Sāvatthijetavanānaṃ bhūmibhāgavasena bhinnattā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘na hi sakkā ubhayattha ekaṃ samayaṃ viharitu’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^Apākaṭā^eb^ti sakko suyāmotiādinā anabhiññātā. Abhiññātānampi aññatarasaddo dissateva ekasadisāyattattāti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘abhijānāti no’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Ahunā^eb^ idāneva. ^b^Sādhāraṇavacanaṃ^eb^ dibbataṃ antonītaṃ katvā. Devo eva ^b^devatā^eb^ purisepi vattanato. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘imasmiṃ panatthe’’^eb^tiādi. Nanu ca rūpāvacarasattānaṃ purisindriyaṃ natthi, yena te purisāti vucceyyuṃ? Yadipi purisindriyaṃ natthi, purisasaṇṭhānassa pana purisavesassa ca vasena purisapuggalātveva vuccanti purisapakatibhāvato.

[03]^b^Abhikkantā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0042^ea^ atikkantā, vigatāti atthoti āha ^b^‘‘khaye dissatī’’^eb^ti. Teneva hi ^b^‘‘nikkhanto paṭhamo yāmo’’^eb^ti upari vuttaṃ. ^b^Abhikkantataro^eb^ti ativiya kantataro. Tādiso ca sundaro bhaddako nāma hotīti āha ^b^‘‘sundare dissatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ko^eb^ti devanāgayakkhagandhabbādīsu ko katamo? ^b^Me^eb^ti mama. ^b^Pādānī^eb^ti pāde. ^b^Iddhiyā^eb^ti imāya evarūpāya deviddhiyā. ^b^Yasasā^eb^ti iminā edisena parivārena paricchadena ca. ^b^Jala^eb^nti vijjotamāno. ^b^Abhikkantenā^eb^ti ativiya kantena kamaniyena abhirūpena. ^b^Vaṇṇenā^eb^ti chavivaṇṇena sarīravaṇṇanibhāya. ^b^Sabbā obhāsayaṃ disā^eb^ti sabbāpi disā pabhāsento cando viya sūriyo viya ca ekobhāsaṃ ekālokaṃ karontoti gāthāya attho. ^b^Abhirūpe^eb^ti uḷārarūpe sampannarūpe.

[03]Kañcanasannibhattacatā suvaṇṇavaṇṇaggahaṇena gahitāti adhippāyenāha ^b^‘‘chaviya’’^eb^nti. Chavigatā ^a^V1.0038^ea^ pana vaṇṇadhātu eva ‘‘suvaṇṇavaṇṇo’’ti ettha vaṇṇaggahaṇena gahitāti apare. Vaṇṇanaṃ kittiyā ugghosananti ^b^vaṇṇo,^eb^ thuti. Vaṇṇīyati asaṅkarato vavatthapīyatīti ^b^vaṇṇo,^eb^ kulavaggo. Vaṇṇīyati phalaṃ etena yathāsabhāvato vibhāvīyatīti ^b^vaṇṇo,^eb^ kāraṇaṃ. Vaṇṇanaṃ dīgharassādivasena saṇṭhahananti ^b^vaṇṇo,^eb^ saṇṭhānaṃ. Vaṇṇīyati aṇumahantādivasena pamīyatīti ^b^vaṇṇo,^eb^ pamāṇaṃ. Vaṇṇeti vikāraṃ āpajjamānaṃ hadayaṅgatabhāvaṃ pakāsetīti ^b^vaṇṇo,^eb^ rūpāyatanaṃ. Evaṃ tena tena pavattinimittena vaṇṇasaddassa tasmiṃ tasmiṃ atthe pavatti veditabbā. ^b^Iddhiṃ māpetvā^eb^ti vatthālaṅkārakāyādīhi obhāsamuñcanādivasena dibbaṃ iddhānubhāvaṃ nimminitvā. ^b^Kāmāvacarā anabhisaṅkhatenapi āgantuṃ sakkonti^eb^ oḷārikarūpattā. Tathā hi te kabaḷīkārabhakkhā. ^b^Rūpāvacarā na sakkonti^eb^ tato sukhumatararūpattā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tesaṃ hī’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ‘‘atisukhumo’’ti mūlapaṭisandhirūpaṃ sandhāya vadati. ^b^Na tena iriyāpathakappanaṃ hotī^eb^ti etena brahmalokepi brahmāno yebhuyyena nimmitarūpeneva pavattantīti dasseti. Itarañhi ativiya sukhumaṃ rūpaṃ kevalaṃ cittuppādassa nissayādhiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ saṇṭhānavantaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati.

[03]^b^Anavasesattaṃ^eb^ sakalatā. ^b^Yebhuyyatā^eb^ bahulabhāvo. ^b^Abyāmissatā^eb^ vijātiyena asaṅkaro. Sukhena hi avokiṇṇatā tattha adhippetā ^a^M1.0043^ea^. ^b^Anatirekatā^eb^ taṃparamatā visesābhāvo. ^b^Kevalakappa^eb^nti kevalaṃ daḷhaṃ katvāti attho. ^b^Saṅghabhedāyā^eb^ti saṅghe vivādāya, vivāduppādāyāti attho. Kevalaṃ vuccati nibbānaṃ sabbasaṅkhatavivittattā, etassa taṃ atthīti ^b^kevalī,^eb^ sacchikatanirodho khīṇāsavo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘visaṃyogo attho’’^eb^ti.

[03]Kappasaddo panāyaṃ saupasaggo anupasaggo cāti adhippāyena okappaniyapade labbhamānaṃ kappasaddamattaṃ dasseti, aññathā kappapadaṃ anidassanameva siyā. ^b^Samaṇakappehī^eb^ti vinayasiddhehi samaṇavohārehi. ^b^Niccakappa^eb^nti niccakālaṃ. ^b^Paññattī^eb^ti nāmaṃ. Nāmañhetaṃ tassa āyasmato, yadidaṃ kappoti. ^b^Kappitakesamassū^eb^ti kattarikāya cheditakesamassu. ^b^Dvaṅgulakappo^eb^ti majjhanhikavelāya vītikkantāya dvaṅgulatāvikappo. ^b^Leso^eb^ti apadeso. Anavasesaṃ pharituṃ samatthassapi obhāsassa kenacipi kāraṇena ekadesapharaṇampi siyā, ayaṃ pana sabbasova pharatīti dassetuṃ samantattho kappa-saddo gahitoti āha ^b^‘‘anavasesaṃ samantato’’^eb^ti. Īsaṃ asamattaṃ, kevalaṃ vā ^b^kevalakappaṃ^eb^. Bhagavato ābhāya anobhāsitameva hi padesaṃ devatā attano pabhāya obhāsenti. Na hi bhagavato pabhā kāyaci pabhāya abhibhuyyati, sūriyādīnampi pabhaṃ sā abhibhuyya tiṭṭhatīti.

[03]^b^Yena^eb^^a^V1.0039^ea^^b^vā kāraṇenā^eb^ti hetumhi idaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ. Hetuattho hi kiriyāya kāraṇaṃ, na karaṇaṃ viya kiriyattho, tasmā nānappakāra-guṇavisesādhigamanatthā idha upasaṅkamanakiriyāti ‘‘annena vasati, vijjāya vasatī’’tiādīsu viya hetuatthameva taṃ karaṇavacanaṃ yuttaṃ na karaṇatthaṃ tassa ayujjamānattāti vuttaṃ ‘‘yena vā kāraṇenā’’tiādi. Bhagavato satatappavattaniratisaya-sāduvipulamatarasa-saddhammaphalatāya sāduphalaniccaphalitamahārukkhena bhagavā upamito. Sāduphalūpabhogādhippāyaggahaṇeneva hi mahākāruṇikassa sāduphalatā gahitāti. ^b^Upasaṅkamī^eb^ti upasaṅkantā. Sampattakāmatāya hi kiñci ṭhānaṃ gacchanto ^a^M1.0044^ea^ taṃtaṃpadesātikkamanena upasaṅkami, upasaṅkantoti vattabbataṃ labhati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘gatāti vuttaṃ hotī’’^eb^ti, upagatāti attho. ^b^Upasaṅkamitvā^eb^ti pubbakālakiriyāniddesoti āha ^b^‘‘upasaṅkamanapariyosānadīpana’’^eb^nti. ^b^Tato^eb^ti yaṃ ṭhānaṃ pattā ‘‘upasaṅkamī’’ti vuttā, tato upagataṭṭhānato.

[03]Gatinivattiatthato sāmaññato āsanampi ṭhānaggahaṇena gayhatīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘āsanakusalatāya ekamantaṃ tiṭṭhantī’’^eb^ti. Nisinnāpi hi gamanato nivattā nāma honti ṭhatvā nisīditabbattā, yathāvuttaṭṭhānādayopi āsaneneva saṅgahitāti. Atidūrāccāsannapaṭikkhepena nātidūranaccāsannaṃ nāma gahitaṃ. Taṃ pana avakaṃsato ubhinnaṃ pasāritahatthasaṅghaṭṭanena daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Gīvaṃ pasāretvā^eb^ti gīvaṃ parivattanavasena pasāretvā.

[03]Kāmaṃ ‘‘katha’’nti ayamākārapucchā, taraṇākāro idha pucchito. So pana taraṇākāro atthato kāraṇamevāti āha ^b^‘‘kathaṃ nūti kāraṇapucchā’’^eb^ti? ^b^Pākaṭo^eb^ abhisambodhiyaṃ mahāpathavīkampanādianekacchariyapātubhāvādinā.

[03]Marisanaṭṭhena pāpānaṃ rogādianatthānaṃ abhibhavanaṭṭhena ^b^māriso,^eb^ dukkharahito. Tenāha ^b^‘‘niddukkhāti vuttaṃ hotī’’^eb^ti. Nirayapakkhe piyālapanavacanavasena upacāravacanañcetaṃ yathā ‘‘devānaṃ piyā’’ti. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘yadi eva’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Saṅkunā saṅkū^eb^ti matthakato samakoṭṭitena yāva hadayapadesā nibbijjhitvā otiṇṇena saṅkunā pādatalato samakoṭṭito saṅku nibbijjhitvā ārohanto ^b^hadaye^eb^ hadayassa padese samāgaccheyya, atha nesaṃ saṅkūnaṃ samāgamasamakāle ^b^naṃ^eb^ yathātikkantasaṅkukaraṇakālaṃ jāneyyāsi. Kiñci nimittaṃ upādāya kismiñci atthe pavattassa saddassa tannimittarahite pavatti ruḷhī nāma gamanakiriyārahite sāsanādimati paṭipiṇḍe yathā gosaddassa.

[03]^b^Oghamatarī^eb^ti ^a^V1.0040^ea^ yesaṃ oghānaṃ taraṇaṃ pucchitaṃ, te gaṇanaparicchedato sarūpato ca dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘cattāro’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Kasmā panettha cattāro ^a^M1.0045^ea^ eva oghā vuttā, te ca kāmādayo evāti? Na codetabbametaṃ, yasmā dhammānaṃ sabhāvakiccavisesaññunā bhagavatā sabbaṃ ñeyyaṃ yāthāvato abhisambujjhitvā ettakāva oghā desitā, ime eva ca desitāti. Vaṭṭasmiṃ ohananti osīdāpentīti oghā, ohananti heṭṭhā katvā hananti gāmenti, tathābhūtā satte adho gāmenti nāma. Ayañca attho ‘‘sabbopi cesā’’tiādinā parato aṭṭhakathāyameva āgamissati. Kāmanaṭṭhena ^b^kāmo,^eb^ kāmo ca so yathāvuttenatthena ogho cāti, kāmesu oghoti vā ^b^kāmogho^eb^. Bhavogho nāma bhavarāgoti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘rūpārūpabhavesu chandarāgo jhānanikanti cā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Sumaṅgalavilāsinī^eb^ādīsu (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 3.312) pana ‘‘sassatadiṭṭhisahagatarāgo cā’’ti vuttaṃ. Tattha paṭhamo upapattibhavesu rāgo, dutiyo kammabhave. Bhavadiṭṭhivinimuttassa diṭṭhigatassa abhāvato. ^b^‘‘Dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhiyo diṭṭhogho’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ, catusaccantogadhattā sabbassa ñeyyassa ^b^‘‘catūsu saccesu aññāṇaṃ avijjogho’’^eb^ti āha.

[03]Idāni tesaṃ oghasaṅkhātānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ uppattiṭṭhānaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘tatthā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ, pavattiṭṭhānaṃ pana kāmaguṇādayo dassitā eva. ‘‘Pañcasu kāmaguṇesu chandarāgo kāmogho’’ti ettha bhavoghaṃ ṭhapetvā sabbo lobho kāmoghoti yuttaṃ siyā. Sassatadiṭṭhisahagato rāgo bhavadiṭṭhisampayuttattā bhavoghoti aṭṭhakathāsu vutto, bhavogho pana diṭṭhigatavippayuttesu eva uppajjatīti pāḷiyaṃ vutto. Tenevāha – ^b^‘‘bhavogho catūsu diṭṭhivippayuttalobhasahagatacittuppādesu uppajjatī’’^eb^ti. Tasmā diṭṭhisahagatalobhopi kāmoghoti yuttaṃ siyā. Diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikadukkhānañhi kāraṇabhūtā kāmāsavādayopi dvidhā vuttā, āsavā eva ca oghā. Kāmāsavaniddese ca kāmesūti kāmarāgadiṭṭhirāgādīnaṃ ārammaṇabhūtesu tebhūmakesu vatthukāmesūti attho sambhavati. Tattha hi uppajjamānā sāyaṃ taṇhā sabbāpi na kāmacchandādināmaṃ na labhatīti.

[03]Yadi pana pañcakāmaguṇiko ca rāgo kāmoghoti vuttoti katvā brahmānaṃ vimānādīsu rāgassa diṭṭhirāgassa ca kāmoghabhāvo paṭisedhitabbo siyā, evaṃ sati kāmoghabhavoghavinimuttena nāma lobhena bhavitabbaṃ ^a^M1.0046^ea^. So yadā diṭṭhigatavippayuttesu uppajjati, tadā tena sampayutto avijjogho oghavippayuttoti domanassavicikicchuddhaccasampayuttassa viya tassapi oghavippayuttatā vattabbā siyā ‘‘catūsupi diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatesu cittuppādesu uppanno moho siyā oghasampayutto siyā oghavippayutto’’ti. ‘‘Kāmogho aṭṭhasu lobhasahagatesu ^a^V1.0041^ea^ cittuppādesu uppajjatī’’ti, ‘‘kāmoghaṃ paṭicca diṭṭhogho avijjogho’’ti ca vacanato diṭṭhisahagato kāmogho na hotīti na sakkā vattuṃ. Tathā hettha ‘‘rūpārūpabhavesu chandarāgo jhānanikanti ca bhavogho nāmāti ettakameva vuttaṃ, na vuttaṃ sassatadiṭṭhisahagato rāgo’’ti.

[03]^b^Adhogamanaṭṭhenā^eb^ti heṭṭhāpavattanaṭṭhena. Heṭṭhāpavattanañcettha na kevalaṃ apāyagamaniyabhāvena, atha kho saṃsāratarakāvarodhanenapīti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘uparibhavañcā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Kāmaṃ nibbānaṃ arūpibhāvā adesaṃ, na tassa ṭhānavasena uparigahaṇaṃ, sabbasaṅkhatavinissaṭattā pana sabbassapi bhavassa uparīti vattabbataṃ arahatīti katvā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘uparibhavaṃ nibbāna’’^eb^nti. ‘‘Mahāudakogho’’tiādīsu rāsaṭṭho ogha-saddoti ‘‘mahā heso kilesarāsī’’ti vuttaṃ ^b^sesesupī^eb^ti bhavoghādīsupi.

[03]Appatiṭṭhahantoti kilesādīnaṃ vasena asantiṭṭhanto, asaṃsīdantoti attho. ^b^Anāyūhanto^eb^ti abhisaṅkhārādivasena na āyūhanto majjhimaṃ paṭipadaṃ vilaṅghitvā nibbuyhanto. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘avāyamanto’’^eb^ti, micchāvāyāmavasena avāyamantoti adhippāyo. Gūḷhanti saṃvutaṃ. ^b^Paṭicchanna^eb^nti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Atthavasena vā saṃvuttaṃ ^b^gūḷhaṃ,^eb^ saddavasenapi apākaṭaṃ ^b^paṭicchannaṃ^eb^ antaradīpādike ^b^ṭhātabbaṭṭhāne. Āyūhantā^eb^ti hatthehi ca pādehi ca vāyamantā. ^b^Etaṃ^eb^ atthajātaṃ, ^b^etaṃ^eb^ vā vissajjanaṃ.

[03]Idāni yenādhippāyena bhagavatā tathāgūḷhaṃ katvā pañho kathito, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘kiṃ panā^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Niggahamukhenā^eb^ti veneyyānaṃ vinayaupāyabhūtaniggahavasena. Tenāha ^b^ye paṇḍitamānino’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Pavayha pavayhā^eb^ti ophuṇitvā ophuṇitvā.

[03]^b^So^eb^ti ^a^M1.0047^ea^ devaputto ^b^nihatamāno^eb^ ahosi yathāvissajjitassa atthassa ajānanto. ^b^Yathā^eb^ti aniyamavacanaṃ niyamaniddiṭṭhaṃ hoti, taṃsambandhañca kathanti pucchāvacananti tadubhayassa atthaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘yathāhaṃ jānāmi, evaṃ me kathehī’’^eb^ti āha.

[03]^b^Yadāsvāha^eb^nti yadā su ahaṃ, su-kāro nipātamattaṃ ‘‘yadidaṃ kathaṃ sū’’tiādīsu viya. ^b^Sabbapadesū^eb^ti ‘‘tadāssu saṃsīdāmī’’tiādīsu tīsupi padesu. ^b^Ataranto^eb^ti oghānaṃ atikkamanatthaṃ taraṇappayogaṃ akaronto. ^b^Tatthevā^eb^ti oghaniyaoghesu eva. ^b^Osīdāmī^eb^ti nimujjāmi ^a^V1.0042^ea^ oghehi ajjhotthaṭo homi. ^b^Nibbuyhāmī^eb^ti oghehi nibbūḷho homi. ^b^Ṭhātuṃ asakkonto^eb^ asaṃsīdanto. ^b^Ativattāmī^eb^ti anupayogaṃ atikkamāmi, apanidhānavasena sammāpaṭipattiṃ virādhemīti attho. ^b^Ṭhāne ca vāyāme cā^eb^ti vakkhamānavibhāge patiṭṭhahane vāyāme ca ^b^dosaṃ disvā^eb^ti patiṭṭhānāyūhanesu saṃsīdananibbuyhanasaṅkhātaṃ taraṇassa vibandhanabhūtaṃ ādīnavaṃ disvāna. Idaṃ bhagavatā bodhimūle attanā pavattita-pubbabhāga-manasikāravasena vuttaṃ. ^b^Atiṭṭhanto avāyamanto^eb^ti patiṭṭhānāyūhanakaraṇakilesādīnaṃ parivajjanena asaṃsīdanto anibbuyhanto. ^b^Devatāyapi paṭividdho^eb^ tadattho upanissayasampannatāya vimuttiparipācanīyadhammānaṃ paripakkattā. ^b^Na pana pākaṭo^eb^ vipañcitaññūādīnaṃ, ugghaṭitaññūnaṃ pana yathā tassā devatāya, tathā pākaṭo evāti. ^b^Satta dukā^eb^ idāni vuccamānarūpā ^b^dassitā^eb^ porāṇaṭṭhakathāyaṃ. ^b^Kilesavasena santiṭṭhanto^eb^ti lobhādīhi abhibhūtatāya saṃsāre patiṭṭhahanto sammā appaṭipajjanena tattheva saṃsīdati nāma. ^b^Abhisaṅkhāravasenā^eb^ti tatthevābhisaṅkhāracetanāya cetento sammāpaṭipattiyogyassa khaṇassa ativattanena nibbuyhati nāma. Iminā nayena sesadukesupi attho veditabbo.

[03]Ettha ca vaṭṭamūlakā kilesāti tesaṃ vasena saṃsāre avaṭṭhānaṃ taṃtaṃkammunā tattha tattha bhave abhinibbatti, kilesā pana tesaṃ paccayamattaṃ. Tattha tattha bhave aparāparaṃ nibbattento saṃsāre nibbuyhati nāmāti imassa atthassa dassanavasena ^b^paṭhamaduko^eb^ vutto. Ime sattā saṃsāre paribbhamantā duvidhā taṇhācaritā diṭṭhicaritā cāti tesaṃ saṃsāranāyikabhūtānaṃ dhammānaṃ vasena santiṭṭhanaṃ, tadaññesaṃ pavattipaccayānaṃ vasena ^a^M1.0048^ea^ āyūhananti imassa atthassa dassanavasena ^b^dutiyaduko^eb^ vutto. Saṃyojaniyesu dhammesu assādadassanasabhāvāya taṇhāya vasena visesato patiṭṭhānaṃ, amuttimagge muttimaggaparāmāsato tathā āyūhanampi diṭṭhiyā vasena hotīti dassetuṃ ^b^tatiyaduko^eb^ vutto. ^b^Catutthaduke^eb^ pana adhippāyo aṭṭhakathāya eva vibhāvito. Yasmā ‘‘sassato attā’’ti abhinivisanto arūparāgaṃ, asaññūpagaṃ vā avimokkhaṃyeva vimokkhoti gahetvā saṃsāre eva olīyati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘olīyanābhinivesā hi bhavadiṭṭhī’’^eb^ti. Yasmā pana kāmabhavādīsu yaṃ vā taṃ vā bhavaṃ patvā attā ucchijjati vinassati, na hoti paraṃ maraṇāti abhinivisanto bhavavippamokkhāvahāya sammāpaṭipattiyā appaṭipajjanena taṃ ativattati. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘atidhāvanābhinivesā vibhavadiṭṭhī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Līnavasena santiṭṭhanto^eb^ti kosajjādivasena saṃkocāpajjanena sammā appaṭipajjanto. ^b^Uddhaccavasena āyūhanto^eb^ti sammāsamādhino abhāvena vikkhepavasena ^b^pañcamo duko^eb^ vutto. Yathā kāmasukhaṃ paviṭṭhassa samādhānaṃ natthi cittassa upakkiliṭṭhattā, evaṃ attaparitāpanamanuyuttassa kāyassa ^a^V1.0043^ea^ upakkiliṭṭhattā. Iti cittakāyaparikkilesakarā dve antā taṇhādiṭṭhinissayatāya saṃsīdananibbuyhananimittā vuttā ^b^chaṭṭhaduke^eb^. Pubbe sappadesatova saṃkilesadhammā ‘‘saṃsīdananimitta’’nti dassitāti idāni nippadesato dassanavasena, pubbe ca sādhāraṇato abhisaṅkhāradhammā ‘‘nibbuyhananimitta’’nti dassitāti idāni puññāneñjābhisaṅkhāre eva ‘‘āyūhananimitta’’nti dassanavasena ^b^sattamaduko^eb^ vutto. Evañhi duggatisugatūpapattivasena saṃsīdananibbuyhanāni vibhajja dassitāni hontīti. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘vuttampi ceta’’^eb^ntiādi. Adhobhāgaṃ duggatiṃ gamentīti ^b^adhobhāgaṅgamanīyā^eb^ anunāsikalopaṃ akatvā. Tathā uparibhāgaṃ gamentīti ^b^uparibhāgaṅgamanīyā^eb^.

[03]Ettha ca oghataraṇaṃ pucchitena bhagavatā ^b^‘‘appatiṭṭhaṃ anāyūha’’^eb^nti tassa pahānaṅgameva dassitaṃ, na sampayogaṅganti? Na evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, yāvatā yena patiṭṭhānaṃ hoti, yena ca āyūhanaṃ, tadubhayapaṭikkhepamukhena tappaṭipakkhadhammadassanametanti. Na hesa a-kāro kevalaṃ paṭisedhe, atha ^a^M1.0049^ea^ kho paṭipakkhe ‘‘akusalā dhammā, ahito, adhammo’’tiādīsu viya, tasmā ^b^appatiṭṭhaṃ anāyūha^eb^nti patiṭṭhānāyūhanānaṃ paṭipakkhavasena pavattamāno tathāpavattihetūvāti ayamettha attho. ^b^Kho^eb^ti ca avadhāraṇatthe nipāto ‘‘assosi kho’’tiādīsu (pārā. 1) viya. Tena appatiṭṭhānassa ekaṃsikataṃ dasseti. Soyaṃ kho-saddo ‘‘anāyūha’’nti etthāpi ānetvā vattabbo. Anāyūhanampi hi ekaṃsikamevāti tassa paṭipakkho saha vipassanāya ariyamaggo. Tena hi oghataraṇaṃ hoti, na aññathā. Evamayaṃ yathānusandhidesanā katā, devatā ca sahavipassanaṃ maggaṃ paṭivijjhīti paṭhamaphale patiṭṭhāsi. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘imaṃ pañhavissajjana’’^eb^ntiādi.

[03]‘‘Cirassā’’ti iminā samānatthaṃ padantarametanti āha ^b^‘‘cirassa kālassā’’^eb^ti yathā ‘‘mamaṃ vā, bhikkhave’’ti (dī. ni. 1.5-6) ettha ‘‘mamā’’ti iminā samānatthaṃ padantaraṃ mamanti. ^b^Na diṭṭhapubbā^eb^ti adassāvī. Adassāvitā ca disvā kattabbakiccassa asiddhatāya veditabbā. Aññathā kā nāma sā devatā, yā bhagavantaṃ na diṭṭhavatī? Tenāha ^b^‘‘kiṃ panimāyā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Dassanaṃ upādāya evaṃ vattuṃ vattatī^eb^ti yadā kadāci kañci piyajātikaṃ disvā taṃ dassanaṃ upādāya ‘‘cirena vata mayaṃ āyasmantaṃ passāmā’’ti adiṭṭhapubbaṃ diṭṭhapubbaṃ vā evaṃ vattuṃ yujjati, ayaṃ loke niruḷhe samudācāroti dasseti. Brahmaṃ vā vuccati ariyamaggo, tassa aṇanato jānanato paṭivijjhanato ^b^brāhmaṇo^eb^. ^b^Kilesanibbānenā^eb^ti kilesānaṃ ^a^V1.0044^ea^ accantasamucchedasaṅkhātena nibbānena ^b^nibbutaṃ^eb^ sammadeva vūpasanta-sabbakilesadaratha-pariḷāhaṃ. ^b^Āsattavisattādīhī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena visatādiākāre saṅgaṇhāti. Vuttañhetaṃ –

[08]‘‘Visatāti visattikā, visaṭāti visattikā, visālāti visattikā, visakkatīti visattikā, visaṃvādikāti visattikā, visaṃ haratīti visattikā, visamūlāti visattikā, visaphalāti visattikā, visaparibhogoti visattikā, visālā vā pana sā taṇhā rūpe sadde gandhe rase phoṭṭhabbe dhamme kule gaṇe visatā vitthatāti visattikā’’ti (mahāni. 3).

[03]Tattha ^a^M1.0050^ea^^b^visatā^eb^ti vitthatā rūpādīsu tebhūmakadhammesu abhibyāpanavasena ^b^visaṭā^eb^ti purimavacanameva ta-kārassa ṭa-kāraṃ katvā vuttaṃ. ^b^Visālā^eb^ti vipulā. ^b^Visakkatī^eb^ti parisakkati, sahati vā. Ratto hi rāgavatthunā pādena tāḷiyamānopi sahatīti. Osakkanaṃ vipphandanaṃ vā ^b^‘‘visakkana’’^eb^ntipi vadanti. Aniccādiṃ niccādito. Gaṇhātīti ^b^visaṃvādikā^eb^ hoti. ^b^Visaṃ haratī^eb^ti tathā tathā kāmesu ānisaṃsaṃ passantī vividhehi ākārehi nekkhammābhimukhappavattito cittaṃ saṃharati saṃkhipati, visaṃ vā dukkhaṃ, taṃ harati, vahatīti attho. Dukkhanibbattakakammassa hetubhāvato ^b^visamūlā^eb^. Visaṃ vā dukkhābhibhūtā vedanā mūlaṃ etissāti ^b^visamūlā^eb^. Dukkhasamudayattā visaṃ phalaṃ etissāti ^b^visaphalā^eb^. Taṇhāya rūpādikassa dukkhasseva paribhogo hoti, na amatassāti ^b^visaparibhogo^eb^ti vuttā, sabbattha niruttivasena padasiddhi veditabbā. Yo panettha padhāno attho, taṃ dassetuṃ puna ‘‘visālā vā panā’’tiādi vuttanti evamettha visattikāpadassa attho veditabbo. ^b^Tiṇṇaṃ^eb^ paṭhamadutiyamaggehi. ^b^Nittiṇṇaṃ^eb^ tatiyamaggena. ^b^Uttiṇṇaṃ^eb^ catutthamaggena.

[03]^b^Samanuñño^eb^ti sammadeva katānuñño. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ekajjhāsayo ahosī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Antaradhāyī^eb^ti adassanaṃ agamāsi. Yathā pana antaradhāyi, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘abhisaṅkhatakāya’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Mālehī^eb^ti liṅgavipallāsena vuttaṃ, ‘‘mālāhī’’ti keci paṭhanti, ‘‘malyehī’’ti vattabbe ya-kāralopaṃ katvā niddeso. Ayaṃ tāva aṭṭhakathāya līnatthavaṇṇanā.

[03]Idāni pakaraṇanayena pāḷiyā atthavaṇṇanaṃ karissāma. Sā pana atthavaṇṇanā yasmā desanāya ^a^V1.0045^ea^ samuṭṭhānappayojanabhājanesu piṇḍatthesu ca niddhāritesu sukarā hoti suviññeyyā ca, tasmā suttadesanāya samuṭṭhānādīni paṭhamaṃ niddhārayissāma. Tattha ^b^samuṭṭhānaṃ^eb^ tāva desanānidānaṃ, taṃ sādhāraṇaṃ asādhāraṇanti duvidhaṃ. Tattha sādhāraṇampi abbhantarabāhirabhedato duvidhaṃ. Tattha ^b^sādhāraṇaṃ abbhantarasamuṭṭhānaṃ^eb^ nāma lokanāthassa mahākaruṇā. Tāya hi samussāhitassa bhagavato veneyyānaṃ dhammadesanāya cittaṃ udapādi, yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – ‘‘sattesu ca ^a^M1.0051^ea^ kāruññataṃ paṭicca buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokesī’’tiādi (ma. ni. 1.283; saṃ. ni. 1.172; mahāva. 9). Ettha ca hetuavatthāyapi mahākaruṇāya saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo yāvadeva saṃsāramahoghato saddhammadesanāhatthadānehi sattasantāraṇatthaṃ taduppattito. Yathā ca mahākaruṇā, evaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ dasabalañāṇādīni ca desanāya abbhantarasamuṭṭhānabhāvena vattabbāni. Sabbañhi ñeyyadhammaṃ tesaṃ desetabbappakāraṃ sattānañca āsayānusayādiṃ yāthāvato jānanto bhagavā ṭhānāṭṭhānādīsu kosallena veneyyajjhāsayānurūpaṃ vicittanayadesanaṃ pavattesīti. ^b^Bāhiraṃ^eb^ pana ^b^sādhāraṇaṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ^eb^ dasasahassamahābrahmaparivāra-sahampatimahābrahmuno ajjhesanaṃ. Tadajjhesanuttarakālañhi dhammagambhīratāpaccavekkhaṇājanitaṃ appossukkataṃ paṭippassambhetvā dhammassāmī dhammadesanāya ussāhajāto ahosi. Asādhāraṇampi abbhantarabāhirabhedato duvidhameva. Tattha ^b^abbhantaraṃ^eb^ yāya mahākaruṇāya yena ca desanāñāṇena idaṃ suttaṃ pavattitaṃ, tadubhayaṃ veditabbaṃ ^b^bāhiraṃ^eb^ pana tassā devatāya pucchā, pucchāvasiko hesa suttanikkhepo. Tayidaṃ pāḷiyaṃ āgatameva.

[03]^b^Payojanampi^eb^ sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇato duvidhaṃ. Tattha ^b^sādhāraṇaṃ^eb^ anukkamena yāva anupādāparinibbānaṃ vimuttirasattā bhagavato desanāya. Tenevāha ‘‘etadatthā kathā, etadatthā mantanā’’tiādi (pari. 366). ^b^Asādhāraṇaṃ^eb^ pana tassā devatāya dassanamaggasamadhigamo, ubhayampetaṃ bāhirameva. Sace pana veneyyasantānagatampi desanābalasiddhisaṅkhātaṃ payojanaṃ adhippāyasamijjhanabhāvato yathādhippetatthasiddhiyā mahākāruṇikassa bhagavatopi payojanamevāti gaṇheyya, iminā pariyāyenassa abbhantaratāpi siyā.

[03]Apica tassā devatāya oghataraṇākārassa yāthāvato anavabodho imissā desanāya samuṭṭhānaṃ, tadavabodho payojanaṃ. So hi imāya desanāya bhagavantaṃ payojeti tannipphādanaparāyaṃ desanāti katvā. Yañhi desanāya sādhetabbaṃ phalaṃ, taṃ ākaṅkhitabbattā desakaṃ desanāya payojetīti payojananti vuccati. Tathā devatāya tadaññesañca vineyyānaṃ patiṭṭhānāyūhanavissajjanañcettha payojanaṃ ^a^M1.0052^ea^. Tathā saṃsāracakkanivatti-saddhammacakkappavattisassatādimicchācāra-nirākaraṇaṃ ^a^V1.0046^ea^ sammāvādapurekkhāro akusalamūlasamūhananaṃ kusalamūlasamāropanaṃ apāyadvārapidahanaṃ saggamokkhadvāravivaraṇaṃ pariyuṭṭhānavūpasamanaṃ anusayasamugghātanaṃ ‘‘mutto mocessāmī’’ti purimapaṭiññāavisaṃvādanaṃ tappaṭipakkhamāramanorathavisaṃvādanaṃ titthiyasamayanimmathanaṃ buddhadhammapatiṭṭhāpananti evamādīnipi payojanāni idha veditabbāni.

[03]Yathā devatā oghataraṇe saṃsayapakkhandā, tādisā aññe ca saṅkhātadhammānaṃ sammāsambuddhassa ca paṭipattiṃ ajānantā asaddhammassavana-dhāraṇa-paricaya-manasikāravipallatthabuddhikā saddhammassavana-dhāraṇa-paricayavimukhā ca bhavavimokkhesino vineyyā imissā desanāya ^b^bhājanaṃ^eb^.

[03]^b^Piṇḍatthā^eb^ pana ‘‘appatiṭṭhaṃ anāyūha’’nti padadvaye catusaccakammaṭṭhānānuyogavasena yonisomanasikārabahulīkāro kusalamūlasamāyogo olīyanātidhāvanāvissajjanaṃ upāyavinibandhavidhamanaṃ micchābhinivesadūrībhāvo taṇhāvijjāvisodhanaṃ vaṭṭattayavicchedanupāyo āsavogha-yoga-ganthāgati-taṇhuppādupādānaviyogo cetokhilavivecanaṃ abhinandananivāraṇaṃ saṃsaggātikkamo vivādamūlapariccāgo akusalakammapathaviddhaṃsanaṃ micchattātivattanaṃ anusayamūlacchedo. Sabbakilesa-darathapariḷāha-sārambhapaṭippassambhanaṃ dassanasavananiddeso vijjūpamavajirūpamadhammāpadeso apacayagāmidhammavibhāvanā pahānattayadīpanā sikkhattayānuyogo samathavipassanānuṭṭhānaṃ bhāvanāsacchikiriyāsiddhi sīlakkhandhādipārisuddhīti evamādayo veditabbā.

[03]Tattha yesaṃ kilesādīnaṃ vasena patiṭṭhāti saṃsīdati, yesañca abhisaṅkhārādīnaṃ vasena āyūhati nibbuyhati, ubhayametaṃ samudayasaccaṃ, tappabhāvitā tadubhayanissitā ca khandhā dukkhasaccaṃ, tadubhayamattho, ‘‘appatiṭṭhaṃ anāyūha’’nti adhippetassa atthassa paṭicchannaṃ katvā desanā upāyo mānaniggaṇhanavasena tassā devatāya saccābhisamayakāraṇabhāvato patiṭṭhānāyūhanapaṭikkhepopadesena caturoghanirattharaṇatthikehi antadvayarahitā majjhimā paṭipatti paṭipajjitabbāti ayamettha bhagavato āṇattīti ayaṃ ^b^desanāhāro^eb^.

[03]Parasaṃsayapakkhandanatāya ^a^M1.0053^ea^ ñātukāmatāya ca ^b^kathaṃ nū^eb^ti pucchāvasena vuttaṃ? Abhimukhabhāvato ekapuggalabhāvato ca ‘‘tva’’nti vuttaṃ. Paramukkaṃsagatassa garubhāvassa anaññayogyassa saddhammadhurassa paridīpanato sādhūti marisasīlādiguṇatāya ^b^‘‘mārisā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ ^a^V1.0047^ea^. Avahananato rāsibhāvato ca ^b^‘‘ogha’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Ñātuṃ icchitassa atthassa katattā pariyosāpitattā ^b^‘‘itī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Saṃsīdanalakkhaṇassa patiṭṭhānassa akātabbato sabbaso ca akatattā. ^b^‘‘Appatiṭṭha’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Tayidaṃ akaraṇaṃ ekaṃsikanti ^b^kho^eb^ti avadhāraṇavasena vuttaṃ. Tassa ca appatiṭṭhānassa sasantatigatattā ‘‘tva’’nti ca pucchitattā ^b^‘‘aha’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Devatāya sambodhanato piyālapanato ca, ^b^‘‘āvuso’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Nibbuyhanalakkhaṇassa āyūhanassa akātabbato sabbaso ca akatattā ^b^anāyūha^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Tiṇṇākārassa oghānaṃ anicchitabhāvato eva tattha saṃsayassa anapagatattā oghataraṇassa ca avisesattā ^b^‘‘yathā kathaṃ panā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Tathā saṃsīdanalakkhaṇaṃ patiṭṭhānaṃ saṃsāre ca saṇṭhānanti anatthantarattā abhinnakālikaṃ. Tathā nibbuyhanalakkhaṇaṃ āyūhanaṃ sammāpaṭipattiyā ativattananti anatthantarattā abhinnakālikanti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘yadā svāhaṃ…pe… tadāssu nibbuyhāmī’’^eb^ti. Tadubhayassa paṭipakkhabhāvato paṭibāhanato ca oghātiṇṇāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘evaṃ khvāhaṃ…pe… oghamatari’’^eb^nti.

[03]Ekabuddhantarantarikattā sudūrakālikatāya ^b^‘‘cirassa’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Antarā adiṭṭhapubbatāya vimhayanīyatāya ca ^b^‘‘vatā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Tadā upalabbhamānatāya attapaccakkhatāya ca ^b^‘‘passāmī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Bāhitapāpato brahmassa ca ariyamaggassa aṇanato paṭivijjhanato ^b^‘‘brāhmaṇa’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Kilesasantāpavūpasamanato dukkhasantāpavūpasamanato ca sabbaso nibbutattā ^b^‘‘parinibbuta’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Taraṇapayogassa nibbattitattā upari taritabbābhāvato ca ^b^‘‘tiṇṇa’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Ñāṇacakkhunā oloketabbato lujjanato palujjanato ca ‘‘loke’’ti vuttaṃ. Visayesu sañjanato jātabhāvato ^b^‘‘visattika’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Ñāṇassa paccakkhabhāvato nigamanato ca ^b^‘‘ida’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Bhāsitattā parisamattattā ca ^b^‘‘avocā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Paṭhamaṃ gahitattā paccāmasanato ca ‘‘sā devatā’’ti vuttaṃ. Paṭikkhepassa abhāvato atthassa anumoditabbato ^b^‘‘samanuñño’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Vineyyānaṃ ^a^M1.0054^ea^ sāsanato paramatthasampattito ca ^b^‘‘satthā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Cakkhupathātikkamena tirobhāvūpagamanato ^b^‘‘antaradhāyī’’^eb^ti vuttanti ayaṃ anupadavicayato ^b^vicayahāro^eb^.

[03]Appatiṭṭhānānāyūhanehi oghataraṇaṃ yujjati kilesābhisaṅkhāravijahanena pārasampattisamijjhanato. Sabbakilesa-taṇhādiṭṭhi-taṇhāyatana-sassatādivasena santiṭṭhato saṃsāre saṃsīdanaṃ hotīti yujjati kāraṇassa suppatiṭṭhitabhāvato. Abhisaṅkharaṇakicce kilesābhisaṅkhāre vijjamāne sabbadiṭṭhābhinivesa-atidhāvanābhinivesādīnaṃ vasena āyūhantassa saṃsāramahoghena nibbuyhanaṃ ^a^V1.0048^ea^ hotīti yujjati sammāpaṭipattiyā ativattanato. Brahmassa ariyamaggassa aṇanato paṭivijjhanato brāhmaṇabhāvo yujjjati bāhitapāpattā. Sammadeva santadhammasamadhigamato parinibbutabhāvo yujjati sabbaso savāsanapahīnakilesattā. Tathā ca visattikāya tiṇṇabhāvo yujjati yathā yāya lesopi na dissati, evaṃ aggamaggena tassā samucchinnattāti ayaṃ ^b^yuttihāro^eb^.

[03]Kilesavaṭṭavasena patiṭṭhānaṃ visesato kammavaṭṭassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Abhisaṅkhāravasena āyūhanañca vipākavaṭṭassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Appatiṭṭhānānāyūhanāni oghataraṇassa padaṭṭhānaṃ, oghataraṇaṃ anupādisesanibbānassa. Taṇhāvasena patiṭṭhānassa assādānupassitā padaṭṭhānaṃ. Tenāha bhagavā – ‘‘saṃyojaniyesu, bhikkhave, dhammesu assādānupassino taṇhā pavaḍḍhatī’’ti (saṃ. ni. 2.52, 56).

[03]Khandhāvijjā-phassa-saññā-vitakkāyonisomanasikāra-pāpamittaparatoghosā diṭṭhivasena patiṭṭhānassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Yathāha – ^b^paṭisambhidāmagge^eb^ (paṭi. ma. 1.124) ‘‘khandhāpi diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ, avijjāpi diṭṭhiṭṭhāna’’ntiādi. Taṇhādiṭṭhābhinandanāvasesakilesābhisaṅkhāravasena āyūhanassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Iminā nayena yathārahaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhādivasena patiṭṭhānāyūhanānaṃ padaṭṭhānabhāvo vattabbo. Sesamettha pāḷito eva suniddhāriyaṃ. Ayaṃ ^b^padaṭṭhānahāro^eb^.

[03]^b^Appatiṭṭhaṃ anāyūha^eb^nti patiṭṭhānāyūhanapaṭikkhepena vissajjentena niyyānāvahā sammāpaṭipatti gahitā ekantato oghanittharaṇūpāyabhāvato. Taggahaṇena ca sabbepi sattatiṃsa bodhipakkhiyadhammā gahitā honti niyyānalakkhaṇena ekalakkhaṇattāti ayaṃ ^b^lakkhaṇahāro^eb^.

[03]^b^Nidāna^eb^massā ^a^M1.0055^ea^ devatāya oghataraṇākārassa yāthāvato anavabodhoti vuttovāyamattho. Aññepi ye imaṃ desanaṃ nissāya oghataraṇūpāyaṃ paṭivijjhanti, tepi imissā desanāya nidānanti daṭṭhabbā. ‘‘Kathaṃ nu kho imaṃ desanaṃ nissāya sammadeva paṭivijjhantā catubbidhampi oghaṃ tarantā sakalasaṃsāramahoghato nitthareyyuṃ, pare ca tattha patiṭṭhapeyyu’’nti ayamettha bhagavato ^b^adhippāyo^eb^. Padanibbacanaṃ ^b^niruttaṃ,^eb^ taṃ ‘‘eva’’ntiādinidānapadānaṃ ‘‘katha’’ntiādipāḷipadānañca aṭṭhakathāya tassā līnatthavaṇṇanāya ca vuttanayānusārena sukarattā ativitthārabhayena na vitthārayimha.

[03]Pada-padattha-desanā-nikkhepa-suttasandhi-vasena pañcavidhā ^b^sandhi^eb^. Tattha padassa padantarena sambandho ^a^V1.0049^ea^^b^padasandhi^eb^. Tathā padatthassa padatthantarena sambandho ^b^padatthasandhi,^eb^ yo ‘‘kiriyākārakasambandho’’ti vutto. Nānānusandhikassa taṃtaṃanusandhīti sambandho, ekānusandhikassa pana pubbāparasambandho ^b^desanāsandhi,^eb^ yā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘‘pucchānusandhi ajjhāsayānusandhi yathānusandhī’’ti tidhā vibhattā. Ajjhāsayo cettha attajjhāsayo parajjhāsayoti dvidhā veditabbo. ^b^Nikkhepasandhi^eb^ catunnaṃ suttanikkhepānaṃ vasena veditabbā. Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ ^b^papañcasūdanīṭīkāyaṃ^eb^ vuttanayena gahetabbaṃ. ^b^Suttasandhi^eb^ idha paṭhamanikkhepavasena veditabbā.

[03]‘‘Kasmā panettha oghataraṇasuttameva paṭhamaṃ nikkhitta’’nti nāyamanuyogo katthaci na pavattati? Apica ‘‘appatiṭṭhaṃ anāyūhaṃ oghamatari’’nti patiṭṭhānāyūhanapaṭikkhepavasena antadvayavivajjanamukhena vā majjhimāya paṭipadāya vibhāvanato sabbapaṭhamamidaṃ suttaṃ idha nikkhittaṃ. Antadvayaṃ anupagamma majjhimāya paṭipattiyā saṅkāsanaparañhi buddhānaṃ sāsananti. Yaṃ pana ekissā desanāya desanantarena saddhiṃ saṃsandanaṃ, ayampi desanāsandhi. Sā idha evaṃ veditabbā –
[03]‘‘Appatiṭṭhaṃ…pe… anāyūhaṃ oghamatari’’nti ayaṃ desanā –
[21]‘‘Sabbadā sīlasampanno, paññavā susamāhito;
[22]Āraddhavīriyo pahitatto, oghaṃ tarati duttaraṃ.
[21]‘‘Virato kāmasaññāya, rūpasaṃyojanātigo;
[27]Nandīrāgaparikkhīṇo, so gambhīre na sīdati; (Saṃ. ni. 1.96);
[22]Saddhāya ^a^M1.0056^ea^ tarati oghaṃ, appamādena aṇṇavaṃ. (saṃ. ni. 1.246; su. ni. 186);
[21]‘‘Pañca chinde pañca jahe, pañca cuttari bhāvaye;
[22]Pañcasaṅgātigo bhikkhu, oghatiṇṇoti vuccati. (saṃ. ni. 1.5; dha. pa. 370);
[21]‘‘Tasmā ^a^V1.0050^ea^ jantu sadā sato, kāmāni parivajjaye;
[22]Te pahāya tare oghaṃ, nāvaṃ sitvāva pāragū. (su. ni. 777; mahāni. 6; netti. 5);
[21]‘‘Ekāyanaṃ jātikhayantadassī, maggaṃ pajānāti hitānukampī;
[22]Etena maggena tariṃsu pubbe, tarissanti ye ca taranti ogha’’nti. (saṃ. ni. 5.384, 409; mahāni. 191; cūḷani. pārāyanānugītigāthāniddesa 107; paṭhamavagga 121; netti. 170) –
[07]Evamādīhi desanāhi saṃsandatīti ayaṃ ^b^catubyūho hāro^eb^.

[03]^b^Appatiṭṭhaṃ anāyūha^eb^nti ettha saṃkilesavasena patiṭṭhānaṃ āyūhanañca. Tena ayonisomanasikāro dīpito, santakilesavasena anāyūhanena yonisomanasikāro. Tattha ayonisomanasikaroto taṇhāvijjā pavaḍḍhati. Tesu taṇhāgahaṇena ca taṇhāmūlakā dhammā āvattanti. Avijjāgahaṇena avijjāmūlakaṃ sabbaṃ bhavacakkaṃ āvattati. Yonisomanasikāraggahaṇena ca yonisomanasikāramūlakā dhammā āvattanti catubbidhañca sampatticakkaṃ. Patiṭṭhānāyūhanapaṭikkhepena pana sammāpaṭipatti dīpitā, sā ca saṅkhepato sīlādisaṅgahā. Tattha sīlaggahaṇena ekādasa sīlānisaṃsā āvattanti, samādhiggahaṇena pañcaṅgiko sammāsamādhi pañcaññāṇiko sammāsamādhi samādhiparikkhārā ca āvattanti. Paññāgahaṇena paññā ca sammādiṭṭhīti sammādiṭṭhisudassanā sabbepi ariyamaggadhammā āvattantīti ayaṃ ^b^āvatto hāro^eb^.

[03]Patiṭṭhānaṃ kilesādivasena sattavidhaṃ. Āyūhanaṃ abhisaṅkhārādivasena sattavidhaṃ. Tathā tappaṭipakkhato appatiṭṭhānaṃ anāyūhanañca. Ayamettha dhammavibhatti. Padaṭṭhānabhūmivibhattiyo pana heṭṭhā vuttanayānusārena veditabbā. Ayaṃ ^b^vibhattihāro^eb^.

[03]Pubbabhāgappaṭipadaṃ sammadeva sampādetvā samathavipassanaṃ yuganaddhaṃ katvā bhāvanaṃ ussakkento kilesādīnaṃ dūrīkaraṇato tesaṃ vasena asaṃsīdanto ^a^M1.0057^ea^ anibbuyhanto appatiṭṭhaṃ anāyūhaṃ oghaṃ tarati. Kilesādīnaṃ vasena pana saṃsīdanto nibbuyhanto saṃsāre patiṭṭhānato āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbattiyā āyūhanato oghaṃ na taratīti ayaṃ ^b^parivatto hāro^eb^.

[03]Appatiṭṭhaṃ ^a^V1.0051^ea^ asantiṭṭhanto asaṃsīdanto anibbisaṃ anavinibbisanti pariyāyavacanaṃ, anāyūhaṃ anibbuyhanto acetento apakappentoti pariyāyavacanaṃ, oghaṃ kilesasamuddanti pariyāyavacanaṃ, atari atikkami accavāyīti pariyāyavacanaṃ. Iminā nayena sesapadesupi pariyāyavacanaṃ veditabbanti ayaṃ ^b^vevacano hāro^eb^.

[03]^b^Appatiṭṭhaṃ anāyūha^eb^nti ettha patiṭṭhaṃ āyūhanti kilesānaṃ kiccakaraṇapaññatti. Pariyuṭṭhānānaṃ vibhāvanapaññatti. Abhisaṅkhārānaṃ viruhanapaññatti. Taṇhāya assādapaññatti. Diṭṭhiyā parinipphandanapaññatti. Bhavadiṭṭhiyā bhavābhinivesapaññatti. Vibhavadiṭṭhiyā vipallāsapaññatti. Kāmasukhānuyogassa kāmesu anugijjhanapaññatti. Attakilamathānuyogassa attaparitāpanapaññatti. Appatiṭṭhaṃ anāyūhanti pana abhiññeyyadhammānaṃ abhiññāpaññatti. Pariññeyyadhammānaṃ pariññāpaññatti. Oghamatarinti pahātabbadhammānaṃ pahānapaññatti. Maggassa bhāvanāpaññatti. Nirodhassa sacchikiriyāpaññattīti ayaṃ ^b^paññattihāro^eb^.

[03]^b^Appatiṭṭhaṃ anāyūha^eb^nti ettha patiṭṭhānāyūhanaggahaṇena oghaggahaṇena ca samudayasaccaṃ gahitaṃ. Appatiṭṭhaṃ anāyūhaṃ atarinti pana padattayena maggasaccaṃ gahitaṃ, hetugahaṇena ca hetumato gahaṇaṃ siddhamevāti dukkhanirodhasaccāni atthato gahitānevāti ayaṃ saccehi otaraṇā. Tattha ye lokiyā pañcakkhandhā, yesaṃ vasena patiṭṭhānāyūhanasiddhi. Ye lokuttarā cattāro khandhā, yesaṃ vasena oghataraṇasiddhi. Ayaṃ khandhamukhena otaraṇā. Ye eva pañcakkhandhā dvādasāyatanāni aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo, te cattāro khandhā dvāyatanāni dve dhātuyoti ayaṃ āyatanamukhena dhātumukhena ca otaraṇā. Tathā appatiṭṭhaṃ anāyūhanti ettha patiṭṭhānāyūhanaggahaṇena kilesābhisaṅkhārādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ. Kilesābhisaṅkhārādayo oghā ca saṅkhārakkhandhā dhammāyatanaṃ dhammadhātu ca, appatiṭṭhānānāyūhanaggahaṇena oghataraṇavacanena ca saha vipassanāya maggo kathito. Evañca saṅkhārakkhandho dhammāyatanaṃ dhammadhātu ca ^a^M1.0058^ea^ gahitāti evampi khandhamukhena āyatanamukhena dhātumukhena otaraṇā. Vipassanā ce aniccānupassanā, animittamukhena vimokkhamukhaṃ, dukkhānupassanā ce, appaṇihitavimokkhamukhaṃ, anattānupassanā ce, suññatavimokkhamukhanti evaṃ vimokkhamukhena otaraṇaṃ. Magge sekkhā sīlakkhandhādayo dhammāyatanadhammadhātū anāsavā ca evampi kho khandhādimukhena otaraṇāti ayaṃ ^b^otaraṇo hāro^eb^.
[03]^b^Appatiṭṭha^eb^nti ārambho. ^b^Anāyūha^eb^nti padasuddhi, no ārambhasuddhi, tathā ^b^ogha^eb^nti. ^b^Atari^eb^nti pana padasuddhi ceva ārambhasuddhi cāti ayaṃ ^b^sodhano hāro^eb^.

[03]^b^Appatiṭṭhaṃ^eb^^a^V1.0052^ea^^b^anāyūha^eb^nti sāmaññato adhiṭṭhānaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhiādivasena patiṭṭhānāyūhanānaṃ sādhāraṇato paṭikkhepacodanāti katvā ^b^oghamatari^eb^nti taṃ vikappetvā visesavacanaṃ. Oghataraṇañhi cattāro ariyamaggā. Tattha paṭhamadutiyamaggā avisesena diṭṭhoghataraṇaṃ, tatiyamaggo kāmoghataraṇaṃ, aggamaggo sesoghataraṇanti ayaṃ ^b^adhiṭṭhāno hāro^eb^.

[03]Kilesavasena patiṭṭhānassa ayonisomanasikāro hetu. Abhisaṅkhāravasena āyūhanassa kilesā hetū. Appatiṭṭhānānāyūhanānaṃ pana yathākkamaṃ yonisomanasikārapahānāni hetū. Saṃyojaniyesu dhammesu assādānupassanā taṇhāvasena yathārahaṃ tassa hetū. Tenāha bhagavā – ‘‘saṃyojaniyesu, bhikkhave, dhammesu assādānupassino taṇhā pavaḍḍhatī’’ti. Khandhāvijjāphassasaññāvitakkāyonisomanasikārapāpamittaparatoghosā diṭṭhivasena patiṭṭhānassa hetū. Tenāha – ^b^paṭisambhidāmagge^eb^ ‘‘khandhāpi diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ, avijjāpi diṭṭhiṭṭhāna’’ntiādi. Taṇhābhinandanā avasesakilesābhisaṅkhāravasena āyūhanassa hetū. Iminā nayena yathārahaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhivasena patiṭṭhānāyūhanānaṃ hetuvibhāgo niddhāretabbo, tabbipariyāyena appatiṭṭhānānāyūhanānaṃ. Kilesuppādane hi sammadeva ādīnavadassanaṃ appatiṭṭhānassa hetū, abhisaṅkharaṇe ādīnavadassanaṃ anāyūhanassa hetū, vipassanāya ussukkāpanaṃ oghataraṇassa hetūti ayaṃ ^b^parikkhāro hāro^eb^.

[03]Yathāvuttavibhāgehi ^a^M1.0059^ea^ patiṭṭhānāyūhanehi catubbidhassapi oghassa parisuddhi. Appatiṭṭhānānāyūhanehi pana sotānaṃ saṃvaro sabbaso pidhānañcāti catubbidhassapi oghassa visesato pidhānaṃ appavattikaraṇaṃ. Ariyamaggassa bhāvanāya hi kilesavasena patiṭṭhānaṃ abhisaṅkhāravasena āyūhanaṃ upacchinnaṃ, tassa sabbepi oghā tiṇṇā sammatiṇṇā pahīnā hontīti ayaṃ ^b^samāropano hāro^eb^.

[03]^b^Appatiṭṭhaṃ anāyūha^eb^nti ettha patiṭṭhāgahaṇena taṇhāvijjā gahitā. Tāsaṃ hi vasena satto tattha tattha bhave patiṭṭhāti. Āyūhanaggahaṇena tappaccayā abhisaṅkhāradhammā gahitā. Tattha taṇhāya visesato rūpadhammā adhiṭṭhānaṃ, avijjāya arūpadhammā. Tesaṃ yathākkamaṃ samatho ca vipassanā ca paṭipakkhā, te ‘‘appatiṭṭhaṃ anāyūhaṃ oghamatari’’nti padehi pakāsitā honti, tesu samathassa cetovimutti phalaṃ, vipassanāya paññāvimutti. Tathā hi sā ‘‘rāgavirāgā avijjāvirāgā’’ti visesetvā vuccati. Tattha taṇhāvijjā abhisaṅkhāro ca samudayasaccaṃ, tesaṃ adhiṭṭhānabhūtā rūpārūpadhammā dukkhasaccaṃ, tesaṃ appavatti nirodhasaccaṃ, nirodhapajānanā paṭipadā oghataraṇapariyāyena vuttā maggasaccaṃ. Taṇhāgahaṇena cettha māyā-sāṭheyyamānātimāna-madappamāda-pāpicchatā-pāpamittatā-ahirikānottappādivasena ^a^V1.0053^ea^ akusalapakkho netabbo. Avijjāgahaṇena viparītamanasikāra-kodhūpanāha-makkhapaḷāsa-issāmacchariya-sārambha- dovacassatā-bhavadiṭṭhiādivasena akusalapakkho netabbo. Vuttavipariyāyena amāyāasāṭheyyādiaviparītamanasikārādivasena. Tathā samathapakkhiyānaṃ saddhindriyānaṃ vipassanāpakkhiyānaṃ aniccasaññādīnañca vasena vodānapakkho netabboti ayaṃ ^b^nandiyāvattassa nayassa bhūmi^eb^.

[03]Tathā vuttanayena gahitesu taṇhāvijjātappakkhiyadhammesu taṇhā lobho, avijjā moho, avijjāya sampayutto lohite sati pubbo viya taṇhāya sati sijjhamāno āghāto doso iti tīhi akusalamūlehi gahitehi, tappaṭipakkhato ‘‘appatiṭṭha’’ntiādivacanehi ca tīṇi akusalamūlāni tīṇi kusalamūlāni ca siddhāni eva honti. Idhāpi lobho sabbāni sāsavakusalamūlāni āyūhanadhammā ca samudayasaccaṃ, tannibbattā tesaṃ adhiṭṭhānagocarabhūtā ca upādānakkhandhā dukkhasaccantiādinā saccayojanā yojetabbā. Phalaṃ panettha vimokkhattayavasena ^a^M1.0060^ea^ niddhāretabbaṃ, tīhi akusalamūlehi tividhaduccarita-saṃkilesamalavisamākusalasaññā-vitakkādivasena akusalapakkho netabbo, tathā tīhi kusalamūlehi tividhasucarita-samakusalasaññā-vitakka-samādhi-vimokkhamukhādivasena vodānapakkho netabboti ayaṃ ^b^tipukkhalassa nayassa bhūmi^eb^.

[03]Tathā vuttanayena gahitesu taṇhāvijjātappakkhiyadhammesu visesato taṇhādiṭṭhīnaṃ vasena asubhe ‘‘subha’’nti, dukkhe ‘‘sukha’’nti ca vipallāsā, avijjādiṭṭhīnaṃ vasena ‘‘anicce nicca’’nti anattani ‘‘attā’’ti vipallāsā veditabbā. Tesaṃ paṭipakkhato ‘‘appatiṭṭha’’ntiādivacanehi ca laddhehi sativīriyasamādhipaññindriyehi cattāri satipaṭṭhānāni siddhāneva honti.

[03]Tattha catūhi indriyehi cattāro puggalā niddisitabbā. Kathaṃ? Duvidho hi taṇhācarito mudindriyo tikkhindriyoti, tathā diṭṭhicarito. Tesu paṭhamo asubhe ‘‘subha’’nti vipariyesaggāhī satibalena yathābhūtaṃ kāyasabhāvaṃ sallakkhento bhāvanābalena taṃ vipallāsaṃ samugghātetvā sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamati. Dutiyo asukhe ‘‘sukha’’nti vipariyesaggāhī ‘‘uppannaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ nādhivāsetī’’tiādinā vuttena vīriyasaṃvarabhūtena vīriyabalena paṭipakkhaṃ vinodento bhāvanābalena taṃ vipallāsaṃ viddhaṃsetvā sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamati. Tatiyo ^a^V1.0054^ea^ anicce ‘‘nicca’’nti ayāthāvaggāhī samathabalena samāhitacitto saṅkhārānaṃ taṅkhaṇikabhāvaṃ sallakkhento bhāvanābalena taṃ vipallāsaṃ samugghātetvā sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamati. Catuttho santati-samūha-kiccārammaṇa-ghanavañcitatāya phassādidhammapuñjamatte anattani ‘‘attā’’ti micchābhinivesī catukoṭikasuññatāmanasikārena taṃ micchābhinivesaṃ viddhaṃsetvā sāmaññaphalaṃ sacchikaroti. Subhasaññāsukhasaññādīhi catūhi vā vipallāsehi samudayasaccaṃ, tesamadhiṭṭhānārammaṇabhūtā pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhasaccantiādinā saccayojanā veditabbā. Phalaṃ panettha cattāri sāmaññaphalāni, catūhi cettha vipallāsehi caturāsavoghayoga-kāyagantha-agati-taṇhuppādupādāna-sattaviññāṇaṭṭhiti-apariññādivasena akusalapakkho netabbo, tathā catūhi satipaṭṭhānehi catubbidhajhāna-vihārādhiṭṭhāna-sukhabhāgiyadhamma-appamaññāsammappadhāniddhipādādivasena vodānapakkho netabboti ayaṃ ^b^sīhavikkīḷitassa nayassa bhūmi^eb^.

[03]Imesaṃ ^a^M1.0061^ea^ pana tiṇṇaṃ atthanayānaṃ siddhiyā vohāranayadvayaṃ siddhameva hoti. Tathā hi atthanayānaṃ disābhūtadhammālocanaṃ ^b^disālocanaṃ,^eb^ tesaṃ samānayanaṃ ^b^aṅkuso^eb^ti pañcapi nayā idha niyuttāti veditabbā. Idañca suttaṃ soḷasavidhe suttantapaṭṭhāne nibbedhasekkhabhāgiyaṃ byatirekamukhena patiṭṭhānāyūhanāni gahitānīti saṃkilesanibbedhasekkhabhāgiyaṃ cāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Aṭṭhavīsatividhe pana suttantapaṭṭhāne lokiyalokuttaraṃ sattādhiṭṭhānaṃ ñāṇañeyyaṃ dassanabhāvanaṃ sakavacanaṃ vissajjanīyaṃ kusalaṃ anuññātanti veditabbaṃ.
[06]Oghataraṇasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^2^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paṭhamamāgata^eb^nti saṃvaṇṇanāvasena paṭhamasuttādīsu paṭhamaṃ āgatapadaṃ. ^b^Uttānattha^eb^nti pākaṭatthaṃ. Apubbaṃyeva hi duviññeyyatthañca padaṃ saṃvaṇṇetabbaṃ. ^b^No^eb^ti pucchāyaṃ ^b^nu^eb^-saddena samānattho nipātoti āha ^b^‘‘jānāsi noti jānāsi nū’’^eb^ti. Vaṭṭato nimuccanti tena sattāti ^b^nimokkho,^eb^ maggo. So ca pamuccanti tenāti ^b^pamokkho,^eb^ pamuccanante pana adhigantabbattāphalaṃ ‘‘pamokkho’’ti vuttaṃ, yathā arahattaṃ ‘‘rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo’’ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Te^eb^ti sattā. ^b^Viviccatī^eb^ti visuṃ asammisso hoti, vigacchatīti attho. Viviccati dukkhaṃ etasmāti ^b^viveko^eb^. Dutiyavikappe pana sakalavaṭṭadukkhato sattā nimuccanti ettha pamuccanti viviccanti cāti ^b^nimokkho pamokkho viveko,^eb^ nibbānanti attho ^a^V1.0055^ea^ veditabbo. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti ca nimittatthe bhummavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Avadhāraṇattho ^b^kho^eb^-kāro ‘‘assosi kho’’tiādīsu viya.

[03]Nandīmūlako bhavo ^b^nandībhavo^eb^ purimapade uttarapadalopena ‘‘sākabhakkho patthavo sākapatthavo’’ti yathā. Paṭhamaṃ kammavaṭṭapadhānaṃ atthaṃ vatvā puna kilesakammānaṃ vasena ubhayappadhānaṃ atthaṃ vadanto ^b^‘‘nandiyā cā’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Purimanaye^eb^ti nandīmūlako kammabhavo nandībhavoti etasmiṃ pakkhe. ^b^Nandībhavenā^eb^ti nandībhavapadena. ^b^Tividhakammābhisaṅkhāravasenā^eb^ti puññābhisaṅkhārādivasena kāyasaṅkhārādivasena ca tippakārassa kammābhisaṅkhārassa ^a^M1.0062^ea^ vasena. ^b^Saṅkhārakkhandho gahito^eb^ cetanāpadhānattā saṅkhārakkhandhassa. ^b^Saññāviññāṇehī^eb^ti ‘‘saññāviññāṇasaṅkhayā’’ti evaṃ vuttasaññāviññāṇapadehi. ^b^Taṃsampayuttā cā^eb^ti tena yathāvuttasaṅkhārakkhandhena samaṃ yuttā eva. ^b^Dve khandhā^eb^ti saññāviññāṇakkhandhā.

[03]Nanu ettha vedanākkhandho na gahitoti? No na gahitoti dassento ^b^‘‘tehi panā’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Tīhi khandhehī^eb^ti saññāsaṅkhāraviññāṇakkhandhehi. ^b^Gahitāva^eb^ avinābhāvato. Na hi vedanārahito koci cittuppādo atthi. ^b^Anupādiṇṇakāna^eb^nti kusalākusalānaṃ. Na hettha kiriyākhandhānaṃ appavatti adhippetā. ^b^Appavattivasenā^eb^ti anuppattidhammatāpattivasena. Nibbattanavasena kammakilesehi upādīyatīti ^b^upādi,^eb^ pañcakkhandhā. Upādino seso ^b^upādiseso,^eb^ saha upādisesenāti ^b^saupādisesaṃ^eb^. ^b^Nibbānaṃ kathitaṃ^eb^ sakalakammakilesavūpasamatthassa jotitattā. Heṭṭhā dvīhi padehi anupādiṇṇakakkhandhā gahitāti ‘‘vedanāna’’nti ettha upādiṇṇakaggahaṇaṃ yuttanti āha ^b^‘‘upādiṇṇakavedanāna’’^eb^nti. ^b^Nirodhenā^eb^ti tappaṭibaddhachandarāganirodhavasena nirujjhanena. ^b^Upasamenā^eb^ti accantūpasamena appavattanena. Evañca katvā ca-saddaggahaṇaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti. ^b^Tesa^eb^nti tassā vedanāya taṃsampayuttānañca tiṇṇaṃ khandhānaṃ. ^b^Vatthārammaṇavasenā^eb^ti vatthubhūtānaṃ channaṃ ārammaṇabhūtānañca sabbesampi upādiṇṇakarūpadhammānaṃ vasena.

[03]Kasmā pana heṭṭhā cattāro arūpakkhandhāyeva vuttā, rūpakkhandho na gahitoti? Visesabhāvato. Saupādisesanibbānappattiyañhi upādiṇṇakarūpadhammānaṃ viya anupādiṇṇakarūpadhammānaṃ appavattiyeva natthi. ^b^Dutiyanaye^eb^ti nandiyā ca bhavassa cāti etamhi pakkhe. Nandiggahaṇena saṅkhārakkhandho gahito taṃsahacaraṇato. ^b^Upapattibhavasaṅkhāto rūpakkhandho^eb^ti upādiṇṇakarūpadhammameva vadati. Taggahaṇeneva ca tannimittakāni utuāhārajāni, viññāṇaggahaṇena ^a^V1.0056^ea^ cittajānīti catusantatirūpassapettha gahitatā veditabbā. ^b^Saññādīhī^eb^ti saññāviññāṇavedanāgahaṇehi tayo khandhā gahitā, tañca kho upādiṇṇā anupādiṇṇāti vibhāgaṃ akatvā avisesato. Avisesena hi pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ appavatti nibbānaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘evaṃ…pe… nibbānaṃ kathitaṃ hotī’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Nibbāna’’nti hi idha amatamahānibbānaṃ adhippetaṃ. ^b^Imameva ca naya^eb^nti idaṃ yathāvuttaṃ dutiyameva. Cattāro ^a^M1.0063^ea^ mahānikāye dhāretīti ^b^catunikāyiko^eb^. Bhaṇḍikanāmako thero ^b^bhaṇḍikatthero. Itī^eb^ti vuttappakāraparāmasanaṃ. ^b^Nibbānavasenevā^eb^ti paṭhamanaye saupādisesanibbānassa anupādisesanibbānassa ca, dutiye pana ‘‘amatamahānibbānassā’’ti sabbathāpi nibbānasseva vasena bhagavā desanaṃ niṭṭhapesi samāpesīti.
[06]Nimokkhasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^3^eb^^b^.^eb^ Anekatthattā dhātusaddānaṃ upasaggavasena atthavisesavācako hotīti āha ^b^‘‘upanīyatīti parikkhīyati nirujjhatī’’^eb^ti. Vinassatīti attho. Upanīyatīti vā saraseneva jīvitassa maraṇūpagamanaṃ vuttanti āha – ^b^‘‘upagacchati vā, anupubbena maraṇaṃ upetīti attho’’^eb^ti. Kāmañcettha ‘‘upanīyatī’’ti padaṃ apākaṭakammavisesaṃ vuttaṃ. Yathā pana ‘‘sabbaṃ ārogyaṃ byādhipariyosānaṃ, sabbaṃ yobbanaṃ jarāpariyosānaṃ, sabbaṃ jīvitaṃ maraṇapariyosāna’’nti, ‘‘upanīyati jīvita’’nti vuttattā ^b^‘‘maraṇaṃ upetī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Kammakattuvasena hetaṃ vuttaṃ.

[03]Idāni kammasādhanavasena atthaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yathā vā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Gopālena gogaṇo nīyati^eb^ yathicchitaṃ ṭhānaṃ. Jīvanti tena sattā, sahajātadhammā vāti ^b^jīvitaṃ,^eb^ tadeva tesaṃ anupālane ādhipaccasabbhāvato ^b^indriya^eb^nti āha ^b^‘‘jīvitanti jīvitindriya’’^eb^nti ^b^paritta^eb^nti ittaraṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘thoka’’^eb^nti. Pabandhānupacchedassa paccayabhāvo idha jīvitassa maraṇakiccanti adhippetanti āha ^b^‘‘sarasaparittatāya cā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Āyū^eb^ti ca paramāyu idhādhippetaṃ, tañca ajjakālavasena veditabbaṃ.

[03]Imasmiñhi buddhuppāde ayaṃ kathāti jīvitassa atīttarabhāvadīpanaparā ayaṃ desanā. Jīvitindriyavasena jīvitakkhayaṃ niyamento ^b^‘‘ekacittappavattimattoyevā’’^eb^ti āha, ekassa cittuppādassa ^a^V1.0057^ea^ pavattikkhaṇamatto evāti attho. Idāni tamatthaṃ upamāya vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘yathā nāmā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^pavattamāna^eb^nti nemirathīsā vattantī ekeneva nemippadesena ^a^M1.0064^ea^ pavattati ekasmiṃ khaṇeti adhippāyo. ^b^‘‘Ekeneva tiṭṭhatī’’^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^Ekacittakkhaṇika^eb^nti ekacittakkhaṇamattavantaṃ. ^b^Tasmiṃ citte^eb^ti tasmiṃ yasmiṃ kismiñci ekasmiṃ citte. ^b^Niruddhamatte^eb^ti niruddhabhāvappattamatte. ^b^Niruddhoti vuccatī^eb^ti matoti vuccati taṃsamaṅgī satto paramatthato. Avisesaviduno pana aviññāyamānantarena anusandhānassa niruddhanaṃ nirodhaṃ sallakkhenti. Yathāvuttamatthaṃ suttena vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘yathāhā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tena tīsupi kālesu sattānaṃ paramatthato jīvanaṃ maraṇaṃ cittakkhaṇavasenevāti dasseti.

[03]^b^Jīvita^eb^nti jīvitindriyaṃ. ^b^Attabhāvo^eb^ti jīvitavedanāviññāṇāni ṭhapetvā avasiṭṭhadhammā adhippetā. ^b^Sukhadukkhā^eb^ti sukhadukkhā vedanā, upekkhāpi idha sukhadukkhāsveva antogadhā iṭṭhāniṭṭhabhāvato. ^b^Kevalā^eb^ti attanā, niccabhāvena vā avomissā. ^b^Ekacittasamāyuttā^eb^ti ekakena cittena sahitā. ^b^Lahuso vattate khaṇo^eb^ti vuttanayena ekacittakkhaṇikatāya lahuko atīttaro jīvitādīnaṃ khaṇo vattati.

[03]^b^Ye niruddhā marantassā^eb^ti cavantassa sattassa cutito uddhaṃ niruddhāti vattabbā ye khandhā. ^b^Tiṭṭhamānassa vā idhā^eb^ti ye vā idha pavattiyaṃ tiṭṭhamānassa dharantassa bhaṅgappattiyā niruddhā khandhā, ^b^sabbepi sadisā^eb^ te sabbepi ekasadisā ^b^gatā^eb^ atthaṅgatā ^b^appaṭisandhiyā^eb^ puna āgantvā paṭisandhānābhāvena vigatā. Yathā hi cutikhandhā na nibbattanti, evaṃ tato pubbepi khandhā. Tasmā ekacittakkhaṇikaṃ sattānaṃ jīvitanti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^Anibbattena na jāto^eb^ti anuppannena cittena jāto na hoti ‘‘anāgate cittakkhaṇe na jīvittha na jīvati jīvissatī’’ti vattabbato. ^b^Paccuppannena^eb^ vattamānena cittena ^b^jīvati^eb^ jīvamāno nāma hoti, na jīvittha na jīvissati. ^b^Cittabhaṅgā mato loko^eb^ti cuticittassa viya sabbassapi tassa tassa cittassa bhaṅgappattiyā ayaṃ loko paramatthato mato nāma hoti ‘‘atīte cittakkhaṇe jīvittha na jīvati na jīvissatī’’ti vattabbato, niruddhassa appaṭisandhikattā. Evaṃ santepi ^b^paññatti paramatthiyā,^eb^ yāyaṃ taṃ taṃ pavattaṃ cittaṃ upādāya ‘‘tisso jīvati, phusso jīvatī’’ti vacanappavattiyā ^a^M1.0065^ea^ visayabhūtā santānapaññatti, sā ettha paramatthiyā paramatthabhūtā. Tathā hi vuttaṃ ‘‘nāmagottaṃ na jīratī’’ti (saṃ. ni. 1.76).

[03]^b^Na^eb^^a^V1.0058^ea^^b^santi tāṇā^eb^ti jaraṃ upagatassa tato taṃnimittaṃ yaṃ vā pāpakārino pāpakammānaṃ upaṭṭhānavasena puññakārino piyavippayogavasena cittadukkhaṃ ubhayesampi bandhanacchedanādivasena vitujjamānaṃ anappakaṃ sarīradukkhaṃ sammohappatti ca hoti, tato tāyantā na santi. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ saraṇaṃ bhavituṃ samatthā nāma keci natthī’’^eb^ti. Bhāyati etasmāti ^b^bhayaṃ,^eb^ bhayanimittanti āha ^b^‘‘bhayavatthū’’^eb^ti. Taggahaṇena ca cittutrāsalakkhaṇaṃ bhayaṃ gahitameva, sati nimitte nemittaṃ santamevāti. ^b^Pubbacetana^eb^nti ekāvajjanavīthiyaṃ nānāvajjanavīthiyaṃ sampavattaṃ upacārajjhānacetanaṃ. ^b^Aparacetana^eb^nti vasībhāvāpādanavasena parato samāpajjanavasena ca pavattaṃ samāpatticetanaṃ. ^b^Muñcacetana^eb^nti vikkhambhanavasena pavattaṃ paṭhamappanācetanaṃ. Kusalajjhānassa vipākajjhāneva labbhamānaṃ sukhaṃ ^b^jhānasukhaṃ^eb^. Iṭṭhapariyāyo cettha sukha-saddo. Jhāne apekkhā ^b^jhānanikanti^eb^. Jhānassa assādavasena pavatto lobho ^b^jhānassādo^eb^. Yena te te brahmāno jhānato vuṭṭhāya ‘‘aho sukhaṃ aho sukha’’nti vācaṃ nicchāresunti. Yathā devā sukhabahulā tihetupaṭisandhikāvāti paṭipajjantā jhānaṃ adhigantuṃ bhabbā, na itareti ^b^‘‘kāmāvacaradevesū’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Kāmāvacarā ca uparidevā ca ^b^kāmāvacaradevā^eb^ti ekadesasarūpekaseso daṭṭhabbo. Tena manussānampi ekaccānaṃ sabbesampi vā saṅgaho siddho hoti patthanāparikappanāya visayabhāvato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘aho vatime ca…pe… tiṭṭheyyu’’^eb^nti. Thullāni phusitāni vipphurāni etthāti thullaphusitako, kālo, deso vā. Tasmiṃ ^b^thullaphusitake^eb^.

[03]‘‘Puññāni kayirātha sukhāvahānī’’ti vuttattā ^b^‘‘aniyyānikaṃ vaṭṭakathaṃ kathetī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena loko, kilesehi āmasitabbato āmisañcāti ^b^lokāmisaṃ^eb^. Nippariyāyāmisaṃ pana loke āmisantipi ^b^lokāmisaṃ^eb^. Pariyāyeti sabhāvato parivattetvā ñāpeti etenāti pariyāyo, leso, kāraṇaṃ vāti āha ^b^‘‘nippariyāyena cattāro paccayā’’^eb^ti, vaṭṭassa ekantato bālalokeheva ^a^M1.0066^ea^ āmasitabbabhāvato pariyāyāmisatā vuttā. ^b^Idha pari..pe… adhippetaṃ^eb^ vivaṭṭapaṭiyogino icchitattā. Catupaccayāpekkhañhi pahānaṃ. Ekaccassa sakalavaṭṭāpekkhappahānassapi paccayo hotīti ^b^‘‘vaṭṭatiyevā’’^eb^ti sāsaṅkaṃ vadati. Vūpasamati ettha sakalavaṭṭadukkhanti ^b^santi,^eb^ asaṅkhatadhātūti āha ^b^‘‘nibbānasaṅkhāta’’^eb^nti.
[06]Upanīyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^4^eb^^b^.^eb^ Kālayanti ^a^V1.0059^ea^ khepentīti ^b^kālā^eb^. Purebhattādayo hi kālā dhammappavattimattatāya paramatthato avijjamānāpi lokasaṅketamattasiddhā tassāyeva dhammappavattiyā gatagatāya anivattanato taṃ taṃ dhammappavattiṃ khepentā vināsayantā viya sayañca tāhi saddhiṃ accentā viya honti. Tenāha – ‘‘kālo ghasati bhūtāni, sabbāneva sahattanā’’ti (jā. 1.2.190). ^b^‘‘Tarayanti rattiyo’’^eb^ti etthāpi vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo. ‘‘Etaṃ bhayaṃ maraṇe pekkhamāno’’ti vuccamānattā puggalaṃ maraṇūpagamanāya tarayantīti attho vutto. ^b^Vayoguṇā^eb^ti ettha koṭṭhāsā guṇā. Titthiyānaṃ hi carimacittena sakalacitte vayasamūhe vayasamaññāti āha – ^b^‘‘paṭhamamajjhimapacchimavayānaṃ guṇā, rāsayoti attho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ānisaṃsaṭṭho guṇaṭṭho^eb^ ‘‘vākaciraṃ nivāsesiṃ, dvādasaguṇamupāgata’’ntiādīsu (bu. vaṃ. 2.30) viya. ‘‘Tandiguṇāhaṃ karissāmi, diguṇaṃ diguṇaṃ vaddheyyā’’ti ca evamādīsu pana ^b^tabbhāvavuttiattho guṇaṭṭho^eb^.
[21]‘‘Asaṅkhyeyyāni nāmāni, saguṇena mahesino;
[22]Guṇena nāmamuddheyyaṃ, api nāma sahassato’’ti. (dha. sa. aṭṭha. 1313; udā. 53; paṭi. ma. aṭṭha. 1.1.76) –

[07]Ādīsu ^b^pasaṃsaṭṭho guṇaṭṭho^eb^ daṭṭhabbo. ‘‘Vayoguṇā anupubbaṃ jahantī’’ti ettha attho ‘‘accenti kālā’’ti ettha vuttanayo eva. ^b^Paṭhamamajjhimavayā^eb^ti paṭhamaggahaṇañcettha vayassa gatassa apunarāvattidassanatthaṃ kataṃ. Tenevāha – ^b^‘‘maraṇakkhaṇe pana tayopi vayā jahantevā’’^eb^ti.

[03]Ettha ^a^M1.0067^ea^ ca pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘accenti kālā’’ti sāmaññato kālassa apagamanaṃ dassitaṃ, puna taṃ visesatopi dassetuṃ itaradvayaṃ vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana mudindriyassa vasena ‘‘vayoguṇā anupubbaṃ jahantī’’ti vuttaṃ, majjhimindriyassa vasena ‘‘tarayanti rattiyo’’ti vuttanti adhippāyena ^b^‘‘kālāti purebhattādayo kālā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Tasmā tattha ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena pacchābhattapaṭhamayāma-muhuttakālādi-kālakoṭṭhāso eva aṇupabhedo kālavibhāgo gahitoti veditabbo. ^b^Sesa^eb^nti idha dvīsu gāthāsu pacchimaddho. So hi idha atthato adhigatattā anantarasutte ca vuttattā atidisito.
[03]Accentisuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^5^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Chindanto^eb^ti ^a^V1.0060^ea^ samucchindanto. ^b^Kati chindeyyā^eb^ti kittake pāpadhamme samucchindeyya, anuppattidhammataṃ pāpeyya. ^b^Sesapadesupī^eb^ti sesesupi dvīsu padesu. Jahanto kati jaheyya, bhāvento kati uttari bhāveyyāti imamatthaṃ ^b^‘‘eseva nayo’’^eb^ti iminā atidisati. Catutthapadassa pana attho sarūpeneva dassito. ^b^Atthato eka^eb^nti bhāvatthato ekaṃ. Yadi evaṃ kimatthaṃ pariyāyantaraṃ gahitanti āha ^b^‘‘gāthābandhassa panā’’^eb^tiādi. Atthato ettha punarutti atthevāti āha ^b^‘‘saddapunaruttiṃ vajjayantī’’^eb^ti. Saṅgaṃ atikkamayatīti ^b^saṅgātigo^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘ayamevattho’’^eb^ti.

[03]Oraṃ vuccati kāmadhātu, paṭisandhiyā paccayabhāvena tañca bhajantīti ^b^orambhāgiyāni^eb^. Tattha ca kammaṃ tabbipākaṃ satte dukkhaṃ, kammunā vipākaṃ, sattena dukkhaṃ saṃyojentīti ^b^saṃyojanāni,^eb^ sakkāyadiṭṭhi-vicikicchā-sīlabbataparāmāsa-kāmarāga-paṭighā. Uddhaṃ vuccati catasso arūpadhātuyo, vuttanayena taṃ bhajantīti ^b^uddhambhāgiyāni, saṃyojanāni^eb^ rūpārūparāgamānuddhaccāvijjā. ^b^Āropitavacanānurūpeneva evamāhā^eb^ti ‘‘pañca chinde pañca jahe’’ti evaṃ kathesi tassā devatāya sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ. Na kevalaṃ tāya devatāya vuttavacanānurūpato eva, atha kho tesu saṃyojanesu ^a^M1.0068^ea^ vattabbākāratopīti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘atha vā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tena orambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni nāma garūni ducchedāni gāḷhabandhanabhāvato, tasmā tāni sandhāya ^b^‘‘pañca chinde’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03]Uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni pana lahūni succhedāni heṭṭhā pavattitānukkamena bhāvanānayena pahātabbato, tasmā tāni sandhāya ^b^‘‘pañca jahe’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘pādesu baddhapāsasakuṇo viyā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Visesa^eb^nti bhāvanānaṃ visesaṃ vipassanābhāvanaṃ ^b^bhāvento^eb^ uppādento vipaccento vaḍḍhento ca. Saṃsārapaṅke sañjanaṭṭhena rāgo eva saṅgo ^b^‘‘rāgasaṅgo’’^eb^. Esa nayo sesesupi. Yasmā ettha rāga-moha-diṭṭhi-tabbhāgiyasakkāyadiṭṭhi-sīlabbataparāmāsa-kāmarāgāvijjā atthato oghā eva, itare tadekaṭṭhā, tasmā bhagavā saṃyojanappahānasaṅgātikkamehi oghataraṇaṃ kathesi. ^b^Lokiyalokuttarāni kathitāni^eb^ ‘‘bhāvaye’’ti pubbabhāgāya maggabhāvanāya adhippetattā.
[06]Katichindasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^6^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Jāgarata^eb^nti ^a^V1.0061^ea^ anādare sāmivacanaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘indriyesu jāgarantesū’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Vissajjanagāthāyaṃ panā’’ti imassa padassa ‘‘ayamattho veditabbo’’ti iminā sambandho. Pucchāgāthāya pana attho imināva nayena viññāyatīti adhippāyo. ^b^Pañca jāgarataṃ suttā^eb^ti ettha ‘‘suttā’’ti padaṃ apekkhitvā ^b^pañcā^eb^ti paccattavacanaṃ ‘‘jāgarata’’nti padaṃ apekkhitvā sāmivasena pariṇāmetabbaṃ ‘‘pañcannaṃ jāgarata’’nti. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘pañcasu indriyesu jāgarantesū’’^eb^ti, jāgarantesu baddhābhāvena sakiccappasutatāya sakiccasamatthatāya cāti attho. Sottaṃva ^b^suttā^eb^ pamādaniddābhāvato. Tameva suttabhāvaṃ puggalādhiṭṭhānāya kathāya dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘kasmā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Pamajjati, pamādo vā etassa atthīti pamādo, tassa bhāvo ^b^pamādatā,^eb^ tāya, pamattabhāvenāti attho.

[03]Evaṃ ^a^M1.0069^ea^ gāthāya paṭhamassa pādassa atthaṃ vatvā dutiyassa vattuṃ ^b^‘‘evaṃ suttesū’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tassattho vuttanayena veditabbo. Yasmā appahīnasupanakiriyāvasena sanīvaraṇassa puggalassa anuppannarāgarajādayo uppajjanti, uppannā pavaḍḍhanti, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘nīvaraṇeheva kilesarajaṃ ādiyatī’’^eb^ti. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘purimā’’^eb^tiādi. Purimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ aparāparuppattiyā paccayabhāvo hettha ādiyanaṃ. ^b^Pañcahi indriyehi parisujjhatī^eb^ti maggapariyāpannehi saddhādīhi pañcahi indriyehi sakalasaṃkilesato visujjhati. Paññindriyameva hi anaññātaññassāmītindriyādīni, itarāni ca anvayānīti.
[06]Jāgarasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^7^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pavattinivattitadubhayahetuvibhāgassa dhammassapi catusaccantogadhattā āha ^b^‘‘dhammāti catusaccadhammā’’^eb^ti. Cattāripi hi ariyasaccāni catusaccantogadhāni. ^b^Appaṭividdhā^eb^ti pariññābhisamayādivasena anabhisamitā. ^b^Diṭṭhigatavādesū^eb^ti diṭṭhigatasaññitesu vādesu. Diṭṭhigatehi te pavattitā. ^b^Ito paresa^eb^nti ito sāsanikehi paresaṃ aññesaṃ. ^b^Dhammatāyā^eb^ti sabhāvena, sayamevāti attho. ^b^Gacchantī^eb^ti pavattanti diṭṭhivādaṃ paggayha tiṭṭhanti. ^b^Parenā^eb^ti diṭṭhigatikena. ^b^Nīyantī^eb^ti diṭṭhivādasaṅgaṇhane uyyojīyanti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tatthā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Pabujjhitu^eb^nti ^a^V1.0062^ea^ pamādaniddāya paṭibujjhituṃ. ^b^Paṭipadā^eb^ yathādesitassa dhammassa kathitatāya, paṭibujjhituṃ yoniso pavattiyamānattā ^b^bhaddikā^eb^.

[03]^b^Hetunā^eb^ti ñāyena. ^b^Kāraṇenā^eb^ti catusaccānaṃ sambodhayuttiyā. Hatthatale āmalakaṃ viya sabbaṃ ñeyyaṃ jānātīti sabbaññū, teneva sabbaññutābhisambodhena buddhoti ^b^sabbaññubuddho^eb^. Paccekaṃ parehi asādhāraṇatāya visuṃ sayambhuñāṇena saccāni buddhavāti ^b^paccekabuddho^eb^. Paropadesena catusaccaṃ bujjhatīti ^b^catusaccabuddho^eb^. Tathā hi so sayambhutāya abhāvato kevalaṃ catusaccabuddhoti vuccati. Sutena sutamayañāṇena khandhādibhedaṃ ñeyyaṃ buddhavāti ^b^sutabuddho^eb^. Sabbaññubuddhapaccekabuddhe ^a^M1.0070^ea^ ṭhapetvā avasesā aggasāvakamahāsāvakāpi pakatisāvakāpi vītarāgā ^b^avasesā khīṇāsavā. Tayopi purimā vaṭṭanti^eb^ sambuddhātiādivacanato. Sannivasati etenāti sannivāso, caritaṃ. Lokassa sannivāso ^b^lokasannivāso,^eb^ tasmiṃ. Kāyaduccaritādibhede ^b^visame^eb^. Satisammosena ^b^visame vā sattanikāye^eb^. So hi visamayogato visamo. Rāgavisamādike ^b^visame vā kilesajāte^eb^. Taṃ visamaṃ pahāya taṃ visamaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā ^b^samaṃ^eb^ sadisaṃ yuttarūpaṃ, purimakehi vā sambuddhehi ^b^samaṃ^eb^ sadisaṃ ^b^caranti^eb^ vattanti.
[06]Appaṭividitasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^8^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Susammuṭṭhā^eb^ti suṭṭhu ativiya sammuṭṭhā. Satta sekkhā hi susammusitā vinaṭṭhā. Kathaṃ pana te anadhigatā naṭṭhā nāma hontīti āha ^b^‘‘yathā hī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Adhigatassā^eb^ti adhigato assa. So vadantoti sambandho. ^b^Sesa^eb^nti ‘‘dhammā’’tiādi. ^b^Purimasadisamevā^eb^ti anantaragāthāya vuttasadisameva.
[06]Susammuṭṭhasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^9^eb^^b^.^eb^ Seyyādibhedaṃ mānaṃ appahāya taṃ paggayha vicaranto kāmento nāma hotīti āha ^b^‘‘mānaṃ kāmentassa icchantassā’’^eb^ti. Damati cittaṃ etenāti ^b^damo,^eb^ satisambojjhaṅgādiko samādhipakkhiko damo. Manacchaṭṭhāni indriyāni dametīti ^b^damo,^eb^ indriyasaṃvaro. Kilese dameti pajahatīti ^b^damo,^eb^ paññā. Upavasanavasena kāyakammādiṃ dametīti ^b^damo,^eb^ uposathakammaṃ. Kodhūpanāhamakkhamānādike ^a^V1.0063^ea^ dameti vinetīti ^b^damo,^eb^ adhivāsanakhanti. ^b^Tenevā^eb^ti ‘‘damo’’ti samādhipakkhikadhammānaṃ eva adhippetattā ^a^M1.0071^ea^. ‘‘Na monaṃ atthī’’ti ca pāṭho. ^b^Asamāhitassā^eb^ti samādhipaṭikkhepo jotito.

[03]Maccudheyyassa pārataraṇassa vuccamānattā ^b^‘‘monanti catumaggañāṇa’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Na hi tato aññena taṃ sambhavati. ^b^Jānāti^eb^ asammohapaṭivedhavasena paṭivijjhatīti attho. Maccu dhīyati etthāti ^b^maccudheyyaṃ,^eb^ khandhapañcakaṃ maraṇadhammattā. ^b^Tassevā^eb^ti maccudheyyasseva. ^b^Pāraṃ^eb^ paratīrabhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ. ^b^Tareyyā^eb^ti ettha taraṇaṃ nāma ariyamaggabyāpāroti āha ^b^‘‘paṭivijjheyya pāpuṇeyyā’’^eb^ti. Tathā hi vakkhati ‘‘paṭivedhataraṇaṃ nāma vutta’’nti. ‘‘Na tareyya na paṭivijjheyya na pāpuṇeyya vā’’ti ayamettha pāṭho yutto. Aññathā ‘‘idaṃ vuttaṃ hotī’’tiādivacanaṃ virujjheyya. ^b^Eko araññe viharanto^eb^ti ekākī hutvā araññe viharantoti attho.

[03]Kāmaṃ heṭṭhimamaggehipi ekaccassa mānassa pahānaṃ labbhati. Aggamaggeneva pana tassa anavasesato pahānanti āha – ^b^‘‘arahattamaggena navavidhamānaṃ pajahitvā’’^eb^ti. Upacārasamādhipubbako appanāsamādhīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘upacārappanāsamādhīhī’’^eb^ti, na upacārasamādhimattena samādhimattaṃ sandhāya paccekaṃ vākyaparisamāpanassa ayujjanato. Na hi appanaṃ appattaṃ lokuttarajjhānaṃ atthi. ^b^‘‘Sucetaso’’^eb^ti cittassa ñāṇasahitatāya lakkhaṇavacananti āha ^b^‘‘ñāṇasampayuttatāyā’’^eb^tiādi. Tathā hi vakkhati ‘‘sucetasoti ettha cittena paññā dassitā’’ti. ^b^‘‘Sabbadhi vippamutto’’^eb^ti sabbesu bhavādīsu visaṃsaṭṭhacitto sabbaso khandhādīhi visaṃyutto hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sabbesu khandhāyatanādīsu vippamutto hutvā’’^eb^ti. Pariññāpaṭivedho sacchikiriyapaṭivedhena vinā natthīti āha ^b^‘‘tebhūmaka…pe… vutta’’^eb^nti.

[03]Mānaṃ nissāya duccaritacaraṇato ^b^māno nāmāyaṃ sīlabhedano^eb^. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti mānassa sīlapaṭipakkhabhāvato. ^b^Iminā^eb^ paṭipakkhappahānakittanena. ^b^Adhicittasikkhā kathitā^eb^ sarūpato evāti adhippāyo. Ettha ^b^cittenā^eb^ti su-saddena visesitacittena. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti paññāya dassitattā. ^b^Iminā^eb^ti ‘‘sucetaso’’ti iminā padena. Adhisīlasikkhā adhicittasikkhā adhipaññāsikkhāti sīlādīnipi visesetvā vuttāni. Sambhave byabhicāre ca visesanavisesitabbatāti taṃ dassento ^b^‘‘adhisīlañca nāma sīle sati hotī’’^eb^tiādiṃ vatvā tadubhayaṃ ^a^M1.0072^ea^ vibhāgena dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘tasmā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Paṭhamanayo saṅkaravasena pavattoti asaṅkaravasena dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘apicā’’^eb^tiādinā ^a^V1.0064^ea^ dutiyanayo vutto. ^b^‘‘Samāpannā’’^eb^ti etthāpi ‘‘nibbānaṃ patthayantenā’’ti ānetvā sambandho. Vipassanāya pādakabhāvaṃ anupagatāpi tadatthaṃ nibbattanādivasena samāpannāti ayamattho purimanayato viseso. Adhipaññāya panettha purimanayato viseso natthīti sā anuddhaṭā. ^b^Samodhānetvā^eb^ti pariyāyato sarūpato ca saṅgahetvā. ^b^Sakalasāsana^eb^nti tissannaṃ kathitattā eva sikkhattayasaṅgahaṃ sakalasāsanaṃ kathitaṃ hotīti.
[06]Mānakāmasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^10^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Santakilesāna^eb^nti vūpasantakilesapariḷāhānaṃ. Yasmā sīlādiguṇasambhavaṃ tato eva bhayasantañca upādāya paṇḍitā ‘‘santo’’ti vuccanti, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘paṇḍitānaṃ vā’’^eb^ti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘santo have’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Seṭṭhacārīna^eb^nti seṭṭhacariyaṃ carantānaṃ. Yasmā puthujjanakalyāṇato paṭṭhāya bhikkhu maggabrahmacariyavāsaṃ vasati nāma, tasmā āha ^b^‘‘maggabrahmacariyavāsaṃ vasantāna’’^eb^nti. Ariyānaṃ pana mukhavaṇṇassa pasīdane vattabbameva natthi. ^b^Mūlakammaṭṭhāna^eb^nti pārihāriyakammaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^Visabhāgasantatī^eb^ti nānārammaṇesu pavattacittasantati. Sā hi vikkhepabyākulatāya appasannā samāhitacittasantatiyā visabhāgasantati. ^b^Okkamatī^eb^ti samādhisabhāgā cittasantati samathavīthiṃ anupavisati. ^b^Cittaṃ pasīdatī^eb^ti kammaṭṭhānanirataṃ bhāvanācittaṃ sandhāyāha, taṃ pasannaṃ hutvā pavattati. ^b^Lohitaṃ pasīdatī^eb^ti cittakālussiyassābhāvato lohitaṃ anāvilaṃ hoti. ^b^Parisuddhāni honti^eb^ kāraṇassa parisuddhabhāvato. ^b^Tālaphalamukhassa viya mukhassa vaṇṇo hotī^eb^ti mukha-saddassa ādimhi pamuttapadena yojetabbo. Evañhi cassa pamuttaggahaṇaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti tālaphalamukhassa vaṇṇasampadāsadisattā. Tibhūmako ^b^eva tebhūmako^eb^.

[03]^b^Atītaṃ nānusocanti^eb^ atītaṃ paccayalābhaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ katvā na socanti na anutthunanti. Jappanataṇhāya vasena na parikappantīti āha ^b^‘‘na patthentī’’^eb^ti ^a^M1.0073^ea^. ^b^Yena kenacī^eb^ti itarītarena. ^b^Taṅkhaṇe laddhenā^eb^ti sannidhikāraparibhogābhāvamāha. ^b^Tividhenapi kāraṇenā^eb^ti tippakārena hetunā, tilakkhaṇasantosanimittanti attho.

[03]^b^Vināsa^eb^nti vināsanahetuṃ. Vinassanti etehīti ^b^vināso,^eb^ lobhadosā tadekaṭṭhā ca pāpadhammā ^a^V1.0065^ea^. Arūpakāyassa viya rūpakāyassapi visesato sukkhabhāvakāraṇanti āha ^b^‘‘etena kāraṇadvayenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Luto^eb^ti lūno.
[06]Araññasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Naḷavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^11^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Tatra bhagavā’’ti vutte na tathā byañjanānaṃ siliṭṭhatā, yathā ‘‘tatra kho bhagavā’’ti vutteti āha ^b^‘‘byañjanasiliṭṭhatāvasenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Parisajeṭṭhake^eb^ti parisāya jeṭṭhake, ye tassā desanāya visesato bhājanabhūtā. ^b^Parisajeṭṭhake bhikkhū^eb^ti catuparisajeṭṭhake bhikkhū. Catunnaṃ hi parisānaṃ jeṭṭhā bhikkhuparisā paṭhamuppannattā. ^b^Āmantesī^eb^ti sambodhesi, sambodhanañca jānāpananti āha ^b^‘‘jānāpesī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Bhadante^eb^ti garugāravasappatissavavacanametaṃ, atthato pana ^b^bhadante^eb^ti bhaddaṃ tava hotu attano niṭṭhānapariyosānattā paresañca santatāvahattā. ^b^Bhagavato paccassosu^eb^nti ettha ^b^bhagavato^eb^ti sāmivacanaṃ āmantanameva sambandhiatthapadaṃ apekkhatīti adhippāyenāha ^b^‘‘bhagavato vacanaṃ patiassosu’’^eb^nti. ^b^Bhagavato^eb^ti pana idaṃ patissavanasambandhena sampadānavacanaṃ yathā ‘‘devadattassa paṭissuṇātī’’ti. Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ nidānavaggassa ādisuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ āgamissati.

[03]^b^Tāvatiṃsakāyo^eb^ti tāvatiṃsasaññito devanikāyo. ^b^Dutiyadevaloko^eb^ti chasu kāmalokesu dutiyo devaloko. Tettiṃsa janā sahapuññakārino tattha uppannā, taṃsahacaritaṭṭhānaṃ ^b^tāvatiṃsaṃ^eb^^a^M1.0074^ea^, tannivāsinopi tāvatiṃsanāmakā sahacaraṇañāyenāti āha ^b^‘‘maghena māṇavenā’’^eb^tiādi. Ayaṃ pana kecivādo byāpanno hotīti taṃ arocentena ^b^‘‘vadantī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Byāpannataṃ dassento ^b^‘‘yasmā panā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tathā hi vakkhati ‘‘evaṃ hi niddosaṃ padaṃ hotī’’ti. ^b^Nāmapaṇṇattiyevā^eb^ti atthanirapekkhattā niruḷhasamaññā eva.

[03]^b^Taṃ vana^eb^nti taṃ upavanaṃ. Paviṭṭhe paviṭṭhe dukkhappattepi attano sampattiyā nandayati, pageva ^a^V1.0066^ea^ adukkhappatteti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘pañcasu hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Pavesitāna^eb^nti pakoṭṭhavārena pavesitānampīti adhippāyo. Cavanakāleyeva thokaṃ dissamānavikārā hutvā cavanti, te sandhāya ^b^‘‘himapiṇḍo viya vilīyantī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Ye pana adissamānavikārā sahasā antaradhāyanti, te sandhāya ^b^‘‘dīpasikhā viya vijjhāyantī’’^eb^ti vuttanti vadanti. ^b^Nandayati^eb^ pakatiyā somanassitaṃ domanassitañca. ^b^Nandane^eb^ti evaṃanvatthanāmake uyyāne. ^b^Parivutā^eb^ti ‘‘devatā’’ti vacanaṃ upādāya itthiliṅgavasena vuttaṃ. Devaputto hi so.

[03]Divi bhavattā dibbāti āha ^b^‘‘devaloke nibbattehī’’^eb^ti. Kāmetabbatāya ^b^kāmabandhanehi,^eb^ tathā aññamaññaṃ asaṃkiṇṇasabhāvatāya ^b^kāmakoṭṭhāsehi^eb^. ^b^Upetā^eb^ti upagatā samannāgatā. ^b^Paricārayamānā^eb^ti pariramamānā. Idañhi padaṃ apekkhitvā ‘‘kāmaguṇehī’’ti kattari karaṇavacanaṃ, purimāni apekkhitvā sahayoge. Ramamānā carantīti katvā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘ramamānā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Paricārayamānā^eb^ti vā parito samantato cārayamānāti atthoti āha ^b^‘‘indriyāni sañcārayamānā’’^eb^ti. Paṭhamanaye hi anubhavanattho paricaraṇasaddo, dutiyanaye parivattanattho. ^b^So panā^eb^ti ‘‘tāyaṃ velāya’’nti vuttakālo. ^b^Adhunā^eb^ti sampati. So vicarīti sambandho. ^b^Kāmaguṇehī^eb^ti hetumhi karaṇavacanaṃ. ^b^Ovuto^eb^ti yathā taṃ na ñāyati, evaṃ pihitacitto. ^b^Nivuto pariyonaddho^eb^ti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘lokābhibhūto’’^eb^ti. ^b^Āsabhi^eb^nti seṭṭhaṃ ‘‘aggohamasmi lokassā’’tiādinā (dī. ni. 2.31; ma. ni. 3.207) ^b^bhāsanto^eb^ bodhisatto viya.

[03]Kevalaṃ ^a^M1.0075^ea^ dassanaṃ kimatthiyanti āha – ^b^‘‘ye…pe… vasenā’’^eb^ti, tasmiṃ nandanavane avaṭṭhitakāmabhāgānubhavanavasenāti attho. ^b^Naradevāna^eb^nti purisabhūtadevatānaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘devapurisāna’’^eb^nti. Appakaṃ adhikaṃ ūnaṃ vā gaṇanūpagaṃ nāma na hotīti ^b^‘‘tikkhattuṃ dasanna’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ‘‘Tettiṃsāna’’nti hi vattabbe ayaṃ ruḷhī. ^b^Parivārasaṅkhātena,^eb^ na kittisaṅkhātenāti adhippāyo. Sīlācārādiguṇanemittikā hi kitti. ‘‘Tāvatiṃsā devā dīghāyukā vaṇṇavanto sukhabahulā’’ti evamādivacanena yase icchite avisesetvāva ^b^‘‘yasena sampannāna’’^eb^nti sakkā vattuṃ.

[03]^b^Ariyasāvikā^eb^ti sotāpannā. ‘‘Sakadāgāminī’’ti keci. ^b^Adhippāyaṃ vivaṭṭetvā^eb^ti yathā tvaṃ andhabāle maññasi, dhammasabhāvo evaṃ na hotīti tassā devatāya adhippāyaṃ viparivattetvā. Ekantato sukhaṃ nāma nibbānameva. Kāmā hi dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammāti iminā ^a^V1.0067^ea^ adhippāyena ^b^tassā adhippāyaṃ paṭikkhipitvā^eb^. Kāmaṃ catutthabhūmakāpi saṅkhārā aniccā eva, te pana sammasanūpagā na hontīti ^b^tebhūmaka^eb^ggahaṇaṃ sammasanayoggena. ^b^Hutvā^eb^ti pubbe avijjamānā paccayasamavāyena bhavitvā uppajjitvā. Etena nesaṃ bhāvabhāgo dassito. ^b^Abhāvatthenā^eb^ti sarasanirodhabhūtena viddhaṃsanabhāvena.

[03]^b^Aniccā^eb^ addhuvā, tato eva ‘‘mayhaṃ ime sukhā’’ti vā na iccāti ^b^aniccā^eb^. ^b^Uppādavayasabhāvā^eb^ti khaṇe khaṇe uppajjananirujjhanasabhāvā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘uppa…pe… vevacana’’^eb^nti. Purimassa vā pacchimaṃ kāraṇavevacananti āha ^b^‘‘yasmā vā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Tadanantarā^eb^ti tesaṃ uppādavayānaṃ antare. ^b^Vemajjhaṭṭhāna^eb^nti ṭhitikkhaṇaṃ vadati. Ye pana ‘‘saṅkhārānaṃ ṭhiti natthī’’ti vadanti, tesaṃ taṃ micchā. Yathā hi tasseva dhammassa uppādāvatthāya bhinnā bhaṅgāvatthā icchitā, aññathā aññaṃ uppajjati, aññaṃ nirujjhatīti āpajjati, evaṃ uppannassa bhaṅgābhimukhāvatthā icchitabbā, sāva ṭhitikkhaṇo. Na hi uppajjamāno bhijjatīti sakkā viññātunti. ^b^Vūpasamasaṅkhāta^eb^nti accantaṃ vūpasamasaṅkhātaṃ ^b^nibbānameva sukhaṃ,^eb^ na tayā adhippetā kāmāti adhippāyo.
[06]Nandanasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^12^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Nandatī^eb^ti ^a^M1.0076^ea^ ettha nandanaṃ sappītikakāmataṇhākiccanti āha – ^b^‘‘tussatī’’^eb^ti, tasmā kāmaparitosena haṭṭhatuṭṭho hotīti attho. ^b^Puttimā^eb^ti puttavā. Pahūte cāyaṃ mā-saddoti āha ^b^‘‘bahuputto’’^eb^ti. Bahuputtatāgahaṇena idaṃ payojananti dassento ^b^‘‘tassa hī’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Pūrentī^eb^ti padaṃ apekkhitvā ^b^dhaññassā^eb^ti sāmivacanaṃ. ^b^Iti āhā^eb^ti imamatthaṃ sandhāyāha, evaṃadhippāyo hutvāti attho. ^b^Gosāmiko^eb^ti gomā. Idhāpi pahūte mā-saddo. ^b^Gorasasampatti^eb^nti gorasehi nipphajjanasampattiṃ. ^b^Upadhī^eb^ti paccattabahuvacanaṃ. ^b^Hī^eb^ti hetuatthe nipāto. Nandayanti pītisomanassaṃ janayantīti ^b^nandanā^eb^. Kāmaṃ dukkhassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato nippariyāyato kāmā ‘‘upadhī’’ti vattabbataṃ arahanti, tassā pana devatāya adhippāyavasenāha ^b^‘‘sukhassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato’’^eb^ti. Kilesavatthuhetukattā sesapadadvayassa kiñcāpi sabbaṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ kilesahetukaṃ, visesato pana pāpadhammā apāyūpapattiṃ nibbattentīti āha – ^b^‘‘kilesāpi apāyadukkhassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato’’^eb^ti. ^b^Upasaṃharamānā^eb^ti upanentā uppādentā. Manussajātikopi dullabhaghāsacchādanatāya ^a^V1.0068^ea^ dukkhabahulo peto viyāti ^b^manussapeto^eb^. Manussajātikopi vuttarūpo anatthapātito parehi hiṃsito samāno nerayiko viyāti ^b^manussanerayiko^eb^.

[03]^b^Phalena^eb^ rukkhato ^b^phalaṃ^eb^ pātento viya. ^b^Tatheva navahākārehī^eb^ti yathā tīsu kālesu nāsamaraṇabhedanavasena puttimā puttanimittaṃ, tatheva gomā gonimittaṃ socati navappakārehi. Pañca kāmaguṇopadhīpi naraṃ socentīti yojanā. ^b^Tassā^eb^ti yo uttari anugijjhati tassa. ^b^Kāmayānassā^eb^ti jātakāmacchandassa. ^b^Jantuno^eb^ti sattassa. ^b^Parihāyanti ce^eb^ vinassanti ce. ^b^Sallaviddhovā^eb^ti sallena viddho viya. ^b^Ruppatī^eb^ti vikāraṃ āpajjati, socatīti attho. ^b^Narassa socanā^eb^ sokaghaṭṭanapaccayo. ^b^Upadhayo natthī^eb^ti kāmaṃ kilesābhisaṅkhārūpadhayo tāva khīṇāsavassa nattheva maggādhigamena nirodhitattā, khandhūpadhayo pana kathanti? Tepi tassa saupādisesakālepi aṭṭhuppattihetubhūtā na santeva, ayañca anupādisesakāle. Tenāha ^b^‘‘so nirupadhi mahākhīṇāsavo’’^eb^ti.
[06]Nandatisuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^13^eb^^b^.^eb^ Puttapemaṃ ^a^M1.0077^ea^ puttaggahaṇena gahitaṃ uttarapadalopenāti āha ^b^‘‘puttapemasama’’^eb^nti. ^b^Gosamita^eb^nti gohi samaṃ kataṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘gohi sama’’^eb^nti. Sūriyassa samāti ^b^sūriyasamā^eb^. Avayavasambandhe cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. Avayavo cettha ābhā evāti viññāyati ‘‘anantaraṃ ābhā’’ti vuccamānattāti āha ^b^‘‘sūriyābhāya samā’’^eb^tiādi. Mahoghabhāvena saranti savantīti ^b^sarā,^eb^ mahantā jalāsayā. ^b^Sabbe te samuddaparamā^eb^ orimajanehi adiṭṭhaparatīrattā tassa.

[03]^b^Natthi attasamaṃ pema^eb^nti gāthāya paṭhamagāthāyaṃ vuttanayena attho veditabbo. Attapemena samaṃ pemaṃ nāma natthīti ayamattho. Anudakakantāre ghammasantāpaṃ asahantiyā aṅke ṭhapitaputtakaṃ kandantaṃ bhūmiyaṃ nipajjāpetvā tassa upari ṭhatvā mataitthivatthunā dīpetabbaṃ. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘mātāpitādayo hi chaḍḍetvāpi puttadhītādayo’’^eb^ti. Tathā cāha –
[21]‘‘Sabbā disā anuparigamma cetasā,
[27]Nevajjhagā piyataramattanā kvaci;
[26]Evaṃ ^a^V1.0069^ea^ piyo puthu attā paresaṃ,
[22]Tasmā na hiṃse paramattakāmo’’ti. (saṃ. ni. 1.119; udā. 41; netti. 113);

[03]^b^Dhaññena samaṃ dhanaṃ nāma natthi,^eb^ yasmā tappaṭibaddhā āhārūpajīvīnaṃ sattānaṃ jīvitavutti. ^b^Tathārūpe kāle^eb^ti dubbhikkhakāle. ^b^Ekadesaṃyeva obhāsantī^eb^ti ekasmiṃ khaṇe catūsu mahādīpesu obhāsaṃ pharituṃ asamatthattā sūriyassapi, pageva itaresaṃ. Bodhisattassa udayabbayassa ñāṇānubhāvena sakalajātikhettaṃ ekālokaṃ ahosīti āha ^b^‘‘paññā…pe… sakkotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tamaṃ vidhamatī^eb^ti pubbenivāsañāṇādayo paññā yattha pavattanti, tamanavasesaṃ byāpetvā ekappahārena pavattanato. ^b^‘‘Vuṭṭhiyā pana pavattamānāya yāva ābhassarabhavanā’’^eb^ti pacuravasena vuttaṃ.
[06]Natthiputtasamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^14^eb^^b^.^eb^ Khettato ^a^M1.0078^ea^ vivādā satte tāyatīti ^b^khattiyo^eb^. ^b^Vadati^eb^ devatā attano ajjhāsayavasena. ^b^Dvipadādīna^eb^nti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena catuppadabhariyaputtā gahitā. ^b^Buddhādayo^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena ājānīyasussūsabhariyassavaputtā. ^b^Dvipadānaṃ seṭṭho^eb^ti ettha dvipadānaṃ eva seṭṭhoti nāyaṃ niyamo icchito, seṭṭho evāti pana icchito, tasmā sambuddho dvipadesu aññesu tattha ca uppajjanato seṭṭho eva sabbesampi uttaritarassa abhāvatoti ayamettha attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘uppajjamāno panesā’’^eb^tiādi. Kāraṇākāraṇaṃ ājānātīti ^b^ājānīyo. Gaṇhāpethā^eb^ti yathā udako na temissati, evaṃ vāḷaṃ gaṇhāpetha. ‘‘Asussūsā’’ti keci paṭhanti. ^b^Āsuṇamāno^eb^ti sappaṭissavo hutvā vacanasampaṭicchako.
[06]Khattiyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^15^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ṭhite majjhanhike^eb^ti pubbaddhaṃ nikkhamitvā aparaddhaṃ appatvā ṭhitamajjhanhe. ^b^Sannisīvesū^eb^ti parissamavinodanatthaṃ sabbaso sannisīdantesu. Da-kārassa hi va-kāraṃ katvā niddeso. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sannisinnesu vissamamānesū’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sabbasattāna^eb^nti sabbesañca āhārūpajīvitasattānaṃ ^a^V1.0070^ea^ ghammatāpane santattakāyānaṃ ^b^iriyāpathadubbalyakālo^eb^ti ṭhānādīriyāpathassa asamatthakālo. ^b^Saṇati viyā^eb^ti saddaṃ karoti viya, yathā taṃ aññampi mahāvanaṃ vakkhamānanayena. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tappaṭibhāgaṃ nāmeta’’^eb^nti ^b^chiddaveṇupabbāna^eb^nti randhajātakīcakamahāveḷupabbānaṃ. ^b^Dutiyakaṃ^eb^ sahāyaṃ alabhantī anabhiratiparitassanāya evamāha. ^b^Anappakaṃ sukha^eb^nti vipulaṃ uḷāraṃ vivekasukhaṃ.

[03]Ekavihāratāya ^b^suññāgāraṃ paviṭṭhassa^eb^. Tena kāyavivekaṃ dasseti. Aniccānupassanādīhi niccasaññādippahānena ^b^santacittassa^eb^. Tena cittavivekaṃ dasseti. Saṃsāre bhayaṃ ikkhanato ^b^bhikkhuno^eb^ ubhayavivekasampannassa, tato ^a^M1.0079^ea^ eva uttariṃ manussadhammato ratiṃ lābhino. ^b^Amānusī ratī^eb^ti bhāvanārati. ^b^Purato^eb^ti purimabhāge. ^b^Pacchato^eb^ti pacchimabhāge. ^b^Aparo^eb^ti añño. ^b^Purato^eb^ti vā anāgate, anāgataṃ ārabbhāti attho. ^b^Pacchato^eb^ti atīte atītaṃ ārabbha paṭipattiyā vibādhanato. ^b^Paro^eb^ti kodho cittapaṭidussanatāya. Na paroti ^b^aparo,^eb^ lobho, so ^b^ce na vijjati^eb^. Etena anāgatappajappanāya atītānusocanāya ca abhāvaṃ dasseti. ^b^Atīva phāsu bhavatī^eb^ti nīvaraṇajeṭṭhakassa kāmacchandassa vigamena vikkhambhitanīvaraṇassa jhānassa vasena ativiya phāsuvihāro hoti. ^b^Ekassa vasato vane^eb^ti taṇhādutiyikābhāvena ekassa araññe vivekavāsaṃ vasato. ^b^Sesaṃ tādisamevā^eb^ti sesamettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ paṭhamagāthāyaṃ vuttasadisameva.
[06]Saṇamānasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^16^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pacchime māse pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātappaṭikkanto catugguṇaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ paññapetvā dakkhiṇena passena sato sampajānoti ettakaṃ pāṭhaṃ saṅkhipitvā ^b^‘‘niddaṃ okkamitā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Kiriyāmayacittehi avomisso bhavaṅgasoto ^b^abyākataniddā^eb^. Sā hi khīṇāsavānaṃ uppajjanārahā, tassā pubbabhāgāparabhāgesu…pe… uppannaṃ thinamiddhaṃ idhādhippetā niddā, sā akhīṇāsavānaṃ yebhuyyena aniyatakālā, tabbidhuraniyatasabbhāvaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘aticchāta…pe… āgantukaṃ ālasiya’’^eb^nti āha. Kāyālasiyapaccayā vīriyassa paṭipakkhabhūtā cattāro akusalakkhandhā ^b^tandī^eb^ nāma. ^b^Tandī^eb^ti sabhāvaniddeso. ^b^Tandiyanā^eb^ti ākāraniṃddeso. ^b^Tandīmanatā^eb^ti tandībhūtacittatā. ^b^Ālasya^eb^nti alasabhāvāharaṇaṃ. ^b^Ālasyāyitatta^eb^nti alasabhāvappatti. ^b^Kāyavijambhanā^eb^ti kāyassa vināmanā. ^b^Akusalapakkhā ukkaṇṭhitatā^eb^ti akusalapakkhiyā ^a^V1.0071^ea^ anabhirati. ^b^Bhattakilamatho^eb^ti yathāvuttassa bhattavatthukassa āhārassa vasena sarīre uppajjanakakhedo. ^b^Upakkiliṭṭho^eb^ti paññāya dubbalīkaraṇena upakkiliṭṭhacitto. Cittassa asamāhitattā ^b^nivāritapātubhāvo^eb^. Ariyamaggassa jotanaṃ nāma uppajjanamevāti āha ^b^‘‘na jotati^eb^^a^M1.0080^ea^, ^b^na pātubhavatīti attho’’^eb^ti. Na hi ariyamaggo jotiajotināmo pavattati.

[03]^b^Maggasahajātavīriyenā^eb^ti lokiyalokuttaramaggasahajātavīriyena. Missakamaggo hi idha adhippeto. ^b^Nīharitvā^eb^ti nīharaṇahetu. Hetuattho hi ayaṃ ^b^tvā^eb^-saddo ‘‘paññāya cassa disvā’’tiādīsu (ma. ni. 1.271) viya. Tena ‘‘maggo visujjhatī’’ti vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti. ‘‘Ariyamaggaṃ visujjhatī’’ti keci paṭhanti.
[06]Niddātandīsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^17^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dukkhaṃ titikkhanti ^b^duttitikkhaṃ^eb^. Tañca dukkhamaṃ dussahanaṃ ārambhavasena dukkaraṃ, anuyuñjanavasena duttitikkhanti. ^b^Abyattenā^eb^ti sāmaññassa upakārānupakāre dhamme jānanasamatthāya veyyattiyasaṅkhātāya paññāya abhāvato na byattena. Tenāha ^b^‘‘bālenā’’^eb^ti. Yasmiṃ dhamme sati samaṇoti vuccati, taṃ sāmaññanti āha ^b^‘‘samaṇadhammo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Iminā^eb^ti ‘‘dukkaraṃ duttitikkhañca, abyattena ca sāmañña’’nti iminā gāthaddhena ^b^idaṃ dassetī^eb^ti idaṃ idāni vuccamānaṃ atthajātaṃ dasseti. ^b^Abhidanta^eb^nti abhibhavanadantaṃ, uparidantanti attho. So hi itaraṃ musalaṃ viya udukkhalaṃ visesato kassaci khādanakāle abhibhuyya vattati. ^b^Ādhāyā^eb^ti nippīḷanavaseneva ṭhapetvā. ^b^Tāluṃ āhaccā^eb^ti tālupadesamāhanitvā viya. ^b^Cetasā^eb^ti kusalacittena. ^b^Citta^eb^nti akusalacittaṃ. ^b^Abhiniggaṇhitvā^eb^ti yathā atisamudācāro na hoti, evaṃ vibādhanavasena niggahetvā. ^b^Āpāṇakoṭika^eb^nti pāṇakoṭipariyosānaṃ, parijīvanti attho. Sambādhetīti ^b^sambādho,^eb^ antarāyiko. ^b^Bahū parissayā^eb^ti ayoniso kāmavitakkādivasena.
[03]Pajjati cittametthāti padaṃ, ārammaṇaṃ. Iriyāpathaṃ eva padaṃ ^b^iriyāpathapadaṃ^eb^.

[03]Gīvā ^a^M1.0081^ea^ cattāro pādāti ^b^gīvapañcamāni. Samodaha^eb^nti vā samodhānahetūti ayamettha atthoti āha – ^b^‘‘samodahitvā vā’’^eb^ti, sammā odhāya anto pavesetvāti attho. ^b^Sake ārammaṇakapāle^eb^ti gocarajjhattaṃ vadati. ^b^Samodaha^eb^nti samodahanto. ^b^Anissito^eb^ti tebhūmakadhammesu kañcipi ^a^V1.0072^ea^ dhammaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhābhinivesavasena anissito. ^b^Avihiṃsamāno^eb^ vihiṃsānimittānaṃ pajahanena. ^b^Ullumpanasabhāvasaṇṭhitenā^eb^ti sīlabyasanato uddharaṇarūpe saṇṭhitena, karuṇāyuttenāti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kāruññataṃ paṭiccā’’^eb^ti.
[06]Dukkarasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^18^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Nisedhetī^eb^ti nivāreti pavattituṃ na deti. ^b^Pucchati^eb^ devatā. ^b^Apaharanto^eb^ti apanento, yathā sabbena sabbaṃ akkosavatthu na hoti, evaṃ pariharantoti attho. ^b^Bujjhati^eb^ sārathividhaṃ. ^b^Attani nipātaṃ na deti,^eb^ ājānīyo hi yuttaṃ pajānāti. Abhūtena ^b^abhūtakkosena parimutto nāma natthi^eb^ bālānañca janānaṃ parāpavāde yuttapayuttabhāvato. Tenāha bhagavā –
[21]‘‘Nindanti tuṇhimāsīnaṃ, nindanti bahubhāṇinaṃ;
[22]Mitabhāṇimpi nindanti, natthi loke anindito’’ti. (dha. pa. 227);

[03]^b^Tanuyā^eb^ti vā katipayā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘appakā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sadā satā^eb^ti hirinisedhabhāve kāraṇavacanaṃ. ^b^Pappuyyā^eb^ti patvā adhigantvā. Vānato nikkhantattā ^b^nibbānaṃ,^eb^ asaṅkhatadhātu.
[06]Hirīsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^19^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Anto^eb^ti kucchiabbhantare. ^b^Vasanaṭṭhānaṭṭhenā^eb^ti vasanabhāvena. ^b^Kulapaveṇi^eb^nti kulācāraṃ kulatantiṃ. ^b^Santānakaṭṭhenā^eb^ti kulasantatiyā bandhanabhāvena ^a^M1.0082^ea^. Evaṃ sabbapadehi pucchitatthassa anujānanavasena ^b^‘‘ekaṃsavacane nipāto’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Āpādikā posikā mātucchā mahāpajāpati mātā evāti katvā ^b^‘‘pahāya pabbajitattā’’^eb^ti avisesato vuttaṃ. Pahāya pabbajitattā natthīti ānetvā sambandho. Puna mātukucchivāsādīnaṃ abhāvavacaneneva vaṭṭamhi bandhanassa abhāvo dīpito hotīti na gahito. Ayaṃ kira devatā yathā puthujjanā buddhānaṃ guṇe na jānanti, evaṃ na jānāti, tasmā ^b^‘‘mayā sannāhaṃ bandhitvā’’^eb^tiādimāha.
[06]Kuṭikāsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^20^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tapanabhāvena ^a^V1.0073^ea^ tapanodakattā ^b^tapodā^eb^ti tassa rahadassa nāmaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tattodakassa rahadassā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tato^eb^ti nāgabhavane udakarahadato tapodā nāma nadī sandati. Sā hi nadī bhūmitalaṃ ārohati. ‘‘Edisā jātā’’ti vacanaseso. ^b^Petaloko^eb^ti lohakumbhinirayā idhādhippetāti vadanti. Rahadassa pana ādito pabbatapādavanantaresu bahū petā viharanti, svāyamattho ^b^petavatthupāḷiyā^eb^^b^lakkhaṇasaṃyuttena^eb^ ca dīpetabbo. ^b^Yatāya^eb^nti yato rahadato ayaṃ. ^b^Sātodako^eb^ti madhurodako. ^b^Setodako^eb^ti parisuddhodako, anāvilodakoti attho. ^b^Tato^eb^ti tapodānadito.

[03]^b^Samiddho^eb^ti avayavānaṃ sampuṇṇatāya saṃsiddhiyāva sammā iddho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘abhirūpo’’^eb^tiādi. Padhāne sammasanadhamme niyutto, taṃ vā ettha atthīti ^b^padhāniko^eb^. Senāsanaṃ suṭṭhapitadvāravātapānaṃ, tesaṃ pidahanena ^b^utuṃ gāhāpetvā^eb^.

[03]^b^Pubbāpayamāno^eb^ti nhānato pubbabhāge viya vodakabhāvaṃ āpajjamāno gamento.
