Avattaṃ paṭikkhipitvā vattaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘tattha…pe… na otaritabba’’^eb^nti paṭhamaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Sabbadisāpalokanaṃ^eb^ yathā nhāyanaṭṭhānassa manussehi vivittabhāvajānanatthaṃ. ^b^Khāṇuādivavatthāpanaṃ^eb^ cīvarādīnaṃ ṭhapanatthaṃ udakasamīpeti ^a^M1.0083^ea^ adhippāyo. ^b^Ukkāsanaṃ^eb^ amanussānaṃ apagamanatthaṃ. ^b^Avakujjaṭṭhānaṃ^eb^ taṅkhaṇepi uparimakāyassa ujukaṃ avivaṭakaraṇatthaṃ. ^b^Cīvarapiṭṭheyeva ṭhapetabbaṃ^eb^ yattha vā tattha vā aṭṭhapetvā. ^b^Udakante^eb^ti udakasamīpe. ^b^Sinnaṭṭhāna^eb^nti sedagatapadeso. ^b^Pasāretabbaṃ^eb^ tassa sukkhāpanatthaṃ. ^b^Saṃharitvā ṭhapanaṃ^eb^ puna sukhena gahetvā nivāsanatthaṃ. ^b^Nābhippamāṇamattaṃ^eb^^b^otaraṇaṃ^eb^ tāvatā udakapaṭicchādilakkhaṇappattato. ^b^Vīciṃ anuṭṭhāpentenā^eb^tiādi saṃyatakāritādassanaṃ. ^b^Nivāsanaṃ parikkhipitvā^eb^ti antaravāsakaṃ kaṭippadesassa yathā parito hoti, evaṃ khipitvā parivasitvā.

[03]^b^Sarīravaṇṇopi vippasīdi^eb^ sammadeva bhāvanānussatimpi vindantassāti adhippāyo. ^b^Samanaṃ niggahetu^eb^nti kilesavasaṃ gataṃ attano cittaṃ niggaṇhituṃ. ^b^Kāmūpanītā^eb^ti kāmaṃ upagatacittā. Atha vā kilesakāmena there upanītacittā.

[03]^b^Aparibhuñjitvā^eb^ti ananubhotvā. Anubhavitabbanti atthato āpannamevāti āha ^b^‘‘pañcakāmaguṇe’’^eb^ti ^a^V1.0074^ea^. ^b^Bhikkhasī^eb^ti yācasi. Tañca bhikkhācariyavasenāti āha ^b^‘‘piṇḍāya carasī’’^eb^ti. Kāmaparibhogagarugamanakālo nāma visesato paṭhamayobbanāvatthāti āha ^b^‘‘daharayobbanakālo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Obhaggenā^eb^ti majjhe saṃbhaggakāyena. Jiṇṇakāle hi sattānaṃ kaṭiyaṃ kāyo obhaggo hoti.

[03]^b^Vo^eb^ti nipātamattaṃ ‘‘ye hi vo ariyā’’tiādīsu viya. ^b^Sattāna^eb^nti sāmaññavacanaṃ, na manussānaṃ eva. ^b^Dehanikkhepana^eb^nti kaḷevaraṭṭhapitaṭṭhānaṃ. Natthi etesaṃ nimittanti ^b^animittā,^eb^ ‘‘ettakaṃ ayaṃ jīvatī’’tiādinā sañjānananimittarahitāti attho. ^b^Na nāyare^eb^ti na ñāyanti. ^b^Ito para^eb^nti ettha ^b^para^eb^nti aññaṃ kālaṃ. Tena orakālassapi saṅgaho siddho hoti. Paramāyuno orakāle eva cettha paranti adhippetaṃ tato paraṃ sattānaṃ jīvitassa abhāvato. ^b^Vavatthānābhāvato^eb^ti kālavasena vavatthānābhāvato. ^b^Vavatthāna^eb^nti cettha paricchedo veditabbo, na asaṅkarato vavatthānaṃ, nicchayo vā. ^b^Abbudapesī^eb^tiādīsu abbudakālo pesikālotiādinā kāla-saddo paccekaṃ yojetabbo. ^b^Kālo^eb^ti idha pubbaṇhādivelā adhippetā. Tenāha ^b^pubbaṇhepi hī^eb^tiādi ^a^M1.0084^ea^. Idheva dehena patitabbanti sambandho. ^b^Anekappakārato^eb^ti nagare jātānaṃ gāme, gāme jātānaṃ nagare, vane jātānaṃ janapade, janapade jātānaṃ vanetiādinā anekappakārato. ^b^Ito cutenā^eb^ti ito gatito cutena. ^b^Idha^eb^ imissaṃ gatiyaṃ. ^b^Yante yuttagoṇo viyā^eb^ti yathā yante yuttagoṇo yantaṃ nātivattati, evaṃ kālo gatipañcakanti evaṃ upamāsaṃsandanaṃ veditabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Ayaṃ kālo^eb^ti ayaṃ maraṇakālo. ^b^Pacchime kāle^eb^ti pacchime vaye. ^b^Tisso vayosīmā^eb^ti. Paṭhamādikā tisso vayassa sīmā atikkantena. Purimānaṃ hi dvinnaṃ vayānaṃ sabbaso sīmā atikkamitvā pacchimassa ādisīmaṃ atikkanto tathā vutto. ^b^‘‘Ayañhi samaṇadhammo…pe… na sakkā kātu’’^eb^nti vatvā tamatthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘tadā hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Gaṇhitu^eb^nti pāḷito atthato ca hadaye ṭhapanavasena gaṇhituṃ. ^b^Paribhuñjitu^eb^nti vuttadhammapariharaṇasukhaṃ anubhavituṃ. Ekassa kathanato paṭhamaṃ gāthaṃ suttaṃ vā ussāreti, tasmiṃ niṭṭhite itaro dhammakathiko taṃyeva vitthārento dhammaṃ katheti, ayaṃ ^b^sarabhāṇadhammakathā^eb^. Suttageyyānusārena yāva pariyosānā ussāraṇaṃ ^b^sarabhaññadhammakathā^eb^. ^b^‘‘Mā maṃ kālo upaccagā’’^eb^ti vadanto ‘‘samaṇadhammassa karaṇassa ayaṃ me kālo’’ti katheti, tato paro ‘‘pacchimavayo añño kālo’’ti katheti. ^b^‘‘Kālaṃ vohaṃ…pe… tasmā abhutvā bhikkhāmī’’^eb^ti vadanto attanā kataṃ paṭipattiñca sahetukaṃ sānisaṃsaṃ katheti.

[03]^b^Taṃ^eb^^a^V1.0075^ea^ gāravakāraṇaṃ sandhāya. ^b^Eta^eb^nti ‘‘atha kho sā devatā pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhahitvā’’ti etaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Daharo tvantiādimāha^eb^ lobhābhibhūtatāya adhigatattā. ^b^Sabbasampattiyutto^eb^ti bhogasampadā parivārasampadāti sabbasampattīhi yutto. ^b^Alaṅkāraparihāra^eb^nti alaṅkārakaraṇaṃ. ^b^Anikkīḷitāvī^eb^ti akīḷitapubbo. Kīḷanañcettha kāmānaṃ paribhogoti āha ^b^‘‘abhuttāvī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Akatakāmakīḷo^eb^ti akatakāmānubhavanappayogo. Sayaṃ attanā eva dissantīti sandiṭṭhā, sandiṭṭhā ^b^eva sandiṭṭhikā,^eb^ attapaccakkhato sandiṭṭhikā. Pakaṭṭho kālo patto etesanti kālikā, te ^b^kālike^eb^.

[03]^b^Cittānantara^eb^nti ^a^M1.0085^ea^ icchitacittānantaraṃ, icchiticchitārammaṇākāreti attho. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘cittānantaraṃ icchiticchitārammaṇānubhavanaṃ na sampajjatī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Cittānantaraṃ laddhabbatāyā^eb^ti anantaritasamādhicittānantaraṃ laddhabbaphalatāya. ^b^Samohitesupī^eb^ti sambhatesupi. ^b^Sampannakāmassā^eb^ti samiddhakāmassa. ^b^Cittakārā^eb^ rūpalābhena, ^b^potthakārā^eb^ paṭimākārakā, ^b^rūpakārā^eb^ dantarūpakaṭṭharūpa-loharūpādikārakā. ^b^Ādi^eb^saddena nānārūpavesadhārīnaṃ naṭādīnaṃ saṅgaho. ^b^Sesadvāresū^eb^ti ettha gandhabbamālākārasūpakārādayo vattabbā.

[03]^b^So^eb^ti samiddhitthero. ^b^Samohitasampattinā^eb^ti saṅgāhabhogūpakaraṇasampattinā. ^b^Pattabbadukkhassā^eb^ti kāmānaṃ āpajjanarakkhaṇavasena laddhabbassa kāyikacetasikadukkhassa. ^b^Upāyāsassā^eb^ti daḷhaparissamassa viratassa. ‘‘Vissātassā’’ti keci. ^b^‘‘Paccavekkhaṇañāṇenā’’^eb^ti keci paṭhanti. Asukasmiṃ nāma kāle phalaṃ hotīti evaṃ udikkhitabbo nassa kāloti ^b^akālo. Etthā^eb^ti etesu navasu lokuttaradhammesu. ^b^Ehipassavidhi^eb^nti ‘‘ehi passā’’ti evaṃ pavattavidhivacanaṃ. Upanetabboti vā upaneyyo, so eva ^b^opaneyyiko. Viññūhī^eb^ti vidūhi paṭividdhasaccehi. Te ekaṃsato ugghaṭitaññūādayo hontīti āha ^b^‘‘ugghaṭitaññūādīhī’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Paccatta’’nti etassa patiattanīti bhummavasena attho gahetabboti āha ^b^‘‘attani attanī’’^eb^ti.
[03]^b^Sabbapadehi sambandho^eb^ti ‘‘kathaṃ ādīnavo ettha bhiyyo, kathaṃ akāliko’’tiādinā sabbehi paccekaṃ sambandho veditabbo.

[03]^b^Navo^eb^ti taruṇo na ciravasso. Ye bhikkhunovādakalakkhaṇappattā, te sandhāya ^b^‘‘vīsativassato paṭṭhāya thero’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Idha sāsanaṃ nāma sikkhattayasaṅgahaṃ piṭakattayanti āha ^b^‘‘dhammena^eb^^a^V1.0076^ea^^b^hī’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha dhammena vinayo ettha vinā daṇḍasatthehīti ^b^dhammavinayo^eb^. Dhammāya vinayo ettha na āmisatthanti dhammavinayo. Dhammato vinayo na adhammatoti dhammavinayo. Dhammo vā bhagavā dhammassāmī dhammakāyattā, tassa dhammasaññitassa satthu vinayo, na takkikānanti dhammavinayo. Dhamme vinayo na adhamme vinayo. Dhammo ca so yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne satte apāyesu apatamāne dhāretīti, sabbe saṃkilesato vinetīti vinayo cāti dhammavinayo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ubhayampetaṃ sāsanasseva nāma’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^Dhammavinayo^eb^ti ^a^M1.0086^ea^ dhammena yutto vinayoti dhammavinayo ājaññaratho viya. Dhammo ca vinayo cāti vā dhammavinayo, taṃ ^b^dhammavinayaṃ^eb^. Dhammavinayānañhi satthubhāvavacanato dhammavinayattasaṃsiddhi dhammavinayānaṃ aññamaññaṃ visesanato. Abhidhammepi vinayavacananti dhammavinayadvayasiddhi, desitapaññattavacanato dhammavinayasiddhi. Dhammo catudhā desito sandassana-samādāpana-samuttejana-sampahaṃsanavasena, vinayo catudhā paññatto sīlācārato parājitavasena. Dhammacariyā sakavisayo, vinayapaññatti buddhavisayo. Pariyāyena desito dhammo, nippariyāyena paññatto vinayo. Dhammadesanā adhippāyatthappadhānā, vinayapaññatti vacanatthappadhānā. Paramatthasaccappadhāno dhammo, sammutisaccappadhāno vinayo. Āsayasuddhipadhāno dhammo, payogasuddhipadhāno vinayo.

[03]Kiriyadvayasiddhiyā dhammavinayasiddhi. Dhammena hi anusāsanasiddhi, vinayena ovādasiddhi. Dhammena dhammakathāsiddhi, vinayena ariyatuṇhībhāvasiddhi. Sāvajjadvayaparivajjanato dhammavinayasiddhi. Dhammena hi visesato pakatisāvajjapariccāgasiddhi, vinayena paññattisāvajjapariccāgasiddhi. Gahaṭṭhapabbajitānaṃ sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇaguṇadvayasiddhi. Bahussutasutapasannadvayato pariyatti-pariyāpuṇana-dhammavihāra-vibhāgato dhammadharavinayadharavibhāgato ca dhammavinayadvayasiddhi, saraṇadvayasiddhiyā dhammavinayadvayasiddhi. Idha sattānaṃ duvidhaṃ saraṇaṃ dhammo attā ca. Tattha dhammo suciṇṇo saraṇaṃ. ‘‘Dhammo have rakkhati dhammacāri’’nti (theragā. 303; jā. 1.10.102; 1.15.385) hi vuttaṃ. Sudanto attāpi saraṇaṃ ‘‘attā hi attano nātho’’ti (dha. pa. 160, 380) vacanato. Tena vuttaṃ ‘‘saraṇadvayasiddhiyā dhammavinayasiddhī’’ti. Tattha yatassa dhammasiddhi, yato ca vinayasiddhi, tadubhayaṃ dassento āha – ^b^‘‘dhammena hettha dve piṭakāni vuttāni, vinayena vinayapiṭaka’’^eb^nti. ^b^Adhunā āgato^eb^ idāneva na cirasseva upagato.

[03]^b^Mahante^eb^^a^V1.0077^ea^^b^ṭhāne ṭhapetvā^eb^ti mahesakkhatādassanatthaṃ attano parivārena mahantaṭṭhāne ṭhapitabhāvaṃ pavedetvā. ^b^Mahatiyā^eb^ti upasaṅkamanavandanādivacanāpajjanavasena samāciṇṇāya. Sabbepi kira nisīdantā taṃ ṭhānaṃ ṭhapetvāva nisīdanti. ^b^Thirakaraṇavasenā^eb^ti daḷhīkaraṇavasena. Ayaṃ kira devatā ñāṇasampannā mānajātikā, tasmā nāyaṃ mānaṃ appahāya ^a^M1.0087^ea^ mama desanaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ sakkotīti mānaniggaṇhanatthaṃ ādito duviññeyyaṃ kathento bhagavā ‘‘akkheyyasaññino’’tiādinā tāya ñātumicchitakāmānaṃ kālikādibhāvaṃ, dhammassa ca sandiṭṭhikādibhāvaṃ vibhāvento dve gāthā abhāsi.

[03]^b^Akkheyyato^eb^ti gihiliṅgapariyāyanāmavisesādivasena tathā tathā akkhātabbato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kathānaṃ vatthubhūtato’’^eb^ti. ^b^Etesa^eb^nti sattānaṃ. ^b^Patiṭṭhitā^eb^ti pavattitā āsattā. Pañcannaṃ kāmasaṅgādīnaṃ vasena āsattā hontu, itaresaṃ pana kathanti? Aniṭṭhaṅgatopi hi ‘‘idaṃ nu kho’’tiādinā kaṅkhato tattha āsatto eva nāma avijahanato, tathā vikkhepagato vikkhepavatthusmiṃ, anusayānaṃ pana āsattabhāve vattabbameva natthi. ^b^Maccuno yoga^eb^nti, maccubandhanaṃ, maraṇadhammatanti attho. Yasmā apariññātavatthukā anatītamaraṇattā maccunā yathāruci payojetabbā, tattha tattha uparūpari ca khipitāya āṇāya abbhantare eva honti, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘payogaṃ…pe… āgacchantī’’^eb^ti. Yasmā tebhūmakā dhammā kamanīyaṭṭhena kāmā, nesampi kālassa laddhabbatāya kālikatā idha akkheyyavacanena paveditā. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘evamimāya gāthāya kālikā kāmā kathitā’’^eb^ti. Sabbepi tebhūmakā dhammā kamanīyā, yasmā ca kālikānaṃ kāmānaṃ tathāsabhāvatā kathitā. Ayampi gāthā tadatthameva dīpetīti imāya te kathitā eva honti. Ye ca sattā pañcasu khandhesu diṭṭhitaṇhādivasena patiṭṭhitā ‘‘itthī, puriso, ahaṃ, mamā’’ti ca abhinivisiya kāme paribhuñjanti, te maraṇaṃ nātivattanti. Evampettha kāmānaṃ kālikattho kathitoti āha ^b^‘‘kālikā kāmā kathitā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Ayaṃ ñātapariññā^eb^ti rūpārūpadhamme lakkhaṇādito ñāte katvā paricchindanapaññā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘evaṃ ñātaṃ katvā’’^eb^tiādi. Padaṭṭhānaggahaṇeneva cettha tesaṃ rūpārūpadhammānaṃ paccayo gahitoti paccayapariggahassapi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Tīreti^eb^ tuleti vīmaṃsati. ^b^Dvācattālīsāya ākārehī^eb^ti iminā matthakappattaṃ mahāvipassanaṃ dasseti. Te pana ākārā visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanāya vuttanayena veditabbā. ‘‘Aniccānupassanāya niccasaññaṃ pajahatī’’tiādinā vipassanākkhaṇepi ekadesena pahānaṃ labbhateva, anavasesato pana pahānavasena pahānapariññaṃ dassento ^a^V1.0078^ea^ āha ^b^‘‘aggamaggena^eb^^a^M1.0088^ea^^b^…pe… ayaṃ pahānapariññā’’^eb^ti. Tathā ca āha ^b^‘‘evaṃ tīhi pariññāhī’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Akkhātāra^eb^nti akkhātabbaṃ, na akkheyyakaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kammavasena kāraka’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Kāraka^eb^nti ca sādhanamāha. ^b^Na maññatī^eb^ti vā maññanaṃ nappavatteti ^b^akkhātāra^eb^nti khīṇāsavaṃ. Atha vā ^b^tañhi tassa na hotī^eb^ti taṃ kāraṇaṃ tassa khīṇāsavassa na hoti na vijjati, ^b^yena^eb^ diṭṭhitaṇhādikāraṇena ^b^akkheyyaṃ^eb^ khandhapañcakaṃ ‘‘tisso’’ti vā ‘‘phusso’’ti vā ‘‘itthī’’ti vā ‘‘puriso’’ti vā abhinivissa vadeyyāti evamettha attho veditabbo. Manussanāgādīhi pūjanīyattā ‘‘yakkho’’ti sabbadevānaṃ sādhāraṇavacananti devadhītāpi ‘‘yakkhī’’ti vuttā. ^b^Akkheyya^eb^nti pahānapariññāya pahānamaggo, tassa ārammaṇabhūtaṃ nibbānampi gahitaṃ. ^b^Na maññatī^eb^ti khīṇāsavassa assa phalappattīti āha ^b^‘‘navavidho lokuttaradhammo kathito’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Visesī^eb^ti visesajātiādivasena seyyoti attho. ^b^Tesu gahitesū^eb^ti tesu seyyamānādīsu tīsu mānesu gahitesu. Tayo seyyamānā, tayo sadisamānā, tayo hīnamānā gahitāva honti. ^b^So puggalo^eb^ti so appahīnamaññanapuggalo. ^b^Teneva mānena^eb^ hetubhūtena. ^b^Upaḍḍhagāthāyā^eb^ti purimaddhena pana vatthukāmā vuttāti āha ^b^‘‘kālikā kāmā kathitā’’^eb^ti.

[03]Vidhīyati visadisākārena ṭhapīyatīti ^b^vidhā,^eb^ koṭṭhāso. ^b^Kathaṃvidha^eb^nti kathaṃ patiṭṭhitaṃ, kena pakārena pavattitanti attho. Vidahanato hīnādivasena vividhenākārena dahanato upadhāraṇato ^b^vidhā,^eb^ māno. ^b^Mānesū^eb^ti nimittatthe bhummaṃ, mānahetūti attho. ^b^Na calatī^eb^ti na vedhati attano parisuddhapakatiṃ avijahanato.

[03]^b^Paññā ‘‘saṅkhā’’ti āgatā, paññā^eb^ti yoniso paṭisaṅkhānaṃ. ^b^Saṅkhāyako^eb^ti saṅkalanapaduppādanādi-piṇḍagaṇanāvasena gaṇako ^b^papañcasaṅkhā^eb^ti mānādipapañcabhāgā. Te te dhammā sammā yāthāvato saṅkhāyanti upatiṭṭhanti etāyāti ^b^saṅkhā,^eb^ paññā. Ekaṃ dvetiādinā saṅkhānaṃ gaṇanaṃ paricchindananti ^b^saṅkhā,^eb^ gaṇanā. Saṅkhāyati bhāgaso kathīyatīti ^b^saṅkhā^eb^^a^M1.0089^ea^, koṭṭhāso. Saṅkhānaṃ satto puggalotiādinā saññāpananti ^b^saṅkhā,^eb^ rattotiādi paṇṇatti. ^b^Khīṇāsavo jahi pajahi^eb^ rāgādīnaṃ suppahīnattā. ^b^Navabhedaṃ^eb^ pabhedato, saṅkhepato ^b^tividhamāna^eb^nti attho. ^b^Navavidha^eb^nti vā pāṭhe navabhedattā antarabhedavasena navavidhanti attho. Paccayavisesehi itthibhāvādivisesehi visesena ^a^V1.0079^ea^ mānīyati gabbho etthāti ^b^vimānaṃ,^eb^ gabbhāsayo. ^b^Na upagacchī^eb^ti na upagamissati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘anāgatatthe atītavacana’’^eb^nti. ‘‘Nājjhagā’’ti hi atītaṃ ‘‘na gamissatī’’ti etasmiṃ atthe. ^b^Chindi^eb^ ariyamaggasatthena. ^b^Olokayamānā^eb^ upapattīsu. ^b^Sattanivesanesū^eb^ti sattānaṃ upapajjaṭṭhānesu. ^b^Lokuttaradhammameva kathesi^eb^ arahattassa paveditattā.

[03]‘‘Gāthāya atthaṃ kathetuṃ vaṭṭatī’’ti attha-saddo āharitvā vattabbo. ^b^Aṭṭhaṅgikamaggavasenapī^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. Satisampajaññaṃ nāma kusaladhammānuyoge kāraṇanti āha ^b^‘‘dasakusalakammapathakāraṇa’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^Aṭṭhaṅgikamaggavasena^eb^ ca gāthāatthavacane ^b^ayaṃ^eb^ idāni vuccamāno vitthāra-^b^nayo^eb^. ^b^Tasmiṃ kira ṭhāne^eb^ti tasmiṃ kira devatāya pucchitaṃ pañhaṃ vissajjanaṭṭhāne. Devatāya ñāṇaparipākaṃ oloketvā anupubbiyā kathāya saddhiṃ sāmukkaṃsikadesanā mahatī ^b^dhammadesanā ahosi. Ñāṇaṃ pesetvā^eb^ti satthudesanāya anussaraṇavasena pattavisuddhipaṭipāṭipavattaṃ bhāvanāñāṇaṃ bandhitvā. ^b^Sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāyā^eb^ti satthudesanāvilāsena attano ca paripakkañāṇattā paṭhamaṃ phalaṃ patvā. ^b^Evamāhā^eb^ti evaṃ ‘‘pāpaṃ na kayirā’’tiādippakārena gāthamāha. ^b^Aṅgaṃ na hoti,^eb^ ājīvo yathā kuppamāno vācākammantavasena kuppati, tathā sampajjamānopīti. So vācākammantapakkhiko, tasmā taggahaṇena ^b^gahitova hoti. Vāyāmasatisamādhayo gahitā^eb^ samādhikkhandhasaṅgahato. ^b^Sammādiṭṭhisammāsaṅkappā gahitā^eb^ paññākkhandhasaṅgahato. ^b^Antadvayavivajjanaṃ gahitaṃ^eb^ sarūpenevāti adhippāyo. ^b^Itī^eb^tiādi nigamanaṃ.
[06]Samiddhisuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Nandanavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^21^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Desanāsīsa^eb^nti ^a^M1.0090^ea^ desanāpadesalakkhaṇavacananti adhippāyo. ^b^Omaṭṭho^eb^ti adhomukhaṃ katvā dinnappahāro. Iminā eva pasaṅgena pahāre vibhāgato dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘cattāro hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ ^a^V1.0080^ea^. ^b^Upari ṭhatvā^eb^ti hatthiādīnaṃ upari ṭhatvā. ^b^Adhomukhaṃ dinnappahāro^eb^ti khaggakaravālādīnaṃ adhomukhaṃ katvā pahatapahāro. ^b^Ummaṭṭho^eb^ vuttavipariyāyena veditabbo. Vividhappahāro ^b^vimaṭṭho^eb^. ^b^‘‘Omaṭṭho gahito’’^eb^ti vatvā tasseva gahaṇe kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘so hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Duggandhakimiādīnaṃ vasena ^b^antodoso. Mañcena saddhiṃ bandhitvā^eb^ti yasmiṃ mañce vaṇikapuggalo nipanno, tattha taṃ subandhaṃ katvā pādaṭṭhānaṃ uddhaṃ karontehi sīsaṭṭhānaṃ adho kātabbaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘adhosiro kātabbo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Paribbaje^eb^ti pavatteyya. Sā pana pavatti bhāvanāvihārena yuttāti āha ^b^‘‘vihareyyā’’^eb^ti.

[03]Sallassa ubbahanaṃ ^b^sallubbahanaṃ. Atthaṃ parittakaṃ gahetvā ṭhitā^eb^ upamākārassa vikkhambhanappahānassa adhippetattā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘punappuna’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Anubandhova hoti^eb^ sati paccaye uppajjanārahato devatāya kāmarāgappahānassa jotitattā. Nanu bhagavatā anāgāmimaggena desanā niṭṭhāpetabbāti? Na, itarissā ñāṇabalānurūpadesanāya pavattetabbato. Veneyyajjhāsayānukulañhi dhammaṃ dhammassāmī desetīti.
[06]Sattisuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^22^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kammaṃ aphusanta^eb^nti kammaphassaṃ aphusantaṃ, kammaṃ akarontanti attho. ^b^Vipāko na phusatī^eb^ti vipākaphasso na phusati, vipāko na uppajjateva kāraṇassa abhāvato. Evaṃ byatirekamukhena kammavaṭṭena vipākavaṭṭaṃ sambandhaṃ katvā atthaṃ vatvā idāni kevalaṃ kammavaṭṭavasena atthaṃ vadanto ^b^‘‘kammamevā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^nākaroto kariyatī^eb^ti kammaṃ akubbato na kayirati, anabhisandhikatakammaṃ nāma natthīti attho. Idāni ^a^M1.0091^ea^ tamevatthaṃ anvayato dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘phusantañcā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^tato^eb^ti phusanahetu. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva. Vuttamevatthaṃ sakāraṇaṃ katvā pariveṭhitavasena vibhūtaṃ katvā dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘tasmā phusanta’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Dhammatā^eb^ti kārakasseva kammavipākānubandho, nākārakassāti ayaṃ kammavipākānaṃ sabhāvo.

[03]^b^Pacceti^eb^ upagacchati anubandhati. ^b^Pāpa^eb^nti pāpakaṃ kammaṃ phalañca. Ayañca attho araññe luddakassa uyyojanāya sunakhehi parivāriyamānassa bhikkhuno bhayena rukkhaṃ āruḷhassa ^a^V1.0081^ea^ cīvare luddassa upari patite tassa sunakhehi khāditvā māritavatthunā dīpetabboti.
[06]Phusatisuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^23^eb^^b^.^eb^ Yena atthena taṇhā ‘‘jaṭā’’ti vuttā, tamevatthaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘jāliniyā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Sā hi aṭṭhasatataṇhāvicaritapabhedā attano avayavabhūtā eva jālā etissā atthīti ^b^jālinī^eb^ti vuccati. Idānissā jaṭākārena pavattiṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘sā hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^rūpādīsu ārammaṇesū^eb^ti tassā pavattiṭṭhānamāha rūpādichaḷārammaṇavinimuttassa taṇhāvisayassa abhāvato. ^b^Heṭṭhupariyavasenā^eb^ti kadāci rūpārammaṇe kadāci yāva dhammārammaṇā, kadāci dhammārammaṇe kadāci yāva rūpārammaṇāti evaṃ heṭṭhā ca upari ca pavattivasena. Desanākkamena cettha heṭṭhupariyatā veditabbā, kāmarāgādivasenapi ayamattho veditabbo. Saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇikabhāvato aparāparuppatti ettha saṃsibbananti āha ^b^‘‘punappunaṃ uppajjanato saṃsibbanaṭṭhenā’’^eb^ti. Idaṃ yena sambandhena ^b^jaṭā viyāti jaṭā^eb^ti jaṭātaṇhānaṃ upamūpameyyatā, taṃdassanaṃ. Ayañhettha attho – yathā jālinī veḷugumbassa sākhā, tāsaṃ sañcayādayo ca attano avayavehi saṃsibbitā vinaddhā ‘‘jaṭā’’ti vuccanti, evaṃ taṇhāpi saṃsibbanasabhāvenāti.

[03]Ime ^a^M1.0092^ea^ sattā ‘‘mama ida’’nti pariggahitaṃ attanibbisesaṃ maññamānā abbhantarimaṃ karonti. Abbhantaraṭṭho ca anto-saddoti sakaparikkhāresu uppajjanamānāpi taṇhā ‘‘antojaṭā’’ti vuttā. Pabbajitassa pattādi, gahaṭṭhassa hatthiādi ^b^sakaparikkhāro^eb^. Attāti bhavati ettha abhimānoti ^b^attabhāvo,^eb^ upādānakkhandhapañcakaṃ. Sarīranti keci. ‘‘Mama attabhāvo sundaro, asukassa viya mama attabhāvo bhaveyyā’’tiādinā sakāttabhāvādīsu taṇhāya uppajjanākāro veditabbo. Attano cakkhādīni ^b^ajjhattikāyatanāni,^eb^ attano ca paresañca rūpādīni ^b^bāhirāyatanāni,^eb^ paresaṃ sabbāni vā. Saparasantatipariyāpannāni vā cakkhādīni ^b^ajjhattikāyatanāni,^eb^ tathā rūpādīni ^b^bāhirāyatanāni^eb^. Parittamahaggatabhavesu pavattiyāpi taṇhāya antojaṭābahijaṭābhāvo veditabbo. Kāmabhavo hi kassacipi kilesassa avikkhambhitattā katthacipi avimutto ajjhattaggahaṇassa visesapaccayoti ‘‘ajjhattaṃ anto’’ti ^a^V1.0082^ea^ ca vuccati, tabbipariyāyato rūpārūpabhavo ‘‘bahiddhā bahī’’ti ca. Tenāha bhagavā – ‘‘ajjhattasaṃyojano puggalo, bahiddhāsaṃyojano puggalo’’ti (a. ni. 2.37).

[03]Visayabhedena pavattiākārabhedena anekabhedabhinnampi taṇhaṃ jaṭābhāvasāmaññena ekanti gahetvā ^b^‘‘tāya evaṃ uppajjamānāya jaṭāyā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Sā pana pajāti vuttasattasantānapariyāpannā eva hutvā punappunaṃ taṃ jaṭentī vinandhantī pavattatīti āha ^b^‘‘jaṭāya jaṭitā pajā’’^eb^ti. Tathā hi paramatthato yadipi avayavabyatirekena samudāyo natthi, ekadeso pana samudāyo nāma na hotīti avayavato samudāyaṃ bhinnaṃ katvā upamūpameyyaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘yathā nāma veḷujaṭādīhi…pe… saṃsibbitā’’^eb^ti āha. Imaṃ jaṭanti sambandho. Tīsu dhātūsu ekampi asesetvā saṃsibbanena ^b^tedhātukaṃ jaṭetvā ṭhitaṃ^eb^. Tenassā mahāvisayataṃ vijaṭanassa ca sudukkarabhāvamāha. ^b^Vijaṭetuṃ ko samattho^eb^ti iminā ‘‘vijaṭaye’’ti padaṃ sattiatthaṃ, na vidhiatthanti dasseti.

[03]Evaṃ ‘‘antojaṭā’’tiādinā puṭṭho athassa bhagavā tamatthaṃ vissajjento ^b^‘‘sīle patiṭṭhāyā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Ettha ^b^sīle^eb^ti kusalasīle. Taṃ pana pātimokkhasaṃvarādibhedesu parisuddhameva icchitabbanti āha ^b^‘‘catupārisuddhisīle’’^eb^ti.

[03]Narati ^a^M1.0093^ea^ netīti ^b^naro,^eb^ puriso. Kāmaṃ itthīpi taṇhājaṭāvijaṭane samatthā atthi, padhānameva pana sattaṃ dassento ‘‘naro’’ti āha yathā ‘‘satthā devamanussāna’’nti, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana avibhāgena puggalapariyāyo ayanti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘naroti satto’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Vipākabhūtāya saha paññāya bhavatīti ^b^sapañño^eb^. Tāya hi ādito paṭṭhāya santānavasena bahulaṃ pavattamānāya ayaṃ satto savisesaṃ sapaññoti vattabbataṃ arahati. Vipākapaññāpi hi santānavisesena bhāvanāpaññuppattiyā upanissayapaccayo hoti ahetukadvihetukānaṃ tadabhāvato. ^b^Kammajatihetukapaṭisandhipaññāyā^eb^ti kammajāya tihetukapaṭisandhiyaṃ paññāyāti evaṃ tihetukasaddo paṭisandhisaddena sambandhitabbo, na paññāsaddena. Na hi paññā tihetukā atthi. Paṭisandhito pabhuti pavattamānā paññā ‘‘paṭisandhiyaṃ paññā’’ti vuttā taṃmūlakattā, na paṭisandhikkhaṇe pavattā eva.

[03]Cinteti ārammaṇaṃ upanijjhāyatīti ^b^cittaṃ,^eb^ samādhi. So hi sātisayaṃ upanijjhānakicco. Na hi vitakkādayo vinā samādhinā tamatthaṃ sādhenti, samādhi pana tehi vināpi ^a^V1.0083^ea^ sādhetīti. Paguṇabalavabhāvāpādanena paccayehi cittaṃ, attasantānaṃ cinotītipi ^b^cittaṃ,^eb^ samādhi. Paṭhamajjhānādivasena cittavicittatāya iddhividhādicittakaraṇena ca samādhi cittanti vināpi paropadesenassa cittapariyāyo labbhateva. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana citta-saddo viññāṇe niruḷhoti katvā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘cittasīsena hettha aṭṭha samāpattiyo kathitā’’^eb^ti. Yathāsabhāvaṃ pakārehi jānātīti ^b^paññā^eb^. Sā yadipi kusalādibhedato bahuvidhā, ‘‘bhāvaya’’nti pana vacanato bhāvetabbā idhādhippetāti taṃ dassento ^b^‘‘paññānāmena vipassanā kathitā’’^eb^ti. Yadipi kilesānaṃ pahānaṃ ātāpanaṃ, taṃ sammādiṭṭhiādīnampi attheva, ātappasaddo viya pana ātāpa-saddo vīriye eva niruḷhoti āha ^b^‘‘ātāpīti vīriyavā’’^eb^ti. Yathā kammaṭṭhānaṃ tāya paññāya parito harīyati pavattīyati, evaṃ sāpi tadatthaṃ yogināti āha ^b^‘‘pārihāriyapaññā’’^eb^ti. Abhikkamādīni sabbakiccāni sātthakasampajaññādivasena paricchijja netīti ^b^sabbakiccapariṇāyikā^eb^.

[03]Yasmā puggalādhiṭṭhānena gāthā bhāsitā, tasmā puggalādhiṭṭhānameva upamaṃ dassento ‘‘yathā nāma puriso’’tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^sunisita^eb^nti suṭṭhu ^a^M1.0094^ea^ nisitaṃ, ativiya tikhiṇanti attho. Satthassa nisitatarabhāvakaraṇaṃ nisānasilāyaṃ, bāhubalena cassa ukkhipananti ubhayampetaṃ atthāpannaṃ katvā upamā vuttāti tadubhayaṃ upameyyaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘samādhisilāyaṃ sunisitaṃ…pe… paññāhatthena ukkhipitvā’’^eb^ti āha. Samādhiguṇena hi paññāya tikkhabhāvo. Yathāha ‘‘samāhito yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī’’ti (saṃ. ni. 3.5; 4.99; 5.1071). Vīriyañcassā upatthambhakaṃ paggaṇhanato. ^b^Vijaṭeyyā^eb^ti vijaṭetuṃ sakkuṇeyya. Vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāya hi vattamānāya yogāvacaro taṇhājaṭaṃ vijaṭetuṃ samattho nāma. Vijaṭanañcettha samucchedavasena pahānanti āha – ‘‘sañchindeyya sampadāleyyā’’ti.

[03]Maggakkhaṇe panesa ^b^vijaṭeti^eb^ nāma, aggaphalakkhaṇe sabbaso ^b^vijaṭitajaṭo^eb^ nāma. Tenāha ‘‘idānī’’tiādi. Yasmā jaṭāya vijaṭanaṃ ariyamaggena, tañca kho nibbānaṃ āgamma, tasmā taṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘jaṭāya vijaṭanokāsa’’^eb^nti. Yattha pana sā vijaṭīyati, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yattha nāmañcā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^‘‘Paṭighaṃ rūpasaññā cā’’^eb^ti gāthāsukhatthaṃ sānunāsikaṃ katvā niddeso, ‘‘paṭigharūpasaññā’’ti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Paṭighasaññāvasena kāmabhavo gahito^eb^ kāmabhavapariyāpannattā tāya. Pathavīkasiṇādirūpe saññā rūpasaññā. Ubhayatthāpi saññāsīsena cittuppādasseva gahaṇaṃ. ^b^Bhavasaṅkhepenāti^eb^ bhavabhāvena saṅkhipitabbatāya, bhavalakkhaṇena ekalakkhaṇattāti attho. Rūpe vā virajjanavasena ca vattuṃ sakkuṇeyyā idha ^b^rūpasaññā^eb^ti vuttā ^a^V1.0084^ea^, evampettha arūpabhavassa ca gahitatā veditabbā. ^b^‘‘Nāmañca rūpañcā’’^eb^ti anavasesato nāmarūpaṃ gahitanti arūpabhava-asaññabhavānampettha gahaṇaṃ siddhanti apare. ^b^Pariyādiyanaṭṭhāne^eb^ti pariyādiyanakāraṇe sabbaso khepananimitte nibbāne. Tenāha ^b^‘‘nibbānaṃ…pe… dassito hotī’’^eb^ti.
[06]Jaṭāsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^24^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Evaṃladdhikā^eb^ti sabbathāpi cittuppatti sadukkhā, sabbathāpi acittakabhāvo seyyo, tasmā yato kutoci cittaṃ nivāretabbanti evaṃdiṭṭhikā ^a^M1.0095^ea^. ^b^So^eb^ti satto. ^b^Aniyyānikakathaṃ katheti^eb^ ayoniso cittanivāraṇaṃ vadantī. ^b^Saṃyatabhāvaṃ āgata^eb^nti rāgavisevanādito sammadeva saṃyatabhāvaṃ otarabhāvaṃ. Dhammacariyāvasena hi pavattamāne citte natthi īsakampi rāgādivisevanaṃ, na tassa sampati āyatiñca koci anattho siyā, tasmā taṃ mano sabbato anavajjavuttito na nivāretabbaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘dānaṃ dassāmī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Yato yato^eb^ti yato yato sāvajjavuttito ayonisomanasikārato. ^b^Ta^eb^nti mano ^b^nivāretabbaṃ^eb^ anatthāvahattā.
[06]Manonivāraṇasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^25^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Katāvī^eb^ti katavā, pariññādikiccaṃ katvā niṭṭhapetvā ṭhitoti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘catūhi maggehi katakicco’’^eb^ti. Svāyamattho arahantiādisaddasannidhānato viññāyati. ^b^Evaṃ^eb^ ‘‘ahaṃ vadāmī’’tiādiākārena ^b^pucchati^eb^.

[03]^b^Khandhādīsu kusalo^eb^ti khandhāyatanādīsu salakkhaṇādīsu ca samūhādivasena pavattiyañca cheko yathābhūtavedī. ^b^Upaladdhinissitakatha^eb^nti attupaladdhinissitakathaṃ hitvā. ^b^Vohārabhedaṃ akaronto^eb^ti ‘‘ahaṃ paramatthaṃ jānāmī’’ti lokavohāraṃ bhindanto avināsento loke lokasamaññameva nissāya ^b^‘‘ahaṃ, mamā’’ti vadeyya. Khandhā bhuñjantī^eb^tiādinā vohārabhedaṃ, tattha ca ādīnavaṃ dasseti.

[03]Māno nāma diṭṭhiyā samadhuro. Tathā hi dutiyamaggādīsu sammādiṭṭhiyā pahānābhisamayassa ^a^V1.0085^ea^ paṭivipaccanīke paṭipattisiddhi. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yadi diṭṭhiyā vasena na vadati, mānavasena nu kho vadatīti cintetvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Vidhūpitā^eb^ti santāpitā ñāṇagginā daḍḍhā. Te pana viddhaṃsitā nāma hontīti āha ^b^‘‘vidhamitā’’^eb^ti. Mamaṅkārādayo mayanti sattasantāne sati pavattanti etenāti mayo, maññanā. Mayo eva ^b^mayatā^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘mayatanti maññana’’^eb^nti.
[06]Arahantasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^26^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Divāratti^eb^nti ^a^M1.0096^ea^ na ādicco viya divā eva, na candimā viya rattiṃ eva, atha kho divā ca rattiñca. ^b^Tattha tatthā^eb^ti yattha yattha sampajjalito, tattha tattheva padese, na ādicco viya candimā viya sakalaṃ mahādisaṃ disantarāḷañca. Ñāṇānubhāvena uppannāloko ^b^ñāṇāloko^eb^ti vadanti. ‘‘Idaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccanti pubbe me, bhikkhave, ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi ñāṇaṃ udapādi paññā udapādi vijjā udapādi āloko udapādī’’ti (saṃ. ni. 5.1081; mahāva. 15; paṭi. ma. 2.30) pana vacanato maggo ^b^ñāṇāloko^eb^. ‘‘Tamo vihato, āloko uppanno’’ti (ma. ni. 1.386; pārā. 12) vā vacanato vijjattayāloko ^b^ñāṇāloko^eb^. Paṭhamābhisambodhiyaṃ viya sañjātapītivipphāro, visesato ratanaghare samantapaṭṭhānavicinane sañjātapītivasena uppannasarīrobhāso vā ^b^pītiāloko^eb^. Tattheva uppannapasādavasena sañjātāalokova ^b^pasādāloko^eb^. Dhammacakkapavattane ‘‘aññāsi vata, bho, koṇḍañño’’ti uppannapasādālokoti ca vadanti. Sabbattheva satthu dhammadesanā sattānaṃ hadayatamaṃ vidhamantī ^b^dhammakathāāloko. Sabbopi buddhānaṃ pātubhāvā uppanno āloko^eb^ti iminā sāvakānaṃ desanāya sañjātadhammālokopi buddhānubhāvoti dasseti.
[06]Pajjotasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^27^eb^^b^.^eb^ Saraṇato avicchedavasena pavattanato khandhādīnaṃ paṭipāṭi ^b^sarā^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ime saṃsārasarā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Kuto^eb^ti kena kāraṇena, kimhi vā? Tenāha ^b^‘‘kiṃ āgammā’’^eb^ti? ^b^Na patiṭṭhāti^eb^ paccayābhāvato. ^b^Āpo^eb^tiādinā pāḷiyaṃ catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ appatiṭṭhānāpadesena tattha kāmarūpabhavānaṃ abhāvo dassito. Tadubhayābhāvadassanena heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva arūpabhavassapi ^a^V1.0086^ea^ abhāvo dassitova hoti, yathārutavasena vā ettha attho veditabbo. Yasmā purimā dve gahitā, gahitañca atthaṃ pariggahetvāva pacchimattho pavattoti.
[06]Sarasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^28^eb^^b^.^eb^ Nidhīyatīti ^a^M1.0097^ea^^b^nidhānaṃ^eb^. Nidhātabbataṃ gataṃ nihitanti attho. ^b^Muttasārādī^eb^ti muttāmaṇiveḷuriyapavāḷarajatajātarūpādi. ^b^Suvaṇṇarajatabhājanādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena kahāpaṇa-dhaññakoṭṭhabhaṇḍādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Tampi hi niccaparibbayavasena bhuñjīyatīti ^b^‘‘bhogo’’^eb^ti vuccati. ^b^Aññamaññaṃ abhigijjhantī^eb^ti aññamaññassa santakaṃ abhigijjhanti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘patthentī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Analaṅkatā^eb^ti na alaṃ pariyattanti evaṃ katacittā, atricchatāmahicchatāhi abhibhūtā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘atittā apariyattajātā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ussukkajātesū^eb^ti taṃtaṃkicce sañjātaussukkesu. ^b^Nānākiccajātesū^eb^ti nānāvidhakiccesu, sañjātanānākiccesu vā. Vaṭṭagāmikapasutena ^b^vaṭṭasotaṃ anusarantesu^eb^. Taṇhānivāsatāya gehantipi agārantipi vuccatīti āha ^b^‘‘mātugāmena saddhiṃ geha’’^eb^nti. ^b^Virājiyā^eb^ti hetuatthadīpakaṃ padanti āha ^b^‘‘virājetvā’’^eb^ti, ^b^tvā^eb^-saddopi cāyaṃ hetuatthoti.
[06]Mahaddhanasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^29^eb^^b^.^eb^ Iriyā vuccati kāyena kattabbakiriyā, tassā pavattiṭṭhānabhāvato ^b^iriyāpatho,^eb^ gamanādi. Taṃ aparāparappavattiyā cakkaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘catucakkanti catuiriyāpatha’’^eb^nti. ^b^Navadvāra^eb^nti karajakāyo adhippeto. So ca kesādiasuciparipūroti āha ^b^‘‘puṇṇanti asucipūra’’^eb^nti. ^b^Taṇhāya saṃyutta^eb^nti taṇhāsahitaṃ. Tena na kevalaṃ sabhāvato ^b^eva,^eb^ atha kho nissitadhammo ca asuciṃ dasseti. Mātukucchisaṅkhāte asucipaṅke jātattā ^b^paṅkajātaṃ,^eb^ kesādiasucipaṅkajātattā ca ^b^paṅkajātaṃ. Yātrā^eb^ti apagamo. Tena sabhāvato nissitadhammato ca asucisabhāvato kāyato kathaṃ apagamo siyāti pucchati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘etassā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]Nahanaṭṭhena bandhanaṭṭhena naddhīti upanāho idhādhippetoti āha ‘‘naddhinti upanāha’’nti. So pana ito pubbakāle kodhoti āha ^b^‘‘pubbakāle’’^eb^tiādi ^a^M1.0098^ea^. ^b^Pāḷiniddiṭṭhe^eb^ti upanāhaiccādike ^a^V1.0087^ea^ idha pāḷiyaṃ niddiṭṭhe ^b^kilese ṭhapetvā avasesā^eb^ diṭṭhivicikicchādayo satta kilesā dummocayatāya varattā viyāti ^b^varattāti veditabbā^eb^. Ārammaṇaggahaṇasabhāvato ^b^eko^eb^ evesa dhammo, pavatti-ākārabhedena pana ^b^icchanaṭṭhena^eb^ patthanaṭṭhena ^b^icchā, lubbhanaṭṭhena^eb^ gijjhanaṭṭhena ^b^lobho^eb^ti vutto. ^b^Paṭhamuppattikā^eb^ti ekasmiṃ ārammaṇe, vāre vā paṭhamaṃ uppannā. ^b^Aparāparuppattiko^eb^ti punappunaṃ uppajjamānako. ^b^Aladdhapatthanā^eb^ appaṭiladdhavatthumhi āsatti lobho. ^b^Uppāṭetvā^eb^ti sasantānato uddharitvā.
[06]Catucakkasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^30^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Eṇimigassa viyā^eb^ti eṇimigassa jaṅghā viya. Avayavīsambandhe hi idaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. Piṇḍimaṃsassa parito samasaṇṭhitattā ^b^suvaṭṭītajaṅgho. Kisa^eb^nti thūlabhāvapaṭikkhepaparājotanā, na suṭṭhu kisabhāvadīpanaparāti āha ^b^‘‘athūlaṃ samasarīra’’^eb^nti. ^b^Ātapena milāta^eb^nti tapasā milātakāyaṃ indriyasantāpanabhāvato. Tenevāha – ^b^‘‘tapo milāta’’^eb^ntiādi, tathā cāha pāḷiyaṃ ^b^‘‘appāhāraṃ alolupa’’^eb^nti. Yathā ‘‘vīrassa bhāvo vīriya’’nti vīrabhāvena vīriyaṃ lakkhīyati, evaṃ vīriyasambhavena vīrabhāvoti āha ^b^‘‘vīranti vīriyavanta’’^eb^nti. ‘‘Cattāro pañca ālope, abhutvā udakaṃ pive’’ti (theragā. 983; mi. pa. 6.5.10) dhammasenāpativuttaniyāmena parimitabhojitāya appāhāratā ^b^bhojane mattaññutā. ‘‘Mitāhāra’’^eb^nti vatvā puna paricchinnakālabhojitāyapi appāhārataṃ dassento ^b^‘‘vikāla…pe… parittāhāra’’^eb^nti āha. ^b^Catūsu paccayesu loluppavirahitaṃ^eb^ bodhimūle ^b^eva^eb^ sabbaso loluppassa pahīnattā. ‘‘Catūsu paccayesū’’ti hi imināva sabbattha loluppavigamo dīpitovāti. ^b^Rasataṇhāpaṭikkhepo vā esa^eb^ ‘‘appāhāra’’nti vatvā ‘‘alolupa’’nti vuttattā. ‘‘Sīhaṃ vā’’ti ettha ekacarasaddo viya iva-saddo atthato ‘‘nāga’’nti etthāpi ānetvā, sambandhitabboti ^a^M1.0099^ea^ āha – ^b^‘‘ekacaraṃ sīhaṃ viya, ekacaraṃ nāgaṃ viyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ekacarā appamattā^eb^ ekīkatāya.

[03]^b^Pañcakāmaguṇavasena rūpaṃ gahitaṃ^eb^ tesaṃ rūpasabhāvattā. ^b^Manena nāmaṃ gahitaṃ^eb^ manassa nāmasabhāvattā. ^b^Avinibhuttadhamme^eb^ti avinābhāvadhamme gahetvā. ^b^Ādi^eb^-saddena āyatanadhātuādayo gahitā. Kāmaguṇaggahaṇena hettha rūpabhāvasāmaññena pañca vatthūni gahitāneva honti, manogahaṇena dhammāyatanaṃ, evaṃ dvādasāyatanāni gahitāni honti. Iminā nayena dhātuādīnampi ^a^V1.0088^ea^ gahitatā yojetabbā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘pañcakkhandhādivasenapettha bhummaṃ yojetabba’’^eb^nti. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti pāḷiyaṃ. Kāmavatthu ^b^bhummaṃ^eb^.
[06]Eṇijaṅghasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Sattivaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^31^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sataṃ sādhūnaṃ saraṇagamanasīlādibhedassa dhammassa ullapanato, attano vā pubbenivāsānussatiyā tassa dhammassa ullapanato kathanato satullapā, devatā, tāsaṃ kāyo samūho, tattha bhavāti ^b^satullapakāyikā^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sataṃ dhamma’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Samādānavasena ullapetvā,^eb^ na vaṇṇanākathanamattena ^b^tatrā^eb^ti tasmiṃ tāsaṃ devatānaṃ satullapakāyikabhāve. ^b^Idaṃ vatthū^eb^ti idaṃ kāraṇaṃ. ^b^Samuddavāṇijā^eb^ti saṃyattikā. ^b^Khittasaravegenā^eb^ti jiyāmuttasarasadisavegena, sīghaoghenāti attho. Uppatatīti uppāto. Uppāte bhavaṃ byasanaṃ ^b^uppātikaṃ^eb^. ^b^Patiṭṭhā^eb^ti hitapatiṭṭhā. Paraloke hitasukhāvahaṃ ^b^abhayakāraṇaṃ. Jaṅghasata^eb^nti manussasataṃ. Jaṅghāsīsena hi manusse vadati sahacāribhāvato. ^b^Aggahesi^eb^ pañcasīlāni. Āsannānāsannesu āsannasseva paṭhamaṃ vipaccanato ^b^‘‘āsannakāle gahitasīlaṃ nissāyā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Ghaṭāvasenā^eb^ti samūhavasena.

[03]^b^Sabbhī^eb^ti ^a^M1.0100^ea^ sādhūhi. Te hi saparahitasādhanato pāsaṃsatāya santaguṇatāya ca santoti vuccati. Te pana yasmā paṇḍitalakkhaṇehi samannāgatā honti, tasmā ^b^‘‘paṇḍitehī’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Samāsethā^eb^ti saṃvasethāti ayamettha adhippāyoti āha ^b^‘‘sabbairiyāpathe’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Mittasanthava^eb^nti mettisandhānaṃ. Sattānaṃ hitesitālakkhaṇā hi metti, sā ca ñāṇasahitā ñāṇapubbaṅgamāvāti mittasanthavo asaṃkiliṭṭho, itaro saṃkiliṭṭhoti āha ^b^‘‘na kenaci saddhiṃ kātabbo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Saddhamma^eb^nti diṭṭhadhammikādihitāvahaṃ sundaradhammaṃ. ^b^Seyyo^eb^ti hitavaḍḍhanatādi vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘vaḍḍhī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Sataṃ^eb^ sādhūnaṃ, paṇḍitānanti ayamettha attho. Tappaṭiyogavisayattā añña-saddassa vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘aññato^eb^^a^V1.0089^ea^^b^andhabālato’’^eb^ti. Sokanimittaṃ sokakāraṇaṃ uttarapadalopena idha sokasaddena gahitanti āha ^b^‘‘sokavatthūna’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Sokavatthūni^eb^ nāma corādayo acchindanādivasena paresaṃ sokakaraṇato. ^b^Sokānugatā^eb^ sokappattā.

[03]^b^Therassā^eb^ti saṃkiccattherassa. Attano bhaginiyā jeṭṭhattā ^b^‘‘tumhe’’^eb^ti āha. Ayaṃ ‘‘idha corā paṭipajjiṃsū’’ti amhe tiṇāyapi na maññatīti cintetvā ^b^ekacce ‘‘mārema na’’nti āhaṃsu.^eb^ Karuṇāya ^b^ekacce ‘‘vissajjemā’’^eb^ti āhaṃsu. ^b^Mantetvā^eb^ti bhāsetvā.

[03]^b^Ahu^eb^ ahosi, bhūtapubbanti attho. ^b^Araññasmiṃ brahāvane^eb^ti tādise brahāvane, mahāraññe nivāsīti attho ^b^ceto^eb^ti byādho. ^b^Kūṭānī^eb^ti vākurādayo. ^b^Oḍḍetvā^eb^ti sajjetvā. ^b^Sasaka^eb^nti pelakaṃ ^b^ubbiggā^eb^ti bhītatasitā. ^b^Ekaratti^eb^nti ekaratteneva. ^b^Dhanajānī^eb^ti paribbayavasena addhikehi laddhabbadhanato hāni, ‘‘samaṇampi nāma hanti, kiṃ amhesu lajjissatī’’ti addhikānaṃ anāgamanato ekadivasaṃ laddhabbaparibbayampi na labhissantīti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^Ñātayopi^eb^ mātāpitubhātubhaginiādike ñātake. Te kira adhimuttassa bhaginiyā santikaṃ upagacchantā antarāmagge tena samāgatā, adhimutto ^a^M1.0101^ea^ saccavācaṃ anurakkhanto corabhayaṃ tesaṃ nārocesi. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘tesampī’’^eb^tiādi. Taṃ nissāya pabbajitattā ^b^‘‘adhimuttasāmaṇerassa santike’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ, na upasampadācariyo hutvā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘attano antevāsike katvā’’^eb^ti. Saccānurakkhaṇena anuttaraguṇādhigamena ca ^b^ñātimajjhe virocati^eb^.

[03]^b^Sātata^eb^nti satataṃ. Sa-saddassa hi idha sābhāvo yathā ‘‘sārāgo’’tiādīsu. Sātabhāvo vā ^b^sātata^eb^nti āha ^b^‘‘sukhaṃ vā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Kāraṇenā^eb^ti tena tena kāraṇena. Sabbāsaṃ tāsaṃ vacanaṃ subhāsitaṃ, bhagavato pana ukkaṃsagataṃ subhāsitameva. Svāyamattho taṃtaṃgāthāpadeneva viññāyatīti taṃ nīharitvā dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘na kevala’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tena sappurisūpasaṃsevasaddhammābhiyogo yathā sattānaṃ vaḍḍhiyā paññāpaṭilābhassa ekantikaṃ kāraṇaṃ, evaṃ sokapaccaye sati visokabhāvassa, ñātimajjhe sobhāya, sugatigamanassa, ciraṃ sukhaṭṭhānassa, vaṭṭadukkhamocanassapi aññāsādhāraṇaṃ hotīti vuttamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
[06]Sabbhisuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^32^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pamajjanākārena ^a^V1.0090^ea^ pavattā anupaladdhi ^b^pamādo^eb^. Tena ekantato satirahitā hontīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sativippavāsalakkhaṇenā’’^eb^ti. Diṭṭhivicikicchādayo cettha pamādeneva saṅgahitā. Idāni yathā macchariyanimittañca pamādanimittañca dānaṃ na dīyati, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘ekacco hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Parikkhayaṃ gamissatī^eb^ti bhogaparihāniṃ gamissati. ^b^Khiḍḍādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena maṇḍanavibhūsanachaṇanakkhattakiccabyasanādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Yasadāyaka^eb^nti kittiyasassa parivārayasassa ca dāyakaṃ. ^b^Sirīdāyaka^eb^nti sobhaggadāyakaṃ. ^b^Sampattidāyaka^eb^nti kulabhogarūpabhogasampadāhi sampattidāyakaṃ. ^b^Puñña^eb^nti vā idha puññaphalaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ ‘‘evamidaṃ puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatī’’tiādīsu (dī. ni. 3.80) viya. ^b^Atthi dānassa phala^eb^nti ettha deyyadhammassa anavaṭṭhitataṃ bahulasādhāraṇataṃ, taṃ pahāya gamanīyataṃ ^a^M1.0102^ea^, tabbisayāya pītiyā sāvajjataṃ, dānadhammassa anaññasādhāraṇataṃ anugāmikataṃ, tabbisayāya pītiyā anavajjataṃ, lobhādipāpadhammānaṃ vinodanaṃ, sesapuññānaṃ upanissayañca jānantenāti vattabbaṃ.
[03]^b^Taṃyeva bāla^eb^nti yo maccharī, tameva. Adānasīlā ^b^bālā^eb^. Ekacco dhanassa paribhogaparikkhayabhayena attanāpi na paribhuñjati atilobhaseṭṭhi viyāti āha ^b^‘‘idhalokaparalokesū’’^eb^ti.

[03]Yasmā ekacco adānasīlo puriso addhike disvā passantopi na passati, tesaṃ kathaṃ suṇantopi na suṇoti, sayaṃ kiñci na katheti, adātukamyatāthambhe baddho hoti, tasmā tattha mataliṅgāni upalabbhantiyevāti āha ^b^‘‘adānasīlatāya maraṇena matesū’’^eb^ti. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana dānamattameva gahetvā matenassa samataṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yathā hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Dānasīlassa pana amataliṅgāni vuttavipariyāyato veditabbāni. ^b^Vaja^eb^nti puthutte ekavacanaṃ, tasmā vacanavipallāsena vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘saha vajantā’’^eb^ti. Dānasīlādidhammo purātano, na ajjatanoti sanantano, so etesu atthīti ^b^sanantanā,^eb^ paṇḍitā, tesaṃ dhammāti tesaṃ vasenapi dhammo ^b^sanantano^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘sanantanānaṃ vā paṇḍitānaṃ esa dhammo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Appasmimpi deyyadhamme^eb^ sati ^b^eke^eb^ dānaṃ dadanti, ^b^eke^eb^ na dadanti maccharibhāvā. ^b^Sahassadānasadisā^eb^ti ekāpi dakkhiṇā pariccāgacetanāya uḷārabhāvato sahassadānasadisā hoti.

[03]^b^Duranugamano^eb^ti asamaṅginā anugantuṃ dukkaro. Ananugamanañcassa dhammassa apūraṇamevāti āha ^a^V1.0091^ea^^b^‘‘duppūro’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Dhammaṃ care’’ti ayaṃ dhammacariyā gahaṭṭhassa vasena āraddhāti āha ^b^‘‘dasakusalakammapathadhammaṃ caratī’’^eb^ti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘dārañca posa’’^eb^nti. ^b^Samuñjaka^eb^nti kassakehi attanā kātabbaṃ katvā visaṭṭhadhaññakaraṇato khale uñchācariyavasena samuñjaniādinā chaḍḍitadhaññasaṃharaṇaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yo api…pe… samuñjakaṃ caratī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Etenā^eb^ti satasahassasahassayāgiggahaṇena dasannampi bhikkhukoṭīnaṃ piṇḍapāto dassito hoti. ‘‘Dinno’’ti padaṃ ānetvā yojanā. ^b^Dasannaṃ vā kahāpaṇakoṭīnaṃ piṇḍapāto^eb^ti dasannaṃ kahāpaṇakoṭīnaṃ viniyuñjanavasena sampāditapiṇḍapāto. Tayidaṃ satasahassaṃ ^a^M1.0103^ea^ sahassayāgīnaṃ dānaṃ ettakaṃ hotīti katvā vuttaṃ. ^b^Samuñjakaṃ carantopī^eb^ti samuñjakaṃ caritvāpi, samuñjakacaraṇahetūti attho. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo. Dāraṃ posentopi dhammaṃ carati, appakasmiṃ dadantopi dhammaṃ caratīti yojanā. ^b^Tathāvidhassā^eb^ti tādisassa tathādhammacārino yā dhammacariyā, tassā kalampi nagghanti ^b^ete sahassayāgino^eb^ attano sahassayāgitāya. ^b^Yaṃ tena daliddenā^eb^tiādi tassevatthassa vivaraṇaṃ. ^b^Sabbesampi tesa^eb^nti ‘‘sataṃsahassānaṃ sahassayāgina’’nti vuttānaṃ tesaṃ sabbesampi. ^b^Itaresa^eb^nti ‘‘tathāvidhassā’’ti vuttapurisato aññesaṃ. ^b^Dasakoṭisahassadāna^eb^nti dasakoṭisaṅkhātaṃ tato anekasahassabhedatāya sahassadānaṃ.

[03]‘‘Kalaṃ nagghatī’’ti idaṃ tesaṃ dānato imassa dānassa uḷāratarabhāvena vipulatarabhāvena vipulataraphalatāya vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘kathaṃ nu kho etaṃ mahapphalataranti jānanattha’’^eb^nti. Paccayavisesena mahattaṃ gatoti ^b^mahaggato,^eb^ uḷāroti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘vipulassetaṃ vevacana’’^eb^nti. ^b^Samenā^eb^ti ñāyena, dhammenāti attho. ^b^Visame^eb^ti na same macchariyalakkhaṇappatte. ^b^Chetvā^eb^ti pīḷetvā. Taṃ pana pīḷanaṃ pothananti dassento ^b^‘‘pothetvā’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Assumukhā^eb^ti tintāssumukhasammissā paraṃ rodāpetvā. ^b^Mahādāna^eb^nti yathāvuttaṃ bahudeyyadhammassa pariccajanena mahantadānaṃ. ^b^Uppattiyā aparisuddhatāyā^eb^ti ajjhāsayassa deyyadhammagavesanāya ca suddhatāya malīnattā. ^b^Itaraṃ^eb^ dhammacariyāya nibbattitadānaṃ. ^b^Parittadāna^eb^nti parittassa deyyadhammassa vasena parittadānaṃ. ^b^Attano uppattiyā parisuddhatāyā^eb^ti ajjhāsayassa deyyadhammagavesanāya ca visuddhatāya. ^b^Evantiādimāhā^eb^ti ‘‘evaṃ sahassānaṃ sahassayāgina’’nti avoca. Tattha ^b^sahassāna^eb^nti sataṃsahassānaṃ. Gāthābandhasukhatthaṃ sataggahaṇaṃ na kataṃ. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
[06]Maccharisuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^33^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Udānaṃ^eb^^a^V1.0092^ea^^b^udānesī^eb^ti pītivegena uggiritabbatāya udānaṃ uggiri uccāresi. Tayidaṃ yasmā pītisamuṭṭhāpitaṃ vacanaṃ, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘udāhāraṃ udāharī’’^eb^ti ^a^M1.0104^ea^. Yathā pana taṃ vacanaṃ ‘‘udāna’’nti vuccati, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yathā hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Saddhāyā^eb^ti ettha ^b^ya^eb^-kāro hetuattho. Pariccāgacetanāya hi saddhā visesapaccayo assaddhassa tadabhāvato. ^b^Pi^eb^-saddo vuttatthasampiṇḍanattho. ^b^‘‘Sāhū’’^eb^ti padaṃ sādhusaddena samānatthaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Katha^eb^nti dānayuddhānaṃ vipakkhasabhāvāti adhippāyo. ^b^Etaṃ ubhaya^eb^nti dānaṃ yuddhanti idaṃ dvayaṃ. ^b^Jīvitabhīruko^eb^ti jīvitavināsabhīruko. ^b^Khayabhīruko^eb^ti bhogakkhayassa bhīruko. ^b^Vadanto^eb^ti jīvite sālayataṃ, tato eva yujjhane asamatthataṃ pavedento. ^b^Chejja^eb^nti hatthapādādichedo. ^b^Ussahanto^eb^ti vīriyaṃ karonto. ^b^Evaṃ bhoge rakkhissāmī^eb^ti tathā bhoge aparikkhīṇe karissāmīti. ^b^Vadanto^eb^ti idha bhogesu lobhaṃ, tato eva dātuṃ asamatthataṃ pavedento. ^b^Eva^eb^nti evaṃ jīvitabhoganirapekkhatāya dānañca yuddhañca samaṃ hoti. ^b^Saddhādisampanno^eb^ti saddhādhammajīvitāvīmaṃsāsīlādiguṇasamannāgato. So hi deyyavatthuno parittakattā appakampi dadanto attano pana cittasampattiyā khettasampattiyā ca bahuṃ uḷārapuññaṃ pavaḍḍhento bahuvidhaṃ lobha-dosa-issā-macchariya-diṭṭhivicikicchādibhedaṃ tappaṭipakkhaṃ abhibhavati, tato eva ca taṃ mahapphalaṃ hoti mahānisaṃsaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana ^b^‘‘maccheraṃ maddati’’^eb^cceva vuttaṃ, tassa pana ujuvipaccanīkabhāvato.
[03]^b^Paratthā^eb^ti paraloke. ^b^Ekasāṭakabrāhmaṇavatthu^eb^ anvayavasena, aṅkuravatthu byatirekavasena vitthāretabbaṃ.

[03]Dhammo laddho etenāti ^b^dhammaladdho,^eb^ puggalo. Aggiāhitapadassa viya saddasiddhi daṭṭhabbā. ^b^‘‘Uṭṭhāna^eb^nti kāyikaṃ vīriyaṃ, ^b^vīriya^eb^nti cetasika’’nti vadanti. ^b^Uṭṭhāna^eb^nti bhoguppāde yuttapayuttatā. ^b^Vīriya^eb^nti tajjo ussāho. ^b^Yamassa^eb^ āṇāpavattiṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^Vetaraṇimpi^eb^ itare niraye ca atikkamma. Te pana abbudādīnaṃ vasena avīciṃ dasadhā katvā avasesamahāniraye sattapi āyuppamāṇabhedena tayo tayo katvā ekatiṃsāti vadanti. Sañjīvādinirayasaṃvattanassa kammassa tikkhamajjhamudubhāvena tassa āyuppamāṇassa tividhatā vibhāvetabbā. Apare pana ‘‘aṭṭha mahānirayā soḷasa ussadanirayā ādito cattāro sitaniraye ekaṃ katvā satta sitanirayāti evaṃ ekatiṃsa mahānirayā’’ti ^a^M1.0105^ea^ vadanti. Mahānirayaggahaṇato ādito cattāro sitanirayā eko nirayo katoti.

[03]^b^Tesa^eb^nti ^a^V1.0093^ea^ vicinitvā gahitapaccayānaṃ. ^b^Pañcanavutipāsaṇḍabhedā^eb^ papañcasūdanisaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayena veditabbā. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti tesu dvīsu vicinanesu. ^b^Dakkhiṇāvicinanaṃ āha,^eb^ upamānāni hi nāma yāvadeva upameyyatthavibhāvanatthāni. Etena sukhettagahaṇatopi dakkhiṇeyyavicinanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Pāṇesu saṃyamo^eb^ti iminā dasavidhampi kusalakammapathadhammaṃ dasseti. Yathā hi ‘‘pāṇesu saṃyamo’’ti iminā sattānaṃ jīvitāvoropanato saṃyamo vutto, evaṃ tesaṃ sāpateyyāvahārato paradārāmasanato visaṃvādanato aññamaññabhedanato pharusavacanena saṅghaṭṭanato niratthakavippalapanato parasantakābhijjhānato ucchedacintanato micchābhinivesanato ca saṃyamo hotīti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sīlānisaṃsaṃ kathetumāraddhā’’^eb^ti. Pharusavacanasaṃyamo panettha sarūpeneva vutto.

[03]^b^Parassa upavādabhayenā^eb^ti pāpakiriyahetu parena attano vattabbaupavādabhayena. ^b^Upavādabhayā^eb^ti upavādabhayanimittaṃ. ‘‘Kathaṃ nu kho amhe pare na upavadeyyu’’nti āsīsantā ^b^pāpaṃ na karonti. Dhammapadamevā^eb^ti asaṅkhatadhammakoṭṭhāso eva ^b^seyyo^eb^ seṭṭho. Yasmā sabbasaṅkhataṃ aniccaṃ khayadhammaṃ vayadhammaṃ virāgadhammaṃ nirodhadhammaṃ, tasmā tadadhigamāya ussāho karaṇīyoti dasseti. Pubbasaddo kālavisesavisayoti āha ^b^‘‘pubbe ca kassapabuddhādikālepī’’^eb^tiādi. Puna akālaviseso apāṭiyekko bhummatthavisayovāti āha ^b^‘‘sabbepi vā’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ^b^sabbepi vā^eb^ti ete sabbepi kassapabuddhādayo lokanāthā ^b^santo nāma^eb^ vūpasantasabbakilesasantāpā santasabbhūtaguṇattā.
[06]Sādhusuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^34^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kamanīyānī^eb^ti ^a^M1.0106^ea^ kantāni. Tato eva etāni ^b^iṭṭhārammaṇāni^eb^ sukhārammaṇāni ^b^rūpādīni,^eb^ te pana vatthukāmā, tadārammaṇakilesakāmā vā. ^b^‘‘Na santi kāmā manujesū’’^eb^ti desanāsīsametaṃ, nicchayena kāmā aniccāyeva. Maccu dhīyati etthāti ^b^maccudheyyaṃ^eb^. Na puna āgacchati ettha taṃ ^b^apunāgamanaṃ. Apunāgamanasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānaṃ^eb^ anupagacchanato. ^b^Nibbānaṃ hī^eb^tiādi vuttassevatthassa vivaraṇaṃ. ^b^Baddho^eb^ti paṭibaddhacitto. ^b^Pamatto^eb^ti vossaggapamādaṃ āpanno.

[03]^b^Taṇhāchandato^eb^^a^V1.0094^ea^^b^jātaṃ^eb^ tassa visesapaccayattā. Icchitaṃ hanatīti ^b^aghaṃ,^eb^ dukkhaṃ. Idha pana anavasesapariyādānavasena pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhanti. ^b^Chandavinayā aghavinayo^eb^ti hetunirodhena hi phalanirodho, evaṃ saupādisesanibbānaṃ vatvā ^b^aghavinayā dukkhavinayo^eb^ti anupādisesanibbānaṃ vadati.

[03]^b^Citrānī^eb^ti kilesakāmāpi vedanādiṭṭhisampayogabhedena honti, ākārabhedena ca atthi savighātāvighātāti tato visesetuṃ ^b^‘‘ārammaṇacittānī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Saṅkappitarāgo^eb^ti subhādivasena saṅkappitavatthumhi rāgo. ^b^Kilesakāmo kāmoti vutto^eb^ tassevidha visesato kāmabhāvasiddhito. ^b^Pasūrasuttena vibhāvetabbo^eb^ ‘‘na te kāmā’’tiādinā tassa vatthumhi āgatattā. Idāni tamatthaṃ saṅkhepeneva vibhāvento ^b^‘‘pasūraparibbājako hī’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Na te kāmā yāni citrāni loke^eb^ti te ce kāmā na honti, yāni loke citrāni rūpādiārammaṇāni. ^b^Vedesī^eb^ti kevalaṃ saṅkapparāgañca kāmaṃ katvā vadesi ce. ^b^Hehintī^eb^ti bhaveyyunti attho. Suṇanto saddāni manoramāni, satthāpi te hehiti kāmabhogīti paccekaṃ gāthā, idha pana saṃkhipitvā dassitā. Dhīrā nāma dhitisampannāti āha ^b^‘‘paṇḍitā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Tassā^eb^ti yo pahīnakodhamāno sabbaso saṃyojanātigo nāmarūpasmiṃ asajjanto rāgādikiñcanarahito, tassa. ^b^Mogharājā nāma thero^eb^ bāvarībrāhmaṇassa paricārakānaṃ soḷasannaṃ aññataro. ^b^Yathānusandhiṃ^eb^ appatto sāvasesa-^b^attho,^eb^ kiñci vattabbaṃ atthīti adhippāyo ^a^M1.0107^ea^. Sabbaso vimuttattāva devamanussā namassanti, ye taṃ paṭipajjanti. Tesaṃ kiṃ hoti? Kiñcipi na siyāti ayamettha atthaviseso? ^b^Dasabalaṃ sandhāyevamāha^eb^ ukkaṭṭhaniddesena. ^b^Anupaṭipattiyāti^eb^ paṭipattiṃ anugantvā paṭipajjanena. ^b^Namassanti^eb^ taṃ pūjenti.

[03]^b^Catusaccadhammaṃ jānitvā^eb^ti tena paṭividdhaṃ catusaccadhammaṃ paṭivijjhitvā. Tathā ca buddhasubuddhatāya nibbematikā hontīti āha ^b^‘‘vicikicchaṃ pahāyā’’^eb^ti. Tato paraṃ pana anukkamena aggamaggādhigamena ^b^saṅgātigāpi^eb^ honti. Asekkhadhammapāripūriyā ^b^pasaṃsiyā^eb^ viññūnaṃ pasaṃsāpi hontīti.
[06]Nasantisuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^35^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ujjhānavasena ^a^V1.0095^ea^ pavattā saññā etesaṃ atthi, ujjhānavasena vā sañjānantīti ^b^ujjhānasaññī. Kāraye^eb^ti katānaṃ pariyantaṃ kārayeti attho. ^b^Pariyantakārita^eb^nti paricchinnakāritaṃ parimitavacananti attho. Paṃsukūlādipaṭipakkhanayena ^b^pattuṇṇadukulādi^eb^ vuttaṃ. ^b^Nāmaṃ gahita^eb^nti etena ‘‘ujjhānasaññikā’’ti ettha ka-saddo saññāyanti dasseti.

[03]^b^Aññenākārena bhūta^eb^nti attanā pavediyamānākārato aññena asuddhena ākārena vijjamānaṃ upalabbhamānaṃ attānaṃ. ^b^Vañcetvā^eb^ti palambhetvā. ^b^Tassa^eb^ kuhakassa. ^b^Taṃ^eb^ catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ paribhuñjanaṃ. ^b^Parijānantī^eb^ti tassa paṭipattiṃ paricchijja jānanti. ^b^Kārako^eb^ti sammāpaṭipattiyā kattā, sammāpaṭipajjitāti attho.

[03]^b^Ida^eb^nti liṅgavipallāsena vuttaṃ, ayanti attho. ^b^Dhammānudhammapaṭipadā^eb^ti nibbānadhammassa anucchavikatāya anudhammabhūtā paṭipadā. Paṭipakkhavidhamane asithilatāya ^b^daḷhā. Bhāsitamattena ca savanamattena cā^eb^ti ettha ^b^ca^eb^-saddo visesanivattiattho. Tena bhāsitassa sutassa ca sammāpaṭipattivisesaṃ nivatteti. ^b^Lokapariyāya^eb^nti lokassa parividhamanaṃ uppādanirodhavasena saṅkhārānaṃ parāvuttiṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘saṅkhāralokassa udayabbaya’’^eb^nti. Svāyamattho saccapaṭivedheneva hotīti āha ^b^‘‘catusaccadhammañca aññāyā’’^eb^ti ^a^M1.0108^ea^. ^b^Evaṃ na kubbantī^eb^ti attani vijjamānampi guṇaṃ anāvīkaronto ‘‘yathā tumhe vadatha, evaṃ na kubbantī’’ti avijjamānataṃ byākarotīti attho.
[03]^b^Akārakamevā^eb^ti dosaṃ akārakameva. Accayassa paṭiggaṇhanaṃ nāma adhivāsanaṃ, evaṃ so desakena desiyamāno tato vigato nāma hoti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘paṭiggaṇhātūti khamatū’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Sabhāvenā^eb^ti sabhāvato. ^b^Ekasadisa^eb^nti paresaṃ cittācāraṃ jānantampi ajānantehi saha ekasadisaṃ karontā. ^b^Parato^eb^ti pacchā. ^b^Kathāya uppannāyā^eb^ti ‘‘kassaccayā na vijjantī’’tiādikathāya pavattamānāya ‘‘tathāgatassa buddhassā’’tiādinā ^b^buddhabalaṃ^eb^ buddhānubhāvaṃ dīpetvā. ^b^Khamissāmī^eb^ti accayadesanaṃ paṭiggaṇhissāmi. Tappaṭiggaho hi idha khamananti adhippetaṃ, satthā pana sabbakālaṃ khamo eva.

[03]Kopo ^a^V1.0096^ea^ antare citte etassāti ^b^kopantaro^eb^. Doso garu garukātabbo assāti ^b^dosagaru^eb^. ‘‘Paṭimuccatī’’ti vā pāṭho, ayameva attho. ^b^Accāyikakamma^eb^nti sahasā anupadhāretvā kiriyā. ^b^No cidhā^eb^ti no ce idha. ^b^Idhā^eb^ti nipātamattaṃ. ^b^Apagataṃ^eb^ apanītaṃ. Doso no ce siyā, tena pariyāyena yadi aparādho nāma na bhaveyyāti. ^b^Na sammeyyuṃ^eb^ na vūpasameyyuṃ. ^b^Kusalo^eb^ti anavajjo.

[03]^b^Dhīro sato^eb^ti padadvayena vaṭṭachindaṃ āha. ^b^Ko niccameva paṇḍito nāmāti attho^eb^ti ‘‘kassaccayā’’tiādikāya pucchāgāthāya attho. Dīghamajjhimasaṃvaṇṇanāsu tathāgata-saddo vitthārato saṃvaṇṇitoti āha ^b^‘‘evamādīhi kāraṇehi tathāgatassā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Buddhattādīhī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena ‘‘bodhetā pajāyā’’tiādinā (mahāni. 192; cūḷani. pārāyanatthutigāthāniddesa 97) niddese āgatakāraṇāni saṅgayhanti. ^b^Vimokkhaṃ^eb^ vuccati ariyamaggo, tassa ^b^anto^eb^ aggaphalaṃ, tattha bhavā ^b^paṇṇatti,^eb^ tassā vasena. Evaṃ buddhabalaṃ dīpeti. Idāni khittaṃ saṅkhepena saṃharāpitaṃ hotīti dasseti.
[06]Ujjhānasaññisuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^36^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tatvassā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0109^ea^ o-kārassa va-kārādesaṃ a-kārassa ca lopaṃ katvā niddesoti āha ^b^‘‘tato assā’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Tatassā’’ti vā pāṭho, ^b^tato^eb^ti ca saddhāhetūti attho. ^b^Nānupatantī^eb^ti na vattanti. ^b^Pamādaṃ karontī^eb^ti pamajjanti, micchā paṭipajjantīti attho. ^b^Lakkhaṇānī^eb^ti aniccādilakkhaṇāni. ^b^Upanijjhāyatī^eb^ti upecca ñāṇacakkhunā pekkhati, anupassatīti attho. ^b^Āgatakicca^eb^nti āhatakiccaṃ, ayameva vā pāṭho. ^b^Sādhetī^eb^ti asammohapaṭivedhavasena nipphādeti, tathalakkhaṇaṃ nirodhasaccaṃ upanijjhāyatīti ayamattho maggepi vattabbo tena vinā asammohapaṭivedhassa asambhavato. ^b^Kasiṇārammaṇassā^eb^ti idaṃ lakkhaṇavacanaṃ. Akasiṇārammaṇasamāpattiyopi hi santīti. Yathā ca kasiṇārammaṇāni aṭṭhannaṃ samāpattīnaṃ avasesānañca tadārammaṇānaṃ paccavekkhaṇavasena cittānaṃ, evaṃ tena tāni ārammaṇāni gahitānīti ‘‘kasiṇārammaṇassa’’icceva vuttaṃ. Paramaṃ uttamaṃ sukhanti vattabbato ^b^paramasukhaṃ arahattaṃ^eb^.
[06]Saddhāsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^37^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Udānaṃ^eb^^a^V1.0097^ea^^b^paṭiccā^eb^ti ukkākaraññā jātisambhedaparihāranimittaṃ attano vaṃsaparisuddhaṃ nissāya vuttaṃ pītiudāhāraṃ paṭicca gottavasena ^b^‘‘sakkā’’ti laddhanāmānaṃ^eb^. Yadi ekopi janapado, kathaṃ bahuvacananti āha ^b^‘‘ruḷhīsaddenā’’^eb^ti. Akkharacintikā hi īdisesu ṭhānesu yutte viya saliṅgavacanāni icchanti, ayamettha ruḷhī yathā ‘‘avantī kurū’’ti, tabbisesane pana janapadasadde jātisaddatāya ekavacanameva. ^b^Aropime^eb^ti kenaci na ropime.

[03]^b^Āvaraṇenā^eb^ti setunā. ^b^Bandhāpetvā^eb^ti paṇḍupalāsapāsāṇamattikakhaṇḍādīhi āliṃ thiraṃ kārāpetvā. ^b^Sassāni kārentī^eb^ti jeṭṭhamāse kira ghammassa balavabhāvena himavante himaṃ vilīyitvā sanditvā anukkamena rohiṇiṃ nadiṃ pavisati, taṃ bandhitvā sassāni kārenti. ^b^‘‘Jātiṃ^eb^^a^M1.0110^ea^^b^ghaṭṭetvā kalahaṃ vaḍḍhayiṃsū’’^eb^ti saṅkhepena vuttamatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ ^b^‘‘koliyakammakarā vadantī’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Niyuttāmaccāna^eb^nti tasmiṃ sassaparipālanakamme niyojitamahāmattānaṃ.

[03]^b^Tīṇi jātakānī^eb^ti ‘‘kuṭhārihattho puriso’’tiādinā ^b^phandanajātakaṃ^eb^ (jā. 1.13.14 ādayo) ‘‘duddubhāyati bhaddante’’tiādinā ^b^duddubhajātakaṃ,^eb^ (jā. 1.4.85 ādayo) ‘‘vandāmi taṃ kuñjarā’’tiādinā ^b^laṭukikajātaka^eb^nti (jā. 1.5.39 ādayo) imāni tīṇi jātakāni. ^b^Dve jātakānī^eb^ti –
[21]‘‘Sādhu sambahulā ñātī, api rukkhā araññajā;
[22]Vāto vahati ekaṭṭhaṃ, brahantampi vanappati’’nti. –
[07]Ādinā ^b^rukkhadhammajātakaṃ^eb^ (jā. 1.1.74).
[21]‘‘Sammodamānā gacchanti, jālamādāya pakkhino;
[22]Yadā te vivadissanti, tadā ehinti me vasa’’nti. (jā. 1.1.33) –
[07]Ādinā ^b^sammodamānajātaka^eb^nti imāni dve jātakāni.
[21]‘‘Attadaṇḍā ^a^V1.0098^ea^ bhayaṃ jātaṃ, janaṃ passatha medhagaṃ;
[22]Saṃvegaṃ kittayissāmi, yathā saṃvijitaṃ mayā’’ti. (su. ni. 941) –
[07]Ādinā ^b^attadaṇḍasuttaṃ^eb^.

[03]^b^Tenā^eb^ti bhagavatā. ^b^Kalahakaraṇabhāvo^eb^ti kalahakaraṇassa atthibhāvo. Mahāpathaviyā mahagghe khattiye kasmā nāsethāti dassetvā kalahaṃ vūpasametukāmo bhagavā pathaviṃ nidassanabhāvena gaṇhīti dassento ^b^‘‘pathavī nāma kiṃ agghatī’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Aṭṭhāne^eb^ti akāraṇe. ^b^Veraṃ katvā^eb^ti virodhaṃ uppādetvā. Taṃtaṃpalobhanakiriyāya parakkamantiyo ^b^‘‘ukkaṇṭhantū’’ti sāsanaṃ pesenti^eb^. ^b^Kuṇāladahe^eb^ti kuṇāladahatīre patiṭṭhāya. ^b^Pucchitaṃ kathesi^eb^ anukkamena kuṇālasakuṇarājassa pucchāpasaṅgena ^b^kuṇālajātakaṃ^eb^ (jā. 2.21.kuṇālajātaka) kathessāmīti. ^b^Anabhiratiṃ vinodesi^eb^ itthīnaṃ dosadassanamukhena kāmānaṃ ādīnavokārasaṃkilesavibhāvanavasena. ^b^Purisapurisehī^eb^ti kosajjaṃ viddhaṃsetvā purisathāmabrūhanena uttamapurisehi no bhavituṃ vaṭṭatīti uppannacittā ^a^M1.0111^ea^. ^b^Avissaṭṭhasamaṇakammantā^eb^ apariccattakammaṭṭhānābhiyogāti attho. ^b^Nisīdituṃ vaṭṭatī^eb^ti bhagavā cintesīti yojanā.

[03]^b^Paduminiya^eb^nti padumavane. ^b^Vikasiṃsu^eb^ guṇagaṇavibodhena. ^b^Ayaṃ^eb^^b^imassa…pe… na kathesī^eb^ti iminā sabbepi te bhikkhū tāvadeva paṭipāṭiyā āgatattā aññamaññassa lajjamānā attanā paṭiladdhavisesaṃ bhagavato nārocesunti dasseti. ^b^Khīṇāsavāna^eb^ntiādinā tattha kāraṇamāha.

[03]^b^Osaṭamatte^eb^ti bhagavato santikaṃ upagatamatte. ^b^Ariyamaṇḍale^eb^ti ariyapuggalasamūhe. ^b^Pācīnayugandharaparikkhepato^eb^ti yugandharapabbatassa pācīnaparikkhepato, na bāhirakehi vuccamānaudayapabbatato. ^b^Rāmaṇeyyakadassanattha^eb^nti buddhuppādapaṭimaṇḍitattā visesato ramaṇīyassa lokassa ramaṇīyabhāvadassanatthaṃ. ^b^Ullaṅghitvā^eb^ti uṭṭhahitvā. ^b^Evarūpe khaṇe laye muhutte^eb^ti yathāvutte candamaṇḍalassa uṭṭhitakkhaṇe uṭṭhitavelāyaṃ uṭṭhitamuhutteti uparūparikālassa vaḍḍhitabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.

[03]Tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ jātiādivasena bhagavato anurūpaparivārabhāvaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘tatthā’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Mahāsammatassa vaṃse uppanno^eb^tiādi kulavaṃsasuddhidassanaṃ. ^b^Khattiyagabbhe jāto^eb^ti idaṃ satipi jātivisuddhiyaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ vasena avisuddhatā siyāti tesampi ‘‘avisuddhatā natthi imesa’’nti ^a^V1.0099^ea^ visuddhidassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Satipi ca gabbhavisuddhiyaṃ katadosena missakattā arajjārahatāpi siyāti ‘‘tampi natthi imesa’’nti dassanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘rājapabbajitā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Sāmantā^eb^ti samīpe. ^b^Caliṃsū^eb^ti uṭṭhahiṃsu. Kosamattaṃ ṭhānaṃ ^b^saddantaraṃ,^eb^ ‘‘saddasavanaṭṭhānameva saddantara’’nti apare. ^b^Tikkhattuṃ tesaṭṭhiyā nagarasahassesū^eb^ti jambudīpe kira ādito mahantāni tesaṭṭhi nagarasahassāni uppannāni, tathā dutiyaṃ, tathā tatiyaṃ. Taṃ sandhāyāha ‘‘tikkhattuṃ tesaṭṭhiyā nagarasahassesū’’ti. Tāni pana sampiṇḍetvā satasahassato paraṃ navasahassādhikāni asītisahassāni. ^b^Navanavutiyā doṇamukhasatasahassesū^eb^ti navasatasahassādhikesu ^a^M1.0112^ea^ navutisatasahassesu doṇamukhesu. ^b^Doṇamukha^eb^nti ca mahānagarassa āyuppattiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ pādanagaraṃ vuccati. ^b^Chanavutiyā paṭṭanakoṭisatasahassesū^eb^ti chakoṭisatasahassādhikesu navutikoṭisatasahassapaṭṭanesu. Tambapaṇṇidīpādi^b^chapaṇṇāsāya ratanākaresu^eb^. Evaṃ pana nagara-doṇamukhapaṭṭana-ratanākarādibhāvena kathanaṃ taṃtaṃadhivatthāya vasantīnaṃ tāsaṃ devatānaṃ bahubhāvadassanatthaṃ. Yadi dasasahassacakkavāḷesu devatā sannipatitā. Atha kasmā pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘dasahi ca lokadhātūhī’’ti? Vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘dasasahassa…pe… adhippeta’’^eb^nti. Tena sahassilokadhātu idha ‘‘ekā lokadhātū’’ti veditabbā.

[03]^b^Lohapāsāde^eb^ti sabbapaṭhamakate lohapāsāde. ^b^Brahmaloke^eb^ti heṭṭhime brahmaloke. Yadi tā devatā evaṃ nirantarā hutvā sannipatitā, pacchā āgatānaṃ okāso eva na bhaveyyāti codanaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘yathā kho panā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]Suddhāvāsakāye uppannā ^b^suddhāvāsakāyikā^eb^. Tāsaṃ pana yasmā suddhāvāsabhūmi nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘suddhāvāsavāsīna’’^eb^nti. ^b^Āvāsā^eb^ti āvāsaṭṭhānabhūtā. Devatā pana orambhāgiyānaṃ itaresañca saṃyojanānaṃ samucchinnaṭṭhena suddho āvāso vihāro etesanti ^b^suddhāvāsā^eb^. ^b^Mahāsamāgamaṃ ñatvā^eb^ti mahāsamāgamaṃ gatāti ñatvā.

[03]^b^Puratthimacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ otari^eb^ aññattha okāsaṃ alabhamāno. Evaṃ sesāpi. ^b^Maṇivamma^eb^nti indanīlamaṇimayaṃ kavacaṃ. Buddhānaṃ abhimukhabhāgo ^b^buddhavīthi,^eb^ sā yāva cakkavāḷā ^b^uttarituṃ na sakkā. Mahatiyā buddhavīthiyāvā^eb^ti buddhānaṃ santikaṃ upasaṅkamantehi tehi devabrahmehi valañjitabuddhavīthiyāva.

[03]Samiti ^a^V1.0100^ea^ saṅgati sannipāto samayo, mahanto samayo ^b^mahāsamayo^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘mahāsamūho’’^eb^ti. Pavaddhaṃ vanaṃ ^b^pavana^eb^nti āha ^b^‘‘vanasaṇḍo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Devaghaṭā^eb^ti devasamūhā. ^b^Samādahaṃsū^eb^ti samāhitaṃ lokuttarasamādhiṃ suṭṭhu appitaṃ akaṃsu. Tathā samāhitaṃ pana samādhinā niyojitaṃ nāma hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘samādhinā yojesu’’^eb^nti. Sabbesaṃ gomuttavaṅkādīnaṃ dūrasamussāritattā ^b^attano…pe… akariṃsu^eb^. Vinayati asse etehīti ^b^nettāni,^eb^ yottāni. Avīthipaṭipannānaṃ assānaṃ vīthipaṭipādanaṃ rasmiggahaṇena hotīti ^b^‘‘yottāni gahetvā acodento’’^eb^ti vatvā taṃ pana acodanaṃ avāraṇamevāti āha ^b^‘‘acodento avārento’’^eb^ti.

[03]Yathā ^a^M1.0113^ea^ khīlaṃ bhittiyaṃ, bhūmiyaṃ vā ākoṭitaṃ dunnīharaṇaṃ, yathā ca palighaṃ nagarappavesanivāraṇaṃ, yathā ca indakhīlaṃ gambhīranemi sunikhātaṃ dunnīharaṇaṃ, evaṃ rāgādayo sattasantānato dunnīharaṇā nibbānanagarappavesanivāraṇā cāti te ^b^‘‘khīlaṃ palighaṃ indakhīla’’^eb^nti ca vuttā. ^b^Ūhaccā^eb^ti uddharitvā. Taṇhāejāya abhāvena ^b^anejā^eb^. Paramasantuṭṭhabhāvena cātuddisattā ^b^appaṭihatacārikaṃ caranti^eb^. Buddhacakkhu-dhammacakkhu-dibbacakkhu-samantacakkhu-pakaticakkhūnaṃ vasena ^b^pañcahi cakkhūhi^eb^. Sudantā kutoti āha ^b^‘‘cakkhutopī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Chandādīhī^eb^ti chandādīnaṃ vasena ^b^na gacchanti^eb^ na vattanti. ^b^Na āgacchanti^eb^ anuppādanato. ^b^Āgu^eb^nti aparādhaṃ.
[03]^b^Sabbasaṃyogā^eb^ti vibhattilopena niddeso, sabbe saṃyogeti attho. ^b^Visajjāti^eb^ visajjitvā. ^b^Evampī^eb^ti imāyapi gāthāya vasena ‘‘āguṃ na karotī’’ti pade.

[03]^b^Gatāse^eb^ti gatā eva. ^b^Na gamissanti^eb^ pariniṭṭhitasaraṇagamanattā. Lokuttarasaraṇagamanañhettha adhippetaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘nibbematikasaraṇagamanena gatā’’^eb^ti. Te hi niyamena apāyaṃ na gamissanti, devakāyañca paripūressanti. Ye pana lokiyena saraṇagamanena buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gatā, na te gamissanti apāyaṃ, sati ca paccayantarasamavāye pahāya mānusaṃ dehaṃ devakāyaṃ paripūressantīti. Tenāha so brahmā ^b^‘‘ye keci buddhaṃ…pe… paripūressantī’’^eb^ti.
[06]Samayasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^38^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ta^eb^nti uyyānaṃ saṅkhaṃ gatanti sambandho. Dhanunā sarena gahanti pothayanti bādhentīti ^b^dhanuggahā. Taṃ sampaṭicchī^eb^ti tassā silāya heṭṭhābhāgena uggantvā sampaṭicchi. Satthu puññānubhāvena ^a^V1.0101^ea^ upahatattā sayampi paripatantī vātaṃ upatthambheti. ^b^Abhihani^eb^ satthārā anāvajjitattā. Tañca kho kammaphalavasenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tato eva ^b^tato paṭṭhāya bhagavato aphāsu jāta^eb^nti etenapi upādiṇṇakasarīre nāma aniṭṭhāpi samphassakā patanti eva tathārūpena kammunā katokāseti dasseti. ^b^Ayaṃ^eb^^a^M1.0114^ea^^b^vihāro^eb^ti gijjhakūṭavihāro. ^b^Ujjaṅgalo^eb^ na kattabbaparo. ^b^Visamo^eb^ti bhūmibhāgavasena visamo. Sivikākārena sajjito mañco eva ^b^mañcasivikā^eb^.

[03]^b^Bhusā^eb^ti daḷhā. ^b^Dukkhā^eb^ti dukkhamā duttitikkhā. ^b^Kharā^eb^ti kakkasā. ^b^Kaṭukā^eb^ti aniṭṭhā. ^b^Asātā^eb^ti na sātā appiyā. ^b^Na appetī^eb^ti na upeti. ^b^Na appāyantī^eb^ti na khamanti. Vedanādhivāsanakhantiyā satisampajaññayuttattā sabbasattaṭṭhitāhārasamudayavatthujātassa ādīnavanissaraṇānaṃ pageva suppaṭividitattā yathā samudācāro cittaṃ nābhibhavati, evaṃ sammadeva upaṭṭhāpitasatisampajaññattā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘vedanādhivāsana…pe… hutvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Apīḷiyamāno^eb^ti abādhiyamāno. Kāmaṃ aniṭṭhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho tāya apīḷiyamāno nāma natthi, pariññātavatthukattā pana tassā vase avattamāno ‘‘avihaññamāno’’ti vutto. Tenāha ^b^‘‘samparivattasāyitāya vedanānaṃ vasaṃ agacchanto’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Sīhaseyya^eb^nti ettha sayanaṃ seyyā, sīhassa viya seyyā sīhaseyyā, taṃ sīhaseyyaṃ. Atha vā ^b^sīhaseyya^eb^nti seṭṭhaseyyaṃ uttamaseyyaṃ. Svāyamattho aṭṭhakathāyameva āgamissati. ‘‘Vāmena passena sentī’’ti evaṃ vuttā ^b^kāmabhogiseyyā^eb^. ^b^Dakkhiṇapassena sayāno nāma natthi^eb^ dakkhiṇahatthassa sarīraggahaṇādiyogakkhamato. Purisavasena cetaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Ekena passena sayituṃ na sakkonti^eb^ dukkhuppattito. ^b^Ayaṃ sīhaseyyā^eb^ti ayaṃ yathāvuttā sīhaseyyā. ^b^Tejussadattā^eb^ti iminā sīhassa abhītabhāvaṃ dasseti. Bhīrukajātikā hi sesamigā attano āsayaṃ pavisitvā utrāsabahulā santāsapubbakaṃ yathā tathā sayanti, sīho pana abhirukabhāvato satokārī bhikkhu viya satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvāva sayati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘dve purimapāde’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Purimapāde^eb^ti dakkhiṇapurimapāde vāmassa purimapādassa ṭhapanavasena dve purimapāde ekasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhapetvā. ^b^Pacchimapāde^eb^ti dve pacchimapāde. Vuttanayeneva idhāpi ekasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhapanaṃ veditabbaṃ. ^b^Ṭhitokāsasallakkhaṇaṃ^eb^ abhīrukabhāveneva. ^b^Sīsaṃ pana ukkhipitvā^eb^tiādinā vuttasīhakiriyā anutrāsapabujjhanaṃ viya abhīrukabhāvasiddhā dhammatāvasenevāti veditabbā. ^b^Sīhavijambhitavijambhanaṃ^eb^ ativelaṃ ekākārena ṭhapitānaṃ sarīrāvayavānaṃ ^a^M1.0115^ea^ gamanādikiriyāsu yoggabhāvāpādanatthaṃ. ^b^Tikkhattuṃ sīhanādanadanaṃ^eb^ appesakkhamigajātapariharaṇatthaṃ.

[03]Seti ^a^V1.0102^ea^ abyāvaṭabhāvena pavattati etthāti seyyā, catutthajjhānameva seyyā ^b^catutthajjhānaseyyā^eb^. Kiṃ panettha taṃ catutthajjhānanti? Ānāpānacatutthajjhānaṃ. Tato hi vuṭṭhahitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā anukkamena aggamaggaṃ adhigantvā tathāgato jātoti. ‘‘Tayidaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ nāma, na seyyā, tathāpi yasmā ‘catutthajjhānā vuṭṭhahitvā samanantaraṃ bhagavā parinibbāyī’ti ^b^mahāparinibbāne^eb^ (dī. ni. 2.219) āgataṃ. Tasmā lokiyacatutthajjhānasamāpatti eva ^b^tathāgataseyyā’’^eb^ti keci. Evaṃ sati parinibbānakālikāva tathāgataseyyāti āpajjati; na ca tathāgato lokiyacatutthajjhānasamāpajjanabahulo vihāsi. Aggaphalavasena pavattaṃ panettha catutthajjhānaṃ veditabbaṃ. Tattha yathā sattānaṃ niddupagamalakkhaṇā seyyā bhavaṅgacittavasena hoti, sā ca nesaṃ paṭhamaṃ jātisamanvayā yebhuyyavuttikā, evaṃ bhagavato ariyajātisamanvayaṃ yebhuyyavuttikaṃ aggaphalabhūtaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ ^b^tathāgataseyyā^eb^ti veditabbā. ^b^Sīhaseyyā^eb^ nāma seṭṭhaseyyāti āha ^b^‘‘uttamaseyyā’’^eb^ti.

[03]‘‘Kālaparicchedaṃ katvā yathāparicchedaṃ uṭṭhahissāmī’’ti evaṃ tadā manasikārassa akatattā pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘uṭṭhānasaññaṃ manasikaritvā’’ti na vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘uṭṭhānasaññanti panettha na vutta’’^eb^nti. Tattha kāraṇamāha ^b^‘‘gilānaseyyā hesā’’^eb^ti. Sā hi cirakālappavattikā hoti.

[03]Visuṃ visuṃ rāsivasena anāgantvā ekajjhaṃ puñjavasena āgatattā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sabbāpi tā’’^eb^ti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sattasatā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Vikāramattampī^eb^ti vedanāya asahanavasena pavattanākāramattampi. ^b^Susammaṭṭhakañcanaṃ viyā^eb^ti sammaṭṭhasusajjitasuvaṇṇaṃ viya.

[03]^b^Dhammālapana^eb^nti asaṅkhārikasamuppannasabhāvālapanaṃ. Samullapitañhi ākārasamānavacanametaṃ. Nāgo viya vāti pavattatīti nāgavo. Tassa bhāvo ^b^nāgavatā^eb^. Vibhattilopena hesa niddeso, mahānāgahatthisadisatāyāti attho. ^b^Byattuparicaraṇaṭṭhenā^eb^ti byattaṃ uparūpari attano kiriyācaraṇena. ^b^Ājānīyo^eb^ti sammāpatitaṃ ^b^dukkhaṃ^eb^ sahanto ^a^M1.0116^ea^ attanā kātabbakiriyaṃ dhīro hutvā nitthārako. Kāraṇākāraṇajānanenāti niyyānikāniyyānikakaraṇañātatāya. ^b^Tenevaṭṭhenā^eb^ti appaṭisamaṭṭheneva. ‘‘Mutto moceyya’’ntiādi ^b^dhuravāhaṭṭhena. Nibbisevanaṭṭhenā^eb^ti rāgādivisavigatabhāvena.

[03]^b^Aniyamitāṇattī^eb^ti anuddesikaṃ āṇāpanaṃ. Sāmaññakatopi samādhisaddo pakaraṇato idha visesatthoti āha ^b^‘‘samādhinti arahattaphalasamādhi’’^eb^nti. Paṭippassaddhivasena sabbakilesehi suṭṭhu ^a^V1.0103^ea^ vimuttanti ^b^suvimuttaṃ. Abhinataṃ nāma^eb^ ārammaṇe abhimukhabhāvena pavattiyā. ^b^Apanataṃ^eb^ apagamanavasena pavattiyā, vimukhatāyāti attho. Lokiyajjhānacittaṃ viya vipassanā viya ca sasaṅkhārena sappayogena tadaṅgappahānavikkhambhanapahānavasena ca vikkhambhetvā na adhigataṃ na ṭhapitaṃ, kiñcarahi kilesānaṃ sabbaso chinnatāyāti āha ^b^‘‘chinnattā vataṃ phalasamādhinā samāhita’’^eb^nti. ^b^Atikkamitabba^eb^nti ācārātikkamavasena laṅghitabbaṃ. Sā pana laṅghanā āsādanā ghaṭṭanāti āha ^b^‘‘ghaṭṭetabba’’^eb^nti.

[03]Pañcavedā nāma – iruvedo, yajuvedo, sāmavedo, āthabbaṇavedo, itihāso cāti evaṃ itihāsapañcamānaṃ vedānaṃ. ‘‘Cara’’nti vacanavipallāsena vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘carantā’’^eb^ti, tapantāti attho. ^b^Hīnattarūpā^eb^ti hīnādhimuttikatāya nihīnacittasabhāvā. Vimuttikatāya abhāvato ^b^nibbānaṅgamā na honti^eb^. Arahattādhigamakammassa abhabbatāya ^b^parihīnatthā^eb^. ^b^Ajjhotthaṭā^eb^ti abhibhūtā. ^b^Tādiseheva sīlehī^eb^ti gosīlādīhi. ^b^Baddhā^eb^ti samādapetvā pavattanavasena anubaddhā. ^b^Lūkhaṃ tapa^eb^nti attakilamathānuyogaṃ. Taṃ pana ekadesena dassento ^b^‘‘pañcātapatāpana’’^eb^ntiādimāha. ‘‘Evaṃ paṭipannassa mokkho natthi, evaṃ paṭipannassa vaṭṭato mutti atthī’’ti vadantī sā attato sāsanassa niyyānabhāvo kathito nāma hotīti āha ^b^‘‘sāsanassa niyyānikabhāvaṃ kathentī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ādi^eb^nti gāthādvayaṃ.
[06]Sakalikasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^39^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Cātumahārājikassā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0117^ea^ cātumahārājikakāyikassa. ^b^Dhammo anubuddho^eb^ti catusaccadhammo pariññeyyādibhāvassa anurūpato buddho. ^b^Paccakkhamevā^eb^ti parapattiyā ahutvā attapaccakkhameva katvā jānāmi. Dhammaṃ garahantā nāma saddadosavasena vā atthadosavasena vā garaheyyunti taṃ dassento ^b^‘‘hīnakkhara…pe… kotivā’’^eb^ti āha. Sā pana ‘‘tesaṃ vigarahā dummedhatāya mahānatthāvahāvā’’ti dassentī devatā āha ^b^‘‘dummedhā upenti roruva’’^eb^nti. ^b^Visuṃ hotī^eb^ti avīcimahānirayato visuṃ eva hoti. ^b^Khantiyā^eb^ti ñāṇakhantiyā. ^b^Upasamenā^eb^ti rāgādīnaṃ sabbaso vūpasamena. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ruccitvā’’^eb^tiādi.
[06]Paṭhamapajjunnadhītusuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^40^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Buddhañca^eb^^a^V1.0104^ea^^b^dhammañca namassamānā^eb^ti buddhasubuddhataṃ dhammasudhammatañca ñatvā tadubhayaṃ namassamānā. Yasmā buddhe ca dhamme ca pasanno saṅghe ca pasanno eva hoti tassa suppaṭipattiyā vijānanato, tasmā so attho gāthāya ca-saddasaṅgahitoti dassento ^b^‘‘ca-saddena saṅghañcā’’^eb^ti āha ^b^atthavatiyo^eb^ti lokiyalokuttarātthasaṅgahitā lokiyakusalalokuttaramaggasaṅgaṇhanato. ^b^Yaṃ dhammaṃ sā abhāsī^eb^ti yaṃ tumhākaṃ dhammaṃ paṭivijjhitvā ṭhitā, sā mahākokanadā attano balānurūpaṃ abhāsi. ^b^Bahunā^eb^ti nānappakārena. ^b^Pariyāyenā^eb^ti kāraṇena. ^b^Tādiso^eb^ti tathārūpo tathāpaṭividdhasacco atthadhammādīsu kusalo ekekaṃ padampi udāharaṇahetunigamanāni nīharanto ācikkhati deseti paññapeti paṭhapeti vivarati vibhajati uttānīkaroti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ayaṃ bhagavā’’^eb^tiādi. Etena ativiya vitthārakkhamo sugatadhammoti dasseti. ^b^Pariyāpuṭa^eb^nti parivattitaṃ. Evaṃ vitthārakkhamaṃ ^a^M1.0118^ea^ dhammaṃ yasmā devadhītā ‘‘saṃkhittamatthaṃ lapayissāmī’’ti avoca, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘tassattha’’^eb^ntiādi.
[06]Dutiyapajjunnadhītusuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Satullapakāyikavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^41^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sīsa^eb^nti desanāpadeso, desanāya aññesupi vattabbesu kassacideva sīsabhāgena apadisanaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘rāgādīhī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Dānenā^eb^ti attano santakassa paresaṃ pariccajanena. Taṃ pana pariccajanaṃ cetanāya hotīti āha ^b^‘‘dānacetanāyā’’^eb^ti ^b^dānapuññacetanā^eb^ti dānamayā puññacetanā ^b^dāyakasseva hoti^eb^ taṃsantatipariyāpannattā. ^b^Nīhatabhaṇḍaka^eb^nti ādittagehato bahi nikkhāmitaṃ bhaṇḍakaṃ. ^b^Eta^eb^nti ‘‘dinnaṃ hotī’’tiādivacanaṃ. ^b^Adinne^eb^ti dānamukhe aniyuñjite bhoge. ‘‘Antenā’’ti jīvitassa anto adhippetoti āha ^b^‘‘maraṇenā’’^eb^ti. Mamāti pariggahitattā ^b^pariggahā,^eb^ bhogā. Tepi kenaci ākārena vināsaṃ anupagatā maraṇena pahīyanti ^a^V1.0105^ea^ nāmāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘corādīnaṃ vasena avinaṭṭhabhoge’’^eb^ti. Sobhanā aggabhūtā rūpādayo etthāti saggo, taṃ ^b^saggaṃ^eb^.
[06]Ādittasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^42^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dve tīṇi bhattāni abhutvā^eb^ti dve tayo vāre bhattāni abhuñjitvā. ^b^Uṭṭhātuṃ na sakkotī^eb^ti uṭṭhātumpi na sakkotī, pageva aññaṃ sarīrena kātabbakiccaṃ dubbalabhāvato. ^b^Dubbalopi hutvā^eb^ti bhuñjanato pubbe dubbalo hutvā balasampanno hoti. Evaṃ byatirekato anvayato ca āhārassa sarīre balavataṃ āha. Yasmā annado ^a^M1.0119^ea^ dāyako paṭiggāhakassa balado hoti, tasmā so āyatiṃ attano sarīre balado avināsavasena balassa rakkhako ca hoti. Tenāha bhagavā – ‘‘balaṃ kho pana datvā balassa bhāgī hotī’’ti (a. ni. 5.37) sesapadesupi eseva nayo. ^b^Surūpopī^eb^ti abhirūpopi. ^b^Virūpo hotī^eb^ti bībhaccharūpo kopīnassa acchannattā. ^b^Idañca yāna^eb^nti sāmaññato vuttaṃ. ^b^Upāhanā^eb^ti sarūpato dasseti. Adukkhappatto hutvā yāti vattati etenāti ^b^yāna^eb^nti chattādīnampi yānabhāvo vutto. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yānado sukhado hotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Cakkhudo nāma^eb^ hoti cakkhunā kātabbakicce sahakārīkāraṇabhāvato dīpassa.

[03]^b^‘‘Sabbesaṃyeva balādīnaṃ dāyako hotī’’^eb^ti saṅkhepato vuttaṃ atthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘dve tayo gāme’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Nisajjādivasena patissayitabbato ^b^patissayo,^eb^ vihāro. ^b^Pakkhittaṃ viya hoti^eb^ parissamassa vinoditattā. ^b^Bahi vicarantassā^eb^ti patissayaṃ alabhitvā bahi vivaṭaṅgaṇe vicarantassa. ^b^Jhāyatī^eb^ti jhāyantaṃ hoti, kilamatīti attho. Sītuṇhādivirodhipaccayavasena sasantāne ^b^visabhāgasantati,^eb^ tabbipariyāyato ^b^sabhāgasantati^eb^ veditabbā. Sukhaṃ nāma dukkhapaccayaparihārato sukhapaccayuppannato ca hoti, tadubhayaṃ patissayavasena labhatīti dassento ^b^‘‘bahi vicarantassa pāde’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Dhammapītisukha^eb^nti dhammapaccavekkhaṇena uppannapītisukhaṃ. ^b^Upasamasukha^eb^nti kilesānaṃ vūpasamena pavattasukhaṃ. Nivātaṃ pihitavātapānaṃ patissayaṃ pavisitvā dvāraṃ pidhāya ṭhitassa andhakāro hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘kūpe otiṇṇo viya hotī’’^eb^ti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘mañcapīṭhādīni na paññāyantī’’^eb^ti. Tayidaṃ bahisamāpannaparissamadosena, na ca patissayadosena. Tenāha ^b^‘‘muhutta’’^eb^ntiādi.

[03]Na ^a^V1.0106^ea^ marati etenāti ^b^amaraṇaṃ,^eb^ nibbānādhigamādayo. Tassa dānaṃ dhammūpadeso, taṃ deti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yo dhammaṃ anusāsatī’’^eb^ti. Tayidaṃ dhammānusāsanaṃ kathaṃ hotīti āha ^b^‘‘aṭṭhakatha’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Aṭṭhakathaṃ kathetī^eb^ti avivaṭapāṭhassa pāḷiyā atthasaṃvaṇṇanaṃ karotīti attho. Anadhītino pana ^b^pāḷiṃ vāceti^eb^. Tattha tattha gataṭṭhāne ^b^pucchitapañhaṃ vissajjeti,^eb^ ayaṃ tāva ganthadhuro, paṭipattivāsadhure pana ^b^kammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhati,^eb^ ubhayesampi ^a^M1.0120^ea^^b^dhammassavanaṃ karoti. Sabbadāna^eb^nti yathāvuttāamisadānaṃ abhayadānaṃ. ^b^Dhammadāna^eb^nti dhammadesanā. ^b^Dhammaratī^eb^ti samathavipassanādhamme abhirati. ^b^Dhammaraso^eb^ti saddhammasannissayaṃ pītipāmojjaṃ.
[06]Kiṃdadasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^43^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Patthentī^eb^ti pihenti. Yatthassa upagamanaṃ loke pākaṭataraṃ ahosi, te udāharaṇavasena dassento ^b^‘‘cittagahapatisīvalittherādike viyā’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Anna^eb^nti annasaññito catubbidhopi paccayo. Sabbepi dāyake ekajjhaṃ gahetvā sāmaññato ekavasena ^b^‘‘dāyakamevā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ, yathā cāha ^b^‘‘ko nāma so yakkho, yaṃ annaṃ nābhinandatī’’^eb^ti? Tattha ^b^yakkho^eb^ti satto. Sāmaññajotanā ca nāma yasmā puthuatthavisayā, tasmā ^b^‘‘ye naṃ dadanti saddhāya, vippasannena cetasā. Tameva annaṃ bhajatī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^ma^eb^-kāro padasandhikaro, te evāti attho. ^b^Dāyakaṃ^eb^ apariccajanameva ^b^anugacchati^eb^ cakkaṃ viya kubbaraṃ.
[06]Annasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^44^eb^^b^.^eb^ Patiṭṭhaṭṭhena avijjāsaṅkhātaṃ ekaṃ mūlaṃ etissāti ekamūlā. Taṃ ^b^ekamūlaṃ^eb^. Yathā saṃyojanīyesu assādānupassanāvasena taṇhāsamuppādo, evaṃ taṇhābhibhavavasena anavabodhoti ^b^avijjā taṇhāya mūlaṃ, taṇhā ca avijjāya mūlaṃ^eb^. Ayañhi nayo upanissayatāvasena vutto, sahajātavasena cāyaṃ aññamaññaṃ mūlabhāvo pākaṭoyeva. ^b^Idha pana^eb^ imissaṃ gāthāyaṃ ^b^adhippetā^eb^ ‘‘ekamūla’’nti sā taṇhā. Tattha yā bhavataṇhā, sā sassatadiṭṭhivasena āvaṭṭati parivattati, vibhavataṇhā ^a^M1.0121^ea^ ucchedadiṭṭhivasena, evaṃ ^b^dvirāvaṭṭaṃ. Sahajātakoṭiyā^eb^ti sahajātakoṭiyāpi, pageva sammuyhaṃ āpannassa pana vattamānāya taṇhāya balavabhāvena malīnatā siyā. ^b^Upanissayakoṭiyā^eb^ti upanissayakoṭiyāva sahajātakoṭiyā asambhavato. ^b^Pattharaṇaṭṭhānā^eb^ti vitthatā hutvā pavattiṭṭhānabhūmi ^a^V1.0107^ea^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tesu sā pattharatī’’^eb^ti. Samuddanaṭṭhena ^b^samuddo^eb^. Uttarituṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya patāya alaṃ pariyattoti pātālo, ayaṃ pana pātālo viyāti ^b^pātālo^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘appatiṭṭhaṭṭhenā’’^eb^ti. Agādhagambhīratāyāti attho.
[06]Ekamūlasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^45^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Anomanāma^eb^nti anūnanāmaṃ. Guṇanemittikāni eva hi bhagavato nāmāni. Guṇānañcassa paripuṇṇatāya anūnanāmanti āha ^b^‘‘sabbaguṇasamannāgatattā’’^eb^tiādi. Apica tathā tevijjo, chaḷabhiññotiādīni nāmāni anomanāmāni na honti paricchinnavisayattā, bhagavato pana satthā, sabbaññū, sammāsambuddhotiādīni nāmāni anomanāmāni nāma mahāvisayattā anūnabhāvato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘avekallanāma’’^eb^nti. ^b^Khandhantarādayo^eb^ti khandhavisesādike. Ñāṇena yāthāvato araṇīyaṭṭhena ^b^atthe. Anvayapaññādhigamāyā^eb^ti lokuttarapaññāpaṭilābhāya. ^b^Paṭipada^eb^nti samathavipassanāpaṭipadaṃ. Kilesakāmānaṃ vasena allīyitabbaṭṭhena kāmā eva ^b^ālayo^eb^. Atītakāleyeva kamanataṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘kamamāna’’^eb^nti. Na etarahi tadabhāvatoti āha ^b^‘‘atītaṃ pana upādāya idaṃ vutta’’^eb^nti. Mahānubhāvatādinā ^b^mahantānaṃ^eb^.
[06]Anomasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^46^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Accharāgaṇasaṅghuṭṭha’’nti gāthā devaputtena yenādhippāyena gāyitā, so anupubbikathāya vinā na paññāyatīti taṃ āgamanato paṭṭhāya ^a^M1.0122^ea^ kathento ^b^‘‘ayaṃ kira devaputto’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^sāsane^eb^ti imasseva satthusāsane. ^b^Kammākamma^eb^nti kammavinicchayaṃ. Atthapurekkhāratāya appakiccatāya ca ^b^sallahukavuttiko. Sayanassa koṭṭhāso^eb^ti divasaṃ purimayāmañca bhāvanānuyogavasena kilantakāyassa samassāsanatthaṃ seyyāya upagamanabhāgo anuññāto.

[03]^b^Abbhantare^eb^ti kucchiyaṃ bhattassa parittatāya ^b^satthakavātā^eb^ti tikkhabhāvena satthakā viya kantanakā vātā. ^b^Dhurasmiṃyevā^eb^ti kilesamārena yuddhe eva. Vimuttāyatanasīse ṭhatvā ^b^dhammaṃ desento vā. Upanissayamandatāya^eb^ aparipakkañāṇatāya āsavakkhayaṃ appatto kālaṃ katvāti yojanā. ^b^Upari ṭhita^eb^nti parikkhārabhāvena dibbadussūpari ṭhitaṃ. ^b^Tatheva aṭṭhāsī^eb^ti tāhi tathā vuttepi ^a^V1.0108^ea^ yathā tato pubbe, tatheva aṭṭhāsi. ^b^Suvaṇṇapaṭṭa^eb^nti nibbuddhe paṭijinitvā laddhabbasuvaṇṇapaṭṭaṃ. Vītikkamassa akatattā ^b^asambhinneneva sīlena^eb^. Yasmā tasmiṃ satthu santikaṃ āgacchante tāpi tena saddhiṃ āgamaṃsu tasmā ^b^‘‘accharāsaṅghaparivuto’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Saṅghosita^eb^nti saṅgamma ghositaṃ, tattha tattha accharānaṃ gītasaddavasena ghositaṃ. ^b^Pisācagaṇaṃ katvā vadati^eb^ acchandarāgatāya. ^b^Niyāmacittatāyā^eb^ti sammattaniyāme ninnacittatāya. ^b^Garubhāvenā^eb^ti tāsaṃ vase avattanato garuṭṭhānabhāvena. ^b^Yātrā^eb^ti nibbānaṃ pati yātrā. Taṃ pana vaṭṭato niggamanaṃ hotīti āha ^b^‘‘kathaṃ niggamanaṃ bhavissatī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Atisallekhatevā^eb^ti ativiya kilesānaṃ sallekhitavuttiko. ^b^Akatābhinivesassā^eb^ti bhāvanamananuyuttassa anāraddhavipassakassa. ^b^Kārakassā^eb^ti sugatovādakārakassa sammāpaṭipajjato. ^b^Suññatāvipassana^eb^nti suññatādīpanaṃ vipassanaṃ duccaritataṇhāya dūrīkaraṇena ekavihāritāya. ^b^Eko maggo assā^eb^ti lokuttaramaggo eva assa anāgato, pubbabhāgamaggo pana kataparicayoti attho.

[03]^b^Kāyavaṅkādīna^eb^nti kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ abhāvato samucchindanena anupalabbhanato. Natthi ettha bhayaṃ, asmiṃ vā adhigate puggalassa natthi bhayanti ^a^M1.0123^ea^^b^abhayaṃ nāma^eb^. Saṃsārakantāraṃ atikkamitvā nibbānasaṅkhātaṃ khemaṃ amataṭṭhānaṃ gamane sugatasārathinā susajjitayānabhāvato ^b^ratho akūjanoti aṭṭhaṅgiko maggova adhippeto^eb^. Dhammato anapetatāya aparāparuppattiyā ca ^b^dhammacakkehi^eb^.

[03]^b^Ottappampi gahitameva^eb^ avinābhāvā. ^b^Apālambo^eb^ti avassayo. ^b^Parivāro^eb^ti parikkhāro abhisaṅkharaṇato. Maggassa karaṇaṭṭhāne dhammo tappariyāpannā ^b^sammādiṭṭhi. Aniccādivasenā^eb^ti aniccānupassanādivasena. ^b^Sodhitesu^eb^ vajjhamānesu. ^b^Bhūmiladdhavaṭṭa^eb^nti bhūmiladdhasaṅkhātaṃ vaṭṭaṃ. Tattha vipassanāya pavattiṭṭhānabhāvato pañcakkhandhā bhūmi nāma, vaṭṭamayakammabhāvato tattha uppajjanārahaṃ kilesajātaṃ bhūmiladdhavaṭṭaṃ. ^b^Parijānamānā^eb^ti paricchindanavasena samatikkamavasena jānamānā paṭivijjhantī.
[03]Kasmā devaputto sotāpattiphaleyeva patiṭṭhāsi, nanu ca sā desanā bhagavatā catumaggappadhānabhāvena pavattitāti āha ^b^‘‘yathā hī’’^eb^tiādi.
[06]Accharāsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^47^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kesa^eb^nti ^a^V1.0109^ea^ sāmivasena vuttakasaddo ‘‘dhammaṭṭhā sīlasampannā’’ti ettha paccattabahuvacanavasena pariṇāmetabbo. Atthavasena hi vibhattivipariṇāmo. ^b^Ke janā^eb^ti ettha vā vuttakesaddo sīhavilokananayena ānetvā yojetabboti āha ^b^‘‘ke dhammaṭṭhā, ke sīlasampannā’’^eb^ti? ^b^Pucchatī^eb^ti iminā tattha kāraṇamāha. Phalādisampattiyā āramanti ettha sattāti ārāmo. Ārāme ropenti nipphādentīti ^b^ārāmaropā^eb^. Vanīyati chāyāsampattiyā bhajīyatīti ^b^vanaṃ^eb^. Tattha yaṃ upavanalakkhaṇaṃ vanaṃ, taṃ ārāmaggahaṇeneva gahitanti tapovanalakkhaṇaṃ, taṃ dassento ^b^‘‘sīmaṃ parikkhipitvā’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Visame^eb^ti udakacikkhallena visame padese. Pānīyaṃ pivanti etthāti papā, taṃ ^b^papaṃ^eb^. Udakaṃ pīyati etthāti vā papā. ^b^Taḷākādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena mātikaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.

[03]^b^Imamatthaṃ^eb^^a^M1.0124^ea^^b^sandhāyā^eb^ti iminā kammappathappattaṃ paṭikkhipati. Attanā katañhi puññaṃ anussarato taṃ ārabbha bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavati, na pana yathā kataṃ puññaṃ sayameva pavaḍḍhati. ^b^Tasmiṃ dhamme ṭhitattā^eb^ti tasmiṃ ārāmaropanādidhamme patiṭṭhitattā. ^b^Tenapi sīlena sampannattā^eb^ti tena yathāvuttadhamme katasīle ṭhatvā ciṇṇena tadaññenapi kāyavācasikasaṃvaralakkhaṇena sīlena samannāgatattā. ^b^Dasa kusalā dhammā pūrenti^eb^ duccaritaparivajjanato. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
[06]Vanaropasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^48^eb^^b^.^eb^ Esitaguṇattā esiyamānaguṇattā ca isī, asekkhā sekkhakalyāṇaputhujjanā ca. Isīnaṃ saṅgho ^b^isisaṅgho^eb^. Isisaṅghena nisevitaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘bhikkhusaṅghanisevita’’^eb^nti.

[03]Taṃ kārentassa gandhakuṭipāsādakūṭāgārādivasena siniddhasandacchāyarukkhalatāvasena bhūmibhāgasampattiyā ca anaññasādhāraṇaṃ atiramaṇīyaṃ taṃ jetavanaṃ cittaṃ toseti, tathā ariyānaṃ nivāsabhāvenapīti āha ^b^‘‘evaṃ paṭhamagāthāya jetavanassa vaṇṇaṃ kathetvā’’^eb^ti. Tenāha bhagavā – ‘‘yattha arahanto viharanti, taṃ bhūmirāmaṇeyyaka’’nti (dha. pa. 98; theragā. 991). Apacayagāmicetanā sattānaṃ visuddhiṃ āvahati kammakkhayāya saṃvattanatoti āha ^b^‘‘kammanti maggacetanā’’^eb^ti. Catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ viditakaraṇaṭṭhena kilesānaṃ vijjhanaṭṭhena ca ^b^vijjā^eb^^a^V1.0110^ea^. Maggapaññā sammādiṭṭhīti āha ^b^‘‘vijjāti maggapaññā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Samādhipakkhikā dhammā^eb^ sammāvāyāmasatisamādhayo. Yathā hi vijjāpi vijjābhāgiyā, evaṃ samādhipi samādhipakkhiko. Sīlaṃ etassa atthīti ^b^sīla^eb^nti āha ^b^‘‘sīle patiṭṭhitassa jīvitaṃ uttama’’^eb^nti. ^b^Diṭṭhisaṅkappā^eb^ti sammādiṭṭhisaṅkappā. Tattha sammāsaṅkappassa sammādiṭṭhiyā upakārabhāvena vijjābhāvo vutto. Tathā hi so paññākkhandhasaṅgahitoti vuccati.
