Yathā ca sammāsaṅkappādayo paññākkhandhasaṅgahitā, evaṃ vāyāmasatiyo ^a^M1.0125^ea^ samādhikkhandhasaṅgahitāti āha ^b^‘‘vāyāmasatisamādhayo’’^eb^ti. Dhammoti hi idha samādhi adhippeto ‘‘evaṃdhammā te bhagavanto ahesu’’ntiādīsu (dī. ni. 2.13; ma. ni. 3.197; saṃ. ni. 5.378) viya. ^b^Vācākammantājīvā^eb^ti sammāvācākammantājīvā. Maggapariyāpannā eva hete saṅgahitā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘etena aṭṭhaṅgikamaggenā’’^eb^ti.

[03]Upāyena vidhinā ariyamaggo bhāvetabbo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘samādhipakkhiyadhamma’’^eb^nti. Sammāsamādhipakkhiyaṃ vipassanādhammañceva maggadhammañca. ‘‘Ariyaṃ vo, bhikkhave, sammāsamādhiṃ desessāmi saupanisaṃ saparikkhāra’’nti (ma. ni. 3.136) hi vacanato sammādiṭṭhiādayo maggadhammā sammāsamādhiparikkhārā. ^b^Vicineyyā^eb^ti vīmaṃseyya, bhāveyyāti attho. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti hetumhi bhummavacanaṃ. Ariyamaggahetukā hi sattānaṃ visuddhi. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tasmiṃ ariyamagge visujjhatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pañcakkhandhadhammaṃ vicineyyā^eb^ti paccuppanne pañcakkhandhe vipasseyya. Tesu vipassiyamānesu vipassanāya ukkaṃsagatāya yadaggena dukkhasaccaṃ pariññāpaṭivedhena paṭivijjhīyati, tadaggena samudayasaccaṃ pahānapaṭivedhena paṭivijjhīyati, nirodhasaccaṃ sacchikiriyāpaṭivedhena, maggasaccaṃ bhāvanāpaṭivedhena paṭivijjhīyatīti evaṃ tesu catūsu saccesu visujjhatīti imasmiṃ pakkhe nimittatthe eva bhummaṃ, tesu saccesu paṭivijjhiyamānesūti attho.

[03]^b^Avadhāraṇavacana^eb^nti vavatthāpanavacanaṃ, avadhāraṇanti attho. ‘‘Sāriputtovā’’ti ca avadhāraṇaṃ sāvakesu ^b^sāriputtova seyyo^eb^ti imamatthaṃ dīpeti tassevukkaṃsabhāvato. ^b^Kilesaupasamenā^eb^ti iminā mahātherassa tādiso kilesavūpasamoti dasseti. Tassa sāvakavisaye paññāya pāramippatti ahosi. Yadi evaṃ ‘‘yopi pāraṅgato bhikkhu, etāvaparamo siyā’’ti idaṃ tesaṃ buddhānaṃ ñāṇavisaye paññāpāramippattānaṃ vaseneva vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Avadhāraṇampi vimuttiyā nānattā tīhi vimuttīhi pāraṅgate sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘pāraṃ gatoti nibbānaṃ^eb^^a^V1.0111^ea^^b^gato’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Na therena uttaritaro nāma atthi^eb^ labbhati, labbhati ce, evameva labbheyyāti adhippāyo.
[06]Jetavanasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^49^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Maccharino^eb^ti ^a^M1.0126^ea^ maccheravanto maccherasamaṅginoti āha ^b^‘‘maccherena samannāgatā’’^eb^ti. Maccheraṃ macchariyanti atthato ekaṃ. ^b^Na vandatī^eb^ti vandanamattampi na karoti, kuto dānanti adhippāyo. ^b^Upaṭṭhānaṃ kātu^eb^nti madhurapaṭisanthāraṃ karotīti yojanā. ^b^Idaṃ tāva mudumacchariyaṃ^eb^ na hadayaṃ viya attānaṃ dassentassa macchariyanti katvā. ^b^Kiṃ tuyhaṃ pādā rujjanti^eb^ nanu tuyhaṃyeva āgatagamanesu pādā rujjanti, kinte ime chindantīti adhippāyo. ^b^Sāmīcimpi na karoti^eb^ kuto dānanti adhippāyo. Yathākammaṃ taṃtaṃgatiyo aranti upagacchantīti ariyā, sattā. Ime pana kucchitā ariyāti ^b^kadariyā,^eb^ thaddhamaccharino. Macchariyasadisañhi kucchitaṃ sabbahīnaṃ natthi sabbaguṇābhibhūtattā bhogasampattiādisabbasampattīnaṃ mūlabhūtassa dānassa nisedhato. ^b^Itiādīhi^eb^ vacanehi. ^b^Attano upaghātako^eb^ti macchariyānuyogena kusaladhammānaṃ gatisampattiyā ca vināsako.

[03]Puññapāpavasena samparetabbato upagantabbato ^b^samparāyo,^eb^ paraloko. ^b^Kāmaguṇaratī^eb^ti kāmaguṇasannissayo assādo. ^b^Khiḍḍā^eb^ti kāyikakhiḍḍā vācasikakhiḍḍā cetasikakhiḍḍāti evaṃ tividhā. ^b^Esa vipāko^eb^ti coḷādīnaṃ kicchalābhoti esa evarūpo vipāko. ^b^Yamaloka^eb^nti paralokaṃ. ^b^Upapajjare^eb^ti ettha ^b^iti^eb^-saddo pakārattho. Tena pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ nirayaṃ tiracchānayoniñca saṅgaṇhāti.

[03]^b^Yācanti^eb^ nāma ariyayācanāya. Vuttañhetaṃ ‘‘uddissa ariyā tiṭṭhanti, esā ariyāna yācanā’’ti (jā. 1.7.59). Ye saṃvibhajanti, te ^b^vadaññū^eb^ nāma ñatvā kattabbakaraṇato. ^b^Vimānappabhāyā^eb^ti nidassanamattaṃ, uyyānakapparukkhappabhāhi devatānaṃ vatthābharaṇasarīrappabhāhipi sagge pakāsentiyeva. ^b^Pakāsantī^eb^ti vā pākaṭā honti, na apāyaloke viya apākaṭāti attho. ^b^Parasambhatesū^eb^ti sayaṃ sambhataṃ anāpajjitvā pareheva sambharitesu sukhūpakaraṇesu. Tenāha pāḷiyaṃ ^b^‘‘vasavattīva modare’’^eb^ti, paranimmitabhogesu vasavattī devaputtā viya sukhasamaṅgitāya modantīti attho. ^b^Evaṃ vuttasamparāyo^eb^ti ete saggāti evaṃ heṭṭhā ^a^M1.0127^ea^ vuttasamparāyo. ^b^Ubhinna^eb^nti etesaṃ yathāvuttānaṃ ubhinnaṃ dukkaṭasukaṭakammakārīnaṃ. ^b^Tato cavitvā^eb^ tato nirayasaggādito cavitvā ^a^V1.0112^ea^ manussesu nibbattati. Tesu yo maccharī manussesu nibbatto, so daliddo hutvā pubbacariyavasena maccharīyeva honto dārādibharaṇatthaṃ macchakacchapādīni hantvā punapi niraye nibbatto. Itaro suddhāsayo samiddho hutvā pubbacariyāvasena punapi puññāni katvā sagge nibbatteyya. Tenāha ^b^‘‘puna samparāyepi duggatisugatiyeva hotī’’^eb^ti.
[06]Maccharisuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^50^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Upapannāse’’ti se-kārāgamaṃ katvā niddeso, ‘‘upapannā’’icceva atthoti āha ^b^‘‘nibbattivasena upagatā’’^eb^ti. Attano sampattito avihānato avihā, tesaṃ brahmaloko ^b^avihābrahmaloko,^eb^ tasmiṃ. ^b^Upapattisamanantaramevā^eb^ti paṭhamakoṭṭhāse eva. ^b^Arahattaphalavimuttiyā^eb^ti asekkhavimuttiyā. Sekkhavimuttiyā pana avihūpapattito pageva vimuttā. Mānusaṃ dehaṃ samatikkamanti cittupakkilesapahānavasenāti phalena hetudassanamidanti āha ^b^‘‘mānusaṃ dehanti idha…pe… vuttānī’’^eb^ti. Divi bhavaṃ dibbaṃ, brahmattabhāvasaññitaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ. Tattha saṃyojanakoti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘dibbaṃ yoganti pañca uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanānī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Imassā^eb^ti devaputtassa. ^b^‘‘Hitvā mānusaṃ dehaṃ, dibbayogaṃ upaccagu’’^eb^nti tesaṃ tvaṃ kusalaṃ sabbāvajjappahānena anavajjataṃ bhāsatīti kusalī vadesi. Atthena saddassa abhedopacāraṃ katvā gambhīravacanaṃ vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘gambhīrattha’’^eb^nti atthasseva gambhīrato, na saddassa. Samucchinnakāmarāgatāya sabbaso kāmavisayappahānena ^b^nirāmisabrahmacārī nāma anāgāmī^eb^. Nivāsanaṭṭhānabhūto samāno eko gāmo etassāti āha ^b^‘‘ekagāmavāsī’’^eb^ti.
[06]Ghaṭīkārasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Ādittavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^51^eb^^b^.^eb^ Hitassa ^a^M1.0128^ea^ sādhanato ^b^sādhu,^eb^ yaṃ kiñci atthajātaṃ. Taṃ pana atthakāmena labhitabbato upasevitabbato ^a^V1.0113^ea^ laddhakaṃ, kalyāṇaṭṭhena bhaddakanti vuccatīti āha ^b^‘‘sādhūti laddhakaṃ bhaddaka’’^eb^nti. ^b^‘‘Sīlaṃ yāva jarā sādhū’’^eb^ti vuttamatthaṃ byatirekato vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘iminā idaṃ dassetī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Ida^eb^nti idaṃ atthajātaṃ.

[03]^b^Patiṭṭhitā^eb^ti cittasantāne laddhapatiṭṭhā, kenaci asaṃhāriyā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘maggena āgatā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Cittīkataṭṭhādīhī^eb^ti pūjanīyabhāvādīhi. ^b^Vuttaṃ hetaṃ^eb^ porāṇaṭṭhakathāyaṃ. ^b^Cittīkatanti ratana^eb^nti idaṃ ratanaṃ nāma loke cittīkataṃ vatthūnaṃ sahassagghanatādivasena. ^b^Yepi loke cittīkatā^eb^ khattiyapaṇḍita-catumahārāja-sakka-suyāma-mahābrahmādayo, ^b^tesaṃ cittīkato^eb^ tehi saraṇanti upagantabbatādivasena. ^b^Ratikara^eb^nti pītisukhāvahaṃ. ^b^Jhānaratisukhenā^eb^ti duvidhenapi jhānaratisukhena. ^b^Tuletu^eb^nti paricchindituṃ. ^b^Guṇapārami^eb^nti guṇānaṃ ukkaṃsapāramiṃ. ^b^Dullabho^eb^ anekāni asaṅkhyeyyāni atidhāvitvāpi laddhuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā. ^b^Anomo^eb^ti anūno paripuṇṇo. Tattha visesato anomasattaparibhogato tehi ‘‘sammāsambuddho bhagavā’’ti anussaritabbatoti āha ^b^‘‘bhagavā anomo sīlenā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]Ariyamaggapaññāyeva idha adhippetāti ^b^‘‘idha pana dullabhapātubhāvaṭṭhena paññā ‘ratana’nti vutta’’^eb^nti āha. Pujjaphalanibbattanato, attano santānaṃ punātīti ca puññacetanā ^b^puññaṃ,^eb^ sā pana yassa uppannā, tasseva āveṇikatāya anaññasādhāraṇattā kenacipi anāhaṭā, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana ^b^‘‘arūpattā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.
[06]Jarāsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^52^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ajīraṇenā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0129^ea^ jiṇṇabhāvānāpajjanena. Lakkhaṇavacanañcetaṃ avināsappattiyā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘avipattiyāti attho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Niddhamitabbo^eb^ti nīharitabbo.
[06]Ajarasāsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^53^eb^^b^.^eb^ Saha atthena vattatīti ^b^sattho,^eb^ bhaṇḍamūlaṃ gahetvā vāṇijjavasena desantarādīsu vicaraṇakajanasamūho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘saddhiṃcaro’’^eb^ti, sahacaraṇakoti attho. ^b^Mitta^eb^nti sinehayogena mittakiccayuttaṃ ^a^V1.0114^ea^. Idhādhippetappakāraṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘roge uppanne’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Tathārūpe^eb^ti jigucchanīye, duttikicche vā. Yathā asaṇṭhitānaṃ saṇṭhāpanavasena pavasato purisassa bhogabyasane nāthatā, evaṃ puttasinehavasena puttassa mātuyā antogehe nāthatāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘mātā mittaṃ sake ghare’’^eb^ti. ^b^Atthajātassā^eb^ti upaṭṭhitapayojanassāti atthoti āha ^b^‘‘uppannakiccassā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Samparāyahita^eb^nti samparāye hitāvahaṃ.
[06]Mittasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^54^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Patiṭṭhā^eb^ti avassayo. ^b^Guyhassā^eb^ti guhitabbassa rahassassa. ^b^Paramo sakhā nāma^eb^ atipiyaṭṭhānatāya.
[06]Vatthusuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^55^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vidhāvatī^eb^ti vividhaṃ rūpaṃ padhāvati, yathākāmaṃ pavattatīti attho.
[06]Paṭhamajanasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^56^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vaṭṭadukkhato^eb^ti ^a^M1.0130^ea^ saṃsāradukkhato. Saṃsāro hi kilesakammavipākānaṃ aparāparuppattitāya vidhāvati. Tañca dukkhaṃ dukkhamattāya nānāvidhadukkharāsibhāvato.
[06]Dutiyajanasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^57^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Nipphattī^eb^ti iṭṭhāniṭṭhavipākānaṃ nipphajjanato nipphatti. Tato eva ^b^avassayo,^eb^ nipphattitavipākassa avassayo adhiṭṭhānaṃ kāraṇanti attho.
[06]Tatiyajanasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^58^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Amaggo^eb^ti ^a^V1.0115^ea^ na maggo anupāyo. ^b^Rattindivakkhayo^eb^ti tattha vayakkhaṇassa pākaṭabhāvato. Vuttakkhaṇopi hi sayaṃ khīyateva. ^b^Sesaṃ bāhiramalaṃ^eb^ vatthasarīrādibhūtaṃ. Tathā hi ^b^‘‘bhasmakhārādīhi dhovitvā sakkā sodhetu’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Duṭṭho^eb^ti dūsito sattasantāno ^b^na sakkā suddho nāma kātuṃ^eb^ abbhantaramalīnabhāvāpādanato. ^b^Itthiya^eb^nti brahmacariyassa antarāyakarāyapi. ^b^Pajā^eb^ti sattakāyo ^b^sajjati^eb^ saṅgaṃ karoti yāthāvato ādīnavaṃ apassanto. Indriyasaṃvarādi kilesānaṃ tāpanato ^b^tapo,^eb^ tenāha ^b^‘‘sabbāpī’’^eb^tiādi.
[06]Uppathasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^59^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kissā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0131^ea^ bhummatthe sāmivacananti āha ^b^‘‘kismiṃ abhirato’’^eb^ti. Saddhā nāma anavajjasabhāvā, tasmā lokiyalokuttarahitasukhāvahāti āha ^b^‘‘sugatiñceva nibbānañca gacchantassa dutiyikā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Anusāsati^eb^ hitacariyāya pariṇāyikabhāvato.
[06]Dutiyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^60^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Gāyattiādiko^eb^ti chabbīsatiyā chandesu gāyattiādiko ukkatipariyosāno ^b^chando gāthānaṃ nidānaṃ^eb^ samuṭṭhānaṃ ‘‘samuṭṭhahati etenā’’ti katvā. Tehi pana anuṭṭhubhādiko hotīti āha ^b^‘‘chando gāthānaṃ nidāna’’^eb^nti. ^b^Pubbapaṭṭhāpanagāthā^eb^ti dhammakathāya ādito ārocanabhāvajānanatthaṃ satijananaṃ viya pavattitagāthā. ^b^Akkharañhi padaṃ janetī^eb^ti yasmā akkharasamudāyo padaṃ, padasamudāyo gāthā, samudāyo ca samudāyīhi byañjīyati taṃpavattanato, tasmā byañjanabhāve ṭhitaṃ akkharaṃ, taṃsamudāyo padaṃ, padaṃ taṃ viyañjetā janetā viya hotīti ‘‘akkharañhi padaṃ janetī’’ti vuttaṃ. Akkharaṃ hi uccāritaviddhaṃsitāya taṃtaṃkhaṇamattāvaṭṭhāyīpi parato pavattiyā manoviññāṇavīthiyā saṅkalanavasena ekajjhaṃ katvā padabhāvena gayhamānaṃ yathāsaṅketamatthaṃ byañjeti. ^b^Padaṃ gāthaṃ janetī^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^Gāthā atthaṃ pakāsetī^eb^ti gāthāsaññito padasamudāyo kiriyākārakasambandhavasena sambandhito kattuadhippāyānurūpaṃ ālocitavilocitaṃ saṃhitaṃ atthaṃ vibhāveti. ^b^Samuddādipaṇṇattinissitā^eb^ vohārasannissayeneva ^a^V1.0116^ea^ pavattatīti katvā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘gāthā ārabhanto’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Āsayo^eb^ti avassayoti āha ^b^‘‘patiṭṭhā’’^eb^ti ^b^kavito^eb^ti vicittakathīādito.
[06]Kavisuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Jarāvaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^61^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Nāma^eb^nti ^a^M1.0132^ea^ sāmaññanāmādibhedaṃ nāmaṃ. ^b^Sabba^eb^nti sabbaṃ paññattipathaṃ sabbaṃ ñeyyapavattipathaṃ. ^b^Addhabhavī^eb^ti kāmaṃ pāḷiyaṃ atītakālaniddeso kato, taṃ pana lakkhaṇamattaṃ. ^b^Abhibhavati anupatatī^eb^ti etena abhibhavo anupatanaṃ pavatti evāti dasseti. Taṃ panassa abhibhavanaṃ appavisaye anāmasitvā mahāvisayānaṃ vasena dassento ^b^‘‘opapātikena vā’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Tassa nāmaṃ hotī^eb^ti tassa rukkhapāsāṇādikassa anāmakoicceva samaññā hoti, tathā naṃ sañjānantīti attho.
[06]Nāmasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^62^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ye cittassa vasaṃ gacchantī^eb^ti ye apariññātavatthukā, tesaṃyeva. ^b^Anavasesapariyādāna^eb^nti anavasesaggahaṇaṃ. Na hi pariññātakkhandhā pahīnakilesā cittassa vasaṃ gacchanti, taṃ attano vase vattenti.
[06]Cittasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^63^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tatiye ^a^V1.0117^ea^^b^‘‘sabbeva vasamanvagū’’^eb^ti ye taṇhāya vasaṃ gacchanti, tesaṃ eva anavasesapariyādānanti imamatthaṃ ^b^‘‘eseva nayo’’^eb^ti iminā atidissati.
[06]Taṇhāsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^64^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kiṃ^eb^^a^M1.0133^ea^^b^su saṃyojano^eb^ti ^b^sū^eb^ti nipātamattanti āha ^b^‘‘kiṃ-saṃyojano’’^eb^ti? Vicaranti etehīti ^b^vicāraṇā,^eb^ pādā. Bahuvacane hi vattabbe ekavacanaṃ kataṃ. ^b^Tassā^eb^ti lokassa.
[06]Saṃyojanasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^65^eb^^b^.^eb^ Catutthe āgatāttho eva anantarepi vutto, byañjanameva nānanti āha ^b^‘‘pañcamepi eseva nayo’’^eb^ti.
[06]Bandhanasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^66^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Kenassubbhāhato’’ti pāṭhoti adhippāyena ^b^‘‘su-kāro nipātamatta’’^eb^nti āha, ‘‘kenassabbhāhato’’ti pana pāṭhe u-kāralopena padasandhi. ^b^Icchādhūpāyito^eb^ti asampattavisayicchālakkhaṇāya taṇhāya santāpito daḍḍho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘icchāya āditto’’^eb^ti.
[06]Attahatasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^67^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ullaṅghito^eb^ti ubbandhitvā laṅghito. ^b^Saddādīsū^eb^ti saddādināgadantesu ^b^sotādīni^eb^ uḍḍitāni ^b^taṇhārajjunā^eb^ daḷhabandhanena baddhattā tadanativattanato. ^b^Loko^eb^ti āyatanaloko. Tathā atthayojanāya katattā khandhādilokavasenapi yojanā kātabbā. Na ^b^dūraṃ^eb^^a^M1.0134^ea^ anantarabhavakattā. Cuticittāntaritattā ^a^V1.0118^ea^ ekacittantarabhavassa kammassa abujjhanaṃ, evaṃ sante kasmā sattā na bujjhantīti āha ^b^‘‘balavatiyā’’^eb^tiādi.
[06]Uḍḍitasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^68^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pañho^eb^ti ñātuṃ icchito attho. ^b^Pucchito^eb^ti sattamasutte gāthāya purimaddhaṃ pacchimaddhaṃ, pacchimaṃ purimaṃ katvā aṭṭhamasutte devatāya pucchitattā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘heṭṭhupariyāyavasena pucchito’’^eb^ti. Pucchānurūpaṃ vissajjananti avuttampi siddhametanti anāhaṭaṃ.
[06]Pihitasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^69^eb^^b^.^eb^ Navame ^b^vinayāyā^eb^ti vinayena. Karaṇatthe hi idaṃ sampadānavacanaṃ. ^b^Kissassū^eb^ti kissa, ^b^su^eb^-kāro nipātamattaṃ. ^b^Sabbaṃ chindati bandhana^eb^nti sabbaṃ dasavidhampi saṃyojanaṃ samucchindati. Na hi taṃ kiñci kilesabandhanaṃ atthi, yaṃ asamucchinnaṃ hutvā ṭhitaṃ assā taṇhāya samucchinnāya. Svāyamattho suviññeyyoti āha ^b^‘‘sabbaṃ uttānamevā’’^eb^ti.
[06]Icchāsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^70^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kismi^eb^nti kismiṃ sati? Tassa pana santabhāvo uppattivasenevāti āha ^b^‘‘kismiṃ uppanne’’^eb^ti? ^b^Loko uppannoti vuccati^eb^ anupādānattā lokasamaññāya. ^b^Chasū^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo ^b^santhava^eb^nti adhikasinehaṃ ^a^M1.0135^ea^^b^karoti^eb^ adhikasinehavatthubhāvato ajjhattikāyatanānaṃ. ^b^Upādāyā^eb^ti pubbakālakiriyā aparakālakiriyaṃ apekkhatīti vacanasesavasena kiriyāpadaṃ gahitaṃ ^b^‘‘pavattatī’’^eb^ti. Kiṃ pana pavattati? Loko, lokasamaññāti attho. ^b^Chasū^eb^ti idaṃ nimittatthe bhummaṃ. Chaḷāyatananimittañhi sabbadukkhaṃ. ^b^Aya^eb^nti sattaloko. ^b^Uppanno nāma hoti^eb^ chaḷāyatanaṃ nāma mūlaṃ sabbadukkhānanti katvā. ^b^Bāhiresu^eb^ āyatanesu ^b^santhavaṃ karoti^eb^ visesato rūpādīnaṃ taṇhāvatthukattā. Yasmā cakkhādīnaṃ santappanavasena ^a^V1.0119^ea^ rūpādīnaṃ pariggahitattā lokassa nisevitāya saṃvattati, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘channaṃ…pe… vihaññatī’’^eb^ti.
[06]Lokasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Addhavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^71^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vadhitvā^eb^ti hantvā vināsetvā. ^b^Aparidayhamānattā^eb^ti apīḷiyamānattā. ^b^Vinaṭṭhadomanassattā na socati^eb^ cetodukkhadukkhābhāvato. Visaṃ nāma dukkhaṃ aniṭṭhabhāvato, tassa mūlakāraṇaṃ kodho aniṭṭhaphalattāti āha ^b^‘‘visamūlassāti dukkhavipākassā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Akkuṭṭhassā^eb^ti akkosāparādhassa. Akkosapahāratthasambandhena hi ‘‘kuddhassā’’ti upayogatthe sampadānavacanaṃ. ^b^Sukhaṃ uppajjati^eb^ kodhaṃ nassati. Sukhuppattiṃ sandhāya esa kodho ^b^‘‘madhuraggo’’ti vutto,^eb^ sukhāvasānoti attho.
[06]Chetvāsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^72^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paññāṇa^eb^nti lakkhaṇaṃ sallakkhaṇūpāyo. ^b^Disvā^eb^ti dassanahetu. ‘‘Coḷarañño raṭṭhaṃ coḷaraṭṭha’’nti evaṃ ^b^raṭṭhaṃ raññā paññāyati^eb^.
[06]Rathasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^73^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Saddhāyā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0136^ea^ saddhāhetu. ^b^Kulasampadā^eb^ti khattiyādisampattiyo. Sabbalokiyalokuttaravittapaṭilābhahetuto ^b^saddhāvittameva^eb^. Heṭṭhā tiṇṇaṃ dvārānaṃ vasena uppannakassa sabbassapi anavajjadhammassa saṅgaṇhanato ^b^‘‘dhammoti dasakusalakammapatho’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Asaṃkiliṭṭhasukha^eb^nti. Nirāmisaṃ ^a^V1.0120^ea^ sukhaṃ. Tameva sāmisaṃ upanidhāya sambhāvento āha ^b^‘‘asaṃkiliṭṭha’’^eb^nti. Asecanakabhāvena abhirucijananato piyākicchakaraṇato bahuṃ sucirampi kālaṃ āsevantassa adosāvahato ^b^saccameva madhurataraṃ^eb^. Na hi taṃ pivitabbato sāditabbato anubhavitabbato rasoti vattabbataṃ arahati. Idāni tassa kiccasampattiatthehipi mahārahataṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘saccasmiṃ hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha nadīnivattanaṃ ^b^mahākappinavatthuādīhi^eb^ (dha. pa. aṭṭha. 1ṃahākappinattheravatthu; a. ni. aṭṭha. 1.1.231; theragā. aṭṭha. 2ṃahākappinattheragāthāvaṇṇanā) dīpetabbaṃ, itarāni ^b^kaṇhadīpāyanajātaka-^eb^ (jā. 1.10.62 ādayo) ^b^sutasoma-^eb^ (jā. 2.21.371 ādayo) ^b^macchajātakehi^eb^ (jā. 1.1.34, 75; 1.2.131 ādayo) dīpetabbāni. ^b^Nimmaddenti^eb^ abhibhavanti. ^b^Madhuratara^eb^nti sundarataraṃ seṭṭhesūti attho. ^b^Paññājīvī^eb^ti paññāya jīvanasīloti paññājīvī, paññāpubbaṅgamacariyoti attho. ^b^Paññājīvī^eb^ti ca paññāvasena iriyati vattati jīvitaṃ pavattetīti atthoti dassento ^b^‘‘yo paññājīvī’’^eb^tiādimāha. ‘‘Jīvata’’nti keci paṭhanti, jīvantānaṃ paññājīviṃ seṭṭhamāhūti attho.
[06]Vittasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^74^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Uppatantāna^eb^nti pathaviṃ bhinditvā uṭṭhahantānaṃ. ‘‘Seṭṭha’’nti vuccamānattā ^b^‘‘sattavidha’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ, itaresaṃ vā tadanulomato. ^b^Khemo hoti^eb^ dubbhikkhupaddavābhāvato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘subhikkho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Nipatantāna^eb^nti adhomukhaṃ pavattantānaṃ. ^b^Pavajamānāna^eb^nti vajanasīlānaṃ. Te pana yasmā jaṅgamā nāma honti, na rukkhādayo viya thāvarā, tasmā āha ^b^‘‘jaṅgamāna’’^eb^nti. ^b^Gāvo^eb^ti dhenuyo. Tena mahiṃsādikānampi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Vadantāna^eb^nti uppannaṃ atthaṃ vadantānaṃ.

[03]^b^Attano^eb^^a^M1.0137^ea^^b^khantiyā^eb^ti attano khantiyā ruciyā gahitabhāvena. ^b^Itarā devatā^eb^ tassā vissajjane aparitussamānā ^b^āha. Yāva padhaṃsī^eb^ti guṇadhaṃsī satthudesanāya laddhabbaguṇanāsanato. ^b^Pagabbā^eb^ti pāgabbiyena samannāgatā, yathā vacīpāgabbiyena akharā, tathā vācāya bhavitabbaṃ. ^b^Mukharā^eb^ti mukhakharā. ^b^Dasabalaṃ pucchi^eb^ saṇhaṃ sukhumaṃ ratanattayasaṃhitaṃ atthaṃ sotukāmā. ^b^Assā^eb^ devatāya ^b^vissajjento^eb^ ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ. ^b^Uppatamānā^eb^ti uppatantī ^b^samugghāṭeti^eb^ odhiso. ^b^Vaṭṭamūlakamahāavijjā^eb^ti tassā ādīnavadassanatthaṃ bhūtakathanavisesanaṃ. ^b^Osīdantāna^eb^nti paṭipakkhavasena adho sīdantānaṃ, ussādayamānānanti attho. ^b^Puññakkhettabhūto^eb^ti idaṃ ‘‘padasā caramānāna’’nti ^a^V1.0121^ea^ padassa atthavivaraṇavasena bhūtakathanavisesanaṃ. ^b^Yādiso putto vā hotū^eb^ti idaṃ purimapade devatāya puttagahaṇassa katattā vuttaṃ.
[06]Vuṭṭhisuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^75^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kiṃ sūdha bhītā^eb^ti ettha ^b^su-idhā^eb^ti nipātamattanti āha ^b^‘‘kiṃ bhītā’’^eb^ti? ^b^Maggo ca nekāyatanappavutto^eb^ti anekakāraṇaṃ nānāvidhādhigamokāsaṃ katvā pavutto kathito. Tenāha ^b^‘‘aṭṭhatiṃsārammaṇavasenā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Evaṃ sante^eb^ti evaṃ sabbasādhāraṇānekāyatanehi nibbānagāmimaggassa tumhehi paveditattā labbhamāne kheme magge kiṃ bhītāyaṃ janatā uppathabhūtā viparītadiṭṭhito gaṇhīti attho? Evaṃ devatā yathicchāya purimaddhena attanā yathācintitamatthaṃ satthu paveditā, pacchimaddhena attano saṃsayaṃ pucchati. ^b^Bahupaññā^eb^ti puthupañña. ^b^Ussannapaññā^eb^ti adhikapaññā. ^b^Ṭhapetvā^eb^ti saṃyametvā. ^b^Saṃvibhāgī^eb^ti āhāraparibhoge sammadeva vibhajanasīlo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘accharāyā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Vuttatthameva^eb^ heṭṭhā.

[03]^b^Manenā^eb^ti manogahaṇena. ^b^Pubbasuddhiaṅga^eb^nti pubbabhāgasuddhibhūtaṃ aṅgaṃ. ^b^Catūsū^eb^ti vuttāṅgapariyāpannaṃ. ^b^Yaññaupakkharo^eb^ti dānassa sādhanaṃ. ^b^Etesu dhammesū^eb^ti ^a^M1.0138^ea^ etesu saddhādiguṇesu. Yathā hi saddho paccayaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā vatthupariccāgassa visesapaccayo kammaphalassa paralokassa ca paccakkhato viya pattiyāyanato, evaṃ muduhadayo. Muduhadayo hi anudayaṃ patvā yaṃ kiñci attano santakaṃ paresaṃ deti. Yo ca saṃvibhāgasīlo, so appakasmimpi attano santake parehi sādhāraṇabhogī hoti. Vadaññū vadāniyatāya yāginova yuttaṃ yuttakālaṃ ñatvā atthikānaṃ manorathaṃ pūretīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘iti…pe… catūsūti āhā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Vācantiādīni tīṇi aṅgāni^eb^ tividhasīlasampattidīpanato. Sampannasīlo hi paralokaṃ na bhāseyya. ^b^Saddho ekaṃ aṅgaṃ^eb^ payogāsayasuddhidīpanato. Suddhāsayassa sammāpayoge ṭhitassa kathaṃ paralokato bhayanti. Dukavasena caturaṅgayojanā ^b^dukanayo. Etesu catūsu dhammesu ṭhito^eb^ti etesu yathāvuttadukasaṅgahesu catūsu guṇesu patiṭṭhito.
[06]Bhītāsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^76^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Nāmagotta^eb^nti ^a^V1.0122^ea^ tisso kassapo gotamoti evarūpaṃ nāmañca gottañca. Nidassanamattametaṃ, tasmā sabbassa paññattiyā lakkhaṇavacananti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Na jīratī^eb^ti asabhāvadhammattā uppādavayābhāvato jaraṃ na pāpuṇāti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘jīraṇasabhāvo na hotī’’^eb^ti. Yasmā samaññābhāvato kālantarepi taṃ samaññāyateva, tasmā ^b^‘‘atītabuddhānaṃ…pe… na jīratīti vuccatī’’^eb^ti āha.

[03]^b^Ālasiya^eb^nti alasabhāvo daḷhakosajjaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yenā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Ṭhiti^eb^nti byāpāraṃ. ^b^Niddāvasena pamajjanaṃ^eb^ kattabbassa akaraṇaṃ. ^b^Kilesavasena pamajjanaṃ^eb^ akattabbassa karaṇampi. ^b^Kammasamaye^eb^ti kammaṃ kātuṃ yuttakāle. ^b^Kammakaraṇavīriyābhāvo^eb^ti taṃkammakiriyasamuṭṭhāpakavīriyābhāvo. So pana atthato vīriyapaṭipakkho akusalacittuppādo, na vīriyassa abhāvamattaṃ. ^b^Sīlasaññamābhāvo^eb^ dussīlyaṃ. ^b^Vissaṭṭhācāratā^eb^ nāma anācāro. ^b^Soppabahulatā^eb^ti niddālutā ^a^M1.0139^ea^. Yato gahaṇahatthopi na kilāsupi puriso niddāya abhibhuyyati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tāyā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Aticchātādīnī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena abhibhuyyatādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Āgantukālasiyaṃ^eb^ na pubbe vuttāalasyaṃ viya pakatisiddhaṃ. ‘‘Te chidde’’ti pāḷiyaṃ liṅgavipallāsena vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘tāni cha chiddānī’’^eb^ti. Kusalacittappavattiyā anokāsabhāvato ^b^chiddāni^eb^. Tenāha bhagavā – ^b^‘‘yattha vittaṃ na tiṭṭhatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sabbākārena^eb^ lesamattaṃ asesetvāti adhippāyo.
[06]Najīratisuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^77^eb^^b^.^eb^ Satthassa malanti ^b^satthamalaṃ,^eb^ yena satthaṃ malīnaṃ hoti, satthamalaggahaṇena cettha malīnaṃ satthameva gahitanti āha ^b^‘‘malaggahitasattha’’^eb^nti. ^b^Āṇāpavattana^eb^nti appake vā mahante vā yattha katthaci attano āṇāya pavattanavasena vasanaṃ issariyattamicchanti. Maṇiratanampi vissajjanīyapakkhikattā uttamaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ nāma na hoti, itthī pana pariccattakulācāritthikāyapi anissajjanīyatāya uttamabhaṇḍaṃ nāma. Tenāha ^b^‘‘itthī bhaṇḍānamuttama’’^eb^nti. Tesaṃ tesañhi purisājānīyānaṃ uppattiṭṭhānatāya uttamaratanākarattā itthī bhaṇḍānamuttamaṃ. ^b^Malaggahitasatthasadiso^eb^ avabodhakiccavibandhanato. Satthamalaṃ viya satthassa paññāsatthassa guṇābhāvakaraṇato ^b^paññāsatthamalaṃ^eb^^a^V1.0123^ea^. Abbu vuccati upaddavaṃ, taṃ detīti ^b^abbudaṃ,^eb^ vināsakāraṇaṃ. Nanu haraṇaṃ samaṇassa ayuttanti? Yuttaṃ. Tassa anvayato byatirekato ca yuttataṃ dassento ^b^‘‘salākabhattādīnī’’^eb^tiādimāha.
[06]Issariyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^78^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Attakāmo’’ti ^a^M1.0140^ea^ pāḷiyaṃ vuttattā āha ^b^‘‘ṭhapetvā sabbabodhisatte’’^eb^ti. Te hi sabbaso paratthāya eva paṭipajjamānā mahākāruṇikā paratthakāmā, atthakāmā nāma na honti, yā ca tesaṃ attatthāvahā paṭipatti, sāpi yāvadeva paratthā evāti. ^b^Vuttaṃ^eb^ porāṇaṭṭhakathāyaṃ. Yasmā bodhisattā parahitapaṭipattiyā pāramiyo pūrentā tathārūpaṃ kāraṇaṃ patvā attānaṃ paresaṃ pariccajanti paññāpāramiyā paripūraṇato, tasmā idhāpi ^b^‘‘sabbabodhisatte ṭhapetvāyevāti vutta’’^eb^nti āha. ^b^Kalyāṇa^eb^nti bhaddakaṃ. Vācāya adhippetattā āha ^b^‘‘saṇhaṃ muduka’’^eb^nti. ^b^Pāpika^eb^nti lāmakaṃ nihīnaṃ. Taṃ pana ^b^pharusaṃ vāca^eb^nti sarūpato dasseti.
[06]Kāmasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^79^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Saddhā bandhati pātheyya^eb^nti saddhā nāma sattassa maraṇavasena mahāpathaṃ saṃvajato mahākantāraṃ paṭipajjato mahāviduggaṃ pakkhandato pātheyyapuṭaṃ bandhati sambalaṃ sajjeti. Kathanti āha ^b^‘‘saddhaṃ uppādetvā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Etaṃ vutta^eb^nti ‘‘saddhā bandhati pātheyya’’nti etaṃ gāthāpadaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā. ^b^Sirī^eb^ti katapuññehi sevīyati tehi paṭilabhīyatīti sirī. ^b^Issariyaṃ^eb^ vibhavo. Āsayitabbato ^b^āsayo, vasanaṭṭhānaṃ^eb^ niketanti attho. ^b^Parikaḍḍhatī^eb^ti icchāvasikaṃ puggalaṃ tattha tattha upakaḍḍhati.
[06]Pātheyyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^80^eb^^b^.^eb^ Taṃ taṃ samavisamaṃ pajjotatīti ^b^pajjoto^eb^. Padīpo andhakāraṃ vidhamitvā paccakkhato rūpagataṃ dasseti, evaṃ paññāpajjoto avijjandhakāraṃ vidhamitvā dhammānaṃ paramatthabhūtaṃ ^a^V1.0124^ea^ rūpaṃ dasseti. ^b^Jāgarabrāhmaṇo viyā^eb^ti jāgarakhīṇāsavabrāhmaṇo viya. So hi satipaññāvepullappattiyā sabbadāpi jāgaro hoti. ^b^Gāvo^eb^ti gojātiyo. Idaṃ ^a^M1.0141^ea^ gunnaṃ goṇānañca sāmaññato gahaṇaṃ. ^b^Kamme^eb^ti karaṇatthe bhummavacanaṃ. Jīvanaṃ jīvo, saha jīvenāti ^b^sajīvino^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kammena saha jīvantāna’’^eb^nti, kasivāṇijjādikammaṃ katvā jīvantānanti attho. ^b^Gomaṇḍalehi saddhi^eb^nti gogaṇena saha. Na tena vinā kasikammādīni uppajjanti, gorasasiddhiyā ceva kasanabhāravahanasiddhiyā ca kasikammaekaccavāṇijjakammādīni ijjhanti. ^b^Sattakāyassā^eb^ti āhārupajīvino sattakāyassa kasito aññathā jīvikaṃ kappentassapi kasijīvitavuttiyā mūlakāraṇaṃ phalanipphattinimittattā tassa. ^b^Iriyāpatho^eb^ ca iriyanakiriyānaṃ pavattanupāyo. ^b^‘‘Sīta^eb^nti naṅgalasītakamma’’nti vadanti.
[06]Pajjotasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^81^eb^^b^.^eb^ Raṇanti kandanti etehīti raṇā, rāgādayo. Tehi abhibhūtatāya hi sattā nānappakāraṃ kandanti paridevanti. Te pana sabbaso natthi etesaṃ raṇāti ^b^araṇā. Nikkilesā^eb^ khīṇāsavā. ^b^Vusitavāso^eb^ti vusitabrahmacariyavāso. ^b^Bhojissiya^eb^nti bhujissabhāvo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘adāsabhāvo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Samaṇā^eb^ti samitapāpasamaṇāti āha ^b^‘‘khīṇāsavasamaṇā’’^eb^ti. Puthujjanakalyāṇakāle lokiyapariññāya, ^b^sekkhā^eb^ pubbabhāge lokiyapariññāya, paccavekkhaṇe ^b^lokiyalokuttarāya pariññāya^eb^ pariññeyyaṃ tebhūmakaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ ^b^parijānanti^eb^ paricchijjanti. Khīṇāsavā pana pariññātapariññeyyā honti. Tathā hi te sāmī hutvā paribhuñjanti. ^b^Vandanti naṃ patiṭṭhita^eb^nti vuttaṃ, vandanīyabhāvo ca sīlasampannatāyāti āha ^b^‘‘patiṭṭhitanti sīle patiṭṭhita’’^eb^nti. ^b^Idhā^eb^ti imasmiṃ loke. ^b^Khattiyā^eb^ti lakkhaṇavacananti āha ^b^‘‘na kevalaṃ khattiyāvā’’^eb^tiādi.
[06]Araṇasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Chetvāvaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Sāratthappakāsiniyā saṃyuttanikāya-aṭṭhakathāya
[06]Devatāsaṃyuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^82^eb^^b^.^eb^ Devassa ^a^V1.0125^ea^^a^M1.0142^ea^ putto ^b^devaputto^eb^. Devānaṃ janakajanetabbasambandhābhāvato kathamayaṃ devaputtoti vuccatīti āha ^b^‘‘devānaṃ hī’’^eb^tiādi. ‘‘Apākaṭo aññataroti vuccatī’’ti idaṃ yebhuyyavasena vuttaṃ. Pākaṭopi hi katthaci ‘‘aññataro’’ti vuccati. Heṭṭhā devatāsaṃyutte ‘‘apākaṭā aññatarā devatā’’ti vatvā idha ‘‘pākaṭo devaputto’’ti vuttaṃ. Tathā hissa ^b^kassapo^eb^ti gottanāmaṃ gahitaṃ, tañca kho purimajātisiddhasamaññāvasena. Anusāsanaṃ anusāso, taṃ ^b^anusāsaṃ. Bhikkhuniddesa^eb^nti bhikkhusaddassa niddesaṃ. ^b^Bhikkhuovāda^eb^nti bhikkhubhāvāvahaṃ ovādaṃ. Yadi pana na assosi, kathamayaṃ pañhaṃ kathesīti? Aññato sutaṃ nissāya pañhaṃ kathesi, na pana bhagavato sammukhā sutabhāvena.

[03]^b^Tesa^eb^nti yathāvuttānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ. ^b^‘‘Kathetukāmo cevā’’^eb^tiādinā hi catutthaṃ idha uddhaṭaṃ. Tattha ādito tiṇṇaṃ bhagavā pañhaṃ bhāraṃ na karoti ekekaṅgavekallato ceva aṅgadvayavekallato ca, catutthassa pana ubhayaṅgapāripūrattā bhāraṃ karotīti āha ^b^‘‘ayaṃ panā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]Gāthāyaṃ ^b^‘‘subhāsitassā’’^eb^ti upayogatthe sāmivacananti āha ^b^‘‘subhāsitaṃ sikkheyyā’’^eb^ti. Catusaccādinissitaṃ buddhavacanaṃ sikkhanto catubbidhaṃ vacīsucaritaṃ sikkhati nāmāti āha ^b^‘‘catusaccanissitaṃ…pe… sikkheyyā’’^eb^ti. Avadhāraṇena tappaṭipakkhaṃ paṭinivatteti. ^b^Upāsitabba^eb^nti āsevitabbaṃ bhāvetabbaṃ bahulīkātabbaṃ. ^b^Aṭṭhatiṃsabhedaṃ kammaṭṭhāna^eb^nti idaṃ tassa vipassanāpadaṭṭhānataṃ hadaye ṭhapetvā vuttaṃ. Tathā hi vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘dutiyapadena adhipaññāsikkhā kathitā’’^eb^ti. Ye pana ‘‘dutiyapadena adhicittasikkhā cittavūpasamena adhipaññāsikkhā’’ti ^a^V1.0126^ea^ paṭhanti, tesaṃ padena aṭṭhatiṃsappabhedakammaṭṭhānaṃ suddhasamathakammaṭṭhānasseva gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yadi evaṃ ‘‘aṭṭhasamāpattivasenā’’ti idaṃ kathanti? ‘‘Taṃ vipassanādhiṭṭhānānaṃ samāpattīnaṃ vasena ^a^M1.0143^ea^ kathita’’nti vadanti. Evañca katvā ‘‘dutiyapadena adhipaññāsikkhā’’ti idaṃ vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti. Sikkhanaṃ nāma āsevananti āha ^b^‘‘bhāveyyāti attho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Upāsana^eb^nti payirupāsanaṃ. Tañca kho assutapariyāpuṇanakammaṭṭhānuggahādivasena dassento ^b^‘‘tampī’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Adhisīlasikkhā kathitā^eb^ lakkhaṇahāranayena. Vacīsucaritassa hi sīlasabhāvattā taggahaṇeneva tadekalakkhaṇaṃ kāyasucaritampi itarampi gahitamevāti. Ettha ca adhisīlasikkhāya cittaviveko, adhipaññāsikkhāya upadhiviveko, adhicittasikkhāya kāyaviveko kathito, kāyaviveko pana sarūpeneva pāḷiyaṃ gahitoti tividhassapi vivekassa pakāsitattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Paṭhamakassapasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^83^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dvīhi jhānehī^eb^ti ārammaṇalakkhaṇūpanijjhānalakkhaṇehi dvīhi jhānehi. ^b^Kammaṭṭhānavimuttiyā^eb^ti kammaṭṭhānānuyogaladdhāya vimuttiyā. Tena tadaṅgavikkhambhanavimuttiyo vadati. Satthusāsanassa hadayattā abbhantarattā ^b^hadayassa^eb^ mānasassa, ^b^anupattiṃ^eb^ paṭilābhamānasaṃ. Taṃ pana atthato aññā evāti āha ^b^‘‘arahatta’’^eb^nti. Taṃ pattukāmena ekantato vajjetabbataṇhādiṭṭhīnaṃ bhāve tassa anijjhanato, tadabhāve ijjhanato ca te uppādanavasena yadaggena nissito, tadaggena panāyampi tehi nissito nāma hotīti āha ^b^‘‘anissito’’^eb^tiādi. Arahattaṃ ānisaṃsitabbaṭṭhena ānisaṃsaṃ etassāti ^b^arahattānisaṃso^eb^. Arahattaṃ pattukāmassa pubbabhāgapaṭipadā icchitabbā. Tattha ca sabbapaṭhamo kammaṭṭhānāttānuyogo, so idha na gahitoti āha ^b^‘‘tantidhammo pubbabhāgo’’^eb^ti. Tattha ^b^tantidhammo^eb^ti pariyattidhammo.
[06]Dutiyakassapasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^84^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Magho^eb^ti ^a^M1.0144^ea^ sakkassetaṃ nāmaṃ purimajātianugataṃ. ^b^Svevā^eb^ti sakko eva. ^b^Vatenā^eb^ti mātāpitūpaṭṭhānādicārittadhammena ^a^V1.0127^ea^. ^b^Aññe^eb^ti upadhivepakkapāpadhamme abhibhavitvā. ^b^Asura^eb^nti indasattubhūtaṃ asuraṃ.
[06]Maghasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^85^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Catutthasuttaṃ vuttatthamevā^eb^ti devatāsaṃyutte saṃvaṇṇitatthameva, tasmā idha na vattabbo atthoti adhippāyo.
[06]Māgadhasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

[03]^b^86^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tena kāraṇenā^eb^ti tena padhānena kāraṇabhūtena, padhānakaraṇanimittanti attho. ^b^Yaṃ kiñci^eb^ khuddakampi mahantampi hīnampi paṇītampi ^b^bhavaṃ. Āyatapaggaho^eb^ti dīgharattassa vīriyārambho. ^b^Kiccavosāna^eb^nti kiccaniṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^Tathevā^eb^ti yathā arahattuppattito pubbe, tato pacchāpi tatheva ‘‘buddhipaggaho’’ti vīriyaṃ daḷhaṃ karotūti kuppadhammaṃ viya maññamāno vadati. Diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārādiatthaṃ pana vīriyakaraṇaṃ icchitabbameva.

[03]^b^Asaṃkiṇṇā^eb^ti avomissā evaṃ aññattha anāgatattā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘bhagavatā hī’’^eb^tiādi. Yadi evaṃ idheva kasmā etaṃ vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘idha panā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Patiṭṭha^eb^nti nadī nāma anavaṭṭhitatīrā, tattha patiṭṭhātabbaṭṭhānaṃ.
[06]Dāmalisuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^87^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pubbayogāvacaro^eb^ti ^a^M1.0145^ea^ pubbe yogāvacaro purimattabhāve bhāvanamanuyutto. Ayaṃ kira kassapassa bhagavato sāsane pabbajitvāva bahūni vassasahassāni samaṇadhammaṃ akāsi, na pana visesaṃ nibbattesi. Tamatthaṃ kāraṇena saddhiṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘bahalakilesatāyā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Ekantaparisuddhassā^eb^ti yathā visesāvaho hoti ^a^V1.0128^ea^, evaṃ ekantena parisuddhassa sabbaso anupakkiliṭṭhassa. ^b^Sīlena samāhitā^eb^ti yathā sīlaṃ uparūpari visesāvahaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyañca hoti, evaṃ sammadeva āhitacittā suṭṭhu sampannacittā. Tathābhūtā tena samannāgatā hontīti āha ^b^‘‘samupetā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Patiṭṭhitasabhāvā^eb^ti sekkhattā eva yathādhigatadhammena niccalabhāvena adhiṭṭhitasabhāvā. Mayā tuṭṭhiyā gahitāya devaputto ‘‘dullabhā tuṭṭhī’’ti vakkhatīti bhagavā ‘‘tuṭṭhi hoti sukhāvahā’’ti avocāti āha ^b^‘‘upari pañhasamuṭṭhāpanattha’’^eb^nti. Pabbajito rukkhamūliko abbhokāsiko vā anagāriyupeto nāma hoti, senāsane pana vasanto kathanti āha ^b^‘‘sattabhūmike’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Catupaccayasantoso^eb^ti bhāvanābhiyogasiddho catūsu paccayesu santoso. Tena cittavūpasamena tuṭṭhi laddhāti dasseti. ^b^Cittavūpasamabhāvanāyā^eb^ti cittakilesānaṃ vūpasamakarabhāvanāya, manacchaṭṭhānaṃ indriyānaṃ nibbisevanabhāvakaraṇena savisesaṃ cittassa vūpasamakarabhāvanāya rato manoti yojanā.

[03]Ettha ca indriyūpasamena cittasamādhānaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ hoti indriyabhāvanāya cittasamādhānassa akārakānaṃ dūrīkaraṇato. Adhicittasamādhānena catupaccayasantoso savisesaṃ parisuddho paripuṇṇo ca hoti paccayānaṃ alābhalābhesu pariccāgasabhāvato. Vuttanayena pana santuṭṭhassa yathāsamādinnaṃ sīlaṃ visujjhati pāripūriñca upagacchati, tathābhūto catusaccakammaṭṭhāne yutto maggapaṭipāṭiyā sabbaso kilese samucchindanto nibbānadiṭṭho hotīti imamatthaṃ dasseti ^b^‘‘ye rattindiva’’^eb^ntiādinā. ^b^Kiṃ na gacchissanti^eb^? Gamissantevāti ariyamaggabhāvanaṃ pahāya sammāpaṭipattiyā dukkarabhāvaṃ sandhāya sāsaṅkaṃ vadati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ayaṃ pana duggamo bhagavā visamo maggo’’^eb^ti.

[03]Tattha ^a^M1.0146^ea^ keci ‘‘ayaṃ panāti devaputto. So hi bhagavato ‘ariyā gacchantī’ti vacanaṃ sutvā ‘duggamo bhagavā’tiādimāhā’’ti vadanti, taṃ na yujjati. Yasmā ‘‘saccameta’’nti evamādipi tasseva vevacanaṃ katvā dassitaṃ, tasmā ‘‘yena maggena ariyā gacchantī’’ti tumhehi vuttaṃ, ayaṃ pana ‘‘duggamo bhagavā visamo maggo’’ti āha devaputto. Ariyamaggo kāmaṃ kadāci atidukkhā paṭipadātipi vuccati, tañca kho pubbabhāgapaṭipadāvasena, ayaṃ pana atīva sugamo sabbakilesaduggavivajjanato kāyaduccaritādivisamassa rāgādivisamassa ca dūrīkaraṇato na visamo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘pubbabhāgapaṭipadāyā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Assā^eb^ti ariyamaggassa. Ariyamaggassa hi adhisīlasikkhādīnaṃ paribundhitabbabhāgena bahū parissayā hontīti. ^b^Evaṃ vutto^eb^ti ‘‘duggamo visamo’’ti ca evaṃ vutto.

[03]^b^Avaṃsirā^eb^ti anuṭṭhahanena adhobhūtauttamaṅgā. Kusalaṅgesu hi sammādiṭṭhi uttamaṅgā sabbaseṭṭhattā ^a^V1.0129^ea^, tañca anariyā patanti na uṭṭhahanti micchāpaṭipajjanato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ñāṇasirenā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Anariyamagge^eb^ti micchāmagge. Tenāha ^b^‘‘visame magge’’^eb^ti. Taṃ magganato anariyā ariyānaṃ maggato apāpuṇanena pariccattā hutvā apāye sakalavaṭṭadukkhe ca patanti. ^b^Svevā^eb^ti svāyaṃ anariyehi kadācipi gantuṃ asakkuṇeyyo maggo ariyānaṃ visuddhasattānaṃ sabbaso samadhigamena ^b^samo hoti^eb^. Kāyavisamādīhi samannāgatattā ^b^visame sattakāye^eb^ tesaṃ sabbasova pahānena sabbattha ^b^samāyeva^eb^.
[06]Kāmadasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^88^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sambādhe^eb^ti sampīḷitataṇhākilesādinā sauppīḷatāya paramasambādhe. Ativiya saṅkāraṭṭhānabhūto hi nīvaraṇasambādho adhippeto. So hi duggahano tasmiṃ asati kāmaguṇasambādho anavasaro eva seyyathāpi mahākassapādīnaṃ. ^b^Okāsanti jhānassetaṃ nāmaṃ^eb^ nīvaraṇasambādhābhāvato. Asambādhabhāvena hi jhānaṃ idha ‘‘okāso’’ti vuttaṃ, tañca kho accantāsambādhaṭṭhānatāya vipassanāpādakatāya ^a^M1.0147^ea^. Tathā hi pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘avindī’’tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^avindī^eb^ti vindi paṭilabhi. ^b^Bhūrimedhaso^eb^ti mahāpañño, sapaññoti attho. ^b^Abujjhī^eb^ti bujjhi paṭivijjhi. Paṭilīno hutvā seṭṭho, paṭilīnānaṃ vā seṭṭhoti ^b^paṭilīnaseṭṭho^eb^. Mānussayavasena unnatabhāvato ^b^paṭilīno nāma pahīnamāno^eb^. ^b^Paṭilabhiṃsū^eb^ti kāmaguṇasambādhepi ‘‘ime kāmaguṇā mādisānaṃ kiṃ karissantī’’ti? Te abhibhuyya nibbānappattiyā sammāsatiṃ paṭilabhiṃsu. Tena sampayuttena lokuttarasamādhināpi suṭṭhu samāhitā.

[03]Ayaṃ kira devaputto ito purimavāre attabhāve paṭhamajjhānalābhī hutvā tato cavitvā brahmakāyikāsu nibbattitvā tattha jhānasukhaṃ anubhavitvā tato cuto idāni kāmabhave nibbatto, tasmā taṃ jhānaṃ sambhāvento ‘‘tādisassa nāma jhānasukhassa lābhī bhagavā’’ti tena guṇena bhagavantaṃ abhitthavanto ^b^‘‘sambādhe vatā’’^eb^ti gāthaṃ abhāsi. Athassa bhagavā yathā nāma aṭṭhasaṭṭhiyojanasatasahassubbedhasinerupabbatarājaṃ upādāya sāsapo na kiñci hoti, evaṃ anantāparimeyyabuddhaguṇe upādāya rūpāvacarapaṭhamajjhānaṃ na kiñci hotīti dassento ^b^‘‘ye sati’’^eb^ntiādinā anuttaraguṇādhigamaṃ pavedesi. Tattha ^b^sati^eb^nti vipassanāsatiyā saddhiṃ ariyamaggasatiṃ. ^b^Susamāhitā^eb^ti lokiyasamādhinā ceva lokuttarasamādhinā ca suṭṭhu samāhitā. Te ^a^V1.0130^ea^ hi accantaṃ susamāhitā, na jhānamattalābhino akuppadhammattā. Keci ‘‘kammante susamāhitā’’ti pāṭhaṃ vatvā ‘‘maggasamāhitā’’ti atthaṃ vadanti.
[06]Pañcālacaṇḍasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^89^eb^^b^.^eb^ Atītajātiyaṃ sayaṃkāravasena tāya diṭṭhiyā uppāditattā ^b^pubbe titthakaro^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘diṭṭhi uppādetvā’’^eb^ti. Apare āhu ‘‘ayaṃ me satthāti gahaṇavasena titthakaro assa atthīti ^b^pubbe titthakaro,^eb^ atītattabhāve titthakarasāvako’’ti. Te ^b^‘‘diṭṭhiṃ uppādetvā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0148^ea^ tassa satthuno diṭṭhiṃ ādāya gahetvāti attho’’ti vadanti. ^b^Titthaṃ nāma dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo^eb^ tabbinimuttassa micchāvādassa abhāvato. Titthe niyuttāti titthikā, te eva ^b^titthiyā^eb^ti vuttā ka-kārassa ya-kāraṃ katvā. ^b^Tassā^eb^ti yathāvuttassa kalyāṇakammassa. ^b^Nissandenā^eb^ti phalabhāvena. ^b^Vīriyappaṭisaṃyuttā^eb^ti vīriyadīpanāti attho.

[03]^b^Aniyamitāaṇattī^eb^ti aniyamavidhānaṃ aniyamavasena vidhivacanaṃ. ^b^Taṇhāsota^eb^nti taṇhāppabandhanaṃ. ^b^Nīharā^eb^ti samehi pajaha. ^b^Ekatta^eb^nti ekaggaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘jhāna’’^eb^nti. ^b^Upapajjatī^eb^ti na uppajjati na pāpuṇātīti āha ^b^‘‘na paṭilabhatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Na osakkeyyā^eb^ti na saṅkocaṃ āpajjeyya. Gharāvāsato paribbajanaṃ parito apagamoti ^b^paribbajo^eb^. Pabbajitavatasamādānassa adaḷhatāya ca tattha ca asakkaccakiriyāya ^b^sithilagahitā. Atireka^eb^nti pabbajjāya purimakālatopi adhikaṃ. ^b^Uparī^eb^ti uparūpari. ^b^Dukkaṭaṃ akatameva seyyo^eb^ti duccaritaṃ nāma sabbena sabbaṃ akatameva hitāvahaṃ.

[03]^b^Yaṃ kiñcī^eb^ti yaṃ kiñci kammaṃ. ^b^Sithilaṃ kata^eb^nti asakkaccakāritāya sithilaṃ katvā pavattitaṃ. ^b^Evarūpamevā^eb^ti evarūpaṃ parāmaṭṭhasāmaññasadisameva pacchānutāpacariyādipaṭibhāgato. ^b^Saṃkiliṭṭhameva^eb^ taṇhāsaṃkilesaupakkiliṭṭhattā. ^b^Āsaṅkitaparisaṅkita^eb^ntiādito samantatopi parehi saṅkitaṃ. Brahmacariyassa ādi ādibrahmacariyaṃ, tattha niyuttāti ^b^ādibrahmacariyikā,^eb^ maggabrahmacariyassa pubbabhāgapaṭipadāti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘maggabrahmacariyassa ādibhūtā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pubbapadhānabhūtā^eb^ti paṭhamārambhabhūtā.
[06]Tāyanasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^90^eb^^b^.^eb^ Vimāne ^a^V1.0131^ea^ gahite taṃnivāsīpi gahito hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘candavimānavāsī devaputto’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sabbadhī^eb^ti sabbasmā duggaṭṭhānā ^b^vippamuttosi^eb^ bhagavā tvaṃ, tasmā mayhampi ito sambādhaṭṭhānato vippamokkhaṃ karohīti adhippāyo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tassa me saraṇaṃ bhavā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Lokānukampakā^eb^ti sabbassa ^a^M1.0149^ea^ lokassa anuggahā, tasmā tuyhampi etassapi candassa. ^b^Tādisā evā^eb^ti samānā eva. Pamuñcasīti pamuñcittha. Tenāha ^b^‘‘atītatthe vattamānavacana’’^eb^nti.
[06]Candimasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^91^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Andhabhāvakaraṇe^eb^ti lokassa andhakaraṇetipi apare. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tamasī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Virocatī^eb^ti vijjotati. Kāmaṃ devaputtavasena paṭhamaṃ devatā uddhaṭā, rāhuno pana payogo tassa vimāneti āha ^b^‘‘maṇḍalīti maṇḍalasaṇṭhāno’’^eb^ti. ^b^Vadati^eb^ tadā mukhena gahitattā. Mukhena gahaṇañcettha ‘‘gilī’’ti adhippetaṃ, na ca ajjhoharaṇanti āha ^b^‘‘gilīti vadatī’’^eb^ti. Idāni tassa mukhena gahaṇasamatthataṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘rāhussa hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^So^eb^tiādi tassa candimasūriyānaṃ gahaṇakāraṇadassanaṃ. ^b^Adhivatthā devatā^eb^ti candimasūriyānaṃ paricārakadevatā. ^b^Vega^eb^nti javaṃ. So hi kenaci abhimukhaṃ atidunnivāro kammaniyāmasiddho. ^b^Matthaka^eb^nti kaṇṭhassa uparimadesaṃ. Keci ‘‘sīsamatthakamevā’’ti vadanti. ^b^Nikkhameyya^eb^ vegassa tikkhasīghathāmabhāvato. ^b^Ākaḍḍhitvā^eb^ti attano gamanadisābhimukhaṃ ākaḍḍhitvā. ^b^Na^eb^nti rāhuṃ. Uddhaṃ ullaṅghetukāmampi ^b^onameyya^eb^. Padadvayenapi so mahāsarīro mahābalo, candimasūriyānaṃ pana gamanavego tena sabbathāpi dunnivāriyovāti dasseti. ^b^Vimānenā^eb^ti candaggahe candavimānena, sūriyaggahe sūriyavimānena ubhinnampi vimānena saheva. Amāvāsiyañhi dve vimānāni yojanamattantaritāni hutvā saheva pavattanti. Yadi dvepi devaputtā sotāpattiphalaṃ pattā, atha kasmā sūriyasutte eva ‘‘pajaṃ mama’’nti vuttaṃ, na candasutteti? ‘‘So ca kira na cirasseva tato cavitvā aññattha nibbatto, aññā eva ca devatā tattha vasi, yasmiṃ candaggahe bhagavā taṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi, na tathā sūriyo, aparabhāge pana tatthapi kālena kālaṃ rāhuggaho hotī’’ti vadanti.
[06]Sūriyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Paṭhamavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^92^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pabbatataṭā ^a^V1.0132^ea^^a^M1.0150^ea^ sandamāno tathārūpo nadīnivattanapadesopi sambādhaṭṭhānatāya kaccho viyāti āha ^b^‘‘pabbatakacchepī’’^eb^ti. Paṭipakkhadūrībhāvena seṭṭhaṭṭhena ca eko udetīti ekodi, ekaggatā. Tasmiṃ yogato ekaggacittā idha ^b^ekodī^eb^. Paṭipakkhato attānaṃ nipayanti visodhentīti ^b^nipakā,^eb^ paññavanto. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ekaggacittā cevā’’^eb^tiādi. Kāyādibhedaṃ ārammaṇaṃ sātisayāya satiyā sarantīti ^b^satā^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘satimanto’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sotthiṃ gamissantī^eb^ti yathāvuttapadese magā sotthimanupaddavena vattissanti, evaṃ jhānalābhino sotthiṃ kilesehi anupaddutā vattissanti. Ayaṃ kira devaputto brahmaloke nibbānasaññī, tasmā evamāha. Bhagavā ‘‘ayaṃ devaputto anibbānagāmī samāno nibbānagāmisaññī, handassa nibbānagāmino dassemī’’ti dutiyaṃ gāthamāha. Catunnaṃ oghānaṃ, saṃsāramahoghasseva vā paratīrabhāvato paratīranti ^b^nibbānaṃ^eb^. Ambuni jāto ^b^ambujo,^eb^ maccho. Suttajālaṃ chinditvā macchā viya kilesajālaṃ bhinditvā gamissantīti.
[06]Candimasasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^93^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Payirupāsiyā^eb^ti payirupāsahetu. ^b^Sikkhantī^eb^ti tissopi sikkhā sikkhanti. ^b^Siṭṭhipade^eb^ti kilesānaṃ sāsanato vaṭṭadukkhaparittāsanato ca siṭṭhisaññite yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjitabbato pade, saddhammeti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘anusiṭṭhipade’’^eb^ti. Tattha ^b^anusiṭṭhī^eb^ti saddhammo. ^b^Kāle^eb^ti yuttapattakāle. ^b^Appamādo^eb^nāma samathavipassanābhāvanā.
[06]Veṇḍusuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^94^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tatheva^eb^^a^M1.0151^ea^^b^paññāyī^eb^ti dīghalaṭṭhitveva paññāyi, tathāsamaññā eva ahosi.
[06]Dīghalaṭṭhisuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^95^eb^^b^.^eb^ Natthi ^a^V1.0133^ea^ etassa āvaṭṭaṃ āvaraṇanti ^b^anāvaṭaṃ^eb^. ^b^Rukkho vā pabbato vā^eb^ti sattānaṃ pakaticakkhussa āvaraṇabhūto rukkho viya pabbato viya ca abhibhavituṃ samattho ñeyyāvaraṇo natthi. ^b^Kathaṃvidha^eb^nti kathaṃsaṇṭhitaṃ, kathaṃpakāraṃ vā. ^b^Dukkha^eb^nti vaṭṭadukkhaṃ.
[06]Nandanasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^96^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Heṭṭhā^eb^ti kāmabhave. Tattha hi paribbhamantassa patiṭṭhā dullabhā yebhuyyena tattha sattā nimuggā eva honti, tasmā heṭṭhā appatiṭṭho saṃsāro. ^b^Uparī^eb^ti mahaggatabhave. Tattha hi nibbattassa nibbānaṃ āruhituṃ ālambanā dullabhā, jhānābhiratiyā tattheva nikanti tesaṃ balavatī hoti, tasmā upari anālambano saṃsāro. ^b^Pesitatto^eb^ti nibbānaṃ pati pesitacitto. ^b^Tayo kammābhisaṅkhārā^eb^ti puññābhisaṅkhārādayo tayo abhisaṅkhārā. Tena ‘‘nandīpubbako kammabhavo’’ti vatvā ‘‘nandiṃ janetvā’’ti vutto. Kāmasaññāsīsena kāmacchandassa gahaṇaṃ, kāmacchandapamukhāni ca orambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni gahitānīti āha ^b^‘‘kāmasaññāgahaṇena pañcorambhāgiyasaṃyojanānī’’^eb^ti. Rūpabhavo rūpaṃ bhavapadalopena. Rūpabhavaggahaṇena cettha sesabhavassapi gahaṇaṃ. Tassa saṃyojanaggahaṇena pañca uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni gahitāni. ^b^Mahoghe^eb^ti ^a^M1.0152^ea^ saṃsāramahoghe. ^b^Tesa^eb^nti kāmabhavādīnaṃ ^b^gahaṇena^eb^ bhavabhāvena tadekalakkhaṇatāya. ^b^Arūpabhavo gahito^eb^ lakkhaṇahāranayena. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Candanasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^97^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Chaṭṭhaṃ^eb^ heṭṭhā devatāsaṃyuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ ^b^vuttatthameva^eb^.
[06]Vāsudattasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^98^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Subrahmā^eb^ti tassa devaputtassa nāmaṃ. Tassa satthu santikūpasaṅkamanassa kāraṇaṃ dassento ^a^V1.0134^ea^^b^‘‘so kirā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tadeva sokaṃ tassa devaputtassa aṭṭhuppatti. ^b^Accharāsaṅghaparivuto^eb^ti sahassamattena accharāsaṅghena parivuto. ^b^Nandanakīḷika^eb^nti nandanavanakīḷikaṃ. ^b^Hatthaṃ āgacchatī^eb^ti hatthagayhupago hoti. ^b^Ganthentī^eb^ti ettha mālāveṭhanampi khiḍḍāpasutatāyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Aññathā pupphāniyeva tāya tāya cittassa vasena mālābhāvena hatthaṃ upagacchantīti. ^b^Upacchedakakammavasenā^eb^ti tasmiṃ devaloke āyusese sati eva tassa pana upaghātakassa laddhokāsassa pāpakammassa vasena. ‘‘Pahāro’’ti divasassa tatiyo bhāgo vuccati, tasmā ^b^ekappahārenevā^eb^ti ekavelāyamevāti attho.

[03]^b^Piyavatthukasokenā^eb^ti piyavatthunimittakena sokena. ^b^Ruppamāno^eb^ti pīḷiyamāno. ^b^Sattame divase^eb^ti manussagaṇanāya sattame divase. ^b^Tatthevā^eb^ti tasmiṃyeva niraye ^b^nibbattitabbaṃ^eb^ iminā tāhi ca saheva pubbe tassa pāpakammassa katattā. ^b^Ruppī^eb^ti cittasantāsaṃ āpajji. ^b^Niddhamitu^eb^nti nīharituṃ apanetuṃ. ^b^Satthu santikaṃ gantvā^eb^ti tāhi pañcasatāhi accharāhi saddhiṃ bhagavato santikaṃ gantvā.

[03]^b^Idanti^eb^^a^M1.0153^ea^^b^attano cittaṃ dasseti^eb^ āsannapaccakkhabhāvato. ^b^Nicca^eb^nti sadā. Svāyaṃ niccattho adhippāyavasena gahetabboti tattha pahātabbaṃ gahetabbañca dassento ^b^‘‘devaloke’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Na gahetabbo^eb^ hetupavattito pubbe tassa utrāsassa abhāvato. ^b^Tesū^eb^ti dukkhesu. Tāni hi hetupaccayehi kattabbato gāthāyaṃ ^b^‘‘kicchesū’’^eb^ti vuttāni. ^b^Kicchesū^eb^ti vā kicchanimittaṃ. Yāsañhi payogavipattīnaṃ vasenassa tāni dukkhāni uppajjeyyuṃ, taṃnimittanti attho. Tā hi assa payogavipattiyo gativipattiyo satthu santikaṃ upagamanena hāyeyyuṃ. ^b^Nibbattānaṃ diṭṭhānī^eb^ti nibbattānaṃ vasena diṭṭhāni dukkhāni. ^b^Tesu^eb^ ca dukkhesu. Sabbattha nimittatthe bhummaṃ. ^b^Ḍayhamāno viya^eb^ cittasantāpena.

[03]Cattāripi saccāni bujjhati paṭivijjhatīti bodhi, satiādidhammasāmaggī, tasmā ^b^bojjhā^eb^ bodhito. Sā pana bodhi bhāvanākāreneva pavattati, aññatrasaddayogena ca ‘‘bojjhā’’ti nissakkavacananti tadatthaṃ dassento muñcitvāpadaṃ apekkhitvā ^b^‘‘bojjhaṅgabhāvana’’^eb^nti āha. ^b^Tapoguṇa^eb^nti dhutadhammamāha. So hi taṇhāloluppassa tapanato ^b^tapo,^eb^ sayaṃ guṇasabhāvattā guṇasannissayato ca ^b^guṇa^eb^nti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘dhutaṅgasaṅkhātaṃ tapoguṇa’’^eb^nti. Sabbe saṅkhāragatā nissajjīyanti etthāti ^b^sabbanissaggo,^eb^ asaṅkhatadhātūti āha ^b^‘‘sabbanissaggāti nibbānato’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Indriyasaṃvarova^eb^^a^V1.0135^ea^^b^paṭhamaṃ veditabbo^eb^ paṭipattikkamavasena tasseva paṭhamattā. Taṃ pana paṭipattikkamaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘indriyasaṃvare hī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Nippariyāyato maggapariyāpannā eva bojjhaṅgāti āha ^b^‘‘sahavipassanāya bojjhaṅge’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tassā^eb^ti tathābhāvena tassa yogino. Yasmā devaputtassa satthā taṃ gāthaṃ vatvā upari ca saccāni pakāsesi, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘bhagavā catusaccavasena desanaṃ vinivattesī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Devaputto sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahī^eb^ti kāmaṃ tasseva visesādhigamo idhāgato, pañcasatamattāhi pana accharāhi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahīti veditabbaṃ. Tenāha ^b^mahāsatipaṭṭhānasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ^eb^ (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 2.373; ma. ni. aṭṭha. 1.106) ‘‘so desanāpariyosāne pañcahi accharāsatehi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya taṃ sampattiṃ thāvaraṃ katvā devalokameva agamāsī’’ti.
[06]Subrahmasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^99^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Nandāmī’’ti ^a^M1.0154^ea^ vutte nandī nāma pabbajitassa malanti codetukāmo devaputto ^b^‘‘nandasī’’^eb^ti pucchi. Athassa bhagavā taṃ paṭikkhipanto ^b^‘‘kiṃ laddhā’’^eb^ti? Āha. Tena ‘‘tayā mama adhippetanandiyā idha paccayo eva natthi, kuto sā nandī’’ti dasseti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tuṭṭhi nāmā’’^eb^tiādi. Atha devaputto nandiyā asati sokena bhavitabbaṃ, soko ca pabbajitassa malanti codento āha ^b^‘‘tena hi, samaṇa, socasī’’^eb^ti. Bhagavā tampi paṭikkhipanto ^b^‘‘kiṃ jīyitthā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Kiṃ maṃ jinātīti attho?

[03]Yadi te nandisokā na santi hāsavatthuno lābhassa jāniyā ca abhāvato, ekavihārino pana aratiyā bhavitabbanti āha – ^b^‘‘kacci taṃ ekamāsīnaṃ, aratī nābhikīratī’’^eb^ti. Tasmimpi bhagavatā paṭikkhitte atha nesampi nandisokāratīnaṃ abhāve kāraṇaṃ pucchanto ^b^‘‘kathaṃ tva’’^eb^nti gāthamāha? Athassa bhagavā taṃ kāraṇaṃ pavedento ^b^‘‘aghajātassā’’^eb^ti gāthamāha. Tattha ^b^aghajātassā^eb^ti aghe jātassa. Tenāha ^b^‘‘vaṭṭadukkhe ṭhitassā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Jātataṇhassa^eb^ appahīnataṇhassa ^b^vaṭṭadukkhaṃ āgatameva^eb^ kāraṇassa appahīnattā. Tasseva hi kāraṇassa appahīnataṃ dassento ^b^‘‘dukkhī sukhaṃ patthayatīti hi vutta’’^eb^nti āha. Dukkhappavattiyā sāpi taṇhāppavatti tena dassitā. ^b^Itī^eb^tiādinā vuttamevatthaṃ nigamanavasena dasseti.
[06]Kakudhasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^100^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Navama^eb^nti ^a^V1.0136^ea^ uttarasuttaṃ heṭṭhā devatāsaṃyuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttatthameva.
[06]Uttarasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^101^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dasame ^a^M1.0155^ea^ kāmaṃ devatāsaṃyuttepi ‘‘idaṃ hi taṃ jetavana’’ntiādinā imā eva gāthā āgatā. Tattha ‘‘aññatarā devatā’’ti nidānaṃ āropitaṃ. Heṭṭhā āgatanayattā eva hi potthakesu na likhitaṃ, idha pana devaputtasaṃyutte ^b^‘‘anāthapiṇḍiko devaputto’’^eb^ti nidāne nigame ca āgataṃ, tattha devaputtena satthu vuttappakāraguṇapavedanavasena vuttaṃ. Satthā pana bhikkhūnaṃ tamatthaṃ pavedento ^b^‘‘aññataro devaputto’’^eb^ti āha. Tathā pavedane pana kāraṇaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘ānandattherassā’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Anumānabuddhiyā^eb^ti anumānañāṇassa. ^b^Ānubhāvappakāsanattha^eb^nti baladīpanatthaṃ.
[06]Anāthapiṇḍikasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Dutiyavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^102^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tatiyavaggassa paṭhama^eb^nti tatiyavagge paṭhamasuttaṃ. ^b^Vuttatthameva^eb^ heṭṭhā satullapakāyikavagge paṭhamasutte.
[06]Sivasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^103^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paṭhamaṃyevā^eb^ti jarāmaraṇādibhāvato pageva. ^b^Balavacintanaṃ cintetī^eb^ti yathā sākaṭiko ajānitvā visame magge sakaṭaṃ pājento akkhe chinne patikātuṃ avisahanto dukkhī ^a^V1.0137^ea^ dummano balavacintanaṃ cinteti, mahantaṃ cittasantāpaṃ pāpuṇāti, evaṃ adhammavādī maccumukhaṃ patto balavacittasantāpaṃ pāpuṇāti, tasmā dhammacariyāya nappamajjitabbanti.
[06]Khemasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^104^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Yaṃ^eb^^a^M1.0156^ea^^b^dānaṃ demī^eb^ti yaṃ deyyadhammaṃ parassa demi. ^b^Tassa pati hutvā^eb^ti tabbisayaṃ lobhaṃ suṭṭhu abhibhavanto tassa adhipati hutvā demi tena anākaḍḍhanīyattā. ^b^‘‘Na dāso na sahāyo’’^eb^ti vatvā tadubhayaṃ anvayato byatirekato dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yo hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Dāso hutvā deti^eb^ taṇhāya dāsabyassa upagatattā. ^b^Sahāyo hutvā deti^eb^ tassa piyabhāvāvissajjanato. ^b^Sāmī hutvā deti^eb^ taṇhādāsabyato attānaṃ mocetvā abhibhuyya pavattanato. Sāmiparibhogasadisā hetassāyaṃ pavattatīti.

[03]Atha vā yo dānasīlatāya dāyako puggalo, so dāne pavattibhedena dānadāso dānasahāyo dānapatīti tippakāro hotīti dasseti. Tadassa tippakārataṃ vibhajitvā dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yo hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Dātabbaṭṭhena ^b^dānaṃ,^eb^ annapānādi. Tattha yaṃ attanā paribhuñjati taṇhādhipannatāya, tassa vase vattanato dāso viya hoti. Yaṃ paresaṃ dīyati, tatthapi annapānasāmaññena idaṃ vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘dānasaṅkhātassa deyyadhammassa dāso hutvā detī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sahāyo hutvā deti^eb^ attanā paribhuñjitabbassa paresaṃ dātabbassa ca samasamaṭṭhapanena. ^b^Pati hutvā deti^eb^ sayaṃ deyyadhammassa vase avattitvā tassa attano vase vattāpanato.

[03]Aparo nayo – yo attanā paṇītaṃ paribhuñjitvā paresaṃ nihīnaṃ deti, so ^b^dānadāso^eb^ nāma tannimittanihīnabhāvāpattito. Yo yādisaṃ attanā paribhuñjati, tādisameva paresaṃ deti, so ^b^dānasahāyo^eb^ nāma tannimittanihīnādhikabhāvavissajjanena sadisabhāvāpattito. Yo attanā nihīnaṃ paribhuñjitvā paresaṃ paṇītaṃ deti, so ^b^dānapati^eb^ nāma tannimittaseṭṭhabhāvappattito. Kammasarikkhako hi vipāko, tasmā devaputto ^b^‘‘dānapatī’’^eb^ti vadanto ^b^‘‘ahaṃ tādiso ahosi’’^eb^nti dasseti.

[03]‘‘Catūsu dvāresu dānaṃ dīyitthā’’ti pāḷiyaṃ saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vitthāretvā dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘tassa kirā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Dāna^eb^nti yiṭṭhaṃ, tañca kho sabbasādhāraṇavasena katanti āha ^b^‘‘samaṇa^eb^^a^V1.0138^ea^^b^…pe… yācakāna’’^eb^nti. ^b^Pabbajjūpagatā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0157^ea^ yaṃ kiñci pabbajjaṃ upagatā. ^b^Bhovādino^eb^ti jātimattabrāhmaṇe vadati. ^b^Nālattha^eb^ buddhasuññattā tadā lokassa. ^b^Duggatā^eb^ti dukkhajīvikakappakā kasiravuttikā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘daliddamanussā’’^eb^ti. Kasivāṇijjādijīvikaṃ anuṭṭhātuṃ asamatthā idha ‘‘kapaṇā’’ti adhippetāti āha ^b^‘‘kāṇakuṇiādayo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pathāvino^eb^ti addhikā. ^b^Vanibbakā^eb^ti dāyakānaṃ guṇakittanakammaphalakittanavasena yācakā seyyathāpi naggādayo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘iṭṭhaṃ dinna’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Pasatamattanti^eb^ vīhitaṇḍulādivasena vuttaṃ. ^b^Sarāvamatta^eb^nti yāgubhattādivasena. Yathā gāmalābho gāme uppajjanako āyalābho, evaṃ tattha dvāralābhoti āha ^b^‘‘tattha uppajjanakasatasahasse’’^eb^ti. ^b^Mahantataraṃ dānaṃ adaṃsu^eb^ aññassapi dhanassa viniyogaṃ gatattā. ^b^Taṃ sandhāyā^eb^ti taṃ mahantataraṃ dānaṃ kataṃ sandhāya. Rañño hi tattha dānaṃ itthāgārassa dānena mahatā abhibhūtaṃ viya paṭinivattaṃ hotīti āha ^b^‘‘paṭinivattī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Kocī^eb^ti bhummatthe paccattavacanaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘katthacī’’^eb^ti. Anekavassasahassāyukakāle tassa uppannattā ^b^asītivassasahassāni^eb^ so rājā dānamadāsīti.
[06]Serīsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^105^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Catutthaṃ^eb^ heṭṭhā devatāsaṃyuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ ^b^vuttatthameva^eb^.
[06]Ghaṭīkārasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^106^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ye vinaye apakataññuno saṃkilesikesu vodāniyesu dhammesu na kusalā yaṃ kiñci na kārino vippaṭisārabahulā. Tesaṃ anuppannañca uddhaccaṃ uppajjati, uppannañca bhiyyobhāvaṃ vepullaṃ āpajjatīti āha ^b^‘‘akappiye kappiyasaññitāya…pe… uddhaccapakatikā’’^eb^ti. Sārābhāvena tucchattā ca naḷo viyāti naḷo, mānoti āha ^b^‘‘unnaḷāti uggatanaḷā’’^eb^ti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘uṭṭhitatucchamānā’’^eb^ti. Māno hi seyyassa seyyoti ^a^M1.0158^ea^ sadisoti ca pavattiyā visesato ^b^tuccho. Cāpallenā^eb^ti capalabhāvena, taṇhāloluppenāti attho. ^b^Mukhakharā^eb^ti mukhena pharusā, pharusavādinoti attho. ^b^Vikiṇṇavācā^eb^ti visaṭavacanā, samphappalāpatāya apariyantavacanā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘asaṃyatavacanā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Caṇḍasote baddhanāvāsadisā^eb^ti etena anavaṭṭhitakiriyataṃ dasseti. Yena samannāgatā sattā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhātuṃ vā nisīdituṃ vā na ^a^V1.0139^ea^ sakkonti, ito cito ca vicaranti. ^b^Anavaṭṭhitacittā^eb^ti ekasmiṃ ārammaṇe na avaṭṭhitacittā. ^b^Vivaṭaindriyā^eb^ti asaṃvutacakkhādīndriyā.

[03]Guṇakathāya saddhiṃ kathiyamāno nigguṇassa aguṇo pākaṭo hoti jātimaṇisamīpe ṭhitassa viya kācamaṇino doso. ^b^Sukhajīvino^eb^ti sukhe ṭhitā. Yathā dāyakānaṃ subharaṃ hoti, evaṃ sukhena akicchena pavattajīvikā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘pubbe bhikkhū’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]Attano rucivasena gāmakiccaṃ netīti gāmaṇi, te pana hīḷento vadati ^b^‘‘gāmaṇikā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Vissajjetvā^eb^ti sativossaggavasena vissajjetvā ^b^kilesamucchāyā^eb^ti mahicchāsaṅkhātāya taṇhāmucchāya. Sīlavantānaṃyeva hi duppaṭipattiṃ sandhāya devaputto vadati. ^b^Vattabbayuttakeyevā^eb^ti ovādena mayā anuggahetabbameva. ^b^Chaḍḍitakā^eb^ti pariccattā ācariyupajjhāyādīhi. Tato eva ^b^anāthā appatiṭṭhā. Petā^eb^ti vigatajīvitā matā. Yathā petā, ^b^tatheva honti^eb^ attahitāsamatthatāya viññūnaṃ jigucchitabbatāya ca.
[06]Jantusuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^107^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ekokāse^eb^ti cakkavāḷassa pariyantasaññite ekasmiṃ okāse. ^b^Bhumma^eb^nti ‘‘yatthā’’ti idaṃ bhummavacanaṃ, sāmaññato vuttampi ‘‘so lokassa anto’’ti vacanato visiṭṭhavisayameva hoti. ‘‘Na jāyati na mīyatī’’ti vatvā puna ‘‘na cavati na upapajjatī’’ti kasmā vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘idaṃ aparāparaṃ…pe… gahita’’^eb^nti. ^b^Padagamanenā^eb^ti padasā gamanena. ^b^Saṅkhāralokassa antaṃ sandhāya vadati^eb^ upari saccāni pakāsetukāmo. Saṅkhāralokassa hi anto nibbānaṃ.

[03]Daḷhaṃ ^a^M1.0159^ea^ thiraṃ dhanu etassāti daḷhadhanvā. So eva ^b^daḷhadhammo^eb^ti vutto. Tenāha ^b^‘‘daḷhadhanū’’^eb^ti. ^b^Uttamappamāṇenā^eb^ti sahassathāmappamāṇena. Dhanusippasikkhitatāya dhanuggaho, na dhanuggahamattenāti āha ^b^‘‘dhanuggahoti dhanuācariyo’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Dhanuggaho’’ti vatvā ‘‘sikkhito’’ti vutte dhanusikkhāya sikkhitoti viññāyati, sikkhā ca ettake kāle samatthassa ukkaṃsagato hotīti āha ^b^‘‘dasa dvādasa vassāni dhanusippaṃ sikkhito’’^eb^ti. ^b^Usabhappamāṇepī^eb^ti vīsatiyaṭṭhiyo usabhaṃ, tasmiṃ usabhappamāṇe padese. ^b^Vālagga^eb^nti vāḷakoṭiṃ. ^b^Katahattho^eb^ti ^a^V1.0140^ea^ paricitahattho. ^b^Katasarakkhepo^eb^ti vivaṭasarakkhepapadesadassanavasena sarakkhepakatāvī. Tenāha ^b^‘‘dassitasippo’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Katasippo’’ti keci. Asanti etenāti ^b^asanaṃ,^eb^ kaṇḍo. ^b^Tālacchāya^eb^nti tālacchādiṃ, sā pana ratanamattā, vidatthicaturaṅgulā vā.

[03]^b^Puratthimasamuddā^eb^ti ekasmiṃ cakkavāḷe puratthimasamuddā. Samuddasīsena puratthimacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiṃ vadati. ^b^Pacchimasamuddo^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^Nippapañcata^eb^nti adandhakāritaṃ. ^b^Sampatte^eb^ti tādisena javena gacchantena sampatte. ^b^Anotatte^eb^ti etthāpi ‘‘sampatte’’ti padaṃ ānetvā sambandho, tathā ‘‘nāgalatādantakaṭṭhaṃ khāditvā’’ti etthāpi. ^b^Tadā^eb^ti yadā so lokantagavesako ahosi, tadā. ^b^Dīghāyukakālo^eb^ti anekavassasahassāyukakālo. ^b^Cakkavāḷalokassā^eb^ti sāmaññavasena ekavacanaṃ, cakkavāḷalokanti attho. ^b^Imasmiṃyeva cakkavāḷe nibbatti^eb^ pubbaparicariyasiddhāya nikantiyā. ^b^Sasaññimhi samanake^eb^ti na rūpadhammamattake, atha kho pañcakkhandhasamudāyeti dasseti. ^b^Samitapāpo^eb^ti samucchinnasaṃkilesadhammo.
[06]Rohitassasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^108-109^eb^^b^.^eb^ Nandasuttavisālasuttāni ^b^sattamāṭṭhamāni^eb^ heṭṭhā saṃvaṇṇitarūpattā ^b^vuttatthāneva^eb^.
[06]Nandasuttanandivisālasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^110^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tuyhampi^eb^^a^M1.0160^ea^^b^no^eb^ti tuyhampi nu, nu-saddo pucchāyaṃ, tasmā vaṇṇaṃ kathetukāmo pucchatīti adhippāyo. ^b^Na vaṭṭatī^eb^ti na yujjati, ^b^kathito^eb^ti kathetuṃ āraddho, tenāha ^b^‘‘matthakaṃ na pāpuṇātī’’^eb^ti. Tameva matthakāpāpuṇanaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘so hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Satisampajaññāyogato gorūpasīlo, mūḷho khalitapañño, gorūpassa viya sīlaṃ etassāti hi ^b^gorūpasīlo. Sabhāgo^eb^ ekarūpacittatāya. Ariyānaṃ sabhāgatā nāma guṇavantavasenāti āha ^b^‘‘aññamaññassa guṇesu pasīditvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Soḷasavidhaṃ pañña^eb^nti mahāpaññādikā cha, nava anupubbavihārasamāpattipaññā, āsavakkhayapaññāti imaṃ soḷasavidhaṃ paññaṃ. Tesaṭṭhi sāvakasādhāraṇañāṇānipi ettheva saṅgahaṃ samosaraṇaṃ gacchanti.

[03]^b^Ānandā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0141^ea^ theraṃ āha. ^b^Ācāro^eb^ti cārittasīlamāha. ^b^Gocaro^eb^ti gocarasampatti. ^b^Vihāro^eb^ti samāpattivihāro. ^b^Abhikkamo^eb^tiādinā iriyāpathavihāraṃ. ^b^Tuyhampī^eb^ti ^b^pi^eb^-saddena bhagavatā attānaṃ ādiṃ katvā tadaññesaṃ viññūnaṃ sabbesaṃ therassa ruccanasabhāvo dīpitoti dassento ^b^‘‘mayhaṃ ruccatī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha satipi ānandattherassapi asītiyā mahātherānaṃ antogadhabhāve ‘‘asītiyā mahātherānaṃ ruccatī’’ti vatvā ‘‘tuyhampi ruccatī’’ti vacanaṃ tena dhammasenāpatino vaṇṇaṃ kathāpetukāmatāyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Sāṭakantare^eb^ti nivatthavatthantare. ^b^Laddhokāso^eb^ti nibbuddhaṃ karonto sāṭakantare laddhaṃ gahetuṃ laddhāvasaro. ^b^Labhissāmino^eb^ti labhissāmi vata. ^b^Dīpadhajabhūta^eb^nti satayojanavitthiṇṇaṃ jambudīpassa dhajabhūtaṃ. ^b^Puggalapalāpe^eb^ti antosārābhāvato palāpabhūte puggale haranto. ^b^Bālatāyā^eb^ti rucikhantiādiabhāvatāya. ^b^Dosatāyā^eb^ti dussakabhāvena. ^b^Mohenā^eb^ti mahāmūḷhatāya. Keci pana ^b^‘‘bālo bālatāyā^eb^ti mūḷhatāya pakatibālabhāvena na jānāti. ^b^Mūḷho mohenā^eb^ti sayaṃ abālo samānopi yadā mohena pariyuṭṭhito hoti, tadā mohena na jānāti, ayaṃ padadvayassa viseso’’ti vadanti. ^b^Vipallatthacitto^eb^ti yakkhummādena pittummādena vā viparītacitto.

[03]^b^‘‘Catūsu^eb^^a^M1.0161^ea^^b^kosallesū’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ catubbidhaṃ kosallaṃ pāḷiyā eva dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘vuttaṃ heta’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha yo aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo samudayato atthaṅgamato assādato ādīnavato nissaraṇato ca yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, ayaṃ ^b^dhātukusalo^eb^. Vuttanayena āyatanesu kusalo ^b^āyatanakusalo^eb^. Avijjādīsu dvādasapaṭiccasamuppādaṅgesu kusalo ^b^paṭiccasamuppādakusalo^eb^. ‘‘Idaṃ imassa phalassa ṭhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ, idaṃ aṭṭhānaṃ akāraṇa’’nti evaṃ ṭhānañca ṭhānato, aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṃ pajānato ^b^ṭhānāṭṭhānakusalo^eb^. Yo pana imesu dhātuādīsu pariññābhisamayādivasena nissaṅgagatiyā paṇḍāti laddhanāmena ñāṇena ito gato pavatto, ayaṃ ^b^paṇḍito^eb^ nāma.

[03]Mahantānaṃ atthānaṃ pariggaṇhanato mahatī paññā etassāti ^b^mahāpañño^eb^. Sesapadesupi eseva nayoti āha ^b^‘‘mahāpaññādīhi samannāgatoti attho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Nānatta^eb^nti yāhi mahāpaññādīhi samannāgatattā thero ‘‘mahāpañño’’tiādinā kittito, tāsaṃ mahāpaññādīnaṃ idaṃ nānattaṃ ayaṃ vemattatā. Yassa kassaci visesato arūpadhammassa mahattaṃ nāma kiccasiddhiyā veditabbanti tadassa kiccasiddhiyā dassento ^b^‘‘mahante sīlakkhandhe pariggaṇhātī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha hetumahantatāya paccayamahantatāya nissayamahantatāya pabhedamahantatāya kiccamahantatāya phalamahantatāya ānisaṃsamahantatāya ca sīlakkhandhassa mahantabhāvo ^a^V1.0142^ea^ veditabbo. Tattha ^b^hetū^eb^ alobhādayo. ^b^Paccayā^eb^ hirottappasaddhāsativīriyādayo. ^b^Nissayā^eb^ sāvakabodhipaccekabodhisammāsambodhiniyatatā, taṃsamaṅgino ca purisavisesā. ^b^Pabhedo^eb^ cārittādivibhāgo. ^b^Kiccaṃ^eb^ tadaṅgādivasena paṭipakkhassa vidhamanaṃ. ^b^Phalaṃ^eb^ saggasampadā nibbānasampadā ca. ^b^Ānisaṃso^eb^ piyamanāpatādi. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana ^b^visuddhimagge^eb^ (visuddhi. 1.8-9) ^b^ākaṅkheyyasuttā^eb^dīsu (ma. ni. 1.64 ādayo) ca āgatanayena veditabbo. Iminā nayena ^b^samādhikkhandhā^eb^dīnampi mahantatā yathārahaṃ niddhāretvā veditabbā. ^b^Ṭhānāṭṭhānā^eb^dīnaṃ pana mahantabhāvo mahāvisayatāya veditabbo. Tattha ṭhānāṭṭhānānaṃ mahāvisayatā bahudhātukasuttādīsu āgatanayena, ^b^vihārasamāpattīnaṃ^eb^ samādhikkhandhe niddhāritanayena veditabbā. ^b^Ariyasaccānaṃ^eb^ sakalasāsanasaṅgaṇhanato saccavibhaṅge ^a^M1.0162^ea^ (vibha. 189 ādayo) taṃsaṃvaṇṇanāsu (vibha. aṭṭha. 189 ādayo) āgatanayena; ^b^satipaṭṭhānā^eb^dīnaṃ satipaṭṭhānavibhaṅgādīsu (vibha. 355 ādayo) taṃsaṃvaṇṇanādīsu (vibha. aṭṭha. 355 ādayo) ca āgatanayena; ^b^sāmaññaphalānaṃ^eb^ mahato hitassa mahato sukhassa mahato atthassa mahato yogakkhemassa nipphattibhāvato santapaṇītanipuṇātakkāvacarapaṇḍitavedanīyabhāvato ca; ^b^abhiññānaṃ^eb^ mahāsambhārato mahāvisayato mahākiccato mahānubhāvato mahānipphattito ca; ^b^nibbānassa^eb^ madanimmadanādimahatthasiddhito mahantatā veditabbā. ^b^Pariggaṇhātī^eb^ti sabhāvādito paricchijja gaṇhāti jānāti paṭivijjhatīti attho. ^b^Sā panā^eb^ti mahāpaññatā.

[03]^b^Puthupaññā^eb^ti ettha ^b^nānākhandhesu ñāṇaṃ pavattatī^eb^ti ayaṃ rūpakkhandho nāma…pe… ayaṃ viññāṇakkhandho nāmāti evaṃ pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ paṭicca ñāṇaṃ pavattati. Tesu ekavidhena rūpakkhandho, ekādasavidhena rūpakkhandho, ekavidhena vedanākkhandho, bahuvidhena vedanākkhandho, ekavidhena saññākkhandho, saṅkhārakkhandho, viññāṇakkhandhoti evaṃ ekekassa khandhassa ekavidhādivasena atītādivasenapi nānākaraṇaṃ paṭicca ñāṇaṃ pavattati. Tathā idaṃ cakkhāyatanaṃ nāma…pe… idaṃ dhammāyatanaṃ nāmaṃ. Tattha dasāyatanā kāmāvacarā, dve catubhūmakāti evaṃ āyatanānaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ paṭicca ñāṇaṃ pavattati. ^b^Nānādhātūsū^eb^ti ayaṃ cakkhudhātu nāma…pe… ayaṃ manoviññāṇadhātu nāma. Tattha soḷasa dhātuyo kāmāvacarā, dve catubhūmakāti evaṃ dhātunānākaraṇaṃ paṭicca ñāṇaṃ pavattati, taṃ upādiṇṇadhātuvasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ paccekabuddhānañhi dvinnaṃ aggasāvakānañca upādiṇṇadhātūsu eva nānākaraṇaṃ paṭicca ñāṇaṃ pavattati. Tañca kho ekadesamattato, na nippadesato, anupādiṇṇakadhātūnaṃ pana nānākaraṇaṃ na jānanti eva. Itarasāvakesu vattabbameva natthi, sabbaññubuddhānaṃyeva pana imāya nāma dhātuyā ussannattāva imassa rukkhassa khandho seto hoti, imassa kāḷo, imassa maṭṭho, imassa ^a^V1.0143^ea^ bahalattaco, imassa tanuttaco, imassa pattaṃ vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādivasena evarūpaṃ; imassa pupphaṃ nīlaṃ pītakaṃ lohitakaṃ odātaṃ, sugandhaṃ duggandhaṃ; phalaṃ khuddakaṃ mahantaṃ dīghaṃ vaṭṭaṃ susaṇṭhānaṃ maṭṭhaṃ ^a^M1.0163^ea^ pharusaṃ sugandhaṃ madhuraṃ tittakaṃ ambilaṃ kaṭukaṃ kasāvaṃ; kaṇṭako tikhiṇo atikhiṇo ujuko kuṭilo tambo lohito odāto hotīti dhātunānattaṃ paṭicca ñāṇaṃ pavattati.

[03]^b^Atthesū^eb^ti rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu. ^b^Nānāpaṭiccasamuppādesū^eb^ti ajjhattabahiddhābhedato ca saṇṭhānabhedato ca nānappabhedesu paṭiccasamuppādaṅgesu. Avijjādiaṅgānañhi paccekaṃ paṭiccasamuppādasaññitāti. Tenāha saṅkhārapiṭake ‘‘dvādasa paccayā dvādasa paṭiccasamuppādā’’ti. ^b^Nānāsuññatamanupalabbhesū^eb^ti nānāsabhāvesu niccasārādivirahato suññasabhāvesu, tato eva itthipurisāttāttaniyādivasena anupalabbhesu sabhāvesu. Ma-kāro hettha padasandhikaro. ^b^Nānāatthesū^eb^ti atthapaṭisambhidāvisayesu paccayuppannādibhedesu nānāvidhesu atthesu. ^b^Dhammesū^eb^ti dhammapaṭisambhidāvisayesu paccayādinānādhammesu. ^b^Niruttīsū^eb^ti tesaṃyeva atthadhammānaṃ niddhāraṇavacanasaṅkhātāsu niruttīsu. ^b^Paṭibhānesū^eb^ti atthapaṭisambhidādīsu visayabhūtesu ‘‘imāni idamatthajotakānī’’ti tathā tathā paṭibhānato patiṭṭhānato paṭibhānānīti laddhanāmesu ñāṇesu. ^b^Puthu nānāsīlakkhandhesū^eb^tiādīsu sīlassa puthuttaṃ nānattañca vuttameva. Itaresaṃ pana vuttanayānusārena suviññeyyattā pākaṭameva. Yaṃ pana abhinnaṃ ekameva nibbānaṃ, tattha upacāravasena puthuttaṃ gahetabbanti āha ^b^‘‘puthu janasādhāraṇe dhamme samatikkammā’’^eb^ti. Tenassa idha madanimmadanādipariyāyena puthuttaṃ dīpitaṃ hoti.

[03]Evaṃ visayavasena paññāya mahattaṃ puthuttañca dassetvā idāni sampayuttadhammavasena hāsabhāvaṃ, pavattiākāravasena javanabhāvaṃ, kiccavasena tikkhādibhāvañca dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘katamā hāsapaññā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^hāsabahulo^eb^ti pītibahulo. Sesapadāni tassa vevacanāni. ^b^Sīlaṃ paripūretī^eb^ti haṭṭhapahaṭṭho udaggudaggo hutvā pītisahagatāya paññāya pātimokkhasīlaṃ ṭhapetvā hāsanīyatarasseva visuṃ gahitattā itaraṃ tividhaṃ sīlaṃ paripūreti. Pītisomanassasahagatā hi paññā abhirativasena tadārammaṇe phullitā vikasitā viya vattati, na upekkhāsahagatā. ^b^Sīlakkhandhaṃ samādhikkhandha^eb^ntiādīsupi eseva nayo. ^b^Thero^eb^tiādinā abhinīhārasiddhā therassa hāsapaññatāti dasseti.

[03]^b^Sabbaṃ^eb^^a^M1.0164^ea^^b^rūpaṃ aniccalakkhaṇato khippaṃ javatī^eb^ti rūpakkhandhaṃ aniccanti sīghavegena pavattiyā paṭipakkhadūrībhāvena pubbābhisaṅkhārassa sātisayattā indena visaṭṭhavajiraṃ viya lakkhaṇaṃ ^a^V1.0144^ea^ paṭivijjhantī adandhāyantī rūpakkhandhe aniccalakkhaṇaṃ vegena paṭivijjhati, tasmā sā ^b^javanapaññā^eb^ nāmāti attho. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Evaṃ lakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanāvasena javanapaññaṃ dassetvā balavavipassanāvasena dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘rūpa’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^khayaṭṭhenā^eb^ti yattha yattha uppajjati, tattha tattheva khaṇeneva bhijjanato khayasabhāvato. ^b^Bhayaṭṭhenā^eb^ti bhayānakato. ^b^Asārakaṭṭhenā^eb^ti attasāravirahato niccasārādivirahato ca. ^b^Tulayitvā^eb^ti tulābhūtāya vipassanāya tulayitvā. ^b^Tīrayitvā^eb^ti tāya eva tīraṇabhūtāya tīretvā. ^b^Vibhāvayitvā^eb^ti yāthāvato pakāsetvā pañcakkhandhaṃ ^b^vibhūtaṃ katvā^eb^ pākaṭaṃ katvā. ^b^Rūpanirodhe^eb^ti rūpakkhandhassa nirodhabhūte nibbāne ninnapoṇapabbhārabhāvena. Idāni sikhāppattavipassanāvasena javanapaññaṃ dassetuṃ puna ^b^‘‘rūpa’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. ‘‘Vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāvasenā’’ti keci.

[03]Ñāṇatikkhabhāvo nāma savisesaṃ paṭipakkhasamucchindane veditabboti ^b^‘‘khippaṃ kilese chindatīti tikkhapañño’’^eb^ti vatvā te pana kilese vibhāgena dassento ^b^‘‘uppannaṃ kāmavitakka’’^eb^ntiādimāha. Tikkhapañño khippābhiñño hoti, paṭipadā cassa na calatīti āha ^b^‘‘ekasmiṃ āsane cattāro ca ariyamaggā adhigatā hontī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Thero cā^eb^tiādinā dhammasenāpatino tikkhapaññatā sikhāppattāti dasseti.

[03]‘‘Sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā saṅkhatā paṭiccasamuppannā khayadhammā vayadhammā virāgadhammā nirodhadhammā’’ti yāthāvato dassanena saccasampaṭivedho ijjhati, na aññathāti kāraṇamukhena nibbedhikapaññaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘sabbasaṅkhāresu ubbegabahulo hotī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^ubbegabahulo^eb^ti vuttanayena sabbasaṅkhāresu abhiṇhappavattasaṃvego. ^b^Uttāsabahulo^eb^ti ñāṇuttāsavasena sabbasaṅkhāresu bahuso utrastamānaso. Tena ādīnavānupassanamāha. ^b^Ukkaṇṭhanabahulo^eb^ti iminā pana nibbidānupassanamāha, ^b^aratibahulo^eb^tiādinā tassā eva aparāparuppattiṃ. ^b^Bahimukho^eb^ sabbasaṅkhārato bahibhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ uddissa pavattañāṇamukho, tathā ^a^M1.0165^ea^ vā pavattitavimokkhamukho. Nibbijjhanaṃ nibbedho, so etissā atthi, nibbijjhatīti vā nibbedhā, sā eva paññā ^b^nibbedhikā^eb^. Yaṃ panettha atthato na vibhattaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayattā suviññeyyameva.

[03]^b^Appicchoti santaguṇaniguhanatā^eb^ti attani vijjamānānaṃ bāhusaccadhutadhammasīlādiguṇānañceva paṭivedhaguṇassa ca niguhanaṃ, ^b^paṭiggahaṇe ca mattaññutā^eb^ti eteneva pariyesanaparibhogamattaññutāpi vuttā hoti. Tīhi ^b^santosehī^eb^ti catūsu paccayesu paccekaṃ tīhi santosehi ^a^V1.0145^ea^, sabbe pana dvādasa. Paṭisallīnena ^b^vivekaṭṭhakāyānaṃ^eb^ na saṅgaṇikārāmānaṃ. ^b^Nekkhammābhiratāna^eb^nti pabbajjaṃ upagatānaṃ. ^b^Parisuddhacittānaṃ^eb^ vigatacittasaṃkilesānaṃ. ^b^Paramavodānappattānaṃ^eb^ aṭṭhasamāpattisamadhigamena ativiya vodānaṃ visuddhiṃ pattānaṃ. Kilesupadhiādīnaṃ abhāvato ^b^nirupadhīnaṃ^eb^. Phalasamāpattivasena sabbasaṅkhāravinissaṭattā ^b^visaṅkhāraṃ^eb^ nibbānaṃ. ^b^Upagatānaṃ, imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vivekānaṃ lābhī^eb^ pavivitto ‘‘pakārehi vivitto’’ti katvā. Samāsajjanaṃ parisinehuppādo saṃsaggo, savanavasena uppajjanakasaṃsaggo ^b^savanasaṃsaggo^eb^. Esa nayo sesesupi. ^b^Samullapanaṃ^eb^ ālāpasallapanaṃ. Saṃsaggavatthunā iminā tassa paribhogo ^b^paribhogasaṃsaggo^eb^.

[03]^b^Āraddhavīriyo^eb^ti ettha vīriyārambho nāma vīriyassa paggaṇhanaṃ paripuṇṇakaraṇaṃ. Taṃ pana sabbaso kilesānaṃ niggaṇhananti dassento ^b^‘‘tatthā’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Odhunanavattā^eb^ti kilesānaṃ yassa kassaci sāvajjassa odhunanavasena vattā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘bhikkhūna’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Otiṇṇaṃ^eb^ nāma vajjaṃ ajjhācaritanti ārocitaṃ. ^b^Anotiṇṇaṃ^eb^ anārocitaṃ. ^b^Tantivasenā^eb^ti pāḷidhammavasena, yuttasaddassa vasenāti attho. Pāpe lāmake puggale dhamme ca garahati jigucchatīti ^b^pāpagarahī^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘pāpapuggale’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Ekadassī^eb^ti ekabhavadassī, idhalokamattadassī diṭṭhadhammikasukhamattāpekkhī. ^b^Samantā^eb^ti samantato, parito me katthaci mā ahūti yojanā.

[03]^b^Soḷasahi padehī^eb^ti soḷasahi koṭṭhāsehi. ^b^Akuppa^eb^nti kenaci akopanīyaṃ. Ayaṃ dhammasenāpatino guṇakathā satthu vacanānusārena dasasahassacakkavāḷabyāpinī ^a^M1.0166^ea^ ahosi, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘eva’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Catubbidhā vaṇṇanibhā pātubhavi^eb^ uḷārapītisomanassasamuṭṭhānattā. Suṭṭhu obhāsatīti ^b^subho^eb^. Obhāsasampattiyā maṇino bhaddakatāti āha ^b^‘‘subhoti sundaro’’^eb^ti. ^b^Jātimā^eb^ parisuddhāakarasamuṭṭhitattā. Kuruvindajātiādijātivisesopi maṇi ākaraparisuddhamūlako evāti āha ^b^‘‘jātisampanno’’^eb^ti. ^b^Dhovanādiparikammenā^eb^ti catūsu pāsāṇesu dhovanadosanīharaṇatāpanasaṇhakaraṇādiparikammena. Rattakambalassa vasena sabhāvavaṇṇasiddhiyā veḷuriyamaṇi ativiya sobhatīti āha ^b^‘‘paṇḍukambale nikkhitto’’^eb^ti. ^b^Nikkha^eb^nti bhaṇḍamāha. Tañca appakena suvaṇṇena kataṃ bhaṇḍaṃ na sobhati sobhāvipulenāti āha ^b^‘‘atirekapañcasuvaṇṇena katapiḷandhana’’^eb^nti. ^b^Suvaṇṇa^eb^nti pañcadharaṇassa samaññā, tasmā pañcavīsatisuvaṇṇasāriyā vicittāabharaṇaṃ idha ^b^‘‘nikkha’’^eb^nti adhippetaṃ. Tañhi vipulaṃ na parittakaṃ. ^b^Mahājambusākhāya pavattanadiya^eb^nti mahājambusākhāya heṭṭhā sañjātanadiyaṃ. Taṃ kira ratanaṃ rattaṃ. ^b^Sukusalena…pe… sampahaṭṭha^eb^nti suṭṭhu kusalena suvaṇṇakārena ukkāya tāpetvā sammā ^a^V1.0146^ea^ pahaṭṭhaṃ majjanādivasena sukataparikammaṃ. ^b^Dhātuvibhaṅge^eb^ti dhātuvibhaṅgasutte. ^b^Katabhaṇḍa^eb^nti ābharaṇabhāvena kataṃ bhaṇḍaṃ.

[03]Nātiucco nātinīco ^b^taruṇasūriyo^eb^ nāma. ^b^Satthārā ābhatavaṇṇo^eb^ ubbhataguṇoti attho. Neva ^b^maraṇaṃ abhinandatī^eb^ti attanopi maraṇaṃ neva abhinandati attavinipātassa sāvajjabhāvato. Bodhisatto pana paresaṃ atthāya attano attabhāvaṃ pariccajati karuṇāvasena, evaṃ vosajjanaṃ paramatthapāramīpāripūriṃ gacchatīti sāvakā na tathā kātuṃ sakkā sikkhāpadato. ^b^Na jīvitaṃ pattheti^eb^ jīvitāsāya samucchinnattā. ^b^Divasasaṅkhepa^eb^nti ajja tvaṃ idaṃ nāma kammaṃ karohi, idaṃ te vetananti divasabhāgena paricchinnaṃ vetanaṃ. Tādiso hi bhatako divasakkhayameva udikkhati, na kammaniṭṭhānaṃ. Nibbisaṃ ^b^bhatako yathā^eb^ti vetanaṃ bhatiṃ icchanto kālakkhayaṃ udikkhanto bhatakapuriso viya.
[06]Susimasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^111^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Nānātitthiyasāvakā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0167^ea^ puthutitthiyānaṃ sāvakā. ^b^Chindite^eb^ti hatthacchedādivasena chede. ^b^Mārite^eb^ti māraṇe. ^b^Na pāpaṃ samanupassatī^eb^ti kiñci pāpaṃ atthīti na passati, paresañca tathā pavedeti. ^b^Vissāsa^eb^nti vissatthabhāvaṃ. ‘‘Katakammānampi vipāko natthī’’ti vadanto katapāpānaṃ akatapuññānañca vissatthataṃ nirāsaṅkataṃ janeti.

[03]^b^Tapojigucchāyā^eb^ti tapasā acelavatādinā pāpato jigucchanena, ‘‘pāpaṃ virājayāmā’’ti acelavatādisamādānenāti attho. Tasmiñhi samādāne ṭhitena saṃvarena saṃvutacitto samannāgato pihito ca nāma hotīti ^b^‘‘susaṃvutatto’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Cattāro yāmā bhāgā catuyāmā, catuyāmā eva ^b^cātuyāmā^eb^. Bhāgattho hi idha yāma-saddo yathā ‘‘rattiyaṃ paṭhamo yāmo’’ti. So panettha bhāgo saṃvaralakkhaṇoti āha ^b^‘‘cātuyāmena susaṃvuto’’^eb^ti, catukoṭṭhāsena saṃvarena suṭṭhu saṃvutoti attho. ^b^Paṭikkhittasabbasītodako^eb^ti paṭikkhittasabbasītudakaparibhogo. ^b^Sabbena pāpavāraṇena yutto^eb^ti sabbappakārena saṃvaralakkhaṇena pāpavāraṇena samannāgato. ^b^Dhutapāpo^eb^ti sabbena nijjaralakkhaṇena pāpavāraṇenapi dhutapāpo. ^b^Phuṭṭho^eb^ti aṭṭhannampi kammānaṃ khepanena vikkhepappattiyā kammakkhayalakkhaṇena sabbena pāpavāraṇena phuṭṭho, taṃ phusitvā ṭhito. ^b^Na niguhanto^eb^ti na niguhanahetu diṭṭhasute tatheva kathento.

[03]^b^Nānātitthiyānaṃyeva^eb^^a^V1.0147^ea^^b^upaṭṭhāko^eb^ti paravādīnaṃ sabbesaṃyeva titthiyānaṃ upaṭṭhāko, tesu sādhāraṇavasena abhippasanno. ^b^Koṭippattā^eb^ti mokkhādhigamena samaṇadhamme pattabbamariyādappattā.

[03]^b^Sahacaritamattenā^eb^ti sīhanādena saha vassakaraṇamattena. Sīhena sīhanādaṃ nadantena saheva siṅgālena attano siṅgālaravakaraṇamattena. ^b^Kotthuko^eb^ti khuddakakotthu. ^b^Āsaṅkitasamācāro^eb^ti attanā ca parehi ca āsaṅkitabbasamācāro. ^b^Sappurisāna^eb^nti buddhādīnaṃ.

[03]^b^Tassā^eb^ti vegabbharissa devaputtassa. ^b^Sarīre anuāvisī^eb^ti sarīre anupavisitvā viya āvisi. ^b^Adhimuccī^eb^ti yathā gahitassa vasena cittaṃ na vattati, attano eva vase vattati, evaṃ adhiṭṭhahi. ^b^Āyuttā^eb^ti dassanena saṃyuttā ^a^M1.0168^ea^. ^b^Pavivekiya^eb^nti kappakavatthabhuñjanasenāsanehi pavivittabhāvaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘te kirā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Rūpe niviṭṭhā^eb^ti cakkhurūpadhamme abhiniviṭṭhā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘taṇhādiṭṭhīhi patiṭṭhitā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Devalokapatthanakāmā^eb^ti devalokasseva abhipatthanakāmā. Maraṇadhammatāya ^b^mātiyā^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘mātiyāti maccā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Paralokatthāyā^eb^ti parasampattibhāvāya lokassa atthāya.

[03]^b^Pabhāsavaṇṇā^eb^ti pabhāya samānavaṇṇā. Kesaṃ pabhāyāti āha ^b^‘‘candobhāsā’’^eb^tiādi. Sajjhārāgapabhāsavaṇṇā indadhanupabhāsavaṇṇāti paccekaṃ yojanā. Āmo āmagandho etassa atthīti ^b^āmisaṃ. Vadhāyā^eb^ti viddhaṃsituṃ. ^b^Rūpā^eb^ti rūpāyatanādirūpidhammā.

[03]Rājagahasamīpappavattīnaṃ ^b^rājagahiyānaṃ^eb^. ‘‘Seto’’ti kelāsakūṭo adhippetoti āha ^b^‘‘setoti kelāso’’^eb^ti. Kenaci na ghaṭṭetīti ^b^aghaṃ,^eb^ antalikkhanti āha ^b^‘‘aghagāmīnanti ākāsagāmīna’’^eb^nti. Udakaṃ dhīyati etthāti ^b^udadhi,^eb^ mahodadhi. ^b^Vipulo^eb^ti vepullapabbato. ^b^Himavantapabbatāna^eb^nti himavantapabbatabhāgānaṃ. ^b^Buddho seṭṭho^eb^ sīlasamādhipaññāvimuttivimuttiñāṇadassanādīhi sabbaguṇehi.
[06]Nānātitthiyasāvakasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Tatiyavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Sāratthappakāsiniyā saṃyuttanikāya-aṭṭhakathāya
[06]Devaputtasaṃyuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^112^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Bhagavatā^eb^^a^V1.0148^ea^^a^M1.0169^ea^^b^saddhiṃ sammodī^eb^ti bhagavato guṇe ajānanto kosalarājā attano khattiyamānena kevalaṃ bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodi. Paṭhamāgate hi satthari tassa sammoditākāraṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yathā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Yathā khamanīyādīni pucchanto^eb^ti yathā bhagavā ‘‘kacci te, mahārāja, khamanīyaṃ, kacci yāpanīya’’ntiādinā tena raññā saddhiṃ paṭhamaṃ pavattamodo ahosi pubbabhāsitāya, tadanukaraṇena evaṃ sopi rājā bhagavatā saddhiṃ samappavattamodo ahosīti yojanā. Taṃ pana samappavattamodanaṃ upamāya dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘sītodakaṃ viyā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^sammodita^eb^nti saṃsanditaṃ ^b^ekībhāva^eb^nti sammodanakiriyāya samānataṃ ekarūpataṃ, ^b^khamanīya^eb^nti ‘‘idaṃ catucakkaṃ navadvāraṃ sarīrayantaṃ dukkhabahulatāya sabhāvato dussahaṃ, kacci khamituṃ sakkuṇeyya’’nti pucchati. ^b^Yāpanīya^eb^nti paccayāyattavuttikaṃ cirapabandhasaṅkhātāya yāpanāya kacci yāpetuṃ sakkuṇeyyaṃ. Sīsarogādiābādhābhāvena ^b^kacci appābādhaṃ^eb^. Dukkhajīvikābhāvena ^b^kacci appātaṅkaṃ^eb^. Taṃtaṃkiccakaraṇe uṭṭhānasukhatāya ^b^kacci lahuṭṭhānaṃ^eb^. Tadanurūpabalayogato ^b^kacci balaṃ^eb^. Sukhavihārasambhavena ^b^kacci phāsuvihāro atthī^eb^ti tattha tattha kacci-saddaṃ yojetvā attho veditabbo. Balavappattā pīti ^b^pīti^eb^yeva. Taruṇapīti ^b^pāmojjaṃ^eb^. Sammodanaṃ janeti karotīti ^b^sammodanīyaṃ^eb^. Sammoditabbato ^b^sammodanīya^eb^nti imaṃ pana atthaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘sammodituṃ yuttabhāvato’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Saritabbabhāvato^eb^ti anussaritabbabhāvato. ‘‘Saraṇīya’’nti vattabbe dīghaṃ katvā ^b^‘‘sāraṇīya’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Suyyamānasukhato^eb^ti āpāthamadhurataṃ āha, ^b^anussariyamānasukhato^eb^ti vimaddaramaṇīyataṃ. ^b^Byañjanaparisuddhatāyā^eb^ti sabhāvaniruttibhāvena tassā kathāya vacanacāturiyamāha, ^b^atthaparisuddhatāyā^eb^ti atthassa nirupakkilesataṃ. ^b^Anekehi pariyāyehī^eb^ti anekehi kāraṇehi. ^b^Adiṭṭhattā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0149^ea^^a^M1.0170^ea^ upasaṅkamanavasena adiṭṭhattā. ^b^Guṇāguṇavasenā^eb^ti guṇavasena gambhīrabhāvaṃ vā aguṇavasena uttānabhāvaṃ vā. ^b^Ovaṭṭikasāraṃ katvā^eb^ti ovaṭṭikāya gahetabbasāravatthuṃ katvā. ^b^Lokanissaraṇabhavokkantipañha^eb^nti lokato nissaṭabhāvapañhañceva ādito bhavokkamanapañhañca. Satthu sammāsambuddhataṃ pucchanto hi ‘‘kiṃ bhavaṃ gotamo sabbalokato nissaṭo, sabbasattehi ca jeṭṭho’’ti? Pucchati nāma. Yathā hi satthu sammāsambuddhatāya lokato nissaṭatā viññāyati, evaṃ sabbasattehi jeṭṭhabhāvato seṭṭhabhāvato. Svāyamattho ^b^aggapasādasuttā^eb^dīhi (itivu. 90; a. ni. 4.34) vibhāvetabbo. Kathaṃ pana sambuddhatā viññāyatīti? Aviparītadhammadesanato. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana ^b^visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanādīsu^eb^ (visuddhi. mahāṭī. 1.124) vuttanayena veditabbo.

[03]Rājā satthu aviparītadhammadesanaṃ ajānanto tato evassa sammāsambodhiṃ asaddahanto ‘‘vuḍḍhataresupi cirapabbajitesu sammāsambuddhabhāve alabbhamāne tabbiparīte kathaṃ labbheyyā’’ti maññamāno ‘‘kiṃ pana bhavaṃ gotamo’’tiādiṃ vakkhati. ^b^Rājā attano laddhiyā na pucchati^eb^ attano sammukhā tehi asammāsambuddhabhāvasseva paṭiññātattā. Yasmā te musāvāditāya attano upaṭṭhākādīnaṃ ‘‘buddhā maya’’nti paṭijāniṃsu, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘loke mahājanena gahitapaṭiññāvasena pucchatī’’^eb^ti. Svāyamattho āgamissati. ^b^Buddhasīhanāda^eb^nti buddhānaṃ eva āveṇikaṃ sīhanādaṃ. Kāmaṃ maggañāṇapadaṭṭhānaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ, sambodhiñāṇe pana gahite taṃ atthato gahitameva hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sabbaññutaññāṇasaṅkhātaṃ sammāsambodhi’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^Pabbajjūpagamanenā^eb^ti yāya kāyaci pabbajjāya upagamanamattena samaṇā, na samitapāpatāya. ^b^Jātivasenā^eb^ti jātimattena brāhmaṇā, na bāhitapāpatāya. ^b^Pabbajitasamūhasaṅkhāto saṅgho^eb^ti pabbajitasamūhatāmattena saṅgho, na niyyānikadiṭṭhivisuddhasīlasāmaññavasena saṃhatattāti adhippāyo. ^b^Etesaṃ atthī^eb^ti etesaṃ sabbaññupaṭiññātānaṃ parivārabhūto atthi. ^b^Svevā^eb^ti pabbajitasamūhasaṅkhāto eva. Keci pana ‘‘pabbajitasamūhavasena. Saṅghino, gahaṭṭhasamūhavasena gaṇino’’ti vadanti, taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ gaṇe eva loke saṅghasaddassa niruḷhattā. ^b^Ācārasikkhāpanavasenā^eb^ti acelakavatacariyādi-ācārasikkhāpanavasena. ^b^Pākaṭā^eb^ti saṅghīādibhāvena ^a^M1.0171^ea^ pakāsitā. ^b^‘‘Appicchā’’^eb^ti vatvā tattha labbhamānaṃ appicchataṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘apicchatāya vatthampi na nivāsentī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Na hi tesu sāsanikesu viya santaguṇaniguhanā appicchā labbhatīti. ^b^Yaso^eb^ti kittisaddo. Taranti etena saṃsāroghanti evaṃ sammatattā titthaṃ vuccati laddhīti ^a^V1.0150^ea^ āha ^b^‘‘titthakarāti laddhikarā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sādhusammatā^eb^ti ‘‘sādhū’’ti sammatā, na sādhūhi sammatāti āha ^b^‘‘santo…pe… puthujjanassā’’^eb^ti.
