[03]^b^Kappakolāhala^eb^nti kappato kolāhalaṃ, ‘‘kappuṭṭhānaṃ bhavissatī’’ti devaputtehi ugghositamahāsaddo. ^b^Ime^eb^ti pūraṇādayo. ^b^Buddhakolāhala^eb^nti devatāhi ghositaṃ buddhakolāhalaṃ. ^b^Payirupāsitvā^eb^ti purisasutiparamparāya sutvā. ^b^Cintāmaṇivijjā^eb^ nāma paracittajānāpanavijjā. Sā ^b^kevaṭṭasutte^eb^ ‘‘maṇikā’’ti āgatā, ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena gandhārisambhavavijjādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Tattha gandhāriyā vikubbanaṃ dasseti. ^b^Attabhāve^eb^ti sarīre. ^b^Rājusmā^eb^ti rājatejo.

[03]^b^Sukkadhammo^eb^ti anavajjadhammo nikkilesatā. ^b^Idaṃ gahetvā^eb^ti idaṃ parammukhā ‘‘mayaṃ buddhā’’ti vatvā attano sammukhā ‘‘na mayaṃ buddhā’’ti tehi vuttavacanaṃ gahetvā. ^b^Evamāhā^eb^ti ‘‘yepi te, bho gotama…pe… navo ca pabbajjāyā’’ti evaṃ avoca. ^b^Attano paṭiññaṃ gahetvā^eb^ti ‘‘na mayaṃ buddhā’’ti tesaṃ attano purato pavattitaṃ paṭiññaṃ gahetvā. Īdise ṭhāne kiṃ-saddo paṭisedhavācako hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘kinti paṭikkhepavacana’’^eb^nti, kasmā paṭijānātīti attho?

[03]^b^Na uññātabbā^eb^ti na garahitabbā. Garahattho hi ayaṃ u-saddo. ‘‘Daharo’’ti adhikatattā vakkhamānattā ca ^b^‘‘khattiyoti rājakumāro’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Urasā gacchatīti ^b^urago,^eb^ yo koci sappo, idha pana adhippetaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘āsīviso’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Sīlavantaṃ pabbajitaṃ dasseti^eb^ sāmaññato ‘‘bhikkhū’’ti vadanto. Idha pana yasmā ‘‘bhavampi no gotamo’’tiādinā bhagavantaṃ uddissa kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi, tasmā bhagavā attānaṃ abbhantaraṃ akāsi. Yadipi viseso sāmaññajotanāya vibhāvito hoti, saṃsayuppattidīpakaṃ noti vuttaggahaṇaṃ pana taṃ paricchijjatīti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘desanākusalatāyā’’^eb^tiādi. Idāni avaññāparibhave payogato vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘ettha cā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha acittīkatākāravasena avaññāya pākaṭabhāvo, vambhanavasena paribhavassāti adhippāyena ^a^M1.0172^ea^ kāyapayogavasena avaññā dassitā, vacīpayogavasena paribhavo, ubhayaṃ pana ubhayatthāpi pabhedato gahitaṃ, avaññaparibhavānaṃ dvinnampi ubhayattha pariggaho. ^b^Taṃ sabbampī^eb^ti taṃ avaññādi sabbampi. Catūsupi taṃ ^b^na kātabbameva^eb^ sampati āyatiñca anatthāvahattā.

[03]^b^Tadatthadīpanā^eb^ti tassa ādito vuttassa atthassa dīpanā. ^b^Visesatthadīpanā^eb^ti tato visiṭṭhatthadīpanā ^a^V1.0151^ea^. Khettānaṃ adhipatīti ^b^khattiyo^eb^ti niruttinayena saddasiddhi veditabbā. Khettato vivādā satte tāyatīti ^b^khattiyo^eb^ti lokiyā kathayanti. ‘‘Mahāsammato, khattiyo, rājā’’ti evamāgatesu imesu ^b^dutiyaṃ. Akkhara^eb^nti samaññā. Sā hi udayabbayābhāvato ‘‘na kadāci kharatīti akkhara’’nti vuttā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘nāmagottaṃ na jīratī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Jātisampanna^eb^nti sampannajātiṃ ativisuddhajātiṃ. ^b^Tīṇi kulānī^eb^ti brāhmaṇavessasuddakulāni. ^b^Atikkamitvā^eb^ti attano jātisampattiyā abhibhavitvā.

[03]Kevalaṃ nāmapadaṃ vuttaṃ ākhyātapadaṃ apekkhatevāti āha ^b^‘‘ṭhānaṃ hīti kāraṇaṃ vijjatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Uddhaṭadaṇḍenā^eb^ti samantato ubbhatena daṇḍena sāsanena, ^b^balavaṃ upakkamaṃ^eb^ garukaṃ rājānampi. ^b^Taṃ khattiyaṃ parivajjeyyā^eb^ti khattiyaṃ avaññāparibhavakaraṇato vajjeyya. Tenāha ^b^‘‘na ghaṭṭeyyā’’^eb^ti.

[03]Uragassa ca nānāvidhavaṇṇaggahaṇe kāraṇaṃ vadati ^b^‘‘yena yena hī’’^eb^tiādinā. ^b^Bahubhakkha^eb^nti mahābhakkhaṃ sabbabhakkhakhādakaṃ. ^b^Pāvakaṃ^eb^ sodhanatthena asuddhassapi dahanena. ^b^So^eb^ti maggo. Kaṇho vattanī imassāti ^b^kaṇhavattanī. Mahanto^eb^ aggikkhandho hutvā. ^b^Yāvabrahmalokappamāṇo^eb^ti kappavuṭṭhānakāle araññe agginā gahite kālantare eva kaṭṭhatiṇarukkhādisambhavoti dassetuṃ ‘‘jāyanti tattha pārohā’’ti pāḷiyaṃ vuttanti dassento ^b^‘‘tatthā’’^eb^tiādimāha.

[03]^b^Ḍahituṃ na sakkoti^eb^ paccakkosanādinā. ^b^Vinassanti^eb^ samaṇatejasā vināsitattā. ‘‘Na tassā’’ti ettha na-kāraṃ ‘‘vindare’’ti ettha ānetvā sambandhitabbanti ^a^M1.0173^ea^ āha ^b^‘‘na vindantī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Vatthumattāvasiṭṭho^eb^ti ṭhānameva nesaṃ avasissati, sayaṃ pana sabbaso saha dhanena vinassantīti attho.

[03]‘‘Sammadeva samācare’’ti ettha yathā rājādīsu sammā samācareyya, taṃ vibhāgena dassento ^b^‘‘khattiyaṃ tāvā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Taṃ suviññeyyameva. ^b^Tisso kulasampattiyo^eb^ti khattiya-brāhmaṇagahapati-mahāsālakulāni vadati. Pañca rūpibrahmaloke, cattāro arūpībrahmaloketi evaṃ ^b^nava brahmaloke^eb^ kammabhavavibhāgena, sesānaṃ gaṇanānaṃ upapattibhavavibhāgena.

[03]^b^Abhikkanta^eb^nti ativiya kamanīyaṃ. Sā panassā kantatā ativiya iṭṭhatāya manavaḍḍhanatāya ^a^V1.0152^ea^ sobhanatāyāti āha ^b^‘‘atīṭṭhaṃ atimanāpaṃ atisundaranti attho’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Abhikkanta’’nti vacanaṃ apekkhitvā napuṃsakaniddeso, vacanaṃ pana bhagavato dhammadesanāti tathā vuttaṃ. Atthamattadassanaṃ vā etaṃ, tasmā atthavasena liṅgavibhattivipariṇāmo veditabbo. Dutiyapadepi eseva nayo.

[03]^b^Adhomukhaṭhapita^eb^nti kenaci adhomukhaṃ ṭhapitaṃ. ^b^Heṭṭhāmukhajāta^eb^nti sabhāveneva heṭṭhāmukhaṃ jātaṃ. ^b^Ugghāṭeyyā^eb^ti vivaṭaṃ kareyya. ^b^Hatthe gahetvā^eb^ti ‘‘puratthābhimukho uttarābhimukho vā gacchā’’tiādīni avatvā hatthe gahetvā nissandehaṃ katvā ‘‘esa maggo’’ti evaṃ vatvā ‘‘gacchā’’ti vadeyya. ^b^Kāḷapakkhacātuddasī^eb^ti kāḷapakkhe cātuddasī. ^b^Nikkujjitaṃ ukkujjeyyā^eb^ti ādheyyassa anādhārabhūtaṃ bhājanaṃ tassa ādhārabhāvāpādanavasena ukkujjeyya. Aññāṇassa abhimukhattā heṭṭhāmukhajātatāya ^b^saddhammavimukhaṃ,^eb^ tato eva adhomukhabhāvena ^b^asaddhamme patita^eb^nti evaṃ padadvayaṃ yathārahaṃ yojetabbaṃ, na yathāsaṅkhayaṃ. Kāmaṃ kāmacchandādayopi paṭicchādakā, micchādiṭṭhi pana savisesaṃ paṭicchādikāti āha ^b^‘‘micchādiṭṭhigahanapaṭicchanna’’^eb^nti. Tenāha bhagavā – ‘‘micchādiṭṭhiparamāhaṃ, bhikkhave, vajjaṃ vadāmī’’ti (a. ni. 1.310). Sabbāpāyagāmimaggo ^b^kummaggo^eb^ ‘‘kucchito maggo’’ti katvā. Sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ ujupaṭipakkhatāya micchādiṭṭhiādayo aṭṭha micchattadhammā ^b^micchāmaggo^eb^. Teneva hi tadubhayapaṭipakkhataṃ sandhāya ^b^‘‘saggamokkhamaggaṃ āvikarontenā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Sappiādisannissayo padīpo na tathā ujjalo, yathā telasannissayoti ^a^M1.0174^ea^^b^telapajjota^eb^ggahaṇaṃ. ^b^Etehi pariyāyehī^eb^ti etehi nikkujjitukkujjanapaṭicchannavivaraṇādiupamopamitabbappakārehi.

[03]^b^Pasannākāra^eb^nti pasannehi kātabbaṃ sakkāraṃ. ^b^Saraṇa^eb^nti paṭisaraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ. ^b^Ajjatā^eb^ti ^b^ajjā^eb^ti padassa vaḍḍhanamattaṃ hettha ^b^tā^eb^-saddo yathā ‘‘devatā’’ti. ^b^Pāṇehi upeta^eb^nti pāṇehi saha saraṇaṃ upetaṃ. ‘‘Yāva me pāṇā dharanti, tāva saraṇaṃ gatameva maṃ dhāretū’’ti āpāṇakoṭikaṃ attano saraṇagamanaṃ pavedeti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yāva me’’^eb^tiādi. Yaṃ panettha atthato avibhattaṃ, taṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Daharasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^113^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Purimasutte^eb^ti purimasuttadesanāyaṃ. Tattha hi upasaṅkamantavelāya satthu guṇe ajānanto ^a^V1.0153^ea^ kevalaṃ sammodanaṃ karoti. Desanaṃ sutvā pana satthu guṇe ñatvā saraṇaṅgatattā ^b^idha^eb^ imasmiṃ samāgame ^b^abhivādesi^eb^ pañcapatiṭṭhitena vandi. Attānaṃ adhi ^b^ajjhattaṃ,^eb^ avijahena attānaṃ adhikicca uddissa pavattadhammā ajjhattaṃ ekajjhaṃ gahaṇavasena, bhummatthe cetaṃ paccattavacanaṃ. Kāmañcāyaṃ ajjhattasaddo gocarajjhattavisayajjhattājjhattajjhattesu pavattati. Te panettha na yujjantīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘niyakajjhatta’’^eb^nti, niyakasaṅkhātājjhattadhammesūti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘attano santāne’’^eb^ti. ^b^Lubbhanalakkhaṇo^eb^ti gijjhanalakkhaṇo, ārammaṇe daḷhaggahaṇasabhāvoti attho. ^b^Dussanalakkhaṇo^eb^ti kujjhanalakkhaṇo, byāpajjanasabhāvoti attho. ^b^Muyhanalakkhaṇo^eb^ti aññāṇalakkhaṇo, ārammaṇe sabhāvasammohabhāvoti attho. ^b^Viheṭhentī^eb^ti atthanāsanānatthuppādanehi vibādhenti. Tato eva yathā saggamaggesu na dissati, evaṃ karontīti āha ^b^‘‘nāsenti vināsentī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Attani sambhūtā^eb^ti santāne nibbattā.
[06]Purisasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^114^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Aññatra^eb^^a^M1.0175^ea^^b^jarāmaraṇā^eb^ti jarāmaraṇena vinā. Jarāmaraṇavirahito jāto nāma atthi nu khoti pucchati. Pāḷiyaṃ ^b^jātassā^eb^ti paccatte sāmivacanaṃ. ^b^Mahāsālā^eb^ti iminā ^b^ra^eb^-kārassa ^b^la^eb^-kāraṃ katvā ‘‘mahāsālā’’ti vuttanti dasseti yathā ‘‘puratthiyoti pulatthiyo’’ti. ^b^Mahāsārappattā^eb^ti mahantaṃ vibhavasāraṃ pattā. ^b^Koṭisataṃ^eb^ dhanaṃ, ayameva vā pāṭho. ‘‘Kumbhaṃ nāma dasa ambaṇānī’’ti vadanti. ^b^Issarā^eb^ti vibhavissariyena issarā. ^b^Suvaṇṇarajatabhājanādīna^eb^nti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena vatthaseyyāvasathādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Asādhāraṇadhanānaṃ nidhānagatattā ^b^‘‘anidhānagatassā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Tuṭṭhikaraṇassā^eb^ti pāsādasivikādisukhasādhanassa.

[03]^b^Ārakā kilesehī^eb^ti niruttinayena saddasiddhimāha. ^b^Ārakā^eb^ti ca sabbaso samucchinnattā tehi dūreti attho. Rāgādīnaṃ hatattā, pāpakaraṇe rahābhāvato, anuttaradakkhiṇeyyatādipaccayā ca ^b^arahaṃ^eb^. Kāmañcāyaṃ saṃyuttavaṇṇanā, abhidhammanayo eva pana nippariyāyoti āha ^b^‘‘cattāro āsavā’’^eb^ti ^b^brahmacariyavāsa^eb^nti maggabrahmacariyavāsaṃ. ^b^Vuṭṭhā^eb^ti vuṭṭhavanto. ^b^Catūhi maggehi karaṇīya^eb^nti paccekaṃ catūhi maggehi kattabbaṃ pariññāpahānasacchikiriyabhāvanābhisamayaṃ. Evaṃ gataṃ soḷasavidhaṃ hoti. Osīdāpanaṭṭhena bhārā viyāti ^b^bhārā^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘bhārā have pañcakkhandhā’’^eb^tiādi (saṃ. ni. 3.22). Attapaṭibaddhatāya attano avijahanato paramatthadesanāya ca paramattho arahattaṃ. Kāmañcāyamattho sabbasamiddhisasantatipariyāpanno anavajjadhammo ^a^V1.0154^ea^ sambhavati akuppasabhāvā, aparihānadhammesu pana aggabhūte arahatte sātisayo, na itaresūti ^b^‘‘arahattasaṅkhāto’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Orambhāgiyuddhambhāgiyavibhāgaṃ ^b^dasavidhampi^eb^ bhavesu saṃyojanaṃ kilesakammavipākavaṭṭapaccayo hutvā nissarituṃ appadānavasena bandhatīti ^b^bhavasaṃyojanaṃ^eb^. Satipi hi aññesaṃ tappakkhiyabhāvena vinā saṃyojanāni tesaṃ tappaccayabhāvo atthi, bhavaniyāmo orambhāgiyuddhambhāgiyasaṅgahitoti taṃtaṃbhavanibbattakakammaniyāmo ca hoti, na ca upacchinnasaṃyojanassa katānipi kammāni bhavaṃ nibbattentīti tesaṃyeva saṃyojanaṭṭho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Sammā^eb^^a^M1.0176^ea^^b^kāraṇehi jānitvā^eb^ti ñāyena dukkhādīsu so yathā jānitabbo; tathā jānitvā, pubbakālakiriyāvimuttā hi aparakālakiriyā ca yathā sambhavati, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘maggapaññāyā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Bhijjanasabhāvo^eb^ khaṇāyattattā. ^b^Nikkhipitabbasabhāvo^eb^ maraṇadhammattā. Ayaṃ kāyo usmāyuviññāṇāpagamo chaḍḍanīyadhammo, yasmiṃ yaṃ patiṭṭhitaṃ, taṃ tassa santānagatavippayuttanti katvā vattabbataṃ arahatīti āha ^b^‘‘khīṇāsavassa hi ajīraṇadhammopi atthī’’^eb^tiādi. Tenāha bhagavā ‘‘imasmiṃyeva byāmamatte kaḷevare sasaññimhi samanake lokañca paññapemi lokasamudayañca lokanirodhañcā’’tiādi (saṃ. ni. 1.107; a. ni. 4.45). ^b^Assa^eb^ khīṇāsavassa, ‘‘jīraṇadhamma’’nti yathāvuttaṃ ajīraṇadhammaṃ ṭhapetvā jīraṇadhammaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘tesaṃpāyaṃ kāyo bhedanadhammo’’^eb^ti evamāha. Jaraṃ pattasseva hissa bhedananikkhipitabbatāniyate atthe suttadesanā pavattā. Atthassa uppatti aṭṭhuppatti, sā etassa atthīti ^b^aṭṭhuppattiko. Kira^eb^-saddo anussavattho, tena anussavāgatoyamattho, na aṭṭhakathāgatoti dīpeti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘vadantī’’^eb^ti. Yenāyaṃ attho hetunā aṭṭhuppattiko, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘sivikasālāyaṃ nisīditvā kathita’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ‘‘Viharati jetavane’’ti nidānavacanena yathā na virujjhati, tathā veditabbaṃ. Nanu imassa suttassa pucchāvasiko nikkhepoti? Saccametaṃ, suttekadesaṃ pana sandhāya aṭṭhuppattikatāvacanaṃ. Keci pana ‘‘yānaṃ āruhitvā rājā āgato, rañño ārohanīyarathaṃ dassetvā vutta’’ntipi vadanti.

[03]^b^Sarīre^eb^ pheṇapiṇḍasame ^b^kiṃ vattabbaṃ? Sabbhi saddhi^eb^nti sādhūhi saha pavedayanti. Na hi kadāci sādhūnaṃ sādhūhi saha kattabbā honti, tasmā sīdanasabhāvānaṃ kilesānaṃ bhijjanappattattā nibbānaṃ sabbhīti vuccati. ^b^Purimapadassā^eb^ti ‘‘satañca dhammo na jaraṃ upetī’’ti padassa. ^b^Kāraṇaṃ dassento^eb^ byatirekavasena. ^b^Sataṃ dhammo^eb^ nibbānaṃ kilesehi saṃsīdanabhijjanasabhāvo na hoti, tasmā taṃ āgamma ^b^jaraṃ na upeti^eb^. Kilesā pana tannimittakā, ^a^V1.0155^ea^ evamayaṃ vuttakāraṇato jaraṃ na upetīti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ida’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Sundarādhivacanaṃ vā etaṃ ‘‘sabbhī’’^eb^ti padaṃ apāpatādīpanato, sabbhidhammabhūtanti ^a^M1.0177^ea^ attho. Tenāha ‘‘virāgo tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati (itivu. 90; a. ni. 4.34), na tena dhammena samatthi kiñcī’’ti (khu. pā. 6.4; su. ni. 227) ca.
[06]Jarāmaraṇasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^115^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Rahasi gatassā^eb^ti janasambādhato apakkantassa. ^b^Nilīnassa^eb^ teneva janavivekena ekamantaṃ nisajjāya ekībhāvena paṭisallīnassa viya. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ekībhūtassā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sabbaññubhāsitaṃ karonto āha^eb^ tassa vacanaṃ ‘‘evameta’’nti sampaṭicchitvā tassa vacanaṃ tathāpaccanubhāsanto. Antakenādhipannattā eva khettavatthuhiraññasuvaṇṇādi ^b^mānusaṃ bhavaṃ jahato. Anuga^eb^nti anugataṃ, tameva anugāmīti attho. ^b^Nicaya^eb^nti uparūpari vaḍḍhiyā nicitabhūtaṃ. ^b^Samparāyika^eb^nti samparāya hitaṃ.
[06]Piyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^116^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pīdahana^eb^nti saṃyamanaṃ. ^b^Kammapathabhedaṃ appattassā^eb^ti supinakālo viya pavattimattatāya kammapathavisesaṃ agatassa. ^b^Kammassā^eb^ti akusalakammassa. ^b^Saṃvara^eb^nti saṃvarabhāvaṃ dasseti, itarassa pana saṃvarabhāvo purimehi tīhi padehi dassitovāti. ^b^Ottappampi gahitameva^eb^ tadavinābhāvato. Na hi pāpajigucchanaṃ pāpautrāsarahitaṃ, utrāso vā pāpajigucchanarahito atthīti.
[06]Attarakkhitasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^117^eb^^b^.^eb^ Uḷārasaddo ^a^M1.0178^ea^ seṭṭhe bahuke ca dissatīti āha ^b^‘‘paṇīte ca bahuke cā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Mānamajjanenā^eb^ti mānavasena madappattiyā. ^b^Atikkama^eb^nti sādhumariyādavītikkamalakkhaṇaṃ dosaṃ. ^b^Kūṭo^eb^ pāso.
[06]Appakasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^118^eb^^b^.^eb^ Yasmā ^a^V1.0156^ea^ kāmanimittaṃ satto sampajānamusā bhāsati, tasmā kāmā tassa patiṭṭhā paccayo kāraṇanti āha ^b^‘‘kāmahetū’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Bhadramukha^eb^sīsena ^b^viṭaṭubhaṃ^eb^ bhadropacārena upacaratīti attho, vinicchayo karīyati etthāti ^b^aḍḍakaraṇaṃ,^eb^ vinicchayaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^Khippa^eb^nti kūṭaṃ, macchakhippantipi vaṭṭati. ^b^Oḍḍita^eb^nti oḍḍanavasena phalaṃ pāpitaṃ.
[06]Aḍḍakaraṇasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^119^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^‘‘Kasmā pucchatī’’^eb^ti? Pucchākāraṇaṃ codetvā samudayato paṭṭhāya dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘ayaṃ kira mallikā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Mālārāmaṃ gantvāti^eb^ attano pitu mālārāmaṃ rakkhaṇatthañceva avasesapupphaggahaṇatthañca gantvā. ^b^Kāsigāme^eb^ti kāsiraṭṭhassa gāme. So kira gāmo mahākosalarājena attano dhītuyā patigharaṃ gacchantiyā pupphamūlatthāya dinno, taṃnimittaṃ. ^b^Bhāgineyyena^eb^ ajātasattunā. ^b^Tassā^eb^ti rañño pasenadissa. ^b^Sāti^eb^ mallikā. ^b^Nivattitu^eb^nti tassā dhammatāya nivattituṃ tassā vacanaṃ paṭikkhipituṃ. ^b^Nevajjhagā^eb^ti vattamānatthe atītavacananti āha ^b^‘‘nādhigacchatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Puthu attā^eb^ti tesaṃ sattānaṃ attā.
[06]Mallikāsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^120^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Thūṇa^eb^nti ^a^M1.0179^ea^ yaññūpatthambhaṃ. ^b^Upanītāni^eb^ yaññaṃ yajituṃ ārambhāya. ^b^Ettāvatā^eb^ti ‘‘idha, bhante…pe… rudamānā parikammāni karontī’’ti ettakena pāṭhena. ^b^Sanniṭṭhāna^eb^nti ‘‘naṃ itthiṃ labhissāmi nu kho, na nu kho labhissāmī’’ti nicchayaṃ avindanto na ñāyanto. ^b^Pheṇuddehaka^eb^nti yathā yattha kuthite pheṇaṃ uddehati na upadhīyati, evaṃ anekavāraṃ pheṇaṃ uṭṭhāpetvā. ^b^Taṃ divasa^eb^nti tasmiṃ raññā niddaṃ alabhitvā dukkhaseyyadivase. ^b^Ālokaṃ oloketvā^eb^ti lohakumbhimukhavaṭṭisīse patte tattha mahantaṃ ālokaṃ oloketvā. Attāno vacanaṃ rañño pavattiñāpanatthaṃ. ^b^Mahāsaddo udapādi^eb^ ‘‘evarūpaṃ yaññaṃ rājā kārāpetī’’ti. ^b^Vattukāmo ahosi,^eb^ vattuñca pana avisahanto ‘‘sa’’ iti vatvā lohakumbhiyaṃ nimuggo. Imaṃ gāthaṃ vattukāmo ahosīti ayaṃ panettha sambandho. Esa nayo sesapadadvayepi. ^b^Dhammabheriṃ carāpesuṃ^eb^ ‘‘koci ^a^V1.0157^ea^ kañci pāṇaṃ mā hanatū’’ti. ^b^So itthisāmiko puriso sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi^eb^ attano upanissayasampattiyā sattu ca desanāvilāsasampattiyā, rājā pana mahābodhinirujjhanasabhāvattā kiñci visesaṃ nādhigacchi.

[03]^b^Saṅgahavatthūnī^eb^ti lokassa saṅgahakāraṇāni. Nipphannasassato navabhāge kassakassa datvā raññaṃ ekabhāgaggahaṇaṃ ^b^dasamabhāgaggahaṇaṃ^eb^. Evaṃ kassakā haṭṭhatuṭṭhā sassāni sampādentīti āha ^b^‘‘sassasampādane medhāvitāti attho’’^eb^ti. Tato orabhāge kira chabhāgaggahaṇaṃ jātaṃ. ^b^Chamāsika^eb^nti channaṃ channaṃ māsānaṃ pahonakaṃ. ^b^Pāsetī^eb^ti pāsagate viya karoti. Vācāya piyassa piyakarassa kammaṃ ^b^vācāpeyyaṃ^eb^. Sabbaso raṭṭhassa iddhādibhāvato ^b^khemaṃ. Nirabbudaṃ^eb^ coriyābhāvato. Idañhi raṭṭhaṃ acoriyaṃ ^b^niraggaḷanti vuccati^eb^ apārutagharabhāvato.

[03]^b^Uddhaṃmūlakaṃ katvā^eb^ti ummūlaṃ katvā. ^b^Dvīhi pariyaññehī^eb^ti mahāyaññassa pubbabhāge pacchā ca pavattetabbehi dvīhi parivārayaññehi. ^b^Sattavīsati…pe… nassā^eb^ti sattavīsādhikānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ pasusatānaṃ dvāvīsatiyā assādīhi ca saṭṭhiadhikadvisatāaraññakapasūhi ca saddhiṃ sampiṇḍitānaṃ pana ^a^M1.0180^ea^ navādhikachasatapasūnaṃ māraṇena bheravassa pāpabhīrukānaṃ bhayāvahassa. Tathā hi vadanti –
[21]‘‘Chasatāni niyujjanti, pasūnaṃ majjhime hani,
[22]Assamedhassa yaññassa, adhikāni navāpi cā’’ti.

[03]^b^Samma^eb^nti yugacchidde pakkhipitabbadaṇḍakaṃ. ^b^Pāsentī^eb^ti khipanti. ^b^Saṃhārimehī^eb^ti sakaṭehi vahitabbehi yūpehi. Pubbe kira eko rājā sammāpāsaṃ yajanto sarassatinadītīre pathaviyā vivare dinne nimuggoyeva ahosi. Andhabālabrāhmaṇā gatānugatigatā ‘‘ayaṃ tassa saggagamanamaggo’’ti saññāya tattha sammāpāsayaññaṃ paṭṭhapenti. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘nimuggokāsato pabhutī’’^eb^ti. Ayūpo appakadivaso ^b^yāgo,^eb^ sayūpo bahudivasaṃ sādheyyo ^b^satrayāgo^eb^. Mantapadābhisaṅkhatānaṃ sappimadhūnaṃ ^b^vāja^eb^miti samaññā, hiraññasuvaṇṇagomahiṃ sādi^b^sattarasakadakkhiṇassa^eb^. Sāragabbhakoṭṭhāgārādīsu natthettha aggaḷanti ^b^niraggaḷo^eb^. Tattha kira yaññe attano sāpateyyaṃ anavasesato anigūhitvā niyyātīyati. ^b^Mahārambhā^eb^ti bahupasughātakammā. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana ‘‘vividhā yattha haññare’’ti vakkhamānattā ‘‘mahākiccā’’ti attho vutto, idha ‘‘mahārambhāti papañcavasena ajeḷakā’’tiādi vuttanti ‘‘bahupasughātakammā’’ti attho vutto. ^b^Nirārambhā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0158^ea^ etthāpi vuttanayena attho veditabbo. Anugataṃ kulanti ^b^anukulaṃ,^eb^ kulānugatanti attho veditabbo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yaṃ niccabhattādi…pe… attho’’^eb^ti.
[06]Yaññasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^121^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ida^eb^nti ‘‘idha, bhante’’tiādikaṃ vacanaṃ. Te bhikkhū ārocesunti sambandho. ^b^Tesū^eb^ti tesu raññā bandhāpitamanussesu. ^b^Sukatakāraṇa^eb^nti sukāraṇakiriyaṃ ārocesuṃ, na kevalaṃ tesaṃ manussānaṃ bandhāpitabhāvaṃ ^a^M1.0181^ea^. Idāni tamatthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘rañño kirā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Aṭṭhavaṅko^eb^ti aṭṭhaṃso. ^b^Antogharacārino^eb^ti antepuravāsino.

[03]^b^Ukkaṭṭhe^eb^ti yuddhe. ^b^Mantīsū^eb^ti guttamantīsu. ^b^Akutūhala^eb^nti saññataṃ. ^b^Piya^eb^nti piyāyitabbaṃ. ^b^Annapānamhi^eb^ madhure abhutte uppanne. ^b^Atthe^eb^ti atthe kicce jāte ^b^thiranti na kathenti^eb^ kāyabalamattena apanetuṃ sakkuṇeyyattā. ^b^Suṭṭhu rattarattā^eb^ti ativiya rattā eva hutvā rattā. ^b^Sārattenā^eb^ti sārabhāvena sārabhāvasaññāya. ^b^Ohārina^eb^nti heṭṭhā haraṇasīlanti āha ^b^‘‘catūsu apāyesu ākaḍḍhanaka’’^eb^nti. ^b^Sithila^eb^nti sithilākāraṃ, na pana sithilaṃ. Tenāha bhagavā ^b^‘‘duppamuñca’’^eb^nti.
[06]Bandhanasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Paṭhamavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^122^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pubbārāmasaṅkhāte^eb^ti sāvatthinagarassa pubbadisāya katattā pubbārāmeti saṅkhaṃ gate. ^b^Tatrā^eb^ti ‘‘migāramātuyā pāsāde’’ti tasmiṃ saṃkhittavacane. ^b^Ayaṃ^eb^ idāni vuccamānā ^b^anupubbikathā^eb^ ādito paṭṭhāya anukkamakathā. ^b^Patthanaṃ akāsi^eb^ tassa bhagavato aggupaṭṭhāyikaṃ ekaṃ upāsikaṃ disvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ ākaṅkhantī. ^b^Meṇḍakaputtassā^eb^ti meṇḍakaseṭṭhiputtassa. ^b^Mātiṭṭhāne^eb^^a^V1.0159^ea^^b^ṭhapesi^eb^ tassā upakāraṃ garubhāvañca disvā. ^b^Tāya kārite pāsāde^eb^ti tāya mahāupāsikāya mahālatāpasādhanaṃ vissajjetvā navahi koṭīhi karīsamatte bhūmibhāge kārite sahassagabbhapaṭimaṇḍite pāsāde.

[03]^b^Parūḷhakacchā^eb^ti parūḷhakacchalomā. Kamaṇḍalughaṭikādiṃ ^b^pabbajitaparikkhāraṃ. Naggabhogganissirikāna^eb^nti naggānañceva bhoggānañca nissirikānañca. Te hi anivatthavatthatāya naggā ceva, acelakavatādinā bhoggasarīratāya bhoggā, sobhārahitatāya nissirikā ca. ^b^Attanā diṭṭhasutaṃ^eb^^a^M1.0182^ea^^b^paṭicchādetvā na katheyyu^eb^nti akāraṇametaṃ tesaṃ raññā payuttacarapurisabhāvato. ^b^Evaṃ kate pana^eb^ te ‘‘aññepi pabbajitā atthīti ayaṃ jānātī’’ti maññeyyunti kohaññacitto evaṃ akāsīti sakkā viññātuṃ. Tathā hi tenatthena aparitosamāno ^b^‘‘apicā’’^eb^tiādimāha.

[03]^b^Kāsikacandana^eb^nti ujjalacandanaṃ. Taṃ kira vaṇṇavasena samujjalaṃ hoti pabhassaraṃ, tadatthameva naṃ saṇhataraṃ karonti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kāsikacandananti saṇhacandana’’^eb^nti. ^b^Vaṇṇagandhatthāyā^eb^ti vaṇṇasobhatthañceva sugandhabhāvatthañca. ^b^Vaṇṇagandhatthāyā^eb^ti chavirāgakaraṇatthañceva sugandhatthāya ca. ‘‘Gihinā’’tiādīhi padehi evaṃ pamādavihārinā tayā arahanto duviññeyyāti dasseti.

[03]Saṃvāso nāma idha kālena upasaṅkamananti dassento ^b^‘‘upasaṅkamantenā’’^eb^ti āha. Kāyavācāhi asaṃyatenapi ^b^saṃyatākāro, asaṃvutindriyenapi saṃvutindriyākāro. Pariggahessāmī^eb^ti vīmaṃsissāmi ‘‘parisuddhaṃ nu kho, no’’ti. ^b^Sappaññenā^eb^ti sīlapariggaṇhanapaññāya sappaññena. ^b^Jānituṃ na sakkoti^eb^ sabhāvassa sato sīlassa anupadhāraṇato.

[03]^b^Kathanenā^eb^ti aparāparaṃ kathanena. Tathā hi vakkhati ^b^‘‘ekaccassa hī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Ariyavohāro^eb^ti diṭṭhādilakkhaṇena voharito ‘‘diṭṭhaṃ adiṭṭha’’ntiādinā pavuttasaddavohāro. Tassa pana kāraṇameva gaṇhanto ^b^‘‘ettha cetanā’’^eb^ti āha. Esa nayo ^b^anariyavohārepi^eb^. Paramatthato hi saccavācādayo musāvādādayo cetanālakkhaṇāti. ^b^Paññattivohāro^eb^ tathā tathā voharitabbato ^b^evamāha^eb^ ‘‘saṃvohārena kho, mahārāja, soceyyaṃ veditabba’’nti.

[03]^b^Ñāṇathāmo^eb^ti ñāṇaguṇabalaṃ, yena ṭhānuppattikapaṭibhānādinā accāyikakiccakaraṇīyāni niṭṭhāpeti. ^b^Saṃkathāyā^eb^ti atthavīmaṃsanavasena pavattāya sammākathāya. ^b^Uppilavati^eb^ lahukabhāvato. ^b^Heṭṭhācarakā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0160^ea^ avacarakā. Ye anupavisitvā paresaṃ rahassavīmaṃsanavasena pavattā, tesu ocarakavohāroti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘carā hī’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Vaṇṇasaṇṭhānenā^eb^ti vaṇṇena vā saṇṭhānena vā vaṇṇapokkharatāya vā saṇṭhānasampattiyā vā. Sujāno pesalo vissaseti yojanā. ^b^Lahukadassanenā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0183^ea^ parittadassanena vijjukena viya. ^b^Parikkhārabhaṇḍakenā^eb^ti pabbajitaparikkhārabhūtena bhaṇḍakena. ^b^Lohaḍḍhamāso^eb^ti lohamayo upaḍḍhagghanakamāso.
[06]Sattajaṭilasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^123^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Rūpā^eb^ti rūpasaṅkhātā kāmaguṇā. Te pana nīlādivasena anekabhedabhinnāpi rūpāyatanattā cakkhuviññeyyataṃ nātivattantīti āha ^b^‘‘nīlapītādibhedaṃ rūpārammaṇa’’^eb^nti. To-saddopi dā-saddo viya kālattho hotīti āha ^b^‘‘yatoti yadā’’^eb^ti. Manaṃ āpayati vaḍḍhetīti ^b^manāpaṃ,^eb^ manoramaṃ. ^b^Manāpanipphattita^eb^nti tassa puggalassa manasā piyāyitaṃ, tassa aggabhāvena pariyantaṃ paramaṃ koṭiṃ katvā pavattitanti attho. ^b^Puggalamanāpa^eb^nti ārammaṇasabhāvaṃ acintetvā puggalassa vasena manāpabhāveneva iṭṭhatāya iṭṭhanti. ^b^Sammutī^eb^ti samaññā. ^b^Puggalamanāpaṃ nāma^eb^ saññāvipallāsavasena viparītampi gaṇhāti itarasabhāvatoti āha ^b^‘‘yaṃ ekassa…pe… iṭṭhaṃ kanta’’^eb^nti. Idāni taṃ jivhāviññeyyavasena yojetvā dassento ^b^‘‘paccantavāsīna’’^eb^ntiādimāha. ^b^Idaṃ puggalamanāpa^eb^nti idaṃ yathāvuttaṃ jivhāviññeyyaṃ viya aññampi evaṃjātikaṃ tena tena puggalena manāpanti gahetabbārammaṇaṃ puggalamanāpaṃ nāma.

[03]^b^Loke paṭivibhattaṃ natthi,^eb^ vibhajitvā dassanena lokena madhurajātenapi paṭivibhattaṃ katvā gahetuṃ na sakkuṇeyyāti adhippāyo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘vibhajitvā pana dassetabba’’^eb^nti. ^b^Dibbakappampī^eb^ti devalokapariyāpannasadisampi ^b^amanāpaṃ upaṭṭhāti^eb^ uḷārapaṇītārammaṇaparicayato. ^b^Majjhimānaṃ pana…pe… vibhajitabbaṃ^eb^ tesaṃ manāpassa manāpato, amanāpassa amanāpato upaṭṭhānato. Tatthapi iṭṭhāniṭṭhaparicchedo nippariyāyato evaṃ veditabboti dassento āha ^b^‘‘tañca paneta’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Tañca panetaṃ^eb^ iṭṭhāniṭṭhabhūtaṃ ^b^ārammaṇaṃ^eb^ kāmāvacarajavanesu akusalassa vasena yebhuyyena ^a^M1.0184^ea^ pavattatīti katvā tattha ‘‘rajjati dussatī’’ti akusalasseva pavatti dassitā. Sesakāmāvacarassapi vasena pavatti labbhateva. Tathā hi taṃ appaṭikūlepi paṭikūlākārato, paṭikūlepi ^a^V1.0161^ea^ appaṭikūlākārato pavattatīti. ^b^Vipākacittaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhaṃ paricchindati,^eb^ na sakkā vipākaṃ vañcetunti. Kusalakammaṃ hi ekantato iṭṭhameva, akusalakammañca aniṭṭhameva, tasmā tattha uppajjamānaṃ vipākacittaṃ yathāsabhāvato pavattatīti.

[03]Yaṃ pana ^b^sammohavinodaniyaṃ^eb^ ‘‘kusalakammajaṃ aniṭṭhaṃ nāma natthī’’ti ettakameva vuttaṃ, taṃ pana nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tena sobhanaṃ akusalakammajampi ekaccānaṃ sattānaṃ iṭṭhanti anuññātaṃ siyā. Kusalakammajaṃ pana sabbesaṃ iṭṭhamevāti vadanti. Tiracchānagatānaṃ kesañci manussarūpaṃ amanāpaṃ, yato te disvāva palāyanti. Manussā ca devatānaṃ rūpaṃ disvā bhāyanti, tesampi vipākaviññāṇaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ ārabbha kusalavipākameva uppajjati, tādisassa pana puññassa abhāvā na tesaṃ tattha abhirati hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kusalakammajassa pana aniṭṭhassa abhāvo viya akusalakammajassa sobhanassa iṭṭhassa abhāvo vattabbo. Hatthiādīnampi hi akusalakammajaṃ manussānaṃ akusalavipākasseva ārammaṇaṃ, kusalakammajaṃ pana pavatte samuṭṭhitaṃ kusalavipākassa, iṭṭhārammaṇena vomissakattā appakaṃ akusalakammajaṃ bahulaṃ akusalavipākuppattiyā kāraṇaṃ na bhavissatīti sakkā vattuṃ. Idāni tameva vipākavasena iṭṭhāniṭṭhārammaṇavavatthānaṃ vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘kiñcāpi hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tayidaṃ sammutimanāpasaṃvibhāgatthaṃ vuttaṃ, idha pana na tathā vibhattanti āha ^b^‘‘bhagavā panā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]So upāsako candanaṅgalagāme jātattā ^b^‘‘candanaṅgaliko’’^eb^ti paññāyati, ‘‘candanavilāso’’ti keci. Tassa upāsakassa paṭibhānaṃ udapādīti yojanā. Te rājāno hatappabhe hatasobhe disvāti sambandho. ^b^Udakābhisitte^eb^ti udakena abhisiñcite. ^b^Aṅgāre viyā^eb^ti aṅgārakkhaṇe viya.
[03]^b^Kālassevā^eb^ti pageva. ^b^Avigatagandhaṃ^eb^ taṅkhaṇavikasitatāya. ^b^Īdisaṃ vacana^eb^nti ‘‘acchādesī’’ti evarūpaṃ vacananti.
[06]Pañcarājasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^124^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Doṇapākakura’’nti ^a^M1.0185^ea^ ettha vibhattilopaṃ katvā niddesoti āha ^b^‘‘doṇapākaṃ kura’’^eb^nti. ^b^Doṇassā^eb^ti catunnaṃ āḷhakānaṃ, soḷasanāḷīnanti attho. ^b^Tadupiya^eb^nti tadanurūpaṃ, tassa ^a^V1.0162^ea^ vuttaparimāṇassa anucchavikanti attho. ^b^Pubbe^eb^ti taṃdivasato purimataradivasesu. ^b^Balavā^eb^ti mahā. ^b^Bhattapariḷāho^eb^ti bhattasammadahetuko. ^b^Assa^eb^ rañño ^b^ubhosu passesu^eb^ gahitatālavaṇṭā ^b^bījanti yamakatālavaṇṭehi^eb^. ^b^Phāsuvihāra^eb^nti bhojane mattaññutāya laddhabbasukhavihāraṃ. Bhojanamattaññū hi sukhavihāro hoti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tanukassa bhavanti vedanā, saṇikaṃ jīrati āyu pālaya’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^Tanukassā^eb^ti tanukā assa puggalassa, bhuttapaccayā visabhāgavedanā na hontīti attho. ^b^Saṇika^eb^nti mandaṃ mudukaṃ, aparissayamevāti attho. ^b^Jīratī^eb^ti paribhuttāhāro paccati. ^b^Āyupālaya^eb^nti nirodho avedano jīvitaṃ rakkhanto. Atha vā ^b^saṇikaṃ jīratī^eb^ti so bhojane mattaññū puggalo parimitāhāratāya saṇikaṃ cirena jīrati jaraṃ pāpuṇāti jīvitaṃ pālento.

[03]^b^Pariyāpuṇitvā^eb^ti ettha yathā sabbaṃ so pariyāpuṇi, tato parañca yathā paṭipajji, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘raññā saddhi’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Tāvatake taṇḍule hāreyyāsi^eb^ tadupiyañca byañjananti ānetvā sambandho.

[03]^b^Purisabhāgo esā^eb^ti majjhimena purisena bhuñjitabbabhāgo eso, yadidaṃ nāḷikodanamattaṃ. ^b^Sallikhitasarīratā^eb^ti bhamaṃ āropetvā ullikhitassa viya sabbapariḷāhavūpasamassa puthulatāpagatasarīrassa. ^b^Sīlaṃ samparāyikattho^eb^ti vuttaṃ, kuto panettha sīlanti āha ^b^‘‘bhojane’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Sīlaṅgaṃ nāma hotī^eb^ti catupārisuddhisīlassa avayavo eko bhāgo hoti.
[06]Doṇapākasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^125^eb^^b^.^eb^ Vedena ^a^M1.0186^ea^ ñāṇena īhati iriyatīti ^b^vedehī,^eb^ kosalarājabhaginī ajātasattuno mātā, sā kira sampajaññajātikā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘paṇḍitādhivacana’’^eb^nti, cattāri aṅgāni etissanti ^b^caturaṅginī^eb^. ^b^Dvinnaṃ rajjāna^eb^nti kāsikarajjamagadharajjānaṃ antare, so pana gāmo kāsikarajjo.

[03]^b^Pāpā^eb^ti lāmakā nihīnācārā. Mejjati siniyhatīti metti, sā etesu atthīti ^b^mittā^eb^. Saha ayanti pavattantīti ^b^sahāyā^eb^. ^b^Sampavaṅka^eb^nti suṭṭhu onataṃ. ^b^Jayakāraṇaṃ disvā āha,^eb^ tathā ^a^V1.0163^ea^ hi ‘‘ajja imaṃ rattiṃ dukkhaṃ setī’’ti kālaparicchedavasena vuttaṃ. Verighāto nāma veripuggale satīti āha ^b^‘‘veripuggalaṃ labhatī’’^eb^ti.
[06]Paṭhamasaṅgāmasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^126^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Suṇāthā^eb^ti ‘‘vatvā’’ti vacanaseso. ^b^Upakappatī^eb^ti sambhavati. ^b^Sayhaṃ hotī^eb^ti kātuṃ sakkā hoti. ‘‘Yadā caññe’’ti ca-kāro nipātamattanti āha ^b^‘‘yadā aññe’’^eb^ti. ^b^Vilumpantī^eb^ti vināsaṃ acchindanaṃ karonti. ^b^Vilumpīyatī^eb^ti viluttaparasantakassa asakattā puggalo diṭṭhadhammikaṃ kammaphalaṃ paṭisaṃvedento viya sayampi parena vilumpīyati, dhanajāniṃ pāpuṇāti. ^b^‘‘Kāraṇa’’nti hi maññatī^eb^ti pāpakiriyaṃ attano hitāvahaṃ kāraṇaṃ katvā maññati. ^b^Jayanto puggalo^eb^ ‘‘idaṃ nāma jināmī’’ti maññamāno sayampi tato parājayaṃ pāpuṇāti. ^b^Ghaṭṭetāra^eb^nti pāpakammavipākaṃ. ^b^Kammavivaṭṭenā^eb^ti kammassa vivaṭṭanena, paccayalābhena laddhāvasarena vivaṭṭetvā vigamitena kammenāti attho.
[06]Dutiyasaṅgāmasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^127^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ekaccā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0187^ea^ paṇḍitā sapaññā. ^b^Seyyā^eb^ti varā. Gāthāsukhatthaṃ sasurasaddalopaṃ katvā ‘‘sassudevā’’ti vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘sassusasuradevatā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Disājeṭṭhakā^eb^ti catūsupi disāsu jeṭṭhakasīsena hi lokaṃ vadati. ^b^Tādisāyā^eb^ti tathārūpāya medhāvitādiguṇavuttiyā. ^b^Subhariyāyā^eb^ti sukhettabhūtāya sundaritthiyāti attho.
[06]Mallikāsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^128^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Samadhiggayhā^eb^ti sammā ativiya gahetvā, ñāyena visesato gaṇhitvā. ^b^Kārāpakāppamādo^eb^ti tiṇṇaṃ puññakiriyavatthūnaṃ pavattakāppamādo. ^b^Samavadhāna^eb^nti samavarodhaṃ antogadhaṃ. ^b^Upakkhepa^eb^nti bahi ahutvā pakkhipitabbataṃ. ^b^Sesapadajātāni viya ava…pe… dhammā^eb^ sappadesattā. ^b^Appamāde samodhānaṃ gacchanti^eb^ tassa nippadesattā. ^b^Aggaṃ seṭṭhaṃ^eb^ mahantaṃ ^b^sesadhammānaṃ^eb^^a^V1.0164^ea^^b^appamādo. Paṭilābhakaṭṭhenā^eb^ti adhigamahetutāya. ^b^Lokiyopi samāno^eb^ti kāmāvacaropi samāno. Mahaggatānuttarānaṃ pubbabhāge pavattāppamādo hi idhādhippeto.

[03]Pasaṃsanti paṇḍitāti yojanā. Appamādassa pāsaṃsabhāve ekantato kattabbatāya pana ^b^‘‘etānī’’^eb^tiādinā kāraṇaṃ āha. Imissā yojanāya ‘‘puññakiriyāsū’’ti padassa ‘‘appamatto’’ti iminā sambandho. Yasmā paṇḍitā appamādaṃ pasaṃsanti, yasmā ca puññakiriyāsu appamatto ubho atthe adhiggaṇhāti, tasmā āyuādīni patthayantena appamādova kātabboti. Dutiyayojanāya pana paṇḍitā appamādaṃ pasaṃsanti. Kattha? Puññakiriyāsu. Kasmāti ce? Appamattotiādi. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yasmā…pe… attho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Atthapaṭilābhā^eb^ti diṭṭhadhammikādihitapaṭilābhā.
[06]Appamādasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^129^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sīlādiguṇasamannāgato ^a^M1.0188^ea^ kalyāṇo bhaddako mitto etassāti kalyāṇamitto, tassa dhammo ^b^kalyāṇamittasseva svākhāto nāma hoti^eb^ sutvā kattabbakiccassa sādhanato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘atthaṃ pūretī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Itarassā^eb^ti pāpamittassa. ^b^Tenā^eb^ti atthapūraṇena. ^b^Eta^eb^nti ‘‘so ca kho kalyāṇamittassā’’ti etaṃ vacanaṃ. ^b^Desanādhammo^eb^ti pariyattidhammo. So hi kalyāṇamittato paccakkhato laddhabbo, itare tadupanissayā paccattapurisakārehi, tena laddhabbo kalyāṇamittoti evamattho gahetabbo. Sāvakabodhisattavasena hesā desanā āgatā. Na hi sesabodhisattānaṃ paropadesena payojanaṃ atthi.

[03]^b^Upaḍḍhaṃ kalyāṇamittato^eb^ti brahmacariyaṃ carantassa upaḍḍhaguṇo kalyāṇamittato laddhabbo. ^b^Upaḍḍhaṃ paccattapurisakārato^eb^ti itaraṃ upaḍḍhaṃ ñāṇaṃ paṭipajjantassa attano purisakārato. Lokepi pākaṭoyamattho ‘‘ācariyato upaḍḍhaṃ, paccattapurisakārato upaḍḍhaṃ laddhabbā tevijjatā’’ti, tasmā thero tathā cintesi. ^b^Nippadesa^eb^nti anavasesato. ^b^Tato^eb^ti kalyāṇamittato. ^b^Upaḍḍhaṃ āgacchatī^eb^ti upaḍḍhaguṇo paṭipajjantaṃ upagacchati. ^b^Bahūhi^eb^ purisehi. ^b^Vinibbhogo^eb^ vivecanaṃ ^b^natthi^eb^ ekajjhaṃ atthassa vivecetuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā. ^b^Esā^eb^ti paratoghosapaccattapurisakārato ca sijjhamāno attho. ^b^Ettaka^eb^nti ettako bhāgo. Yadi na sakkā laddhuṃ, atha kasmā upaḍḍhanti vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘kalyāṇamittatāyā’’^eb^tiādi. Sammādiṭṭhiādīsu ^b^na sakkā laddhuṃ^eb^. Asakkuṇeyye ^a^V1.0165^ea^ sakalampi na sambhavati paratoghosamattena tesaṃ asijjhanato, padhānahetubhāvadīpanatthaṃ pana ^b^‘‘sakalamevā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Pubbabhāgapaṭilābhaṅga^eb^nti pubbabhāge paṭiladdhabbakāraṇaṃ kalyāṇamittassa upadesena vinā tena uttari visesato aladdhabbato. ^b^Atthato^eb^ti paramatthato. ^b^‘‘Kalyāṇamittaṃ…pe… cattāro khandhā’’^eb^ti vatvā sutvāti attho. Te pana sīlādayo saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannāti āha ^b^‘‘saṅkhārakkhandhotipi vadantiyevā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Māheva^eb^nti mā aha evanti chedo, ^b^ahā^eb^ti nipātamattaṃ, māti paṭisedhe nipāto. Tenāha ^b^‘‘mā evaṃ abhaṇī’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Māhevaṃ ānandā’’ti ^a^M1.0189^ea^ vadato bhagavato imasmiṃ ṭhāne tādisassa nāma te, ānanda, kalyāṇamittaguṇe sevato vattuṃ yuttaṃ ayāthāvatoti dhammabhaṇḍāgārikassa yathābhūtaguṇakittanamukhena paṭikkhepo yuttoti dassento ^b^‘‘bahussuto’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Ida^eb^nti idaṃ vacanaṃ bhagavā āhāti sambandho. ^b^Sakalameva hī^eb^ti ettha ^b^hi^eb^-saddo hetuattho. Tena ‘‘māheva’’nti tassa paṭikkhepassa kāraṇaṃ jotitaṃ, na sarūpato vuttaṃ. ‘‘Kalyāṇamittasseta’’ntiādinā pana taṃ sarūpato dassitanti āha ^b^‘‘idāni…pe… ādimāhā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pāṭikaṅkhitabba^eb^nti icchanaṭṭhena pāṭikaṅkhitabbaṃ, na paṭikaṅkhānimittenāti āha ^b^‘‘avassaṃbhāvīti attho’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Idhā^eb^ti antogadhāvadhāraṇapadaṃ, idhevāti attho. Imasmiṃyeva hi sāsane ariyamaggabhāvanā, na aññattha. ^b^Ādipadānaṃyevā^eb^ti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ vākye ādito eva vuttasammādiṭṭhiādipadānaṃyeva. ^b^Sammādassanalakkhaṇā^eb^ti catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ pariññābhisamayādivasena sammadeva dassanasabhāvā. ^b^Sammāabhiropanalakkhaṇo^eb^ti nibbānasaṅkhāte ārammaṇe sampayuttadhamme sammadeva āropanasabhāvo. ^b^Sammāpariggahaṇalakkhaṇā^eb^ti musāvādādīnaṃ visaṃvādanādikiccatāya lūkhānaṃ apariggāhakānaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvato pariggāhakasabhāvā sammāvācā siniddhabhāvena sampayuttadhamme sammāvācāpaccayaṃ subhāsitasotārañca puggalaṃ pariggaṇhātīti ^b^sammāpariggahaṇalakkhaṇā^eb^. Yathā kāyikakiriyā kiñci kattabbaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti, sayañca samuṭṭhahanaṃ ghaṭanaṃ hoti, tathā ^b^sammākammanta^eb^ saṅkhātā viratipīti ^b^samuṭṭhāpanalakkhaṇā^eb^ daṭṭhabbā, sampayuttadhammānaṃ vā ukkhipanaṃ ^b^samuṭṭhāpanaṃ^eb^ kāyikakiriyāya bhārukkhipanaṃ viya. Jīvamānassa sattassa, sampayuttadhammānaṃ vā, jīvitappavattiyā ājīvasseva vā suddhi vodānaṃ. Yathā uppannuppannānaṃ vajjānaṃ dhammena pahānānuppādātthalābhādiparivuḍḍhi hoti, evaṃ sampayuttānaṃ paggahaṇasabhāvoti ^b^sammāpaggahalakkhaṇo sammāvāyāmo^eb^. Kāyavedanācittadhammesu subhasukhaniccāttagāhānañca vidhamanavasena sammāpatiṭṭhānasabhāvāti ^b^sammāupaṭṭhānalakkhaṇā sammāsati^eb^. Sampayuttadhammānaṃ sammā samādahanaṃ ^a^V1.0166^ea^ ekaggatākaraṇaṃ sabhāvo etassāti ^b^sammāsamādhānalakkhaṇo sammāsamādhi. Tīṇi kiccāni honti^eb^ paṭipakkhadhammesu ^a^M1.0190^ea^, ārammaṇadhammesu, sampayuttadhammesu ca ekasmiṃyeva khaṇe pavattivisesabhūtāni. Idāni tāni sarūpato dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘seyyathida’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Saddhi^eb^nti iminā ‘‘aññehī’’ti vuttakilesā micchādiṭṭhiyā saha ekaṭṭhā vā anekaṭṭhā vāti dasseti. ^b^Pajahati^eb^ pahāya naṃ paṭivijjhati. ^b^Nirodha^eb^nti nibbānaṃ ^b^ārammaṇaṃ karoti^eb^ sacchikiriyāpaṭivedhena paṭivijjhati.

[03]Na kevalaṃ maggadhammā vuttanayeneva, atha kho aparenapi nayena veditabbāti dassento ^b^‘‘apicā’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Nānākhaṇā^eb^ punappunaṃ uppajjanato. ^b^Nānārammaṇā^eb^ aniccānupassanādibhāvato. ^b^Ekakkhaṇā^eb^ sakideva uppajjanato. ^b^Ekārammaṇā^eb^ nibbānavisayattā. ^b^Cattāri nāmāni labhati^eb^ pariññābhisamayādivasena pavattiyā. ^b^Tīṇi nāmāni labhati^eb^ kāmasaṅkappādīnaṃ pahānavasena pavattiyā. Paṭipakkhapahānavasena hissa nāmattayalābho. Esa nayo sesesupi. ^b^Viratiyopi honti cetanāyopi^eb^ pubbabhāgepi vikkhambhanavasena pavattanato. ^b^Maggakkhaṇe pana viratiyova^eb^ paṭipakkhasamucchindanassa maggakiccattā. Na hi cetanā maggasabhāvā. ^b^Sammappadhānasatipaṭṭhānavasenā^eb^ti catubbidhasammappadhānacatubbidhasatipaṭṭhānavasena ^b^cattāri nāmāni labhati^eb^ anuppannākusalānuppādanādīnaṃ kusalānañca vaḍḍhanato. ^b^Pubbabhāgepi maggakkhaṇepī^eb^ti yathā pubbabhāge paṭhamajjhānādivasena nānā. Evaṃ maggakkhaṇepi. Na hi ekopi ca maggasamādhi paṭhamajjhānasamādhiādināmāni labhati sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ viya kiccavasena bhedābhāvato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘maggakkhaṇepi sammāsamādhiyevā’’^eb^ti.

[03]Ñatvā ñātabbāti sambandho. Vuddhi nāma vepullaṃ bhiyyobhāvo punappunaṃ uppādo evāti āha ^b^‘‘punappunaṃ janetī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Abhinibbattetī^eb^ti abhivaḍḍhaṃ pāpento nibbatteti. ^b^Vivittatā^eb^ti vivittabhāvo. So hi vivecanīyato viviccati, yaṃ viviccitvā ṭhitaṃ, tadubhayampi idha vivittabhāvasāmaññena ‘‘vivittatā’’ti vuttaṃ. Tesu purimo vivecanīyato viviccamānatāya viviccanakiriyāya samaṅgī dhammasamūho tāya eva viviccanakiriyāya vasena vivekoti gahito. Itaro sabbaso tato vivittasabhāvatāya. Tattha yasmiṃ dhammapuñje sammādiṭṭhi pavattati, taṃ yathāvuttāya viviccamānatāya vivekasaṅkhātaṃ nissāyeva pavattati, itaraṃ pana taṃninnatātaṃārammaṇatāhīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘vivekaṃ nissitaṃ, viveke vā nissita’’^eb^nti.

[03]Yathā ^a^M1.0191^ea^ vā vivekavasena pavattaṃ jhānaṃ ‘‘vivekaja’’nti vuttaṃ, evaṃ vivekavasena pavattā sammādiṭṭhi ^a^V1.0167^ea^ ‘‘vivekanissitā’’ti daṭṭhabbā. Nissayo ca vipassanāmaggānaṃ vasena maggaphalānaṃ veditabbo. Asatipi tāsaṃ pubbāparabhāve ‘‘paṭiccasamuppādo’’ti ettha paccayānaṃ samuppādanaṃ viya abhinnadhammādhārā nissayabhāvanā sambhavanti. Tassa tadaṅga-samucchedanissaraṇavivekanissitataṃ vatvā paṭippassaddhivivekanissitatāya avacanaṃ ariyamaggabhāvanāya vuccamānattā. Bhāvitamaggassa hi ye sacchikātabbā dhammā. Tesaṃ kiccaṃ paṭippassaddhiviveko. ^b^Ajjhāsayato^eb^ti ‘‘nibbānaṃ sacchikarissāmī’’ti mahantājjhāsayato. Yadipi hi vipassanākkhaṇe saṅkhārārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ, saṅkhāresu pana ādīnavaṃ suṭṭhu, disvā tappaṭipakkhe nibbāne ninnatāya ajjhāsayato nissaraṇavivekanissito hoti, uṇhābhibhūtassa puggalassa sītaninnacittatā viya. Keci pana ‘‘yathā sabhāvato, yathā ajjhāsayato nissaraṇavivekanissitatā, evaṃ paṭippassaddhivivekanissitatāpi siyā’’ti vadanti. Yadaggena hi nibbānaninnatā siyā, tadaggena phalaninnatāpi siyā ‘‘kudāssu nāmāhaṃ tadāyatanaṃ upasampajja vihareyya’’nti ajjhāsayasampattiyā bhāvato. Yasmā pahānavinayo viya rāganirodhopi idhādhippetavivekena atthato nibbisiṭṭho, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^esa nayo virāganissitādīsū^eb^ti. Tenāha ‘‘vivekatthā eva hi virāgādayo’’ti.

[03]Vossaggasaddo pariccāgattho pakkhandanattho cāti vossaggassa duvidhatā vuttā. Vossajjanañhi pahānaṃ, vissaṭṭhabhāvena nirāsaṅkapavatti ca, tasmā vipassanākkhaṇe tadaṅgavasena, maggakkhaṇe samucchedavasena paṭipakkhassa pahānaṃ vossaggo, tathā vipassanākkhaṇe taṃninnabhāvena, maggakkhaṇe ārammaṇakaraṇena vissaṭṭhasabhāvatā vossaggoti veditabbaṃ. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘tattha pariccāgavossaggo’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Ayaṃ sammādiṭṭhī^eb^ti ayaṃ missakavasena vuttā sammādiṭṭhi. ^b^Yathāvuttena pakārenā^eb^ti tadaṅgappahānasamucchedappahānapakārena taṃninnatadārammaṇakaraṇappakārena ca.

[03]Pubbe vossaggavacanasseva atthassa vuttattā āha ^b^‘‘sakalena vacanenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pariṇamantaṃ^eb^ vipassanākkhaṇe, ^b^pariṇataṃ^eb^ maggakkhaṇe. Pariṇāmo nāma idha paripākoti āha ^b^‘‘paripaccantaṃ paripakkañcā’’^eb^ti. Paripāko ca āsevanalābhena laddhasāmatthiyassa kilese pariccajituṃ ^a^M1.0192^ea^ nibbānaṃ pakkhandituṃ tikkhavisadabhāvo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘aya’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Esa nayo^eb^ti yvāyaṃ nayo ‘‘vivekanissita’’ntiādinā sammādiṭṭhiyaṃ vutto, sesesu sammāsaṅkappādīsupi eseva nayo, evaṃ tattha netabbanti attho. ^b^Paṭiccāti^eb^ nissāya. ^b^Jātisabhāvā^eb^ti jāyanasabhāvā. ^b^Sakalo^eb^ti anavaseso, sabboti attho. Na koci maggo sāvaseso hutvā sambhavati. Heṭṭhime magge uppanne ^a^V1.0168^ea^ uparimo uppanno eva nāma anantarāyena uppajjanato. ^b^Vavassaggatthe^eb^ti vacasāyatthe. ^b^Vaṇṇayantī^eb^ti guṇavaṇṇanavasena vitthārenti.
[06]Kalyāṇamittasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^130^eb^^b^.^eb^ Diva-saddo divā-saddo viya divasapariyāyo, tasmā visesanabhāvena vuccamāno divasaddo atthavisesaṃ dīpetīti āha ^b^‘‘divasassa divā’’^eb^tiādi. Saṃ vuccati dhanaṃ, tassa patīti sampati, dhanasāmiko, tassa hitāvahattā ^b^sāpateyya^eb^nti āha ^b^‘‘sāpateyyanti dhana’’^eb^nti. Tassa gehe katākatabhaṇḍassa atibahubhāvato vimhayappatto rājā ^b^‘‘ko pana vādo’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Kāḷalohaṃ^eb^ nāma ayophalaṃ. Kacchapādirūpehipi sovaṇṇādīni ṭhapenti. ^b^Sakuṇḍakabhatta^eb^nti sakuṇḍehi vā sathusehi vā pakkabhattaṃ. Bilaṅgaṃ vuccati dhaññabilaṅgaṃ, āranālantipi vuccati, taṃ dutiyaṃ assāti ^b^bilaṅgadutiyaṃ^eb^. Tañhi kañjito nibbattattā ^b^kañjikaṃ^eb^ nāma. Tīhi pakkhehi vatthakhaṇḍehi katanivāsanaṃ ^b^tipakkhavasanaṃ^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tīṇi…pe… nivāsana’’^eb^nti.

[03]Asanto nīco purisoti ^b^asappuriso^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘lāmakapuriso’’^eb^ti. Kammassa nibbattabhāvena otaraṇatāya phalaṃ aggaṃ nāma, uparibhūmigatattā uddhaṃ aggaṃ assāti ^b^uddhaggikaṃ. Dakkhiṇa^eb^nti dānamāha. Saggo nāma kāmabhavūpapattibhavo, tassa nibbattanato ^b^‘‘saggassa hitā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Tatrupapattijananato^eb^ti tatra upapattiyā jananato, uppādanatoti attho.

[03]Setaṃ ^a^M1.0193^ea^ udakaṃ etissāti ^b^setodakā^eb^. So yena bhāvena yattha pākaṭataro hutvā dissati, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘vīcīnaṃ bhinnaṭṭhāne’’^eb^ti āha. Sukhotaraṇaṭṭhānatāya kaddamādidosavirahato ca ^b^sundaratitthā. Taṃ apeyyamāna^eb^nti taṃ udakaṃ kenaci aparibhuñjiyamānaṃ. ^b^Attanā kattabbakiccakaro^eb^ti attanā kātabbakammasaṅkhātakiccakaro, paribhogavasena ceva saṅgahetabbasaṅgaṇhanavasena ca niyojakoti attho. ^b^Kusalakiccakaro^eb^ti attanā kātabbapuññakaro.
[06]Paṭhamāputtakasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^131^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Piṇḍapātenā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0169^ea^ sahayoge karaṇavacanaṃ. Paṭipādanaṃ tena saha yojananti āha ^b^‘‘piṇḍapātena saddhiṃ saṃyojesi, piṇḍapātaṃ adāsīti attho’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Paṇītabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā’’ti vuttaṃ, pāḷiyaṃ pana ‘‘kaṇājakaṃ bhuñjati bilaṅgadutiya’’nti. Taṃ taṃ pavattitaṃ yebhuyyavasena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Idāni ‘‘imassa seṭṭhissa kassaci samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā dethā’’ti vacanaṃ na sutapubbaṃ, yasmā paccekabuddhā nāma attano guṇānubhāvehi loke pākaṭā sañjātā eva honti, tasmā seṭṭhibhariyāya ‘‘na yassa vā tassa vā’’tiādi cintitaṃ. Tathā hi tesaṃ dentāpi sakkaccaṃ yebhuyyena paṇītameva denti. ^b^Nāsāpuṭaṃ pahari^eb^ attano ānubhāvena. ^b^So^eb^ luddhatāya ‘‘bahu vata dhaññaṃ mamassā’’ti ^b^cittaṃ saṃyametuṃ^eb^ sandhāretuṃ ^b^asakkonto^eb^.

[03]Vippaṭisāruppannākāraṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘varameta’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. ‘‘Imassa samaṇassa piṇḍapātaṃ dehī’’ti vadato na ekāya eva javanavīthiyā vasena atthasiddhi. Atha kho tattha ādito pavattajavanavāropi atthi majjhe pavattajavanavāropi, taṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘pubbapacchimacetanāvasenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ekā cetanā dve paṭisandhiyo na detī^eb^ti ettha sāketapañhavasena nicchayo veditabbo. Cuddasannaṃ cetanānaṃ pubbe puretaraṃ katattā ^b^purāṇaṃ^eb^.

[03]Parigayhatīti ^a^M1.0194^ea^^b^pariggaho^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘pariggahitaṃ vatthu’’^eb^nti. Anvāya upanissāya jīvantīti ^b^anujīvino. Sabbameta^eb^nti dhanadhaññādisabbaṃ etaṃ yathāvuttapariggahavatthuṃ. ^b^Nikkhippagāmina^eb^nti nikkhipitabbatāgāminaṃ. Nikkhipitabbasabhāvaṃ hotīti āha ^b^‘‘nikkhippasabhāva’’^eb^nti. Pahāya gamanīyanti ayamettha atthoti āha ^b^‘‘pariccajitabbasabhāvamevā’’^eb^ti.
[06]Dutiyāputtakasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Dutiyavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^132^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Nīce ^a^V1.0170^ea^ kule paccājāto’’tiādi appakāsanabhāvena tamatīti ^b^tamo,^eb^ tena tamena yuttoti ^b^tamo^eb^ puggalo vuccati, taṃyogato puggalassa tabbohāro yathā ‘‘maccherayogato macchero’’ti. Tasmā ^b^tamo^eb^ti appakāsanabhāvena tamo tamabhūto andhakāro viya jāto, andhakārattaṃ vā pattoti attho. Vuttalakkhaṇaṃ tamameva paramparato ayanaṃ gati niṭṭhā etassāti ^b^tamaparāyaṇo,^eb^ tamaparāyaṇataṃ vā pattoti attho. Ñāyenapi tamaggahaṇena khandhatamova kathito, na andhakāratamo. Khandhatamoti ca sampattirahitā khandhapavattiyeva daṭṭhabbā. ‘‘Ucce kule paccājāto’’tiādi pakāsanabhāvena jotetīti ^b^joti,^eb^ tena jotinā yuttotiādi sabbaṃ tame vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. ^b^Itare dve^eb^ti jotitamaparāyaṇo jotijotiparāyaṇoti itare dve puggale.

[03]Veṇuvettādikehi peḷādikārakā ^b^vilīvakārakā^eb^. Migamacchādīnaṃ nisādanato ^b^nesādā,^eb^ māgavikamacchabandhādayo. Rathesu cammena hananakaraṇato ^b^rathakārā^eb^ cammakārā vuttā. ‘‘Pu’’ iti karīsassa nāmaṃ, taṃ kusenti apanentīti ^b^pukkusā,^eb^ pupphachaḍḍakā. ^b^Dubbaṇṇo^eb^ti virūpo. ^b^Okoṭimako^eb^ti ^a^M1.0195^ea^ ārohābhāvena heṭṭhimakoṭiko, rassakāyoti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘lakuṇḍako’’^eb^ti. Laku viya ghaṭikā viya ḍeti pavattatīti hi ^b^lakuṇḍako,^eb^ rasso. Kaṇati nimīlatīti ^b^kāṇo^eb^. Taṃ panassa nimīlanaṃ ekena akkhinā dvīhipi vāti āha ^b^‘‘ekakkhikāṇo vā ubhayakkhikāṇo vā’’^eb^ti. Kuṇanaṃ kuṇo, hatthavekallaṃ, so etassa atthīti ^b^kuṇī. Khañjo^eb^ vuccati pādavikalo. Heṭṭhimakāyasaṅkhāto sarīrassa pakkho padeso hato assāti ^b^pakkhahato^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘pīṭhasampī’’^eb^ti. Padīpe padīpane etabbaṃ netabbanti ^b^padīpeyyaṃ,^eb^ telakapallādiupakaraṇaṃ. ^b^Vutta^eb^nti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Āgamanavipattī^eb^ti āgamanaṭṭhānavasena vipatti āgamo etthāti katvā. ^b^Pubbuppannapaccayavipattī^eb^ti paṭhamuppannapaccayavasena vipatti. Caṇḍālādisabhāvā hissa mātāpitaro paṭhamuppannapaccayā, paṭhamuppattiyā vā paccayā, tehevassa vipatti eva, na sampatti. ^b^Pavattapaccayavipattī^eb^ti pavatte sukhapaccayavipatti. Tādise nihīnakule uppannopi koci vibhavasampanno ^a^V1.0171^ea^ siyā, ayaṃ pana duggato durūpo hoti. ^b^Ājīvupāyavipattī^eb^ti ājīvanupāyavasena vipatti. Sukhena hi jīvikaṃ pavattetuṃ upāyabhūtā hatthisippādayo imassa natthi, pupphachaḍḍakasilākoṭṭanādikammaṃ pana katvā jīvikaṃ pavatteti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kasiravuttike’’^eb^ti. ^b^Attabhāvavipattī^eb^ti upadhivipatti. ^b^Dukkhakāraṇasamāyogo^eb^ti kāyikacetasikadukkhuppattiyā paccayasamodhānaṃ. ^b^Sukhakāraṇavipattī^eb^ti sukhapaccayaparihāni. ^b^Upabhogavipattī^eb^ti upabhogasukhassa vināso anupaladdhi. Joti ceva jotiparāyaṇabhāvo ca ^b^sukkapakkho^eb^.

[03]^b^Dasahi akkosavatthūhī^eb^ti lakkhaṇavacanaṃ etaṃ yathā ‘‘yadi me byādhitā honti, dātabbamidamosadha’’nti, tasmā dasahi akkosavatthūhi, tattha vā yena kenaci paribhāsatīti attho. ^b^Ekaggacitto^eb^ti dānaṃ dātuṃ apekkhitatāya samāhitacitto.
[06]Puggalasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^133^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Jarājiṇṇā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0196^ea^ jarāya jiṇṇā. Tena pākaṭajarāya matthakappattimāha. ^b^Vayovuḍḍhā^eb^ti vayasā vuḍḍhā. Tena pacchimavayassa osakkasampavattiṃ vadati. ^b^Jātimahallikā^eb^ti jātimahattagatā. ^b^Cirakālaṃ atikkantā^eb^ti dve tayo rājaparivaṭṭe vītivattā. Vayo-saddo sādhāraṇavacanopi jiṇṇasaddasannidhānato osānavayaṃ eva vadatīti āha ^b^‘‘pacchimavayaṃ sampattā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ayyikā^eb^ti mātāmahiṃ sandhāya vadati. Hatthī eva ratanabhūto ^b^hatthiratana^eb^nti āha ‘‘satasahassagghanakenā’’tiādi. ^b^Sabbāni tānī^eb^ti kumbhakārabhājanāni, tehi saddhiṃ sattasantānassa pamāṇaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘tesu hī’’^eb^tiādimāha, taṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Ayyikāsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^135^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Aṭṭhuppattiko^eb^ti ettha kā assa aṭṭhuppatti? Titthiyānaṃ bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca alābhāya ayasāya parisakkanaṃ. Taṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘bhagavato kirā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Yathā taṃ sabbadisāsu yamakamahāmegho uṭṭhahitvā mahāoghaṃ viya sabbā pāramiyo ‘‘imasmiṃyeva attabhāve vipākaṃ dassāmā’’ti sampiṇḍitā viya lābhasakkāramahoghaṃ nibbattayiṃsu. Tato tato annapānayānavatthamālāgandhavilepanādihatthā khattiyabrāhmaṇādayo āgantvā – ‘‘kahaṃ bhagavā, kahaṃ ^a^V1.0172^ea^ devadevo narāsabho lokanātho’’ti bhagavantaṃ pariyesanti, sakaṭasatehipi paccaye āharitvā okāsaṃ alabhamānā samantā gāvutappamāṇampi sakaṭadhurena sakaṭadhuraṃ āhacca tiṭṭhanti ceva anuvattanti ca andhakavindabrāhmaṇādayo viya. Sabbaṃ ^b^khandhake^eb^ (mahāva. 282) tesu tesu suttesu ca āgatanayena veditabbaṃ. Yathā ca bhagavato, evaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassapi. Vuttampi – ‘‘tena kho pana samayena bhagavā sakkato hoti garukato mānito pūjito apacito lābhī cīvara…pe… parikkhārānaṃ, bhikkhusaṅghopi kho’’tiādi (udā. 38), tathā ‘‘yāvatā kho, cunda, etarahi ^a^M1.0197^ea^ saṅgho vā gaṇo vā loke uppanno, nāhaṃ, cunda, aññaṃ ekaṃ saṅghampi ekaṃ gaṇampi samanupassāmi evaṃ lābhaggayasaggappattaṃ, yatharivāyaṃ, cunda, bhikkhusaṅgho’’ti (dī. ni. 3.176). ^b^Eva^eb^nti idāni vuccamānākārena. ^b^Nijjhatti^eb^nti saññattiṃ. ^b^Na^eb^nti kathaṃ.

[03]^b^Evaṃ pucchituṃ ayuttaṃ^eb^ titthiyānaṃ kathā mahājanasannipāte niyyātitā hotīti. ^b^Tasmiṃ dātabbaṃ,^eb^ cittappasādamattena dentepi hi puññaṃ pavaḍḍhati. ^b^Ārocitaṃ^eb^ attanoti adhippāyo. ^b^Bhagavā^eb^ti satthu āmantanaṃ. ^b^Cittaṃ nāma^eb^ yathāpaccayaṃ pavattamānaṃ ^b^nigaṇṭhā…pe… pasīdati^eb^ pasannassāti adhippāyo. Pubbe avisesato deyyadhammassa dātabbaṭṭhānaṃ nāma pucchitaṃ, idāni tassa mahapphalabhāvakaro dakkhiṇeyyavisesoti āha ^b^‘‘aññaṃ tayā paṭhamaṃ pucchitaṃ, aññaṃ pacchā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sallakkhehi etaṃ^eb^. Pacchimaṃ purimena saddhiṃ ānehīti adhippāyo. Pucchitassa nāma pañhassa kathanaṃ mayhameva bhāro. ^b^Samupabyūḷho^eb^ti ekato senāya rāsivasena sampiṇḍitoti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘rāsibhūto’’^eb^ti. ^b^Asikkhito^eb^ti sattaṭṭhasaṃvaccharāni dhanusippena sikkhito. Dhanusippaṃ sikkhitvāpi koci katahattho na hoti, ayaṃ pana asikkhito na katahattho, poṅkhānupoṅkhabhāvoyeva byāmamuṭṭhibandho. ^b^Tiṇapuñjamattikāpuñjādīsū^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena ^b^paṃsupuñjavālukapuñjasāraphalakāyoghanādike^eb^ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Akataparicayo^eb^ti tesaṃ santikā vijjhanaṭṭhena akataparicayo. Rājarājamahāmattādike upecca asanaṃ upāsanaṃ, na kataṃ upāsanaṃ etenāti ^b^akatūpāsano^eb^. Asikkhitatādinā bhīrubhāvena vā kāyassa chambhanaṃ saṅkampanaṃ uttāso etassa atthīti chambhīti āha ^b^‘‘pavedhitakāyo’’^eb^ti.

[03]Dakkhiṇeyyatāya adhippetattā ^b^‘‘arahattamaggena kāmacchando pahīno hotī’’^eb^ti āha. Accantappahānassa icchitattā ^b^tatiyeneva kukkuccaṃ pahīnaṃ hoti^eb^ paṭighasampayogaṃ. Asekkhassa ayanti ^b^asekkhaṃ,^eb^ sīlakkhandho. Tayidaṃ na aggaphalaṃ sīlameva adhippetaṃ, atha kho yaṃ kiñci asekkhasantāne pavattaṃ sīlaṃ, lokuttaro eva na adhippeto sikkhāya jātattā, evaṃ vimuttikkhandhopīti ^a^V1.0173^ea^. Sekkhassa esoti vā, apariyositasikkhattā sayameva sikkhatīti vā sekkho, catūsu maggesu ^a^M1.0198^ea^ heṭṭhimesu ca tīsu phalesu sīlakkhandho. Upari sikkhitabbābhāvato ^b^asekkho^eb^. Vuḍḍhippatto sekkhoti ^b^asekkho^eb^. Aggaphalabhūto sīlakkhandho vucceyya, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana vipassakassa sīlassa adhippetattā tathā attho vutto. ^b^Sabbatthā^eb^ti ^b^‘‘asekkhenā’’^eb^tiādīsu. Ettha ca yathā sīlasamādhipaññākkhandhā missakā adhippetā, evaṃ vimuttikkhandhāpīti tadaṅgavimuttiādayopi veditabbā, na paṭippassaddhivimutti eva.

[03]Yena sippena issāso hoti, taṃ ^b^issatta^eb^nti āha ^b^‘‘ususippa’’^eb^nti. Yassā vāyodhātuyā vasena sarīraṃ sañjātathāmaṃ hoti, taṃ balapaccayaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘balaṃ nāma vāyodhātū’’^eb^ti. Samappavattito hi visamappavattinivārakadhātu balaṃ nāma, tena tato aññaṃ balarūpaṃ nāma natthi.

[03]Yasmā arahā eva ekantato sorato, tassa bhāvo ^b^soracca^eb^nti āha ^b^‘‘soraccanti arahatta’’^eb^nti. ^b^Ete dve^eb^ti khanti soraccanti ete dve dhammā. Pānīyaṃ pivanti etthāti ^b^papā,^eb^ yo koci jalāsayo yaṃ kiñci pānīyaṭṭhānanti āha ^b^‘‘caturassapokkharaṇīādīnī’’^eb^ti. Udakavikūlādīsu kamanti atikkamanti etehīti ^b^saṅkamanāni,^eb^ setuādīni. Setukaraṇayuttaṭṭhāne setuṃ, caṅkamanakaraṇayuttaṭṭhāne caṅkamanaṃ, maggakaraṇayuttaṭṭhāne maggaṃ kareyyāti ayamettha adhippāyo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘paṇṇāsā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Bhikkhācāravatta^eb^nti ariyānaṃ hitaṃ vattapaṭipattiṃ. ^b^Dentopī^eb^ti ^b^pi^eb^-saddena akhīṇāsavassa dentopīti imamatthaṃ dasseti yassa kassacipi dentenapi kammaphalaṃ saddahitvā vippasannacitteneva dātabbattā. ^b^Thanaya^eb^nti idaṃ tassa mahāmeghabhāvadassanaṃ, yo hi mahāvassaṃ vassati, so gajjanto vijjummālaṃ vissajjento pavassati. ^b^Abhisaṅkharitvā samodhānetvā^eb^ti khādanīyassa vividhajātiyāni sampiṇḍetvā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘rāsiṃ katvā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Pakiraṇaṃ^eb^ nāma vikiraṇampi hoti anekatthattā dhātūnanti āha ^b^‘‘vikiratī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pakiranto viya vā dānaṃ detī^eb^ti iminā guṇakhettameva apariyesitvā karuṇākhettepi mahādānaṃ pavattetīti dasseti. Tena ‘‘pakiretī’’ti ^a^M1.0199^ea^ vadantena bhagavatā aṭṭhuppattiyaṃ āgatatitthiyavādena appaṭisedhitatāpi dīpitā hoti. ^b^Puññadhārā^eb^ti puññamayadhārā puññābhisandā. ^b^Sinehayantī^eb^ti thūladhārenapi sinehena siniddhaṃ karontī. ^b^Kiledayantī^eb^ti allabhāvaṃ pāpayantī. Yathāyaṃ puññadhārā ^a^V1.0174^ea^ dātāraṃ anto sineheti pūreti abhisandeti, evaṃ paṭiggāhakānampi anto sineheti pūreti abhisandeti. Tenevāha ‘‘dadaṃ piyo hoti bhajanti naṃ bahū’’tiādi (a. ni. 5.34) evaṃ santepi ‘‘dātāraṃ abhivassatī’’ti vuttattā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dāyakavaseneva ^b^‘‘sinehetī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ, yasmā vā paṭiggāhakassa sinehuppatti āmisanissitāti dāyakavaseneva vuttaṃ.
[06]Issattasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^136^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Khattiyā^eb^ti abhisekappattā. Issariyamado ^b^kāmagedho^eb^. Pathavimaṇḍalassa mahantatā taṃnivāsinaṃ anuyantatāti sabbamidaṃ yathicchitassa rājakiccassa sukhena samijjhanassa kāraṇakittanaṃ. Yādise rājakicce ussukkaṃ āpanno, taṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘esa kirā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Antaragamanānī^eb^ti tiṇṇaṃ nirantaragamanānaṃ antarantarā gamanāni. ^b^Corā cintayiṃsū^eb^ti eko antarabhogiko rājāparādhiko pañcasatamanussaparivāro coriyaṃ karonto vicarati, te sandhāya vuttaṃ.

[03]‘‘Ayuttaṃ te kata’’nti sacāhaṃ vakkhāmīti yojanā. ^b^Dhuravihāre^eb^ti rathassa dhuraṃ viya nagarassa dhurabhūte vihāre. ^b^Santhambhitu^eb^nti vissāsabhāvena upaṭṭhātuṃ. ^b^Saddhāyiko^eb^ti saddhāya ayitabbo, saddheyyoti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘saddhātabbo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Paccayiko^eb^ti pattiyāyitabbo. ^b^Abbhasamaṃ^eb^ puthulabhāvena. ^b^Nippothento^eb^ti nimmaddento. ^b^Saṇhakaraṇīyaṃ^eb^ atisaṇhaṃ ^b^pisanto^eb^ nisadapoto viya pisanto.

[03]^b^Dhammacariyā^eb^tiādittampi sīsaṃ celañca ajjhupekkhitvā sammāpaṭipatti eva kātabbā tassā eva paraloke patiṭṭhābhāvato. ^b^Ācikkhāmī^eb^ti kathemi, kathento ca yathā tamatthaṃ sammadeva rājā jānāti, evaṃ jānāpemīti ^a^M1.0200^ea^. ^b^Nipphatti^eb^ yuddhena kātabbātthasiddhi. Visinoti bandhati yathādhippetaṃ cittaṃ etenāti ^b^visayo,^eb^ samatthabhāvo. ^b^Mantasampannā^eb^ti sampannarājamantā. ^b^Mahāamaccā^eb^ti mahosadhādisadisā nītisatthachekā amaccapurisā. ^b^Upalāpetu^eb^nti paresaṃ antare virodhatthaṃ saṅgaṇhituṃ.

[03]^b^Dveyeva pabbatā^eb^ti pabbatasadisā dveyeva gahitā. ^b^Rājovāde^eb^ti rājovādasutte. ^b^Āgatāva^eb^ tattantiyā ^a^V1.0175^ea^ anurūpatthaṃ. ^b^Vilumpamānā^eb^ti ^b^iti^eb^-saddo ādiattho. ^b^Vipattī^eb^ti bhogaparihānādivināso. ^b^Hatthiyuddhādīhi jarāmaraṇaṃ jinituṃ na sakkā^eb^ sattassa avisayabhāvato. Yena pana jinituṃ sakkā, taṃ dassento bhagavā ^b^‘‘buddhe…pe… nivesaye’’^eb^ti āha. Ratanattaye hi saddhā niviṭṭhā mūlajātā patiṭṭhitā ekantato jarāmaraṇavijayāya hoti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tasmā saddha’’^eb^nti.
[06]Pabbatūpamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Tatiyavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Sāratthappakāsiniyā saṃyuttanikāya-aṭṭhakathāya
[06]Kosalasaṃyuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^137^eb^^b^.^eb^ Uruvelāya ^a^V1.0176^ea^^a^M1.0201^ea^ samīpe gāmo uruvelagāmo, taṃ ^b^uruvelagāmaṃ^eb^ abhimukhabhāvena sammadeva sabbadhamme bujjhatīti abhisambodhi, sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ, tena samannāgatattā ca bhagavā ^b^abhisambuddho^eb^ti vuccati. Tassa pañcacattālīsāya vassesu ādito pannarasa vassāni paṭhamabodhi, idha pana sattāhabbhantarameva adhippetanti āha ^b^‘‘abhisambuddho hutvā antosattāhasmiṃ yevā’’^eb^ti. Asukhabhāvena aññehi kātuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā dukkaraṃ karotīti dukkarakāro, so eva itthiliṅgavasena ^b^dukkarakārikā^eb^. Tāya mutto vatamhīti cintesi. Yadi evaṃ kasmā taṃ lokanātho chabbassāni samanuyuñjati? Kammapīḷitavasena. Vuttañhetaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa. thera 1.39.92-94) –
[21]‘‘Avacāhaṃ jotipālo, sugataṃ kassapaṃ tadā;
[22]Kuto nu bodhi muṇḍassa, bodhi paramadullabhā.
[21]‘‘Tena kammavipākena, acariṃ dukkaraṃ bahuṃ;
[22]Chabbassānuruvelāyaṃ, tato bodhimapāpuṇiṃ.
[21]‘‘Nāhaṃ etena maggena, pāpuṇiṃ bodhimuttamaṃ;
[22]Kummaggena gavesissaṃ, pubbakammena vārito’’ti.

[03]^b^Māretī^eb^ti vibādheti. Vipattiādisaṃyojanañhi sādhūnaṃ paramatthato maraṇaṃ saccapaṭivedhamāraṇattā, pāpatarattā pāpatamoti ^b^pāpimā^eb^. Sā cassa pāpatamatā pāpavuttitāyāti āha ^b^‘‘pāpe^eb^^a^V1.0177^ea^^b^niyutto’’^eb^ti. ^b^Adhipatī^eb^ti kāmādhipati. Appahīnakāmarāge attano vase vattetīti ^b^vasavattī^eb^. Tesaṃyeva kusalakammānaṃ antaṃ karotīti ^b^antako^eb^. Vaṭṭadukkhato aparimuttapaccayattā ^b^namuci^eb^. Mattānaṃ pamattānaṃ bandhūti ^b^pamattabandhu^eb^.

[03]^b^Tapokammā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0202^ea^ attakilamathānuyogato. ^b^Aparaddho^eb^ti virajjhasi. ‘‘Aparādho’’tipi atthi, soyeva attho. Kāyakilamathaṃ anuyuñjanto yebhuyyena amaratthāya anuyuñjati, so ca kammavādīhi anuyuñjiyamāno devatthāya siyāti āha ^b^‘‘amarabhāvatthāyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sabbaṃ tapa^eb^nti sabbaṃ attaparitāpanaṃ. ^b^Atthāvahaṃ na bhavati^eb^ bodhiyā anupāyattā. ^b^Kiñcassā^eb^ti kiñci siyāti attho. ^b^Phiyārittaṃva dhammanī^eb^ti dhammaṃ vuccati vaṇṇu, so idha ‘‘dhamma’’nti vutto, dhammani vaṇṇupadeseti attho. Tenāha ‘‘araññe’’ti. Ubhosu passesu phiyāhi ^b^ākaḍḍheyya ceva^eb^ arittehi ^b^uppīḷeyya ca^eb^.

[03]^b^Sammāvācākammantājīvā gahitā^eb^ maggasīlassa adhippetattā. Samādhino hi gahaṇena ^b^sammāvāyāmasatisamādhayo gahitā^eb^ upakārabhāvato. ^b^Paññāyā^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. Bujjhati etenāti ^b^bodho^eb^. Maggoti āha ^b^‘‘bodhāyāti maggatthāyā’’^eb^ti. Kathaṃ pana maggaṃ maggatthāya bhāvetīti āha ^b^‘‘yathā hī’’^eb^tiādi. Tena yathā yāgupacanārambho yāvadeva yāguattho, evaṃ maggabhāvanārambho maggādhigamatthāyāti dasseti. Ārambhoti ca ariyamaggabhāvanāya bandhāpanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Keci pana ‘‘magganti ariyamaggaṃ, bodhāyāti arahattasambodhāya, evañca katvā ‘pattosmi paramasuddhi’nti idampi vacanaṃ samatthita’’nti vadanti, apare pana ‘‘sabbaññutaññāṇasambodhāyāti. So hi sabbasmāpi bodhito uttaritaro’’ti. ^b^Nihato^eb^ nibbisevanabhāvaṃ pāpito. Tenāha ^b^‘‘parājito’’^eb^ti.
[06]Tapokammasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^138^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Andhabhāvakārake^eb^ti pacurajanassa cakkhuviññāṇuppattinivāraṇena andhabhāvakārake. ^b^Mahātame^eb^ti mahati tamasi. ^b^Pāsāṇaphalake mahācīvaraṃ sīse ṭhapetvā^eb^ti etena taṃ phalakaṃ apassāya nisinnoti dasseti ^a^M1.0203^ea^. ^b^Padhāna^eb^nti bhāvanaṃ. ^b^Pariggaṇhamāno^eb^ti sabbaso gaṇhanto avissajjento, bhāvanaṃ anuyuñjanto anupubbasamāpattiyo phalasamāpattiñca manasikarontoti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘nanu cā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Ariṭṭhako^eb^ti ariṭṭhakavaṇṇo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kāḷako’’^eb^ti.
[03]^b^Dīghamaddhāna^eb^nti ^a^V1.0178^ea^ cirataraṃ kālaṃ. ^b^Saṃsara^eb^nti āsādanādhippāyena sañcaranto, alaṃ tuyhaṃ etena nippayojananti adhippāyo. Na hi tena mārassa kāci atthasiddhīti.
[06]Hatthirājavaṇṇasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^139^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Susaṃvutā^eb^ti maggasaṃvarena suṭṭhu saṃvutā. ^b^Supihitā^eb^ti suṭṭhu pihitā. ^b^Vasānugā^eb^ti kāyādidvāravasānugā vasavattino na honti. ^b^Baddhacarā^eb^ti paṭibaddhacariyāti.
[06]Subhasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^140^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Upāyamanasikārenā^eb^ti aniccādīsu aniccādito manasikaraṇena. ^b^Upāyavīriyenā^eb^ti anuppannākusalānaṃ anuppādanāya vidhinā pavattavīriyena. ^b^Kāraṇavīriyenā^eb^ti anuppannānuppādanādiatthassa kāraṇabhūtena vīriyena. Anuppannapāpakānuppādanādiatthāni hi vīriyāni yadatthaṃ honti, taṃ atthaṃ sādhentiyevāti etassa atthassa dīpako ^b^sammā-saddo^eb^. Yonisosammāsaddena hi upāyakāraṇatthadīpakataṃ sandhāya ^b^‘‘upāyavīriyena kāraṇavīriyenā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Arahattaphalavimutti^eb^ ukkaṭṭhaniddesena. Mārena ‘‘mayhaṃ kho, bhikkhave’’tiādikaṃ bhagavato vacanaṃ sutvā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘arahattaṃ patvāpi na tussatī’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Kilesapāsenā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0204^ea^ kilesamārassa upāyabhūtena. Kilesamāro hi satte kāmaguṇapāsehi nibandhati, na pana sayameva. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ye dibbā kāmaguṇasaṅkhātā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Mārabandhane^eb^ti kilesamārassa bandhanaṭṭhāne, bhavacāraketi attho. ^b^Na me samaṇa mokkhasī^eb^ti idaṃ māro ‘‘anuttarā vimutti anuppattā, vimuttā sabbapāsehī’’ti ca bhagavato vacanaṃ asaddahanto vadati saddahantopi vā ‘‘evamayaṃ paresaṃ sattānaṃ mokkhāya ussāhaṃ na kareyyā’’ti attano kohaññe ṭhatvā vadati.
[06]Paṭhamamārapāsasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^141^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Anupubbagamanacārika^eb^nti ^a^V1.0179^ea^ gāmanigamarājadhānīsu anukkamena gamanasaṅkhātaṃ cārikaṃ. ^b^Evaṃ hi gatesū^eb^ti evaṃ tumhesu bahūsu ekajjhaṃ gatesu.

[03]Ādimhi kalyāṇaṃ etassāti ^b^ādikalyāṇaṃ,^eb^ tathā sesesu. ^b^Sāsanassa ādi sīlaṃ^eb^ mūlakattā. Tassa ^b^samathādayo majjhaṃ^eb^ sāsanasampattiyā vemajjhabhāvato. ^b^Phalanibbānāni pariyosānaṃ^eb^ tadadhigamato uttari karaṇīyābhāvato. Sāsane sammāpaṭipatti nāma paññāya hoti, tassā ca sīlaṃ samādhi ca mūlanti āha ^b^‘‘sīlasamādhayo vā ādī’’^eb^ti. Yasmā paññā anubodhapaṭivedhavasena duvidhā, tasmā tadubhayaṃ gaṇhanto ^b^‘‘vipassanāmaggā majjha’’^eb^nti āha. Paññānipphatti phalakiccaṃ, nibbānasacchikiriyā pana sammāpaṭipattiyā pariyosānaṃ tato paraṃ kattabbābhāvatoti āha ^b^‘‘phalanibbānāni pariyosāna’’^eb^nti. Phalaggahaṇena hi saupādisesanibbānaṃ gayhati, itarena itaraṃ, tadubhayavasena paṭipattiyā osānanti āha ^b^‘‘phalanibbānāni pariyosāna’’^eb^nti. ‘‘Tasmātiha tvaṃ, bhikkhu, ādimeva visodhehi kusalesu dhammesu. Ko cādi kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ? Sīlañca suvisuddhaṃ, diṭṭhi ca ujukā’’ti (saṃ. ni. 5.369) vacanato sīladiṭṭhujukatāya matthakabhūtā vipassanā, tadadhiṭṭhānā sīlasamādhīti ime ^a^M1.0205^ea^ tassa sāsanassa mūlanti āha ^b^‘‘sīlasamādhivipassanā vā ādī’’^eb^ti. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03]Kiñcāpi avayavavinimutto samudāyo natthi, yesu pana avayavesu samudāyarūpena apekkhitesu gāthāti samaññā, taṃ tato bhinnaṃ viya katvā dassento ^b^‘‘catuppadikagāthāya tāva paṭhamapādo’’^eb^tiādimāha. Pañcapadachappadānaṃ gāthānaṃ ādipariyosānaggahaṇena itare dutiyādayo tayo cattāro vā majjhanti avuttasiddhamevāti na vuttaṃ. ^b^Ekānusandhikasuttassā^eb^ti idaṃ bahuvibhāgaṃ yathānusandhinā ekānusandhikaṃ suttaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, itarassa pana teyeva desetabbadhammavibhāgena ādimajjhapariyosānabhāgā labbhanti. ^b^Nidāna^eb^nti kāladesakaparisādi-apadisanalakkhaṇādiko attho. ^b^Idamavocā^eb^ti ^b^iti^eb^-saddo ādiattho. Tena tadavasesanigamanapāḷiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Anekānusandhīkassa^eb^ saha nidānena paṭhamo anusandhi ādi. Saha nigamanena pacchimo pariyosānaṃ, itarena majjhimantiādimajjhapariyosānāni veditabbāni.

[03]^b^Sātthaka^eb^nti atthasampattiyā sātthakaṃ katvā. ^b^Sabyañjana^eb^nti byañjanasampattiyā sabyañjanaṃ. Sampatti ca nāma paripuṇṇabyañjanatāti āha ^b^‘‘byañjanehi…pe… desetā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sakalaparipuṇṇa^eb^nti ^a^V1.0180^ea^ sabbaso paripuṇṇaṃ sīlādipañcadhammakkhandhapāripūriyā. ^b^Nirupakkilesaṃ^eb^ diṭṭhimānādiupakkilesābhāvato. Avisesato tisso sikkhā sakale sāsane bhavanti. ^b^Dhammo^eb^ti pana brahmacariyaṃ vā sandhāya vuttaṃ ‘‘katamesānaṃ kho, bhante, buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ brahmacariyaṃ ciraṭṭhitikaṃ ahosī’’tiādīsu (pārā. 18) viya. ^b^Dukūlasāṇiyā paṭicchannā viya,^eb^ na tu pākāraselādipaṭicchannā viya. Tena dhammaniruttiyā sakalakilesānaṃ pahānānubhāvaṃ vadati. ^b^Alābhaparihāniyā,^eb^ na laddhaparihāniyā. ^b^Aḍḍhuḍḍhānī^eb^ti pañcasatādhikāni tīṇi pāṭihāriyasahassāni. ^b^Sāta^eb^nti sukhaṃ.
[06]Dutiyamārapāsasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^142^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Surākārakāna^eb^nti ^a^M1.0206^ea^ piṭṭhasurāyojanakānaṃ. Kosalānaṃ issaroti kosalo, kosalarājassa ayanti ^b^kosalikā. Paribhogapātī^eb^ti bhattaparibhojanatthāya pāti paribhogapāti. ^b^Kammāruddhanapaṇāḷiyā^eb^ti kammāruddhanapaṇāḷimukhe. ^b^Dhamamānāyā^eb^ti dhamiyamānāya. Taṃ pana yasmā bhastavātehi pūritaṃ nāma hoti, tasmā ^b^‘‘bhastavātena pūriyamānāyā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Niyāmabhūmiya^eb^nti bhagavato paṭisallānaṭṭhāne ^b^sañcarantaṃ^eb^ māraṃ maṃsacakkhunāva ^b^disvā^eb^. Tenāha ‘‘vijjulatālokenā’’ti.

[03]^b^Seyyatthāyā^eb^ti seyyānisaṃsāya. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ṭhassāmī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Attasaññato^eb^ti attabhāvena saṃyato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘saṃyatattabhāvo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Taṃsaṇṭhitassā^eb^ti tasmiṃ hatthapādakukkuccarahite buddhamunismiṃ avaṭṭhitassa. ^b^Vossajja careyya tattha so^eb^ti iminā bhagavā taṃ byākaramāno vibhiṃsitā buddhānaṃ kiṃ karissati bhayābhāvato? Kevalaṃ pana anaṭṭhavalikaṃ uppīḷento viya tvameva āyāsaṃ āpajjissasīti māraṃ santajjeti.

[03]^b^Bheravā^eb^ti avītarāgānaṃ bhayajanakā. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti taṃnimittaṃ. ^b^Phaleyyā^eb^ti bhijjeyya. ^b^Sattisalla^eb^nti sattisaṅkhātaṃ puthusallaṃ. ^b^Urasmiṃ cārayeyyu^eb^nti phāsuṃ vijjhituṃ ṭhapeyyuṃ uggireyyuṃ. ^b^Khandhupadhīsū^eb^ti khandhasaṅkhātesu upadhīsu. ^b^Tāṇaṃ karonti nāmā^eb^ti tato bhayanimittato attano tāṇaṃ karonti nāma.
[06]Sappasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^143^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Utugāhāpanatthaṃ^eb^^a^V1.0181^ea^^b^dhovitvā,^eb^ na rajojallavikkhālanatthaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘buddhānaṃ panā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Dhotapādake gehe^eb^ti dhotapādehi akkamitabbake. ^b^Vattabhedo nāma natthi^eb^ dhammassāmibhāvato. ^b^Vattasīse^eb^^a^M1.0207^ea^^b^ṭhatvā dhovanti^eb^ aññesaṃ diṭṭhānugatiāpajjanatthaṃ. ^b^Soppapariggāhakenā^eb^ti ettha ^b^soppaṃ^eb^ nāma niddāya antarantarā pavattakiriyamayacittappavattirahitā nirantarabhavaṅgasantatīti taṃ sabhāvato payojanato kālaparicchedato pariggāhakaṃ upariniddesasatisampajaññaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘soppapariggāhakena satisampajaññenā’’^eb^ti. Keci pana ‘‘niddāsoppanā’’ti vadanti, taṃ bhagavato soppaṃ hīḷento vadati.

[03]^b^Kiṃ nū^eb^ti etthaṃ ^b^ki^eb^nti hetunissakke paccattavacananti āha ^b^‘‘kasmā nu supasī’’^eb^ti? ^b^Dubbhago^eb^ vuccati nissiriko bhinnabhago, so pana matasadiso visaññisadiso ca hotīti āha ^b^‘‘mato viya visaññī viya cā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Ādinā^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena ‘‘bāhirassa upādāya aṭṭhārasā’’tiādinā (vibha. 842) āgataṃ taṇhākoṭṭhāsaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Tattha tattha visattatāyā^eb^ti tammiṃ tasmiṃ ārammaṇe visesato āsattabhāvena. Visassa dukkhanibbattakakammassa hetubhāvato ^b^visamūlatā^eb^ visaṃ vā dukkhadukkhādibhūtavedanā mūlaṃ etassāti ^b^visamūlā,^eb^ taṇhā. Tassa rūpādikassa dukkhassa paribhogo, na amatassāti ^b^visaparibhogatā. Katthaci netu^eb^nti katthaci bhave sabbathā netuṃ? ^b^Parikkhayā^eb^ti sabbaso khīṇattā. ^b^Tuyhaṃ kiṃ etthā^eb^ti sabbupadhiparikkhayā suddhassa mama paṭipattiyaṃ tuyhaṃ kiṃ ujjhāyanaṃ? Kevalaṃ vighātoyeva teti dasseti.
[06]Supatisuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^144^eb^^b^.^eb^ Aṭṭhamaṃ uttānatthameva.
[06]Nandatisuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^145^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paṇṇāsaṃ^eb^^a^V1.0182^ea^^a^M1.0208^ea^^b^vā vassāni jīvati^eb^ vassasatato upari seyyathāpi thero anuruddho. ^b^Saṭṭhi vā vassāni^eb^ seyyathāpi thero bākulo. Paṭiharitvā paccanīkabhāve sātaṃ sukhaṃ etassāti paccanīkasāto, tabbhāvo ^b^paccanīkasātatā,^eb^ tāya. ^b^Abhibhavitvā abhāsi^eb^ paṭivacanaṃ jānamānova.

[03]^b^Na hīḷeyya^eb^ na jiguccheyya. ^b^Eva^eb^nti so dārako viya kiñci acintento sappuriso careyya, evaṃ hissa cittadukkhaṃ na hotīti adhippāyo. ^b^Pajjalitasīso viya careyyā^eb^ti yathā pajjalitasīso puriso aññaṃ kiñci akatvā tasseva vūpasamāya vāyameyya, evaṃ sappuriso āyuṃ parittanti ñatvā teneva nayena sabbasaṅkhāragataṃ aniccaṃ, aniccattā eva dukkhaṃ, anattāti vipassanampi otaritvā taṃ ussukkāpentopi saṅkhāravigamāya careyya paṭipajjeyya.
[06]Paṭhamāayusuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^146^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Nemīvā^eb^ti nemisīsena cakkaṃ vadati. ^b^Kubbaraṃ anupariyāyatī^eb^ti kubbaraṃ anuparivattati. Tathābhūto pana so taṃ ajahantovāti āha ^b^‘‘na vijahatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Āyu anupariyāyatī^eb^ti maccānaṃ āyu gatampi paccāgacchatīti bhagavato paṭāṇi hutvā vadati, bhagavā pana taṃ abhibhavitvā ‘‘accayanti ahorattā’’tiādinā āyuno accayagamanamaraṇataṃyeva pavedesi.
[06]Dutiyāayusuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Paṭhamavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^147^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pavijjhī^eb^ti ^a^V1.0183^ea^^a^M1.0209^ea^ pabbataṃ sabbato pavattento tato tato nissajji. ^b^Sakala^eb^nti sabbabhāgavantaṃ, nissesanti attho.
[06]Pāsāṇasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^148^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vicakkhukammāyā^eb^ti vicakkhubhāvakāmatāya. Yathā sā bhagavato desiyamānaṃ dhammaṃ attano paññācakkhunā na passituṃ sakkoti, evaṃ kātuṃ kāmatāya. Tenāha ^b^‘‘parisāyā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Vināsetuṃ na sakkoti^eb^ bheravārammaṇe bhāyanasseva abhāvato. ^b^Dasabalappattā^eb^ti dasahi balehi samannāgatā.
[06]Kiṃnusīhasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^149^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Mandabhāvenā^eb^ti jaḷabhāvena ^b^momūhabhāvenā^eb^ti mahāmūḷhatāya. ^b^Kabbakaraṇena matto^eb^ti kabbakiriyāpasutatādivasena matto kabbaṃ katvā. ^b^Kimidaṃ soppasevā^eb^ti idaṃ tava soppaṃ kimatthaṃ, purisena nāma purisattakarena bhavitabbaṃ, na soppatiyeva. ^b^Atthaṃ samāgantvā^eb^ti paramatthaṃ nibbānaṃ sammā āgantvā adhigantvā. ^b^Asaṅga…pe… natthi^eb^ sabbaso siddhatthabhāvato. ^b^Jagganto^eb^ti jāgaranto puriso viya, ^b^na bhāyāmi^eb^ bhayahetūnaṃ abhāvā. ^b^Nānutapanti^eb^ sabbattha sabbadāpi vissaṭṭhabhāvato, ^b^māma^eb^nti mamaṃ. Gāthāsukhatthañhi dīghaṃ katvā vuttaṃ. ^b^Ṭhitattā^eb^ti uddesaparipucchāya paricchijjattā. ^b^Hāni^eb^nti kassaci jāniṃ.
[06]Sakalikasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^150^eb^^b^.^eb^ Anurujjhati ^a^V1.0184^ea^^a^M1.0210^ea^ etenāti anurodho, rāgo. Virujjhati etenāti virodho, paṭigho. Tesu ^b^anurodhavirodhesu^eb^ tannimittaṃ ^b^sajjati nāma^eb^ saṅgaṃ karoti nāma, anurodhavirodhuppādanameva cettha sajjanaṃ. ^b^Yadaññamanusāsatī^eb^ti yaṃ aññesaṃ anusāsanaṃ, taṃ tesaṃ hitesanaṃ anukampanaṃ, tasmā anukampake hitesake sammāsambuddhe anurodhavirodhe āropetvā vikampanatthaṃ micchā vadasīti.
[06]Patirūpasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^151^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ākāse carante^eb^ti pañcābhiññe sandhāya vadati. Antalikkhe carantepi kiccasādhanato ^b^antalikkhacaro^eb^. Manasi jātoti ^b^mānaso^eb^. Taṃ pana manasantānasampayuttatāyāti āha ^b^‘‘manasampayutto’’^eb^ti.
[06]Mānasasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^152^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañcannaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ lakkhaṇādīni ceva samudayañca assādādīnavanissaraṇāni ca gahetvā sammā tesaṃ lakkhaṇādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ hotīti āha ^b^‘‘pañca upādānakkhandhe ādiyitvā’’^eb^ti. Ruppanavediyanasañjānanābhisaṅkharaṇavijānanāni ^b^khandhānaṃ sabhāvalakkhaṇāni. Ādi^eb^-saddena rasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānāni ceva samudayādīni ca saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Dassetī^eb^ti paccakkhato dasseti, hatthāmalakaṃ viya pākaṭe vibhūte katvā vibhāveti. ^b^Gaṇhāpetī^eb^ti te dhamme manasā anupekkhite diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhe karonto uggaṇhāpeti. ^b^Samādānamhī^eb^ti tattha atthassa sammadeva ādiyane khandhānañca sammasanavasena aññadhammavasena samādiyane. ^b^Paṭividdhaguṇenā^eb^ti tāya desanāya, taṃ nissāya paccattapurisakārena ca tesaṃ paṭividdhaguṇena ^a^M1.0211^ea^. ^b^Jotāpetī^eb^ti tesaṃ cittasantānaṃ assaddhiyādikilesamalavidhamanena pabhassaraṃ karoti. ^b^Aṭṭhiṃ katvā^eb^ti tāya desanāya pāpetabbaṃ atthaṃ payojanaṃ daḷhaṃ katvā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ayaṃ no’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Kammakārakacittaṃ^eb^ nāma otaraṇacittaṃ. ‘‘Yonisomanasikārapubbakaṃ vipassanācitta’’nti ^a^V1.0185^ea^ keci. ^b^Ohitasotā^eb^ti anaññavihitatāya dhammassavanāya appitasotā, tato eva tadatthaṃ ^b^ṭhapitasotā^eb^.

[03]^b^Ete rūpādayo khandhe yañca saṅkhataṃ^eb^ samiddhapaccayehi kataṃ, tañca ‘‘eso ahaṃ na homi, etaṃ mayhaṃ na hotī’’ti passantoti yojanā. Khemo attāti khemattā, taṃ ^b^khemattaṃ^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘khemibhūtaṃ attabhāva’’^eb^nti. ^b^Pariyesamānā^eb^ mārasenā.
[06]Pattasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^153^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sañjāyati etasmāti sañjāti, so eva sampayuttadhammo samosarati etthāti samosaraṇaṃ, so eva attho, tena ^b^sañjātisamosaraṇaṭṭhena. Bhayabheravaṃ sadda^eb^nti bhāyati etasmāti ^b^bhayaṃ,^eb^ tadeva yassa kassaci bheravāvahattā ^b^bheravaṃ,^eb^ devādisaddanti attho. Vigatavalāhake deve uppātavasena uppajjanakasaddo ^b^devadundubhi^eb^. Asanipātādisaddo ^b^asanipātasaddo. Undrīyatī^eb^ti viparivattati. ^b^Loko adhimucchito^eb^ti atithaddhakāyo viya mucchaṃ āpanno. ^b^Mārassā^eb^ti kilesamārassa. ^b^Ṭhānabhūta^eb^nti pavattiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ.
[06]Chaphassāyatanasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^154^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tattha tatthā^eb^ti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ñātimittakule. ^b^Pāhunakānī^eb^ti pahitabbapaṇṇākārāni. ^b^Āgantukapaṇṇākārānī^eb^ti āgantukānaṃ upagatānaṃ ^a^M1.0212^ea^ dātabbapaṇṇākārāni. ^b^Sayaṃcaradivase^eb^ti kumārakānañca kumārikānañca sayaṃ attanā caritabbachaṇadivase. Idāni tamatthaṃ vitthārato dassento ^b^‘‘samavayajātigottā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Samavayasamajātikasamagottāti paccekaṃ sama-saddo yojetabbo. Gottasamatā ca āvāhavivāhayogyatāvasena daṭṭhabbā, na ekagottatāvasena. ^b^Tato tato^eb^ gāmato. ^b^Aññasmiṃ^eb^ dātabbe asati. Chaṇavasena pahiṇituṃ sampāditaṃ pūvaṃ ^b^chaṇapūvaṃ. Tāsaṃ sampattiyā^eb^ti tāsaṃ dānaṃ dhammassavanañcāti tassā duvidhāyapi sampattiyā.

[03]Ñāṇaṃ nāma āvajjanapubbakaṃ, tasmā ajānanassa ‘‘anāvajjanatāyā’’ti kāraṇaṃ vatvā ^a^V1.0186^ea^ sesakāraṇaṃ vadanto ^b^‘‘buddhāna’’^eb^ntiādimāha. ^b^Upacārabheda^eb^nti buddhaṃ disvā manussehi kātabbaupacārassa bhindanaṃ. ^b^Bhinditu^eb^nti vidhamituṃ.
[03]^b^Bhagavā panā^eb^ti ^b^pana^eb^saddo visesatthajotako. Tena na kevalaṃ bhagavā uppaṇḍanaṃ pariharanto taṃ gāmaṃ na puna pāvisi, atha kho māraṃ anukampantoti idaṃ visesaṃ joteti.

[03]^b^Janesī^eb^ti apuññaṃ janesi, janento ca yathā tato āyatiṃ thirataraṃ mahantaṃ dukkhaṃ nipphajjissati, evaṃ nipphādesi. ^b^Āsajjana^eb^nti ettha ^b^na^eb^nti nipātamattaṃ. Kiñcati maddati abhibhavatīti kiñcananti āha ^b^‘‘maddituṃ samattha’’^eb^nti.
[06]Piṇḍasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^155^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Nibbānaṃ apadisitvā^eb^ti nibbānaṃ nissāya nibbānaguṇe ārabbhāti attho. ^b^Haṭahaṭakeso^eb^ti ito cito ca vikiṇṇattā ākulākulakeso. ^b^Cakkhusamphassaviññāṇāyatana^eb^nti ettha yathā cakkhuggahaṇena phasso visesito, tena eva viññāṇāyatanaṃ. Tathā sati cakkhuviññāṇassa ca gahaṇaṃ āpajjeyyāti. Nanu cettha cakkhuggahaṇena visesitattā cakkhudvārikānaṃ sabbesaṃ viññāṇānaṃ gahaṇanti? Saccametaṃ, tañca kho paṭhamena cakkhuggahaṇenāti nāyaṃ doso. ^b^Bhavaṅgacitta^eb^nti āvajjanāya anantarapaccayabhūtameva ^a^M1.0213^ea^ adhippetanti niyametvā dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘sāvajjanaka’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ, tasmā ^b^tadārammaṇampī^eb^ti javanacittena saha tadārammaṇacittampi. ‘‘Viññāṇāyatana’’nti ca vutte nimmalameva.

[03]^b^‘‘Cakkhū’’^eb^ti avisesato vuttattā pana mārassa ayampi attho āpannoti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yaṃ loke’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Upakkavipakka^eb^nti cakkhupākarogena upari heṭṭhā ca sabbaso pakkaṃ kuthitaṃ. ^b^Eseva nayo^eb^ti iminā yaṃ loke kuṭṭhakilāsagaṇḍakacchuādīhi upaddutaṃ vaṇapīḷakādivasena paggharantaṃ asuciṃ antamaso paramajeguccharūpampi, sabbaṃ taṃ taveva hotūti evamādiṃ apadisati.

[03]^b^Yaṃ bhaṇḍaka^eb^nti hiraññasuvaṇṇādikhettavatthādiupakaraṇaṃ gahaṭṭhā, pabbajitā ca yaṃ pattacīvarādiṃ ‘‘mama ida’’nti abhinivisantāva vadanti, ^b^etesu^eb^ pariggahatthesu ca tesaṃ pariggāhakapuggalesu ^a^V1.0187^ea^ ca te ^b^cittaṃ yadi atthi,^eb^ tāni ārabbha tava cittaṃ yadi bhavati, evaṃ tvaṃ tattha baddho eva hosīti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘na me samaṇa mokkhasī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Yaṃ bhaṇḍakaṃ vadantī^eb^ti yathāvuttaṃ upakaraṇaṃ loke bahujanā ‘‘mama ida’’nti vadanti. ^b^Na taṃ mayha^eb^nti taṃ mayhaṃ na hoti, na tattha mama taṇhāvasena mamanti natthi. ^b^Na te aha^eb^nti ye puggalā ettha baddhā, tepi ahaṃ na homi, tattha me diṭṭhibaddho natthi. ^b^Na me maggampi dakkhasī^eb^ti evaṃ sabbaso baddhābhāvena muttassa me gatamaggampi māra tvaṃ na dakkhasi na passissasi, ye bhavādayo tuyhaṃ visayā, tesu bhavayonigatiādīsu mayhaṃ gatamaggaṃ na passissasi bhavanissaṭṭhattāti.
[06]Kassakasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^156^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ahana^eb^nti karaṇe paccattavacananti āha ^b^‘‘ahanantenā’’^eb^ti, paccatte eva vā paccattavacanaṃ, ‘‘ahananto hutvā’’ti vacanasesena bhavitabbanti adhippāyo. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. ^b^Ajina^eb^nti antogadhahetuatthaṃ ^a^M1.0214^ea^ vadatīti āha ^b^‘‘parassa dhanajāniṃ akarontenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Akārāpentenā^eb^ti parassa dhanajāniṃ akārentena. ^b^Asocantenā^eb^ti bhogabyasanādivasena paraṃ asocantena. Kasmā bhagavā evaṃ cintesīti tattha kāraṇamāha ^b^‘‘itī’’^eb^tiādinā. ^b^Rajje vijite daṇḍakarapīḷite^eb^ti dhanadaṇḍādidaṇḍena ceva balinā ca bādhite.

[03]^b^Ijjhanakakoṭṭhāsā^eb^ti cetovasibhāvādikassa sādhanakakoṭṭhāsā. ^b^Vaḍḍhitā^eb^ti bhāvanāpāripūrivasena anubrūhitā. ^b^Punappunaṃ katā^eb^ti bhāvanāya bahulīkaraṇena aparāparaṃ pavattitā. ^b^Yuttayāna^eb^nti yathā yuttānaṃ ājaññarathānaṃ sārathinā adhiṭṭhitaṃ yathāruci pavattati, evaṃ yathārucipavattitaṃ gamitā. ^b^Patiṭṭhaṭṭhenā^eb^ti adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena. ^b^Vatthukatā^eb^ti sabbaso upakkilesasodhanena iddhivisayatāya patiṭṭhānabhāvato suvisodhitaparissayavatthu viya katā. ^b^Avijahitā^eb^ti paṭipakkhadūrībhāvato subhāvitabhāvena taṃtaṃadhiṭṭhānayogyatāya na jahāpitā. ^b^Niccānubaddhā^eb^ti tato eva niccaṃ anubaddhā viya katā. ^b^Suparicitā^eb^ti suṭṭhu sabbabhāgena bhāvanānupacayaṃ gamitā. ^b^Avirādhitavedhihattho viyā^eb^ti avirajjhanabhāvena virajjhanahattho viya. ^b^Suṭṭhu samāraddhā^eb^ti bhāvanāuppattiyā sammadeva sampāditā. ^b^Cinteyyā^eb^ti atthuddhāravasena cinteyya.

[03]^b^Pabbatassā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0188^ea^ pabbato assa. Pabbato assāti ^b^pabbato bhaveyya^eb^ kīdisassāti āha ^b^‘‘suvaṇṇassā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Jātarūpassā^eb^ti ātaparūpasampannassa. ^b^Dvikkhattumpi tāva mahanto^eb^ti yattako so pabbato hoti, dvikkhattuṃ tattako. ^b^Ekassā^eb^ti ekassapi puggalassa ^b^nālaṃ na pariyatto^eb^ taṇhāya duppūraṇabhāvā. ^b^Evaṃ jānanto^eb^ti evaṃ taṇhāya duppūraṇabhāvādīnavataṃ jānanto. ^b^Samaṃ careyyā^eb^ti paravatthuparāmāsādiṃ vihāya kāyādīhi samameva paṭipajjeyya.

[03]Dukkhaṃ taṇhānidānaṃ, taṇhā kāmaguṇanidānā, tasmā dukkhassa taṇhāpaccayakāmaguṇanidānattaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Ta^eb^nti dukkhaṃ. ^b^Yatonidānaṃ hotī^eb^ti yaṃnidānaṃ yaṃkāraṇaṃ taṃ pavattati. ^b^Evaṃ yo adakkhī^eb^ti yo pariññātavatthuko evaṃ dukkhaṃ tassa nidānabhūte kāmaguṇe ca tathato paññācakkhunā passi. ^b^Kena kāraṇena nameyya^eb^? Taṃ kāraṇaṃ natthīti attho. ^b^Kāmaguṇaupadhi^eb^nti kāmaguṇasaṅkhātaṃ upadhiṃ. Sajjati etthāti ^b^saṅgo eso, lagganametanti evaṃ^eb^^a^M1.0215^ea^^b^viditvā^eb^. Tameva kāmābhibhūto nappaṭiseveyya na laggeyyāti evaṃ vinayāya vūpasamāya sikkheyyāti.
[06]Rajjasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Dutiyavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^157^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Jaṭācumbaṭakenā^eb^ti sīse paṭimukkena jaṭākalāpena. Apariggahabrāhmaṇapabbajitā hi jaṭāya uñchācariyaṃ caranti. ^b^Udumbaradaṇḍa^eb^ñhi attaguttatthāya gahitaṃ tesaṃ appicchabhāvappakāsanaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘appicchabhāvappakāsanattha’’^eb^nti. ^b^Sīsaṃ okampetvā^eb^ti ettha ativiya sīsassa okampitabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘hanukena uraṃ paharanto adhonataṃ katvā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Jivhaṃ nīharitvā^eb^ti lambanacālanavasena mukhato nikkhāmetvā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘uddha’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Tisākha^eb^nti tibhaṅgabhakuṭi viya nalāṭe jātattā ^b^nalāṭikaṃ^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘nalāṭe uṭṭhitaṃ valittaya’’^eb^nti, tibhaṅgavalikaṃ nalāṭe katvāti attho. ^b^Attanova tele^eb^ti attanova pāpakammanibbattake tele, pacitabbaṭṭhānageheti adhippāyo.
[06]Sambahulasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^158^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Mayhaṃ^eb^^a^V1.0189^ea^^b^lābhā^eb^ti evarūpassa nāma sammāsambuddhassa satthussa paṭilābho, evarūpassa ca nāma niyyānikassa saddhammassa paṭilābho, evarūpānañca suppaṭipannānaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ paṭilābho, ete mayhaṃ suladdhalābhā. ^b^Mayhaṃ suladdha^eb^nti yañcetaṃ mama niyyānikasāsane pabbajjā upasampadā, tasmiñca abhiratīti sabbañcetaṃ mayā suladdhaṃ. Yathā panassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko uppanno, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘so kirā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Caritānurūpavasena ^a^M1.0216^ea^ gahitaṃ ^b^mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ. Pāsādika^eb^nti pasādāvahaṃ. ^b^Evamahosī^eb^ti ^b^‘‘lābhā vata me’’^eb^tiādinā evaṃ parivitakko ahosi. ^b^Nisinnasadiso^eb^ti nisinno viya. ^b^Tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne^eb^ti yasmiṃ ṭhāne nisinnaṃ māro upasaṅkami, tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne. ^b^Tassā^eb^ti samiddhittherassa. ^b^Kammaṭṭhānaṃ sappāya^eb^nti kammaṭṭhānabhāvanāya anuyuñjanaṃ sappāyaṃ upakārāvahaṃ bhavissati.

[03]^b^Mayha^eb^nti mayā. Sati ca paññā ca ^b^satipaññā,^eb^ tā ariyamaggena jānanasamatthanabhāvena avabuddhā. Thero kira tadā vipassanaṃ ussukkāpesi. ^b^Kāma^eb^nti yathāruci. Keci ‘‘kāmaṃ karassūti āyasmato ‘kāmā’ti mārassa ālapana’’nti vadanti. ^b^Vibhiṃsakārahānī^eb^ti bhayānakārahāni. ^b^Rūpānī^eb^ti vippakārāni. Vippakāratthopi hi rūpasaddo ^b^‘‘rūpaṃ dasseti anappaka’’^eb^ntiādīsu viya. ^b^Na kampessasī^eb^ti samaṇadhammakaraṇato na calissasi.
[06]Samiddhisuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^159^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pabbatassa passe^eb^ti pabbatapāde upaccakāyaṃ. Samaye samaye laddhattā ^b^sāmayikaṃ^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘appitappitakkhaṇe paccanīkadhammehi vimuccatī’’^eb^ti. Lokiyavimutti hi anaccantapahāyitāya samayavimutti nāma, lokuttaravimutti accantapahāyitāya asamayavimutti. Tāhi samannāgatā ‘‘samayavimuttā, asamayavimuttā’’ti ca vuccanti. ^b^Yāva^eb^ paṭhamajjhānanibbattanaṃ, tāva ^b^kasmā parihāyīti^eb^ attho? ^b^Sābādhattā^eb^ti sarogattā. ^b^Vātapittasemhavasenā^eb^ti kadāci vātapittavasena, kadāci vātasemhavasena, ubhinnampi sannipātavasena. ^b^Anusāyiko^eb^ti kāyaṃ anugantvā sayito, yāpyāmayabhāvena ṭhitoti attho. ^b^Samādhissā^eb^ti samādhibhāvanāya. ^b^Upakārakadhamme^eb^ utubhojanādike. ^b^Pūretu^eb^nti samodhānetuṃ. ^b^Parihāyī^eb^ti sarīrassa akallabhāvato.
