[03]^b^Āhareyya^eb^nti ^a^V1.0190^ea^^a^M1.0217^ea^ jīvitaharaṇatthāya upaneyyaṃ. ^b^Nibaddhā gati hoti^eb^ kevalaṃ brahmalokūpapattito, na sotāpannādīnaṃ viya paricchinnabhāvena. Tenāha ^b^‘‘brahmaloke nibbattatī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Jalamānā^eb^ti samuṭṭhitaniyataiddhiyā anaññasādhāraṇaparivārasampattiyā ca sadevake loke jalamānā. Maṃsacakkhu dibbacakkhu dhammacakkhu paññācakkhu samantacakkhūti pañcahi cakkhūhi ^b^cakkhumā. Ānubhāvadharā^eb^ti acinteyyāparimeyyabuddhānubhāvasampannā. Ānubhāvapariyāyopi hi juti-saddo hoti ‘‘iddhijutibalavīriyūpapattī’’tiādīsu (jā. 2.22.1589, 1595) viya. Anavasesato mānaṃ siyati samucchindatīti aggamaggo ^b^mānasaṃ^eb^. Tannibbattanā pana arahattassa mānasatā daṭṭhabbā. ^b^Sīlādīnī^eb^ti anuttarasīlādīni. ^b^Sikkhamāno^eb^ti sikkhāni bhāvento attano santāne uppādento. Na cittabhāvanā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sakaraṇīyo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Jane^eb^ti sattassa kāye, sadevake loketi attho. ^b^Vissutā^eb^ti anaññasādhāraṇehi sīlādiguṇehi vissutā.

[03]^b^Vedanaṃ vikkhambhetvā^eb^ti uppannaṃ dukkhavedanaṃ paṭicca uppannāttakilamathaṃ anuppādanavasena vikkhambhetvā ^b^taṃyeva vedanaṃ pariggahetvā^eb^ pavattavipassanā vīthimeva otaratīti katvā ^b^mūlakammaṭṭhāna^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^‘‘Samasīsī hutvā parinibbāyī’’^eb^ti vatvā tassa pabhedaṃ vibhajitvā idhādhippetaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘samasīsī nāma tividho hotī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Iriyāpathavasena samasīsī ^b^iriyāpathasamasīsī^eb^. Esa nayo sesadvayepi.

[03]^b^Iriyāpathakopanañcā^eb^ti iriyāpathehi asamāyogo. ^b^Ekappahārenevā^eb^ti ekavelāyameva. ^b^Parinibbānavasenā^eb^ti anupādisesaparinibbānavasena, na kilesakkhayamattena. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti etesu dvīsu nayesu. Evaṃ sati teneva iriyāpathena vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā teneva iriyāpathena, ekasmiṃ antorogeyeva vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ patvā teneva rogena parinibbāyantā khīṇāsavā bahavopi samasīsino eva sambhaveyyuṃ. Tasmā vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo.

[03]Sīsañcettha ^a^M1.0218^ea^ terasa – palibodhasīsaṃ taṇhā, bandhanasīsaṃ māno, parāmāsasīsaṃ diṭṭhi, vikkhepasīsaṃ uddhaccaṃ, kilesasīsaṃ avijjā, adhimokkhasīsaṃ saddhā, paggahasīsaṃ vīriyaṃ, upaṭṭhānasīsaṃ sati, avikkhepasīsaṃ samādhi, dassanasīsaṃ paññā, pavattisīsaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ, gocarasīsaṃ vimokkho, saṅkhārasīsaṃ nirodhoti. Imesu terasasu sīsesu palibodhasīsādīni pavattisīsañca pariyādiyitabbāni, adhimokkhasīsādīni pariyādāyakāni, pariyādāyakaphalaṃ gocarasīsaṃ. Tañhi visayajjhattaṃ phalaṃ vimokkho, pariyādāyakassa maggassa phalassa ca ārammaṇaṃ ^a^V1.0191^ea^ saṅkhārasīsaṃ saṅkhāravivekabhūto nirodhoti pariyādiyitabbānaṃ pariyādāyakaphalārammaṇānaṃ saha viya saṃsiddhaṃ dassanena samasīsibhāvaṃ dassetuṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ terasa sīsāni vuttāni. Idha pana ‘‘apubbaṃ acarimaṃ āsavapariyādānañca hoti jīvitapariyādānañcā’’ti (pu. pa. 16) vacanato tesu kilesapavattasīsānameva vasena yojanaṃ karonto ^b^‘‘ettha ca pavattisīsa’’^eb^ntiādimāha.

[03]Tattha pavattisīsaṃ pavattato vuṭṭhahanto maggo cutito uddhaṃ appavattikaraṇavasena yadipi pariyādīyati, yāva pana cuti, tāva pavattisabbhāvato ^b^‘‘pavattisīsaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ cuticittaṃ khepetī’’^eb^ti āha. Kilesapariyādānena pana maggacittena attano anantaraṃ viya nipphādetabbā paccavekkhaṇavārā ca kilesapariyādānasseva vārāti vattabbataṃ arahanti. ‘‘Vimuttasmiṃ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṃ hotī’’ti (ma. ni. 1.78; saṃ. ni. 3.12) vacanato paccavekkhaṇaparisamāpanena kilesapariyādānaṃ samāpitaṃ nāma hoti, taṃ pana parisamāpanaṃ yadi cuticittena hoti, teneva jīvitaparisamāpanañca hotīti imāya vāracutisamatāya kilesapariyādānajīvitapariyādānānaṃ apubbācarimatā veditabbāti dassento ^b^‘‘dvinnaṃ cittānaṃ ekato uppādo natthī’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Dvinnaṃ cittāna^eb^nti cuticittamaggacittānaṃ. ^b^Ta^eb^nti paccavekkhaṇaṃ paripuṇṇajavanacittānaṃ sattakkhattuṃ pavattiyā, aparipuṇṇānaṃ vā pañcakkhattuṃ pavattiyā. Kiñcāpi ^b^‘‘eko vā dve vā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ yathā ‘‘ekaṃ vā dve vā tadārammaṇacittānī’’ti, heṭṭhimantena pana dve pavattanti.
[03]^b^Uppāṭetvā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0219^ea^ uddharitvāti attho. ^b^Anupādisesenā^eb^ti anupādisesanibbānena.

[03]^b^Dhūmāyitatta^eb^nti dhūmassa viya ayitabhāvaṃ pavattiākāraṃ. Dhūmasadisā valāhakā ^b^dhūmavalāhakā,^eb^ timiravalāhakā, ye mahikā ‘‘timira’’nti vuccanti. ^b^Appatiṭṭhitenā^eb^ti patiṭṭhaṃ alabhantena. Itthambhūtalakkhaṇe etaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ, anuppattidhammenāti attho. Sati hi uppāde patiṭṭhitaṃ nāma siyā, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana yadeva tassa viññāṇassa appatiṭṭhānakāraṇaṃ, tadeva parinibbānakāraṇanti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘appatiṭṭhitakāraṇā’’^eb^ti.
[03]^b^Sokena phuṭṭhassā^eb^ti ‘‘aphalo vata me vāyāmo jāto’’ti sokena abhibhūtassa. ^b^Abhassathā^eb^ti balavasokābhitunnassa satisammosā sithilaṃ gahitā bhassi patitā sā kacchā.
[06]Godhikasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^160^eb^^b^.^eb^ Yasmā ^a^V1.0192^ea^ kapilavatthuto nikkhantakālato paṭṭhāya māro otārāpekkho lokanāthaṃ anubandhituṃ āraddho, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘pure bodhiyā chabbassānī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Atigahetvā^eb^ti anugantvā tassa yathāruci paṭipattiṃ anuvatto viya hutvā.
[03]^b^Avajjhāyanto^eb^ti pajjhāyanto. ^b^Jito^eb^ vittaparājito asi nu. ^b^Pamāṇātikkanta^eb^nti garutaraṃ.
[03]^b^Khanitvā^eb^ ummūletvā. Kāmāsavādīni pajahanto ^b^anāsavo^eb^.
[03]^b^Pehī^eb^ti apehi. ^b^Pāragāmino^eb^ti pāraṅgamanasīlā. Tekāliko ayaṃ gāmi-saddoti āha ^b^‘‘yepī’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Māravisūkānī^eb^ti mārakaṇṭakāni kaṇṭakasadisāni mārassa durācārāni. ^b^Viruddhasevitāni^eb^ virodhavasena tāsaṃyeva vevacanāni. Tāni sarūpato dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘appamāyū’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Nibbejanīyā^eb^ti nibbedadāyikā. ^b^Ukkaṇṭhanīyā^eb^ti ukkaṇṭhavahā.

[03]^b^Vikappavasena^eb^^a^M1.0220^ea^^b^veditabbo^eb^ opammaparikappavisayattā tassa kiriyāpadassa. Tenāha ^b^‘‘anuparigaccheyyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti etasmiṃ medavaṇṇavatthusmiṃ. ^b^Mudu^eb^nti mudumadhurasaṃ ^b^vindeyyāma^eb^ paṭilabheyyāma. ^b^Assādo^eb^ti assādetabbo.
[06]Sattavassānubandhasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^161^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Cintesī^eb^ti sokavasiko hutvā cintayi. ^b^Gaṇikārahatthiniyo^eb^ti dīpakakareṇuyo. ^b^Ekasataṃ ekasata^eb^nti ekasataṃ ekasataṃ paccekaṃ sataṃ satanti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ekekaṃ sataṃ sataṃ katvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Kumārivaṇṇasata^eb^nti kumāritthīnaṃ attabhāvānaṃ sataṃ. Tā kira paṭhamaṃ kaññārūpena attānaṃ dassesuṃ. Anupagatapupphānañhi samaññā kaññāti. Puna yathāvuttakumārirūpena upagatapupphā hi kumārī. Puna vadhukārūpena. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘avijātavaṇṇasata’’^eb^nti ^a^V1.0193^ea^. Tatiyavāre yuvatirūpena. Vijātā hi itthī anatikkantamajjhimavayā yuvatī. Ettāvatā bālā taruṇī porīti tividhāsu itthīsu purimā dve dassitā, pariyosānavāresu manussajātikānaṃ manussitthiyova ruccantīti tena manussarūpena tā attānaṃ dassesuṃ.

[03]^b^Atthassa patti^eb^nti ekantato hitānuppattiṃ. ^b^Hadayassa santi^eb^nti paramacittupasamaṃ. ^b^Kilesasena^eb^nti kāmaguṇasaṅkhātaṃ paṭhamaṃ kilesasenaṃ. Sā hi kilesasenā accharāsaṅghātasabhāvāpi paṭipatthayamānā piyāyitabbaicchitabbarūpabhāvato piyarūpasātarūpā nāma attano kiccavasena. ^b^Eko ahaṃ jhāyanto^eb^ti gaṇasaṅgaṇikāya kilesasaṅgaṇikāya ca abhāvato eko asahāyo ahaṃ lakkhaṇūpanijjhānena nijjhāyanto. ^b^Anubujjhi^eb^nti anukkamena maggapaṭipāṭiyā bujjhiṃ paṭibujjhiṃ. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti yathāvuttavivekasukhasamadhigamanimittaṃ. ^b^Akaraṇenā^eb^ti mittasanthavassa akaraṇena. ^b^Sakkhī^eb^ti sakkhibhāvo.

[03]^b^Katamena^eb^^a^M1.0221^ea^^b^vihārenā^eb^ti jhānasamāpattīnaṃ katamena vihārena. Idha dutiyapadassa attho vissajjanagāthāvaṇṇanāyameva āvi bhavissati. Anāmantena ^b^‘‘taṃ puggala’’^eb^nti sammukhā ṭhitampi bhagavantaṃ asammukhā viya katvā vadati, kathaṃ tvanti attho.

[03]^b^‘‘Avitakkajhāyī’’^eb^ti vakkhamānattā ayamevettha kāyapassaddhi veditabbāti āha ^b^‘‘catutthajjhānena assāsapassāsakāyassa passaddhattā passaddhakāyo’’^eb^ti. Puññābhisaṅkhārādike ^b^kammābhisaṅkhāre^eb^. Kāmālayādīnaṃ abhāvato ^b^anālayo. Na saratī^eb^ti na savati. Rāgavasena hi sattā saṃsāramanusavanti. ^b^Na thino^eb^ti na thinamiddhacitto. Mohavasena hi sattā thinamiddhaṃ āpajjantīti. ^b^Diyaḍḍhakilesasahassa^eb^nti ^b^khuddakavatthuvibhaṅge^eb^ (vibha. 842, 976) āgatesu aṭṭhasu kilesasatesu aṭṭhasataṃ taṇhāvicaritāni apanetvā sesā paññāsādhikaṃ sataṃ kilesā, te ^b^brahmajāle^eb^ (dī. ni. 1.31) āgatāhi dvāsaṭṭhiyā diṭṭhīhi saha pañcapaññāsādhikaṃ sattasataṃ hoti; tā ca uppannānuppannabhāvena diguṇitā diyaḍḍhakilesasahassaṃ dasādhikaṃ hoti; taṃ appakaṃ pana ūnamadhikaṃ vā gaṇanupagaṃ na hotīti ‘‘diyaḍḍhakilesasahassa’’nti vuttaṃ. Itaresaṃ atītādibhāvāmasanato aggahaṇaṃ pahānassa adhippetattā. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana ^b^abhidhammaṭīkāyaṃ^eb^ (dha. sa. anuṭī. nidānakathāvaṇṇanā) vuttanayena veditabbo. ^b^Paṭhamapadenā^eb^ti ‘‘na kuppatī’’ti iminā padena. ^b^Dutiyenā^eb^ti ‘‘na saratī’’ti padena. ^b^Tatiyenā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0194^ea^ ‘‘na thino’’ti padena. ^b^Nīvaraṇappahānena khīṇāsavataṃ dasseti,^eb^ anavasesato nīvaraṇānaṃ accantappahānaṃ adhippetaṃ.

[03]^b^Pañcadvārikakilesoghaṃ tiṇṇo^eb^ti channaṃ dvārānaṃ vasena pavattanakilesoghaṃ taritvā ṭhito. Kāmoghadiṭṭhoghabhavoghaṭṭhakilesabhāvato ^b^‘‘pañcoghaggahaṇena vā pañcorambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni veditabbānī’’^eb^ti āha. Rūparāgādayo visesato na pañcadvārikāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘chaṭṭhaggahaṇena pañcuddhambhāgiyāni veditabbānī’’^eb^ti.
[03]^b^Maccurājassā^eb^ti sambandhe sāmivacananti dassento ^b^‘‘maccurājassa hatthato’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Nayamānāna^eb^nti anādare sāmivacananti katvā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘nayamānesū’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Ūhaccā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0222^ea^ buddhaṃ nissāya. ^b^‘‘Idamavocā’’ti desanaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā^eb^ti etena saṃyuttesu ayaṃ nigamanapāḷi, heṭṭhā anāgatanayattā pana kesuci potthakesu na likhīyatīti dasseti. ^b^Daddallamānā^eb^ti jajjakārassa hi daddakāraṃ katvā niddeso. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ativiya jalamānā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Nīharī^eb^ti tāsaṃ kāyavacīvikāraṃ na manasikaronto tiṇāyapi amaññamānova anapekkheneva nīhari. ^b^Phalato bhaṭṭha^eb^nti phalasipāṭikato bhaṭṭhaṃ. Kuṇḍatiṇādigacchatūlaṃ ^b^poṭakitūlaṃ^eb^.
[06]Māradhītusuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Tatiyavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Sāratthappakāsiniyā saṃyuttanikāya-aṭṭhakathāya
[06]Mārasaṃyuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^162^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Āḷaviyaṃ^eb^^a^V1.0195^ea^^a^M1.0223^ea^^b^jātā^eb^ti āḷaviyaṃ vijāyitvā saṃvaḍḍhamānā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘āḷavinagaratoyeva ca nikkhamma pabbajitā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Dhanaṃ samādapetvā^eb^ti cetiyassa rājā ekaṃ mukhaṃ, rājaputto ekaṃ, amaccānaṃ jeṭṭhako hutvā senāpati ekaṃ, janapadānaṃ jeṭṭhako hutvā seṭṭhi ekanti evaṃ catūsu mukhesu navakamme kayiramāne seṭṭhinā gahitamukhe kamme olīyamāne eko upāsako ariyasāvako pañca sakaṭasatāni yojāpetvā janapadaṃ gantvā ‘‘yo yaṃ dātuṃ ussahati hiraññaṃ vā suvaṇṇaṃ vā sattavidharatanaṃ vā haritālaṃ vā manosilaṃ vā, so dhanaṃ detū’’ti samādapetvā yathāladdhaṃ paṭhamaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ pesetvā ‘‘navakammaṃ niṭṭhita’’nti sutvā ekakaṃ āgacchantaṃ antarāmagge corā palibundhitvā tato kiñcipi dhanaṃ alabhantā ‘‘sace naṃ muñcissāma, anatthaṃ no kareyyā’’ti jīvitā voropesuṃ. Anaparādhe ariyasāvake aparādhakā te corā andhā jātā, tasmā taṃ ṭhānaṃ ^b^‘‘andhavana’’^eb^nti paññāyitthāti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Khīṇāsavānaṃ yasmā yattha katthaci cittaviveko hotiyeva upadhivivekassa siddhattā. Tasmā ^b^‘‘kāyavivekatthinī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Nissaraṇa^eb^nti nibbānaṃ sabbasaṅkhatassa nissaṭattā. ^b^Paccavekkhaṇañāṇenā^eb^ti paccavekkhaṇañāṇena, pageva maggaphalañāṇehīti adhippāyo. ^b^Nibbānapada^eb^nti nibbānasaṅkhātaṃ dhammakoṭṭhāsaṃ. ^b^Vinivijjhanaṭṭhenā^eb^ti hadayaṃ vinividdhena hadayamhi vijjhitvā dukkhuppādanena khandhānaṃ ete pañca kāmā sattisūlasadisā. ^b^Adhikuṭṭanabhaṇḍikā^eb^ti āghātanaghaṭikā.
[06]Āḷavikāsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^163^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ṭhāna^eb^nti ^a^V1.0196^ea^ issariyaṭṭhānaṃ visayajjhattaṃ. ^b^Duppasahaṃ^eb^ akampiyabhāvattā. ^b^Dvaṅgulapaññāyā^eb^ti ettha itthiyo hi daharakumārikākālato paṭṭhāya ^a^M1.0224^ea^ odanapacanavidhiṃ anutiṭṭhantiyo ukkhaliyaṃ udakaṃ tāpetvā taṇḍule pakkhipitvā attano buddhiyā tesaṃ pākakālappamāṇaṃ paricchindituṃ tāni dabbiyā uddharitvāpi vaṇṇasaṇṭhānaggahaṇamattena pakkāpakkabhāvaṃ jānituṃ na sakkonti, kevalaṃ pana dvīhi aṅgulīhi uppīḷitakāle eva jānanti, tasmā dvīhaṅgulikehi dubbalapaññattā ^b^‘‘dvaṅgulapaññā’’^eb^ti vuccanti. Phalasamāpattiñāṇappavattikittanena catūsu saccesu asammohavihāro dīpito hotīti āha ^b^‘‘ñāṇamhi vattamānamhīti phalasamāpattiñāṇe pavattamāne’’^eb^ti. ^b^Vipassantassā^eb^ti asammohapaṭivedhato visesena passantassa khandhapañcakameva saccābhisamayato pubbabhāge vipassantassa. ^b^Aññaṃ vā^eb^ti itthipurisato aññaṃ vā kiñci vatthuṃ. ‘‘Ahaṃ asmī’’ti mānadiṭṭhigāhataṇhāgāhavasena gahitavatthusmiṃ yevāti āha ^b^‘‘ahaṃ asmīti taṇhāmānadiṭṭhivasenā’’^eb^ti.
[06]Somāsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^164^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Kisāgotamī’’ti ettha kā panāyaṃ kisāgotamī, kissa ayaṃ bhikkhunī hutvā samaṇadhammaṃ matthakaṃ pāpesīti tamatthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘pubbe kirā’’^eb^tiādimāraddhaṃ. ^b^Aṅgārāvā^eb^ti addāriṭṭhakavaṇṇāṅgārā eva jātā. ^b^Dārusāka^eb^nti addhamāsakena dāruṃ sākañca āharissāmīti antarāpaṇe antaravīthiṃ gatā.
[03]^b^Siddhatthaka^eb^nti sāsapaṃ. ^b^Sālāya^eb^nti anāthasālāyaṃ. ^b^Khuraggeyevā^eb^ti khurasikhe eva, kesorohanakkhaṇe evāti attho.

[03]^b^Ekamāsī^eb^ti ettha ^b^ma^eb^-kāro padasandhikaro. Saṃhitāvasena ca purimapade vā rassattaṃ. Parapade vā dīghattanti āha ^b^‘‘ekā āsī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Bhāvanapuṃsakametaṃ^eb^ ‘‘ekamantaṃ nisīdī’’tiādīsu viya. ^b^Puttamaraṇaṃ antaṃ atītaṃ^eb^ idāni puttamaraṇassa abhāvato. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘puttamaraṇaṃ nāma natthī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Purisaṃ gavesitu^eb^nti yathā mayhaṃ purisagavesanā nāma sabbaso natthi, tathā eva puttagavesanāpi natthi, tasmā me puttamaraṇaṃ etadantaṃ, sabbesu khandhādīsu bhavādīsu ca taṇhānandiyā ^a^V1.0197^ea^ abhāvakathanena sabbasattesu taṇhā sabbaso ^a^M1.0225^ea^ visositā, tassāyeva kārakāvijjākkhandho padālitoti attano nikkilesataṃ pavedentī therī sīhanādaṃ nadīti.
[06]Kisāgotamīsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^165^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañca aṅgāni etassāti pañcaṅgaṃ, pañcaṅgameva pañcaṅgikaṃ, tena ^b^pañcaṅgikena. Ātata^eb^ntiādīsu ^b^ātataṃ^eb^ nāma cammapariyonaddhesu bheriādīsu ekatalaṃ tūriyaṃ. ^b^Vitataṃ^eb^ nāma ubhayatalaṃ. ^b^Ātatavitataṃ^eb^ nāma tantibaddhavīṇādi. ^b^Susiraṃ^eb^ vaṃsādi. ^b^Ghanaṃ^eb^ sammādi. Tatāadivisesopi ātatamevāti ‘‘cammapariyonaddhesū’’ti visesanaṃ. Ekatalaṃ kumbhathūṇadaddarādi. Ubhayatalaṃ bherimudiṅgādi. Cammapariyonaddhaṃ sesaṃ tantibaddhaṃ sabbaṃ ātatavitataṃ nāma, gomukhīādīnampi ettheva saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Vaṃsādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^saddena saṅkhasiṅgānampi saṅgaho. Sammatāḷa-kaṃsatāḷa-silātāḷa-salākatāḷādi sammādi nāma. Tattha ^b^sammatāḷaṃ^eb^ nāma daṇḍamayatāḷaṃ, kaṃsamayatāḷaṃ ^b^kaṃsatāḷaṃ,^eb^ silāyaṃ ayopattena ca tāḷanatāḷaṃ. ^b^Sabbe^eb^ kāmaguṇe. ^b^Uggharitapaggharitaṭṭhenā^eb^ti upari gharaṇena ca vissandanena ca. ^b^Eva^eb^nti ‘‘iminā pūtikāyenā’’ti. ^b^Arūpaṭṭhāyino^eb^ti sattādhiṭṭhānenāyaṃ dhammadesanāti āha ^b^‘‘sabbatthāti sabbesu rūpārūpabhavesū’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tesaṃ dvinnaṃ^eb^ rūpārūpabhavānaṃ gahitattā. Bhavabhāvasāmaññato, tadadhiṭṭhānato ^b^gahite kāmabhave^eb^. ^b^Avijjātamo vihato^eb^ aggamaggena samugghātitattā.
[06]Vijayāsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^166^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Aggato^eb^^a^M1.0226^ea^^b^paṭṭhāyā^eb^ti sabbāggato pabhuti yāva mūlā antarāyuttaṃ sammadeva pupphitaṃ sālarukkhaṃ. Vaṇṇadhātusīsena vaṇṇadhātusampannaṃ dutiyaṃ bhikkhuniṃ vadatīti āha ^b^‘‘tayā sadisā aññā bhikkhunī natthī’’^eb^ti. Pakhumasīsena akkhibhaṇḍaṃ vuccatīti āha ^b^‘‘pakhumantarikāyanti dvinnaṃ akkhīnaṃ majjhe’’^eb^ti. ^b^Nāsavaṃse^eb^ti nāsavaṃsamūle. ^b^‘‘Na passasī’’^eb^ti vatvā adassane kāraṇaṃ āha ^b^‘‘vasībhūtamhī’’^eb^ti.
[06]Uppalavaṇṇāsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^167^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ida^eb^nti ^a^V1.0198^ea^ idaṃ dassanaṃ. ^b^Gāhāpesī^eb^ti samādāpesi ^b^‘‘jātiṃ mā rocā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Añña^eb^nti bandhavadhato aññaṃ chedanādiṃ. ^b^Nivesesī^eb^ti pavisāpesi.
[06]Cālāsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^168^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Punappunaṃ…pe… āgacchanti^eb^ kāraṇassa asamūhatattā. ^b^Santāpito^eb^ kilesasantāpehi. ^b^Agatī^eb^ti avisayo.
[06]Upacālāsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^169^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Samaṇisadisā^eb^ti samaṇaliṅgassa dhāraṇena samaṇisadisā, kassacipi pāsaṇḍassa aruccanato monamaggassa appaṭipajjanato tava samaṇibhāvaṃ nānupassāmīti adhippāyo. ^b^Pāsaṃ ḍentī^eb^ti pāsaṃ sajjenti, yathā ^a^M1.0227^ea^ tattha diṭṭhipāse sattānaṃ cittaṃ paṭimukkaṃ hoti, evaṃ sajjentīti attho. Tathābhūtā ca te sattānaṃ citte khittā viya hontīti āha ^b^‘‘cittesu diṭṭhipāsaṃ khipantīti attho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pāse mocetī^eb^ti diṭṭhipāse sattānaṃ cittasantānato nīharati dhammasudhammatāya. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti pāsamocanato pāsaṇḍoti na vuccati. ^b^‘‘Ito bahiddhāyeva pāsaṇḍā hontī’’^eb^ti vuttassa atthassa nigamanaṃ. Evañca katvā sabbepi bāhirakasamaye sandhāya ^b^cūḷasīhanādasutte^eb^ ‘‘channavuti pāsaṇḍā’’ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Pasīdantī^eb^ti diṭṭhipaṅke saṃsārapaṅke ca pakārehi agādhā osīdanti.

[03]^b^Abhibhavitvā^eb^ti sabbasaṃkilesappahānena abhibhuyya atikkamitvā. ^b^Ajito^eb^ti ajini avijayattā. Sabbāni akusalakammāni kusalakammāni ca khīṇāni etthāti ^b^sabbakammakkhayo,^eb^ arahattaṃ. Upadhayo sammadeva khīyanti etthāti ^b^upadhisaṅkhayo,^eb^ nibbānaṃ.
[06]Sīsupacālāsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^170^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kenidaṃ^eb^^a^V1.0199^ea^^b^pakataṃ bimba^eb^nti idaṃ attabhāvasaññitaṃ bimbaṃ brahmā-visaṇupurisa-pajāpatiādīsu kena kataṃ nimmitaṃ nibbattitanti kattabbamohaṃ nāma kātukāmo pucchati. ^b^Agha^eb^nti aghavatthu. Tenāha ^b^‘‘dukkhapatiṭṭhānattā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Hetunirodhenā^eb^ti taṇhāsaṅkhatassa hetuno anuppādanirodhena. ^b^Paccayavekallenā^eb^ti tadavasiṭṭhakilesābhisaṅkhārādipaccayassa vekallabhāvena, apaccayabhāvūpagamanenāti attho.
[06]Selāsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^171^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Suddhasaṅkhārapuñje^eb^ti rūpārūpavibhāge kilesasaṅkhārasamūhe. ^b^Paramatthato^eb^ti sabhāvena. Yathā na hi sattasaññitasaṅkhārapuñjo nāma paramatthato ^a^M1.0228^ea^ upalabbhati, evaṃ tabbinimutto nāma koci na upalabbhati avijjamānattā. ^b^Vijjamānesū^eb^ti yathāpaccayasampattiyā labbhamānesu. ^b^Tenākārenā^eb^ti itthipurisādiākārena. ^b^Vavatthitesū^eb^ti paccekaṃ paccayavisesasamuṭṭhitaṃ saṇṭhānavisesaṃ upādāya ‘‘puriso hatthī asso’’tiādinā abhisaṅgato pavattesu. ^b^Sammutī^eb^ti sattoti vohāro. Tenāha ^b^‘‘samaññāmattamevā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pañcakkhandhadukkha^eb^nti pañcakkhandhasaññitaṃ dukkhaṃ. Vuttaṃ hetaṃ bhagavatā ‘‘saṃkhittena pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhā’’ti (dī. ni. 2.387; ma. ni. 1.120; 3.373; vibha. 202) ^b^añño neva sambhoti^eb^ yathāvuttadukkhato aññassa saṅkhatadhammassa abhāvato. ^b^Na nirujjhatī^eb^ti tato aññaṃ na nirujjhati, uppādato hoti nirodhoti.
[06]Vajirāsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Sāratthappakāsiniyā saṃyuttanikāya-aṭṭhakathāya
[06]Bhikkhunīsaṃyuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^172^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Parivitakko^eb^^a^V1.0200^ea^^a^M1.0229^ea^^b^udapādī^eb^ti dhammagambhīratāpaccavekkhaṇahetuko dhammadesanāya appossukko uppajji. Ayaṃ parivitakko kasmā udapādi? Kattha ca udapādīti taṃ sabbaṃ vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘sabbabuddhāna’’^eb^ntiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha ^b^āciṇṇasamāciṇṇo^eb^ti ācarito ceva ācarantehi ca sammadeva ācaritoti attho. Etena ayaṃ parivitakko sabbabuddhānaṃ paṭhamābhisambodhiyaṃ uppajjatevāti ayamettha dhammatāti dasseti. Tattha ^b^aṭṭhame sattāhe^eb^ti idaṃ sattamasattāhato paraṃ sattāhabbhantare uppannattā vuttaṃ, na pana itaresaṃ viya aṭṭhamassa nāma sattāhassa pavattitassa sabbhāvā. ^b^Sapaccagghe^eb^ti mahagghe. ‘‘Paccagghe’’ti vā pāṭho, abhinaveti attho. ^b^Selamaye^eb^ti muggavaṇṇasilāmaye.

[03]^b^Paṭividdho^eb^ti sayambhuñāṇena ‘‘idaṃ dukkha’’ntiādinā paṭimukhaṃ nibbijjhanavasena patto, yāthāvato avabuddhoti attho. ^b^Dhammoti catusaccadhammo^eb^ tabbinimuttassa paṭivijjhitabbadhammassa abhāvato. ^b^Gambhīro^eb^ti mahāsamuddo viya makasatuṇḍasūciyā aññatra samupacitaparipakkañāṇasambhārehi aññesaṃ ñāṇena alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘uttānapaṭikkhepavacanameta’’^eb^nti. Yo alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭho, so ogāhituṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya sarūpato visesato ca passituṃ na sakkāti āha ^b^‘‘gambhīrattāva duddaso’’^eb^ti. ^b^Dukkhena daṭṭhabbo^eb^ti kicchena kenaci kadācideva daṭṭhabbo. Yaṃ pana daṭṭhumeva na sakkā, tassa ogāhetvā anu anu bujjhanako kadāci natthīti āha ^b^‘‘duddasattāva duranubodho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Dukkhena avabujjhitabbo^eb^ avabodhassa dukkarabhāvato. Imasmiṃ ṭhāne ‘‘taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, katamaṃ nu kho dukkarataraṃ vā durabhisambhavataraṃ vā’’ti (saṃ. ni. 5.1115) suttapadaṃ vattabbaṃ. Santārammaṇatāya vā ^b^santo^eb^. Nibbutasabbapariḷāhatāya ^b^nibbuto^eb^. Attano paccayehi padhānabhāvaṃ nītoti ^a^M1.0230^ea^ vā ^b^paṇīto^eb^^a^V1.0201^ea^. Atittikaraṇaṭṭhena ^b^atappako^eb^ sādurasabhojanaṃ viya. Tattha ca nirodhasaccaṃ santaṃ ārammaṇanti santārammaṇaṃ, maggasaccaṃ santaṃ santārammaṇañcāti santārammaṇaṃ, anupasantasabhāvānaṃ kilesānaṃ saṅkhārānañca abhāvato santo. Nibbutasabbapariḷāhattā nibbuto. Santapaṇītabhāveneva tadatthāya asecanakatāya atappakatā daṭṭhabbā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘idaṃ dvayaṃ lokuttarameva sandhāya vutta’’^eb^nti. Uttamañāṇassa visayattā ^b^na takkena avacaritabbo^eb^. Tato eva nipuṇañāṇagocaratāya saṇhasukhumasabhāvattā ca ^b^nipuṇo^eb^. Bālānaṃ avisayattā yathāvuttehi paṇḍitehi eva veditabboti ^b^paṇḍitavedanīyo^eb^. Ālīyanti abhiramitabbaṭṭhena sevīyantīti ^b^ālayā,^eb^ pañca kāmaguṇā. Ālayanti allīyanti abhiramaṇavasena sevantīti ^b^ālayā,^eb^ taṇhāvicaritāni. ^b^Ramantī^eb^ti ratiṃ vindanti kīḷanti laḷanti. ^b^Ālayaratāti^eb^ ālayaniratā.

[03]Ṭhānaṃ sandhāyāti ṭhānasaddaṃ sandhāya, atthako pana ṭhānanti ca paṭiccasamuppādo eva adhippeto. Tiṭṭhati phalaṃ tadāyattavuttitāyāti hi ^b^ṭhānaṃ,^eb^ saṅkhārādīnaṃ paccayabhūtā avijjādayo. Imesaṃ saṅkhārādīnaṃ paccayā idappaccayā, avijjādayo. ^b^Idappaccayā eva idappaccayatā^eb^ yathā ‘‘devo eva devatā’’. Idappaccayānaṃ vā avijjādīnaṃ attano phalaṃ pati paccayabhāvo uppādanasamatthatā ^b^idappaccayatā^eb^. Tena paramatthapaccayalakkhaṇo paṭiccasamuppādo dassito hoti. Paṭicca samuppajjati phalaṃ etasmāti ^b^paṭiccasamuppādo^eb^. Padadvayenapi dhammānaṃ paccayaṭṭho eva vibhāvito. Tenāha ^b^‘‘saṅkhārādipaccayānaṃ etaṃ adhivacana’’^eb^nti. Saṅkhārādīnaṃ paccayā saṅkhārādipaccayā, avijjādayo. Tesaṃ ^b^saṅkhārādipaccayānaṃ^eb^. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana ^b^visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ^eb^ (visuddhi. mahāṭī. 2.572-573) vuttanayena veditabbo. ^b^Sabbasaṅkhārasamathotiādi sabba^eb^nti sabbasaṅkhārasamathādiabhidheyyaṃ sabbaṃ atthato nibbānameva. Idāni assa nibbānabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yasmā hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Ta^eb^nti nibbānaṃ. ^b^Āgammā^eb^ti paṭicca ariyamaggassa ārammaṇapaccayahetu. ^b^Sammantī^eb^ti paṭippassaddhivūpasamavasena sammanti. Tathā santā ca savisesaṃ upasantā nāma hontīti āha ^b^‘‘vūpasammantī’’^eb^ti. Etena ^a^M1.0231^ea^ sabbe saṅkhārā sammanti etthāti ^b^sabbasaṅkhārasamatho,^eb^ nibbānanti dasseti. Sabbasaṅkhāravisaṃyutte hi nibbāne sabbasaṅkhāravūpasamapariyāyo aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutto eva. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo.

[03]Upadhīyati ettha dukkhanti ^b^upadhi,^eb^ khandhādayo. ^b^Paṭinissaṭṭhā^eb^ti samucchedavasena pariccattā honti. ^b^Sabbā taṇhā^eb^ti aṭṭhasatappabhedā sabbāpi taṇhā. ^b^Sabbe kilesarāgā^eb^ti kāmarāgarūparāgādibhedā sabbepi kilesabhūtā rāgā, sabbepi vā kilesā idha ^b^‘‘kilesarāgā’’^eb^ti adhippetā, na lobhavisesā eva cittassa pariḷāhabhāvāpādanato. Yathāha ‘‘rattampi cittaṃ vipariṇataṃ ^a^V1.0202^ea^, duṭṭhampi cittaṃ vipariṇataṃ, mūḷhampi cittaṃ vipariṇata’’nti (pārā. 271). ^b^Virajjantī^eb^ti palujjanti vikkhambhanato sabbaso tena visaṃyuttabhāvato. ^b^Sabbaṃ dukkha^eb^nti jarāmaraṇādibhedaṃ sabbaṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ. ^b^Bhavena bhava^eb^nti tena tena bhavena bhavantaraṃ bhavanikantibhāvena saṃsibbati. ^b^Phalena vā saddhiṃ kammaṃ^eb^ sataṇhasseva āyatiṃ punabbhavabhāvato. ^b^Tato vānato nikkhantaṃ^eb^ tattha tassa sabbaso abhāvato. Ciranisajjācirabhāsanehi piṭṭhiāgilāyanatālugalasosādivasena ^b^kāyakilamatho ceva kāyavihesā ca^eb^ veditabbā. Sā ca kho desanāya atthamajānantānaṃ apaṭipajjantānañca vasena, jānantānaṃ pana paṭipajjantānañca desanāya kāyaparissamopi satthu aparissamoyeva. Tenāha bhagavā – ‘‘na ca maṃ dhammādhikaraṇaṃ vihesesī’’ti (udā. 10). Tenevāha – ^b^‘‘yā ajānantānaṃ desanā nāma, so mama kilamatho assā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ubhaya^eb^nti cittakilamatho cittavihesā cāti ubhayampetaṃ buddhānaṃ natthi bodhimūle eva samucchinnattā. ^b^Anubrūhanaṃ^eb^ sampiṇḍanaṃ. ^b^So^eb^ti apissūti nipāto. Vuddhippattā vā acchariyā ^b^anacchariyā,^eb^ vuddhiatthopi hi -kāro hoti yathā ‘‘asekkhā dhammā’’ti. Kappānaṃ satasahassaṃ cattāri ca asaṅkhyeyyāni sadevakassa lokassa dhammasaṃvibhāgakaraṇatthameva pāramiyo pūretvā idāni samadhigatadhammarajjassa tattha appossukkatāpattidīpanatā gāthatthassa ca acchariyatā tassa vuddhippattīti veditabbaṃ. Atthadvārena hi gāthānaṃ anacchariyatā. ^b^Gocarā ahesu^eb^nti upaṭṭhahiṃsu. Upaṭṭhānañca vitakketabbatāvāti āha ^b^‘‘parivitakkayitabbataṃ pāpuṇiṃsū’’^eb^ti.

[03]Yadi ^a^M1.0232^ea^ sukhāpaṭipadāva, kathaṃ kicchatāti āha ^b^‘‘pāramīpūraṇakāle panā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Evamādīni^eb^ duppariccajāni dentassa. ^b^Ha^eb^-iti vā byattanti etasmiṃ atthe nipāto. ‘‘Ekaṃsatthe’’ti keci. Ha byattaṃ, ekaṃsena vā alaṃ nippayojanaṃ evaṃ kicchena adhigatassa pakāsituṃ desitunti yojanā. ^b^Hala^eb^nti vā alanti iminā samānatthapadaṃ ‘‘halanti vadāmī’’tiādīsu viya. ^b^Rāgadosaphuṭṭhehī^eb^ti phuṭṭhavisena viya sappena rāgena dosena ca phuṭṭhehi abhibhūtehi. ^b^Rāgadosānugatehī^eb^ti rāgadosehi anubandhehi.

[03]^b^Niccādīna^eb^nti niccādīnaṃ catunnaṃ vipallāsānaṃ. ^b^Evaṃgata^eb^nti evaṃ aniccantiādinā ākārena pavattaṃ bujjhitabbaṃ. Kāmarāgarattā ca bhavarāgarattā ca nīvaraṇehi nivutacittatāya diṭṭhirāgarattā viparītābhinivesena ^b^na dakkhanti^eb^ yāthāvato dhammaṃ na paṭivijjhissanti. ^b^Sabhāvenā^eb^ti aviparītasabhāvena. ^b^Evaṃ gāhāpetu^eb^nti aniccantiādinā sabhāvena yāthāvato dhammaṃ jānāpetuṃ. Rāgadosaparetatāpi nesaṃ sammūḷhabhāvenevāti āha ^b^‘‘tamokhandhena āvuṭā’’^eb^ti.

[03]Dhammadesanāya ^a^V1.0203^ea^ appossukkatāpattiyā kāraṇaṃ vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘kasmā panā’’^eb^tiādinā sayameva codanaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti. ^b^Aññātavesenā^eb^ti imassa bhagavato sāvakabhāvūpagamanena aññātavesena. ‘‘Aññataratāpasavesenā’’ti keci, so panassa arahattādhigamaneneva vigaccheyya. Tividhaṃ kāraṇaṃ appossukkatāpattiyā paṭipakkhassa balavabhāvo, dhammassa gambhīratā, tattha ca bhagavato sātisayaṃ gāravanti taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘tassa hī’’^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha ^b^paṭipakkhā^eb^ nāma rāgādayo kilesā sammāpaṭipattiyā antarāyakarattā. Tesaṃ balavabhāvato ciraparibhāvanāya sattasantānato dubbisodhiyatāya te satte mattahatthino viya dubbalapurisaṃ adhibhavitvā ajjhottharitvā anayabyasanaṃ āpādentā anekasatayojanāyāmavitthāraṃ sunicitaṃ ghanasannivesaṃ kaṇṭakaduggampi adhisenti. Dūrapabhedaducchejjatāhi dubbisodhiyataṃ pana dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘athassā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ca anto amaṭṭhatāya ^b^kañjiyapuṇṇā lābu,^eb^ cirapārivāsikatāya ^b^takkabharitā cāṭi,^eb^ snehatintadubbalabhāvena ^b^vasāpītapilotikā,^eb^ telamissitatāya ^b^añjanamakkhitahattho^eb^ dubbisodhanīyā vuttā. Hīnūpamā cetā rūpapabandhabhāvato acirakālikattā ca malīnatāya, kilesasaṃkileso eva pana dubbisodhanīyataro ^a^M1.0233^ea^ anādikālikattā arūpanissitattā ca. Tenāha ‘‘atisaṃkiliṭṭhā’’ti.

[03]Yathā ca dubbisodhanīyataratāya, evaṃ gambhīraduddasaduranubodhānampi vuttaupamā hīnūpamāva. Gambhīropi dhammo paṭipakkhavidhamanena ñāṇena visadabhāvaṃ āpannena supākaṭo bhaveyya, paṭipakkhavidhamanaṃ pana sammāpaṭipattipaṭibaddhaṃ, sā saddhammassavanādhīnā, taṃ satthari dhamme ca pasādāyattaṃ. So garuṭṭhāniyānaṃ ajjhesanahetukoti paṇālikāya sattānaṃ dhammasampaṭipattiyā brahmāyācanānimittanti taṃ dassento ^b^‘‘apicā’’^eb^tiādimāha.

[03]Upakkilesabhūtaṃ appaṃ rāgādirajaṃ etassāti apparajaṃ, apparajaṃ akkhi paññācakkhu yesaṃ te taṃsabhāvāti katvā ^b^apparajakkhajātikā^eb^ti imamatthaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘paññāmaye’’^eb^tiādimāha. Appaṃ rāgādirajaṃ yesaṃ taṃsabhāvā apparajakkhajātikāti evamettha attho veditabbo. ^b^Assavanatāti^eb^ ‘‘sayaṃ abhiññā’’tiādīsu viya karaṇe paccattavacananti āha ^b^‘‘assavanatāyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Dasapuññakiriyavasenā^eb^ti dānādidasavidhapuññakiriyavatthūnaṃ vasena. Tenāha ^b^‘‘katādhikārā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Papañcasūdaniyaṃ^eb^ (ma. ni. aṭṭha. 1.282) pana ‘‘dvādasapuññakiriyavasenā’’ti vuttaṃ, taṃ dānādīsu saraṇagamana-parahitapariṇāmanādipakkhipanavasena vuttaṃ.

[03]Rāgādimalena ^b^samalehi^eb^ pūraṇādīhi ^b^chahi satthārehi^eb^ satthupaṭiññehi kabbaracanāvasena cintākaviādibhāve ṭhatvā takkapariyāhataṃ vīmaṃsānucaritaṃ sayaṃpaṭibhānaṃ cintito. Te kira buddhakolāhalānussavena ^a^V1.0204^ea^ sañjātakutūhalaṃ lokaṃ vañcentā kohaññe ṭhatvā sabbaññutaṃ paṭijānantā yaṃ kañci adhammameva ‘‘dhammo’’ti dīpesuṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘te hi puretaraṃ uppajjitvā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Apāpureta^eb^nti etaṃ kassapassa bhagavato sāsanantaradhānato pabhuti pihitaṃ nibbānamahādvāraṃ ariyamaggaṃ saddhammadesanāhatthena apāpura vivara.

[03]Selo pabbato ucco hoti thiro ca, na paṃsupabbato missakapabbato cāti āha ^b^‘‘sele yathā pabbatamuddhanī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Dhammamayaṃ pāsāda^eb^nti lokuttaradhammamāha. So hi sabbaso pasādāvaho, sabbadhamme ^a^M1.0234^ea^ atikkamma abbhuggataṭṭhena pāsādasadiso ca. Paññāpariyāyo vā idha dhamma-saddoti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘paññāmaya’’^eb^nti. Sā hi abbhuggataṭṭhena pāsādoti abhidhamme āgatā. Tathā cāha –
[21]‘‘Paññāpāsādamāruyha, asoko sokiniṃ pajaṃ;
[22]Pabbataṭṭhova bhūmaṭṭhe, dhīro bāle avekkhatī’’ti. (dha. pa. 28);

[03]^b^Yathā hī^eb^tiādīsu yathā ca pabbate ṭhatvā andhakāre heṭṭhā olokentassa purisassa khettakedārapāḷikuṭikāyo tattha sayitamanussā ca na paññāyanti anujjalabhāvato, kuṭikāsu pana aggijālā paññāyati samujjalabhāvato, evaṃ dhammapāsādamāruyha sattalokaṃ olokayato bhagavato ñāṇassa āpāthaṃ nāgacchanti akatakalyāṇā sattā, ñāṇagginā anujjalabhāvato anuḷārabhāvato ca rattiṃ khittā sarā viya honti, katakalyāṇā pana bhabbapuggalā dūre ṭhitāpi bhagavato āpāthaṃ āgacchanti paripakkañāṇaggitāya samujjalabhāvato uḷārasantānatāya himavantapabbato viya cāti evaṃ yojanā veditabbā.

[03]Garuṭṭhānīyaṃ payirupāsitvā garutaraṃ payojanaṃ uddissa abhipatthanā ajjhesanā, sāpi atthato yācanāva hotīti āha ^b^‘‘ajjhesananti yācana’’^eb^nti. Padesavisayaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ ahutvā buddhānaṃyeva āveṇikabhāvato idaṃ ñāṇadvayaṃ ‘‘buddhacakkhū’’ti vuccatīti āha ^b^‘‘imesañhi dvinnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ ‘buddhacakkhū’ti nāma’’^eb^nti. ^b^Tiṇṇaṃ magggañāṇāna^eb^nti heṭṭhimānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ maggañāṇānaṃ ‘‘dhammacakkhū’’ti nāmaṃ catusaccadhammadassanamattabhāvato. Yato tāni ñāṇāni vijjūpamabhāvena vuttāni, aggamaggañāṇaṃ pana ñāṇakiccassa sikhāppattiyā dassanamattaṃ na hotīti ‘‘dhammacakkhū’’ti na vuccati, yato taṃ vajirūpamabhāvena vuttaṃ. ^b^Vuttanayenā^eb^ti ‘‘apparajakkhajātikā’’ti ettha vuttanayena. Yasmā mandakilesā ^b^‘‘apparajakkhā’’^eb^ti vuttā, tasmā ^a^V1.0205^ea^ bahalakilesā ^b^‘‘mahārajakkhā’’^eb^ti veditabbā. Paṭipakkhavidhamanasamatthatāya ^b^tikkhāni^eb^ sūrāni visadāni, vuttavipariyāyena ^b^mudūni. Saddhādayo ākārā^eb^ti saddahanādippakāre vadati. ^b^Sundarā^eb^ti kalyāṇā. ^b^Sammohavinodaniyaṃ^eb^ pana ‘‘yesaṃ āsayādayo koṭṭhāsā ^a^M1.0235^ea^ sundarā, te svākārā’’ti vuttaṃ, taṃ imāya atthavaṇṇanāya aññadatthu saṃsandatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Kāraṇaṃ^eb^ nāma paccayākāro, saccāni vā. ^b^Paraloka^eb^nti samparāyaṃ. Taṃ dukkhāvahaṃ vajjaṃ viya bhayato passitabbanti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘paralokañceva vajjañca bhayato passantī’’^eb^ti. Sampattibhavato vā aññattā vipattibhavo paralokoti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘para…pe… passantī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Ayaṃ panettha pāḷī^eb^ti ettha ‘‘apparajakkhā’’ti padānaṃ atthavibhāvane ayaṃ tassa tathābhāvasādhanapāḷi. Saddhādīnañhi vimuttaparipācakadhammānaṃ balavabhāvo tappaṭipakkhānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ dubbalabhāve sati hoti. Tesañca balavabhāvo saddhādīnaṃ dubbalabhāveti vimuttiparipācakadhammānaṃ savisesaṃ atthitānatthitāvasena apparajakkhā mahārajakkhātiādayo pāḷiyaṃ (paṭi. ma. 1.111) vibhajitvā dassitā ‘‘saddho puggalo apparajakkho’’tiādinā. Khandhādayo eva lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena ^b^loko^eb^ sampattibhavabhūto loko ^b^sampattibhavaloko,^eb^ sugatisaṅkhāto upapattibhavo. Sampatti bhavati etenāti ^b^sampattisambhavaloko,^eb^ sugatisaṃvattaniyo kammabhavo. Duggatisaṅkhātaupapattibhava-duggatisaṃvattaniyakammabhavā ^b^vipattibhavaloka-vipattisambhavalokā^eb^. Puna ekakadukādivasena lokaṃ vibhajitvā dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘eko loko’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Āhārādayo viya hi āhāraṭṭhitikā saṅkhārā sabbe lujjanaṭṭhena lokoti. Tattha ^b^eko loko sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā^eb^ti yāyaṃ puggalādhiṭṭhānāya kathāya sabbesaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ paccayāyattavuttitā vuttā, tāya sabbo saṅkhāraloko eko ekavidho pakārantarassa abhāvato. ^b^Dve lokā^eb^tiādīsupi iminā nayena attho veditabbo. Nāmaggahaṇena cettha nibbānassa aggahaṇaṃ tassa alokasabhāvattā.

[03]Nanu ca ‘‘āhāraṭṭhitikā’’ti ettha paccayāyattavuttitāya maggaphalānampi lokatā āpajjatīti? Nāpajjati, pariññeyyānaṃ dukkhasaccadhammānaṃ idha ‘‘loko’’ti adhippetattā. Atha vā na lujjati na palujjatīti yo gahito tathā na hoti, so lokoti taṃgahaṇarahitānaṃ lokuttarānaṃ natthi lokatā. Upādānānaṃ ārammaṇabhūtā khandhā ^b^upādānakkhandhā^eb^. Anurodhādivatthubhūtā lābhādayo ^b^aṭṭha^eb^^a^M1.0236^ea^^b^lokadhammā. Dasāyatanānī^eb^ti dasa rūpāyatanāni. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva. Vivaṭṭajjhāsayassa adhippetattā tassa ca sabbaṃ tebhūmakakammaṃ garahitabbaṃ vajjitabbañca hutvā upaṭṭhātīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sabbe abhisaṅkhārā vajjā, sabbe bhavagāmikammā vajjā’’^eb^ti ^a^V1.0206^ea^. Apparajakkhatādīsu pañcasu dukesu ekekasmiṃ dasa dasa katvā ^b^‘‘paññāsāya ākārehi imāni pañcindriyāni jānātī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Atha vā anvayato byatirekato ca saddhādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ paropariyattaṃ jānātīti katvā tathā vuttaṃ. Ettha ca apparajakkhādibhabbādivasena āvajjentassa bhagavato te sattā puñjapuñjāva hutvā upaṭṭhahanti, na ekekā.

[03]Uppalāni ettha santīti ^b^uppalinī^eb^. Uppalagacchopi jalāsayopi ca. Idha pana jalāsayo adhippetoti āha ^b^‘‘uppalavane’’^eb^ti. Yāni hi udakassa anto nimuggāneva hutvā pusanti vaḍḍhanti, tāni antonimuggaposīni. ^b^Dīpitānī^eb^ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pakāsitāni, idheva vā ^b^‘‘aññānipī’’^eb^tiādinā dassitāni. ^b^Ugghaṭitaññū^eb^ti ugghaṭanaṃ nāma ñāṇugghaṭanaṃ, ñāṇena ugghaṭitamatteneva jānātīti attho. Vipañcitaṃ vitthāritameva atthaṃ jānātīti ^b^vipañcitaññū^eb^. Niddesādīhi dhammābhisamayāya netabboti ^b^neyyo^eb^. Pajjati attho etenāti padaṃ, pajjate ñāyateti vā padaṃ, tadattho. Padaṃ paramaṃ etassa, na saccābhisambodhoti ^b^padaparamo^eb^.

[03]^b^Udāhaṭavelāyā^eb^ti udāhāre dhammassa uddese udāhaṭamatteyeva. ^b^Dhammābhisamayo^eb^ti catusaccadhammassa ñāṇena saddhiṃ abhisamayo. ^b^Ayaṃ vuccatī^eb^ti ayaṃ ‘‘cattāro satipaṭṭhānā’’tiādinā nayena saṃkhittena mātikāya ṭhapiyamānāya desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhituṃ samattho puggalo ‘‘ugghaṭitaññū’’ti vuccati. ^b^Ayaṃ vuccatī^eb^ti saṃkhittena mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā vitthārena atthe vibhajiyamāne arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ samattho puggalo ‘‘vipañcitaññū’’ti vuccati. ^b^Uddesato^eb^ti uddesahetu. Uddisantassa uddisāpentassa vāti attho. ^b^Paripucchato^eb^ti atthaṃ paripucchantassa. ^b^Anupubbena dhammābhisamayo hotī^eb^ti anukkamena arahattappatti hoti. ^b^Na tāya jātiyā dhammābhisamayo hotī^eb^ti tena attabhāvena maggaṃ vā phalaṃ vā antamaso jhānaṃ vā vipassanaṃ vā nibbattetuṃ na sakkoti. ^b^Ayaṃ vuccati padaparamo^eb^ti ayaṃ puggalo chabbidhaṃ byañjanapadaṃ chabbidhaṃ atthapadanti idaṃ padameva paramaṃ assāti padaparamoti vuccatīti attho.

[03]^b^Vāsanā^eb^^a^M1.0237^ea^^b^hotī^eb^ti desanā phalavohārena vāsanā hotīti vuttā. Na hi kāci buddhānaṃ desanā niratthakā. ^b^Ye^eb^ti ye duvidhe puggale. Vibhaṅge ^b^kammāvaraṇenā^eb^ti pañcavidhena ānantariyakammena. ^b^Vipākāvaraṇenā^eb^ti ahetukapaṭisandhiyā. Yasmā pana duhetukānampi ariyamaggapaṭivedho natthi, tasmā duhetukā paṭisandhipi vipākāvaraṇamevāti veditabbā. ^b^Kilesāvaraṇenā^eb^ti niyatamicchādiṭṭhiyā. ^b^Assaddhā^eb^ti buddhādīsu saddhārahitā. ^b^Acchandikā^eb^ti kattukamyatāchandarahitā. Uttarakurukā manussā acchandikaṭṭhānaṃ paviṭṭhā. ^b^Duppaññā^eb^ti bhavaṅgapaññāya parihīnā. Bhavaṅgapaññāya ^a^V1.0207^ea^ pana paripuṇṇāyapi yassa bhavaṅgacalanaṃ lokuttarassa paccayo na hoti, sopi duppañño eva nāma. ^b^Abhabbā niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammatta^eb^nti kusalesu dhammesu sammattaniyāmasaṅkhātaṃ maggaṃ okkamituṃ adhigantuṃ abhabbā. ^b^Na kammāvaraṇenā^eb^tiādīni vuttavipariyāyena veditabbāni. ^b^Rāgacaritā^eb^diādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ ^b^paramatthadīpaniyaṃ visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ^eb^ (visuddhi. mahāṭī. 1.43) vuttanayena veditabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Nibbānassa dvāraṃ^eb^ pavisanamaggo ^b^vivaritvā ṭhapito^eb^ mahākaruṇūpanissayena sayambhuñāṇena adhigatattā. ^b^Saddhaṃ pamuñcantū^eb^ti attano saddhaṃ dhammasampaṭicchanayogyaṃ katvā vissajjentu, saddahanākārena naṃ upaṭṭhapentūti attho. Sukhena akicchena pavattanīyatāya ^b^suppavattitaṃ. Na bhāsiṃ^eb^ na bhāsissāmīti cintesiṃ.

[03]Satthu santikaṃ upagatānaṃ devānaṃ brahmānañca tassa purato antaradhānaṃ nāma atiṭṭhananti āha ^b^‘‘sakaṭṭhānameva gato’’^eb^ti. Saddhindriyādi sammādiṭṭhiādiko dhammo eva vineyyasantāne pavattanaṭṭhena cakkanti ^b^dhammacakkaṃ^eb^. Atha vā ^b^cakka^eb^nti āṇā. ^b^Dhamma^eb^nti desanā. Atha vā atthadhammato anapetattā dhammañca taṃ pavattanaṭṭhena cakkañcāti ^b^dhammacakkaṃ^eb^. Dhammena ñāyena cakkantipi ^b^dhammacakkaṃ^eb^. Yathāha ‘‘dhammañca pavatteti cakkañcāti dhammacakkaṃ, cakkañca pavatteti dhammañcāti dhammacakkaṃ, dhammena pavattetīti dhammacakkaṃ, dhammacariyāya pavattetīti dhammacakka’’ntiādi (paṭi. ma. 2.40-41). ^b^Pavattesī^eb^ti paṭṭhapesi.
[06]Brahmāyācanasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^173^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ayaṃ^eb^^a^M1.0238^ea^^b^vitakko^eb^ti ayaṃ ‘‘kintāhaṃ vihareyya’’nti evaṃ pavattitavitakko. ^b^Aññasmi^eb^nti parasmiṃ. Attā na hotīti hi añño, paro. So panettha na yo koci adhippeto, atha kho garuṭṭhānīyo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kañci garuṭṭhāne aṭṭhapetvā’’^eb^ti. Patissavati garuno ‘‘āmā’’ti sampaṭicchatīti patisso, na patissoti ^b^appatisso. Patissayarahito^eb^ garupassayarahitoti attho.

[03]^b^Sadevake^eb^ti avayavena viggaho samudāyo samāsattho. Sadevakaggahaṇena pañcakāmāvacaradevaggahaṇaṃ pārisesañāyena itaresaṃ padantarehi saṅgahitattā, samārakaggahaṇena chaṭṭhakāmāvacaradevaggahaṇaṃ ^a^V1.0208^ea^ paccāsattiñāyena. Tattha hi māro jāto tannivāsī ca hoti. Sabrahmakavacanena brahmakāyikādibrahmaggahaṇaṃ paccāsattiñāyeneva. ‘‘Sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāyā’’ti sāsanassa paccatthikasamaṇabrāhmaṇaggahaṇaṃ. Nidassanamattañcetaṃ apaccatthikānaṃ asamitapāpānaṃ abāhitapāpānañca samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ teneva vacanena gahitattā. Kāmaṃ ‘‘sadevake’’tiādivisesanānaṃ vasena sattavisayo lokasaddoti viññāyati tulyayogavisayattā tesaṃ. ‘‘Salomako sapakkhako’’tiādīsu pana atulyayogepi ayaṃ samāso labbhatīti byabhicāradassanato pajāgahaṇanti pajāvacanena sattalokaggahaṇaṃ. Devabhāvasāmaññena mārabrahmesu gahitesupi itarehi tesaṃ labbhamānavisesadassanatthaṃ visuṃ gahaṇanti dassento ^b^‘‘māro nāmā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Māro brahmānampi vicakkhukammāya pahotīti āha ^b^‘‘sabbesa’’^eb^nti. ^b^Uparī^eb^ti uparibhāve. ^b^Brahmā^eb^ti dasasahassibrahmānaṃ sandhāyāha. Tathā cāha ^b^‘‘dasahi aṅgulīhī’’^eb^tiādi. Idha dīghanikāyādayo viya bāhirakānampi ganthanikāyo labbhatīti āha ^b^‘‘ekanikāyādivasenā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Vatthuvijjādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena vijjāṭṭhānāni saṅgahitāni. Yathāsakaṃ kammakilesehi pajātattā nibbattattā pajā, sattanikāyo. Tassā ^b^pajāya. Sadevamanussāyā^eb^ti vā iminā sammutidevaggahaṇaṃ tadavasiṭṭhamanussalokaggahaṇañca daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evaṃ bhāgaso lokaṃ gahetvā yojanaṃ dassetvā idāni abhāgaso lokaṃ gahetvā yojanaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘apicetthā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Lokavasena vuttāni^eb^ ‘‘lokīyanti ettha kammakammaphalānī’’ti ^a^M1.0239^ea^ katvā, ^b^pajāvasena^eb^ ‘‘hetupaccayehi pajāyatī’’ti katvā. ^b^Sīlasampannatara^eb^nti ettha paripuṇṇasampannatā adhippetā ‘‘sampannaṃ sālikedāra’’ntiādīsu (jā. 1.14.1) viya. Tenāha ^b^‘‘adhikataranti attho’’^eb^ti. Paripuṇṇampi ‘‘adhikatara’’nti vattabbatamarahati. ^b^Sesesū^eb^ti ‘‘samādhisampannatara’’ntiādīsu.
[03]^b^Kāraṇa^eb^ntiādīsu ^b^kāraṇa^eb^nti yuttiṃ. ^b^Attha^eb^nti aviparītatthaṃ. ^b^Vuḍḍhi^eb^nti abhivuḍḍhinimittaṃ.

[03]^b^Iminā vacanenā^eb^ti imasmiṃ sutte anantaraṃ vuttavacanena. Na kevalaṃ imināva, suttantarampi ānetvā paṭibāhitabboti dassento ^b^‘‘na me ācariyo atthī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Ettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ ^b^sumaṅgalavilāsiniyā dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāya^eb^ (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 3.162) vuttameva. ^b^Sara^eb^nti karaṇe etaṃ paccattavacananti āha ^b^‘‘sarantenā’’^eb^ti, ^b^sara^eb^nti vā saraṇahetūti attho.
[06]Gāravasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^174^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ekako^eb^ti ^a^V1.0209^ea^ vivekaṭṭhitatāya nissaṭo. Gaṇasaṅgaṇikābhāvo tassānena dīpito, kilesasaṅgaṇikābhāvo pana ^b^‘‘appamatto’’^eb^tiādīhi pakāsito. ^b^Pesitatto^eb^ti nibbānaṃ pati pesitacitto. ^b^Sammadevā^eb^ti ñāyeneva. So pana yadi āgamanato paṭṭhāya labbhati, vattabbameva natthi, atha paṭipadārambhato paṭṭhāya labbhati, evampi vaṭṭatevāti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yathā vā tathā vā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Aggamaggādhigamena asammohapaṭivedhassa sikhāppattattā maggadhammesu viya phaladhammesupi sātisayo asammohoti ‘‘sayaṃ abhiññā’’ti vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘sāmaṃ jānitvā’’^eb^ti. Yathā jānanā panassa sacchikaraṇaṃ attapaccakkhakiriyāti ‘‘sacchikatvā’’ti vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘paccakkhaṃ katvā’’^eb^ti. Tathā sacchikiriyā cassa vipassanāpaṭilābhoti ‘‘upasampajjā’’ti vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘paṭilabhitvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Etenā^eb^ti ‘‘khīṇā jātī’’tiādivacanena.

[03]^b^Jāti^eb^^a^M1.0240^ea^^b^khīṇā^eb^ti ettha jātisīsena tabbikāravanto khandhā vuttā. ^b^Pubbeva khīṇattā^eb^ti maggādhigamanato pageva atītabhāveneva khīṇattā. ^b^Tattha^eb^ anāgatesu. ^b^Vāyāmābhāvato^eb^ti avijjamānattā. Anāgatabhāvasāmaññaṃ gahetvā lesena vuttaṃ. ^b^Na paccuppannā vijjamānattā^eb^ti saṃkiliṭṭhā ca maggabhāvanāti siyāti vacanaseso. Yathā ajātaphalataruṇarukkhamūle chinne āyatiuppajjanārahāni phalāni chedanapaccayā anuppajjamānāni naṭṭhāni nāma honti, evameva bhāvanāya asati uppajjanārahā kilesā tappaccayā jāti ca maggabhāvanāya sati na uppajjamānā pahīnāti vuccantīti imamatthaṃ dasseti ^b^‘‘maggassa panā’’^eb^tiādinā. ^b^Anuppādadhammataṃ āpajjanena^eb^ ñāṇena khīṇarāgavasena.

[03]^b^Soḷasakiccabhāvāyā^eb^ti soḷasakiccatāya, soḷasavidhassa vā kiccassa bhāvāya uppādanāya. Pāḷiyaṃ ^b^sapadāna^eb^nti sapadānacāro vutto bhāvanapuṃsakaniddesenāti āha ^b^‘‘sapadānacāra’’^eb^nti. ^b^Anukkammā^eb^ti anatikkamitvā. ^b^Āhutipiṇḍa^eb^nti juhitabbapiṇḍaṃ, juhanavasena aggimhi pakkhipitabbapāyāsapiṇḍanti adhippāyo. ^b^Bhūtabalikamma^eb^nti tathā pakkhipitvā balikammakaraṇaṃ. ^b^Haritupalitta^eb^nti allagomayena kataparibhaṇḍaṃ. ^b^Vanamālaparikkhitta^eb^nti manoharāhi vanapupphamālāhi parikkhittaṃ. ^b^Dhūmakaṭacchū^eb^ti dhūmapānaṃ. ^b^Sīlagandha^eb^nti sīlaṃ paṭicca uppannakittigandhaṃ. ^b^Ghāyamānassā^eb^ti upagataṃ gaṇhantassa.

[03]^b^Imamhā^eb^^a^V1.0210^ea^^b^ṭhānā^eb^ti imasmā manussānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānā, mahāpathavitalatoti adhippāyo. ^b^Sabbaheṭṭhimo^eb^ti brahmapārisajjānaṃ vāsabrahmalokamāha. ^b^Brahmapatho nāma cattāri kusalajjhānāni^eb^ brahmalokamaggabhāvato. ^b^Jīvitapatho nāma^eb^ jīvitapavattiupāyabhāvato. ‘‘Bhuñjatu bhavaṃ mahābrahmā’’ti vacanaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘kiṃ jappasī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Tiṇabījānī^eb^ti sālitaṇḍulādīni. ^b^Goyūsa^eb^nti khīraṃ jigucchanto vadati. Ayampi attho ‘‘netādiso brahmabhakkho’’ti vadantena dīpitoti.

[03]Atidevapattopi pañcakhandhūpadhīnaṃ atthitāya kilesūpadhiādīnaṃyeva virahitabhāvo gahito. Aññatra hi bhāvapaccayaṃ tadattho viññāyatīti āha ^b^‘‘atidevabhāvaṃ patto’’^eb^ti. Yasmā brahmānopi devagatipariyāpannattā devā eva, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘atibrahmabhāvaṃ patto’’^eb^ti.
[03]^b^Attānaṃ^eb^^a^M1.0241^ea^^b^bhāvetvā^eb^ti sīlādīhi guṇehi attānaṃ vaḍḍhetvā paribrūhitvā ṭhito.

[03]^b^Puthujjanā tasā^eb^ taṇhāmānadiṭṭhiparittāsavasena tāsanato. ^b^Khīṇāsavā thāvarā nāma^eb^ sabbaso gatīsu sañcaraṇābhāvato. Tathā hi catunnaṃ saccānaṃ sabbaso adiṭṭhattā bhavadāyajjassa taṇhādāsabyassa bhāvato ekaccāsu gatīsu sañcaraṇasabhāvato sekkhā thāvarā na honti. ^b^Bhajamānā^eb^ti bhajāpiyamānā. ^b^Thāvarapakkhameva bhajanti^eb^ sabbaseṭṭhapakkhaṃ ekantapasaṭṭhaṃ bhajamānabhāvaṃ upādāya.
[03]Pahīnakileso khīṇāsavo ^b^viseno^eb^. Sukhaṃ āyati sukhāyati, tassa kārakaṃ ^b^sukhāyatikaṃ^eb^.
[06]Brahmadevasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^175^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Sassato attā ca loko cā’’ti evaṃ pavattā diṭṭhi ^b^sassatadiṭṭhi. Saha kāyenā^eb^ti saha tena brahmattabhāvena. ^b^Brahmaṭṭhāna^eb^nti attano brahmavatthuṃ. ^b^Aniccaṃ ‘‘nicca’’nti vadati^eb^ aniccatāya attano apaññāyamānattā. ^b^Thira^eb^nti daḷhaṃ, vināsābhāvato sārabhūtanti attho. Uppādavipariṇāmābhāvato ^b^sadā vijjamānaṃ. Kevala^eb^nti paripuṇṇaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘akhaṇḍa’’^eb^nti. ^b^Kevala^eb^nti vā jātiādīhi asammissaṃ, virahitanti adhippāyo. Uppādādīnaṃ abhāvato eva ^b^acavanadhammaṃ. Koci jāyanako…pe… upapajjanako vā natthi^eb^ niccabhāvato ^a^V1.0211^ea^ ṭhānena saddhiṃ tannivāsīnaṃ. Niccabhāvañhi so paṭijānāti. ^b^Tisso jhānabhūmiyo^eb^ti dutiyatatiyacatutthajjhānabhūmiyo. Catutthajjhānabhūmivisesā hi asaññasuddhāvāsāruppabhavā. ^b^Nibbāna^eb^nti vā ettha ^b^iti^eb^-saddo ādiattho, na parisamāpanattho, tasmā ‘‘sabba’’nti iminā ‘‘asañña…pe… bhavā’’ti vuttaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Paṭibāhatī^eb^ti santaṃyeva samānaṃ ajānantova ‘‘natthī’’ti paṭikkhipati. ^b^Eke^eb^ uttaravihāravāsino.

[03]^b^Heṭṭhūpapattikoti^eb^^a^M1.0242^ea^ heṭṭhā bhūmīsu uppannaupapattiko. Idāni tamatthaṃ vivarituṃ ^b^‘‘anuppanne’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Heṭṭhupapattikaṃ katvā^eb^ti yathāṭhitabhūmito heṭṭhā tatiyajjhānabhūmiyaṃ upapattijhānaṃ katvā, na uparijhānassa viya patthanāmattanti adhippāyo. ^b^Paṭhamakāle^eb^ti tasmiṃ bhave paṭhamakāle. ^b^Aññāsi^eb^ āsannabhāvato. ^b^Ubhaya^eb^nti taṃ taṃ attanā katakammañceva nibbattaṭṭhānañcāti ubhayaṃ. ^b^Pamussitvā^eb^ nibbattiṃ anupadhārento.

[03]^b^Avijjāya gato^eb^ti avijjāya saha pavatto. Sahayoge hi idaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘samannāgato’’^eb^ti. ^b^Aññāṇī^eb^ti avidvā. Paññācakkhuvirahato ^b^andhībhūto,^eb^ andhabhāvaṃ āpannoti attho. Anāgate saddo hotāyaṃ ‘‘vakkhatī’’ti yatrasaddapayogena, attho pana vattamānakāliko. Tenāha ^b^‘‘bhaṇatī’’^eb^ti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yatrā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Maggacoro^eb^ti maggaparibundhakacoro. ^b^Santajjiyamāno^eb^ti ‘‘avijjāgato vata, bho, bako brahmā’’tiādinā santajjiyamāno. ^b^Satiṃ labhitvā^eb^ti teneva santajjanena yoniso ummujjitvā purimajātivisayaṃ satiṃ labhitvā. ^b^Nippīḷitukāmo^eb^ti ghaṃsetukāmo dosaṃ dassetukāmo ‘‘idaṃ passa yāvañca te aparaddha’’nti. ^b^Puññakammā^eb^ti puññakārino. ^b^Vedehi^eb^ ñāṇehi ^b^gatattā^eb^ pavattattā. ^b^Antimā brahmupapattī^eb^ti sabbapacchimā brahmabhāvappatti. ^b^Asmābhijappantī^eb^ti asme abhijappanti. Āyuvaṇṇādivasena brūhitaguṇattā ^b^brahmā^eb^. Aññehi mahantā brahmā ^b^mahābrahmā. Abhibhū^eb^ti taṃ brahmalokaṃ jeṭṭhakabhāvena abhibhavitvā ṭhito. ^b^Anabhibhūto^eb^ti aññehi na abhibhūto. ^b^Aññadatthū^eb^ti ekaṃsavacanametaṃ. Dassanavasena ^b^daso,^eb^ sabbaṃ passatīti adhippāyo. ^b^Vasavattī^eb^ti sabbajanaṃ vase vatteti. ^b^Issaro^eb^ti loke issaro. ^b^Kattā nimmātā^eb^ti lokassa kattā nimmātā. ^b^Seṭṭho sajitā^eb^ti ayaṃ lokassa uttamo saṃvibhajitā ca. ^b^Vasī pitā bhūtabhabyāna^eb^nti āciṇṇavasittā vasī, ayaṃ pitā bhūtānaṃ nibbattānaṃ bhabyānaṃ sambhavesīnanti ^b^patthenti^eb^ vikatthenti ^b^pihenti^eb^ mānenti.

[03]^b^Eta^eb^nti ^a^V1.0212^ea^^a^M1.0243^ea^ viparītasaññāvasena ‘‘idaṃ niccaṃ idaṃ dhuvaṃ idaṃ sassata’’ntiādinā vuttaṃ etaṃ appaṃ parittakanti taṃ bhagavā paricchinditvā dasseti. Taṃ pana ‘‘ekasmiṃ kosalake tilavāhe vassasate vassasate ekekatiluddhāre kayiramāne tilāni parikkhayaṃ gacchanti, na tveva abbude āyū’’ti evaṃ vutto abbudo, taṃvasena vīsatiguṇaṃ nirabbudo, tesaṃ nirabbudānaṃ vasena nirabbudasatasahassaṃ. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthārato pana padume āyuno vassagaṇanā imasmiṃyeva saṃyutte parato āgamissati. ^b^Anantadassī^eb^ti anantassa ñeyyassa anavasesato dassī. ^b^Vatasīlavatta^eb^nti samādānavasena vatabhūtaṃ cārittasīlavasena samāciṇṇattā sīlavattaṃ. Taṃ pana ekamevāti āha ^b^‘‘sīlamevā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Apāyesī^eb^ti ettha yadā so pipāsite manusse pānīyaṃ pāyesi, taṃ samudāgamato paṭṭhāya dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘tatrā’’^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. ^b^Pubbe^eb^ti purimajātiyaṃ. Esa brahmā ‘‘jarāmaraṇassa antaṃ karissāmī’’ti ajjhāsayavasena jhānaṃ nibbattetvā brahmaloke nibbatti, so tattha nibbānasaññī ahosi. ^b^Jhānaratiyā vītināmetī^eb^ti tadā tassā kiriyāya avicchedato pavattiṃ upādāya vattamānapayogo. Rattandhakāre purato purato gacchantassa sakaṭassa anussaraṇavasena gacchantānaṃ sakaṭānaṃ nivattanaṃ hotīti ^b^‘‘sabbasakaṭāni tatheva nivattitvā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Kammasajjā^eb^ti yuddhasajjā. ^b^Vilopa^eb^nti viluttabhaṇḍaṃ. ^b^Eṇikūlasmi^eb^nti ettha ‘‘panihatāya niccagaṅgāya nāma’’nti keci. ‘‘Eṇimigabahulatāya so gaṅgāya tīrappadeso eṇikūlanti vutta’’nti apare. ^b^Gaṅgeyyako^eb^ti gaṅgāsannivāsī.

[03]^b^Baddhacaro^eb^ti paṭibaddhacariyo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘antevāsiko’’^eb^ti. ^b^Yasmā buddho^eb^ sabbaññū, tasmā aññāsi, idha mayhaṃ pamuṭṭhañca sabbaṃ jānāsīti adhippāyo. ^b^Sabbaṃ brahmalokaṃ obhāsayanto^eb^ sabbampimaṃ brahmalokaṃ bhagavā obhāsaṃ abhibhavitvā anaññasādhāraṇaṃ attano obhāsaṃ obhāsento tiṭṭhati.
[06]Bakabrahmasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^176^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tejokasiṇaparikammaṃ^eb^^a^M1.0244^ea^^b^katvā^eb^ti ‘‘tejokasiṇaparikammajjhānaṃ samāpajjissāmī’’ti cittuppādo evettha tejokasiṇaparikammaṃ. Na hi buddhānaṃ aññesaṃ viya tattha jhānasamāpajjanena ^a^V1.0213^ea^ parikammapapañco atthi sabbattheva ciṇṇavasībhāvassa paramukkaṃsabhāvappattattā. Tassa kira brahmuno ‘‘yathāhaṃ evaṃ mahānubhāvo añño natthī’’ti laddhi, yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – ‘‘natthi so samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā, yo idha āgaccheyyā’’ti. Bhagavā tassa taṃ laddhiṃ vissajjetuṃ tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā tassa upari ākāse nisīdi. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘tejodhātuṃ…pe… tathāgataṃ disvā’’^eb^ti. Aṭṭhivedhaṃ viyaṃ vijjhitabbo ^b^aṭṭhivedhī,^eb^ yathā aṭṭhiṃ vijjhitvā aṭṭhimiñjaṃ āhacca tiṭṭhati, evaṃ vijjhitabboti attho. Ayaṃ pana aṭṭhivedhī viya ^b^aṭṭhivedhī,^eb^ yathā so laddhiṃ vissajjeti, evaṃ paṭipajjitabboti attho. ^b^Sesāna^eb^nti mahākassapamahākappinānuruddhattherānaṃ.

[03]^b^Aññabrahmasarīravimānālaṅkārādīnaṃ pabhā^eb^ti brahmānaṃ sarīrappabhā vimānappabhā alaṅkāravatthādīnaṃ pabhāti imasmiṃ brahmaloke imā sabbā pabhā attano pabhassarabhāvena abhibhavantaṃ. ^b^Natthi me sā^eb^ti idāni me sā diṭṭhi natthi, ‘‘natthi so samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā, yo idha āgaccheyyā’’ti ayaṃ laddhi natthi. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tatrāssa…pe… pahīnā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti etasmiṃ samāgame. Yathā tassa brahmuno sabbaso diṭṭhigataṃ vimuccati dhammacakkhu uppajjati, evaṃ ^b^mahantaṃ dhammadesanaṃ desesi^eb^.

[03]‘‘Ajjāpi te, āvuso’’tiādinā vuttena ^b^tattakeneva. Sarūpena vuttā^eb^ti paṭhamena pādena catasso, dutiyena ekanti evaṃ pañca abhiññā sarūpena vuttā. Kasmā ettha dibbasotaṃ nāgatanti? Āha ^b^‘‘tāsaṃ vasena āgatamevā’’^eb^ti. Yena imā lokuttarā abhiññā adhigatā, na tassa dibbasotasampādanaṃ bhāriyaṃ paṭipakkhavigamena sukheneva ijjhanato.
[06]Aññatarabrahmasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^177^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paccekaṃ^eb^^a^M1.0245^ea^^b^dvārabāha^eb^nti paccekaṃ dvārabāhaṃ. Pacceka-saddo cettha āvuttivasena veditabbo; ‘‘paccekaṃ pacceka’’nti āha ^b^‘‘ekeko ekeka’’^eb^nti. Tesu hi eko paccekabrahmā gandhakuṭiyā ekadvārabāhaṃ nissāya ṭhito, aparo aññaṃ. ^b^Paccekabrahmā^eb^ti ca ekacārī brahmā, na parisacārī brahmāti attho. Samiddhi nāma sagge sukhupakaraṇehi, brahmānañca jhānaṃ sukhupakaraṇanti ^b^jhānasukhena samiddho^eb^ti. Sampattiyā vepullappattatā brahmānañca abhiññāguṇehi vepullappattīti ^a^V1.0214^ea^ āha ^b^‘‘phītoti abhiññāpupphehi supupphito’’^eb^ti. ^b^Asahanto^eb^ti nasahanto narocento.

[03]^b^Satapada^eb^nti satasaddo. ^b^Rūpavasenā^eb^ti rūpasaddavasena, rūpasaddena saddhinti attho. Tathā ^b^pantivasenā^eb^ti etthāpi. ^b^Ekacce^eb^ti eke migārī, tesaṃ byagghīnisārūpakānaṃ pañcasatānīti attho. ^b^‘‘Kassa aññassa upaṭṭhānaṃ gamissāmī’’^eb^ti vimānasampattiyaṃ vimhayakkhiko ahaṅkāravasena vadati. Raṇanti nindanti etehīti ^b^raṇā,^eb^ dosā. Virodhipaccayasannipāte vikāruppatti ruppanaṃ rūpassa pavedhananti āha ^b^‘‘sītādīhi ca niccaṃ pavedhita’’^eb^nti. ^b^Sumedho^eb^ sundarapañño ^b^so satthā rūpe na ramati,^eb^ kiṃ pana mandapañño rūpe saraṇañca pavedhitañca apassanto ramasīti adhippāyo.
[06]Brahmalokasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^178^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pamāṇakarānaṃ rāgādīnaṃ abhāvato khīṇāsavo rāgādivasena na sakkā imaṃ pamātunti ^b^appameyyo,^eb^ appameyyāni vā cattāri ariyasaccāni vijjhitvā ṭhitattā pamitaṃ pameyyaṃ tassa kato parimeyyo natthi. Tenāha ^b^‘‘khīṇāsavo…pe… dīpetī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ta^eb^nti khīṇāsavaṃ. ^b^Pametuṃ^eb^ randhagavesī hutvā vajjato paricchindituṃ. Yathāsabhāvato tassa minane nihīnapaññatāya ^b^avakujjapaññaṃ^eb^.
[06]Kokālikasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^179^eb^^b^.^eb^ Kiṃ ^a^M1.0246^ea^ kusalagavesitāya ‘‘kiṃ kusalaṃ akusala’’ntiādinā kinti suṇāti etāyāti ^b^kissa vā vuccati paññā^eb^.
[06]Katamodakatissasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^180^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ābādho etassa atthīti ^b^ābādhiko. Anantarasutte^eb^ti anāgatānantare sutte. ^b^Varāko^eb^ti ^a^V1.0215^ea^ anuggahavacanameva, na nippariyāyena vuttavacanaṃ. ^b^Piyasīlā^eb^ti iminā etasmiṃ atthe niruttinayena ‘‘pesalā’’ti padasiddhīti dasseti. ^b^Kabarakkhīnī^eb^ti byādhibalena paribhinnavaṇṇatāya kabarabhūtāni akkhīni. ^b^Yattaka^eb^nti yaṃ tvaṃ bhagavato vacanaṃ aññathā karosi, tattakaṃ ^b^tayā aparaddhaṃ,^eb^ tassa pamāṇaṃ natthīti attho. Yasmā anāgāmino nāma kāmacchandabyāpādā pahīnā honti, tvañca diṭṭho kāmacchandabyāpādavasena idhāgato, tasmā yāva te idaṃ aparaddhanti ayamevettha attho daṭṭhabbo.

[03]^b^Adiṭṭhippatto^eb^ti appattadiṭṭhinimitto. ^b^Gilaviso viya^eb^ visaṃ gilitvā ṭhito viya. ^b^Kuṭhārisadisā^eb^ mūlapacchindanaṭṭhena. ^b^Uttamatthe^eb^ti arahatte. ^b^Khīṇāsavoti vadati^eb^ sunakkhatto viya acelaṃ korakkhattiyaṃ. ^b^Yo^eb^ aggasāvako viya ^b^pasaṃsitabbo khīṇāsavo,^eb^ taṃ ‘‘dussīlo aya’’nti yo vā vadati. ^b^Samakova vipāko^eb^ti pasaṃsiyanindā vijjamānaguṇaparidhaṃsanavasena pavattā yāva mahāsāvajjatāya kaṭukataravipākā, tāva nindiyapasaṃsāpi mahāsāvajjatāya samavipākā tattha avijjamānaguṇasamāropanena attano paresaṃ micchāpaṭipattihetubhāvato pasaṃsiyena tassa samabhāvakaraṇato ca. Lokepi hi ayaṃ pure samaṇagārayho hoti, pageva duppaṭipannaduppaṭipannoti samaṃ karontīti.
[03]^b^Sakenā^eb^ti attano sāpateyyena. ^b^Ayaṃ appamattako aparādho^eb^ diṭṭhadhammikattā sappatikārattā ca tassa. ^b^Ayaṃ mahantataro kali^eb^ katūpacitassa samparāyikattā appatikārattā ca.

[03]‘‘Nirabbudo’’ti ^a^M1.0247^ea^ gaṇanāviseso ekoti āha ^b^‘‘nirabbudagaṇanāyā’’^eb^ti, satasahassaṃ nirabbudānanti attho. Nirabbudaparigaṇanaṃ pana heṭṭhā vuttameva. ^b^Yamariyagarahī nirayaṃ upetī^eb^ti ettha yathāvuttaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ pākatikena ariyūpavādinā vuttanti veditabbaṃ. ‘‘Aggasāvakānaṃ pana guṇamahantatāya tatopi ativiya mahantatarā evā’’ti vadanti.
[06]Turūbrahmasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^181^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dve kokālikanāmakā bhikkhū, tato idha adhippetaṃ niddhāretvā dassetuṃ – ^b^‘‘ko ayaṃ kokāliko’’^eb^ti? Pucchā. Suttassa aṭṭhuppattiṃ dassetuṃ – ^b^‘‘kasmā ca upasaṅkamī’’^eb^ti? Pucchā ^a^V1.0216^ea^. ^b^Ayaṃ kirā^eb^tiādi yathākkamaṃ tāsaṃ vissajjanaṃ. Vivekavāsaṃ vasitukāmattā appicchatāya ca ^b^mā kassaci…pe… vasiṃsu^eb^.

[03]^b^Pakkamissantīti āghātaṃ uppādesi^eb^ attano icchāvighātanato. ^b^Therā bhikkhusaṅghassa niyyādayiṃsu^eb^ payuttavācāya akatattā therehi ca adīpitattā. ^b^Pubbepi…pe… maññe^eb^ti iminā therānaṃ kohaññe ṭhitabhāvaṃ āsaṅkati avaṇe vaṇaṃ passanto viya, suddhe ādāsatale lekhaṃ uṭṭhāpento viya ca.
[03]^b^Aparajjhitvā^eb^ti bhagavato sammukhā ‘‘pāpabhikkhū jātā’’ti vatvā. Āha ^b^‘‘saddhāya ākaro pasādāvaho’’^eb^ti. Pavattasaddhāyiko vāti atthoti āha ^b^‘‘saddhātabbavacano’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Pīḷakā^eb^ nāma bāhirato paṭṭhāya aṭṭhiṃ bhindati, imā pana paṭhamaṃyeva aṭṭhiṃ bhinditvā uggatā. ^b^Taruṇabeluvamattiyo^eb^ti taruṇabillaphalamattiyo. ^b^Visagilito^eb^ti khittapaharaṇo. Tañca baḷisaṃ visasamaññā loke. ‘‘Ārakkhadevatānaṃ sutvā’’ti padaṃ ānetvā sambandho.

[03]Magadharaṭṭhe ^a^M1.0248^ea^ saṃvohārato ^b^māgadhako patto,^eb^ tena. Tilasakaṭaṃ ^b^tilavāhā^eb^eti vutto. ^b^Paccitabbaṭṭhānassā^eb^ti nirayadukkhena paccitabbapadesassa. ^b^Etaṃ^eb^ ‘‘abbudo’’ti nāmaṃ.

[03]^b^Vassagaṇanā^eb^ti ekato paṭṭhāya dasaguṇitaṃ abbudāayumhi, tato paraṃ vīsatiguṇaṃ nirabbudādīsu vassagaṇanā veditabbā. ^b^Sabbatthā^eb^ti ababādīsu padumapariyosānesu sabbesu nirayesu. ^b^Eseva nayo^eb^ti heṭṭhimato uparimassa uparimassa vīsatiguṇataṃ atidisati.
[06]Kokālikasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Paṭhamavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^182^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Porāṇakattā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0217^ea^ nibbattitvā cirakālattā. Jātattā jano, taṃ ito ^b^janeto,^eb^ tasmiṃ. ^b^Khattiyo seṭṭho^eb^ lokamariyādaparipālanādinā sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ sattānaṃ niyojanena bahukārattā. So hi pare tathā paṭipādento sayampi tattha patiṭṭhitoyeva hotīti seṭṭho vutto. Paṭipakkhavijjhanaṭṭhena pubbenivāsādīnaṃ viditakaraṇaṭṭhena ^b^vijjā^eb^ti. Saddhāhirottappabāhusaccavīriyasatipaññāti ime ^b^satta saddhammā^eb^. Caranti agatapubbaṃ disaṃ etehīti ^b^caraṇāni,^eb^ sīlādayo pannarasa dhammā.
[06]Sanaṅkumārasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^183^eb^^b^.^eb^ Appaññatte eva sikkhāpade chejjagāmikammassa katattā saliṅgeneva ca ṭhitattā ‘‘devadatto sāsanato pakkanto’’ti na vattabboti ^b^acirapakkante^eb^ti ettha ‘‘sāsanato pakkante’’ti avatvā ^b^‘‘veḷuvanato^eb^^a^M1.0249^ea^^b^gayāsīsaṃ gate’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Pakatatto hi bhikkhusaṅghaṃ bhindeyya, na apakatattoti. ^b^Vaḷavāyā^eb^ti vaḷavāya kucchiyaṃ jātaṃ.
[06]Devadattasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^184^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Janata^eb^nti janānaṃ samūhaṃ, janasañcaraṇaṭṭhānanti attho. ^b^Manussānaṃ anupacāre^eb^ti yattake kasanādikiccaṃ karontānaṃ sañcāro hoti, ettakaṃ atikkamitvā anupacāre. ^b^Saṃyojanavippamokkhā^eb^ti saṃyojanavimokkhahetu. Vivekaratiṃ pavivekasukhajjhānaṃ alabhanto. ^b^Cittānurakkhaṇattha^eb^nti pubbe maṃ manussā ‘‘araññavāsena pavivitto asaṃsaṭṭho āraddhavīriyo’’ti maññiṃsu, idāni gāmante vasantaṃ disvā gaṇasaṅgaṇikāya nivuṭṭhoti appasādaṃ āpajjissanti. Yadipi me idha abhirati natthi, evaṃ santepi idheva vasissāmīti vikkhittacittena hutvā na vasitabbaṃ, ko attho cittavasaṃ gantvāti adhippāyo. ^b^Satipaṭṭhānaparāyaṇo^eb^ti ^a^V1.0218^ea^ satipaṭṭhānabhāvanārato. Evaṃ hissa gaṇavāsopi pāsaṃso vivekavāsena vinā samaṇakiccassa asijjhanato.
[03]^b^Vaṭṭabhayato^eb^ pamutto ajjhāsayavasenāti adhippāyo.
[03]^b^Nisīdi tattha bhikkhū^eb^ti iminā sattūpaladdhiyā anissitattā yathāruciyā tesaṃ nisajjaṃ dasseti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘iminā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]Iminā ca iminā ca ākārena jātanti na anussavadassanametaṃ, na anussavaggahaṇaṃ. Takkahetu nayahetu vā na vadāmīti yojanā. Piṭakaṃ gantho sampadīyati etassāti ^b^piṭakasampadānaṃ,^eb^ ganthassa uggaṇhanato tena piṭakassa uggaṇhanakabhāvena, kenaci ganthānusārena evaṃ na vadāmīti attho. Brahmassa seṭṭhassa dhammassa cariyaṃ vācasikaṃ pavattatīti ^b^brahmacariyaṃ,^eb^ dhammadesanā. Bhāvitena maraṇassa sabbaso bhāgena vippahānena ^b^maraṇapariccāgīnaṃ^eb^. Te ca khīṇajātikāti āha ^b^‘‘khīṇāsavāna’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^Dasadhā^eb^^a^M1.0250^ea^^b^dasā^eb^ti dasakkhattuṃ dasa. ^b^Añña^eb^nti pañcasatādhikasahassato aññaṃ. ^b^Puññabhāgino^eb^ti vivaṭṭanissitapuññassa bhāgino tassā desanāya ettakā sattā jātāti gaṇetuṃ ahaṃ na sakkomīti dasseti. ^b^Brahmadhammadesana^eb^nti brahmunā vuttaṃ āha.
[06]Andhakavindasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^185^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Abhibhū sambhavo^eb^ti tesaṃ dvinnaṃ mahātherānaṃ nāmāni. Tesaṃ vibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘tesū’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Ete dve tassa bhagavato aggasāvakāti dasseti. ^b^Avajjhāyantī^eb^ti heṭṭhā katvā cintenti. ^b^Khiyyanti^eb^ taṃ lāmakato cintetabbataṃ pāpenti pāpakataṃ karonti. ^b^Vitthārayantā^eb^ti tameva lāmakato cintetabbataṃ vepullaṃ pāpentā. Sabbe pāsaṇḍā attano attano samaye siddhante sabbe devamanussā attano attano samaye paṭilābhe paṭiladdhātthe purisakāraṃ vaṇṇayantīti yojanā.

[03]^b^Ārambhavīriya^eb^nti maccusenāsaṅkhātakilesadhunane ārambhavīriyaṃ, yā ‘‘ārambhadhātū’’ti vuccati ^a^V1.0219^ea^. ^b^Nikkamavīriya^eb^nti kosajjapaṭipakkhabhūtaṃ vīriyaṃ, yā ‘‘nikkamadhātū’’ti vuccati. ^b^Payogaṃ karothā^eb^ti paraṃ paraṃ ṭhānaṃ akkamanato tatopi balavataraṃ bhāvanābhiyogaṃ pavattethāti attho. Tenāha ‘‘parakkamathā’’ti. ^b^Kilesasenā^eb^ nāma rāgādikilesasamūho, so maraṇapaccayabhāvato ‘‘maccuno senā’’ti vuccati. Tañhi sandhāya vuttaṃ ‘‘mahāsenena maccunā’’ti (ma. ni. 3.272, 275, 276). Khandhānaṃ paṭhamābhinibbatti ^b^jāti,^eb^ tadaññaṃ pana tesaṃ paṭipāṭi pavattaṃ ^b^saṃsāro^eb^ti adhippāyenāha ^b^‘‘jātiñca saṃsārañcā’’^eb^ti. Yasmā ‘‘ekampi jātiṃ dvepi jātiyo’’tiādīsu tasmiṃ tasmiṃ bhave ādānanikkhepaparicchinnakhandhappavatti ‘‘jātī’’ti vuccati, sā eva yāva parinibbānā aparāparaṃ pavattamāno saṃsāro ‘‘ito cito saṃsaraṇa’’nti katvā, tasmā āha ^b^‘‘jātisaṅkhātaṃ vā saṃsāra’’^eb^nti. ^b^Pariccheda^eb^nti pariyosānaṃ. Obhāsaṃ pharīti sambandho. ^b^Ālokaṭṭhāne^eb^ti attanā ^a^M1.0251^ea^ katāalokaṭṭhāne. ^b^Ālokakiccaṃ natthī^eb^ti andhakāraṭṭhāne ālokadassanaṃ viya ālokaṭṭhāne ālokadassanakiccaṃ natthi. Tasmā tesaṃ sattānaṃ ‘‘kiṃ āloko ayaṃ, kassa nu kho ayaṃ āloko’’ti? ^b^Vicinantānaṃ^eb^ cintentānaṃ. ^b^Sabbe^eb^ti sahassilokadhātuyaṃ sabbe devamanussā. ^b^Osaṭāya parisāyā^eb^ti dhammassavanatthaṃ sabbosaṭāya paricitaparicchinnāya parisāya. ^b^Saddaṃ suṇiṃsū^eb^ti na kevalaṃ saddameva suṇiṃsu, atha kho atthopīti yathādhippeto tesaṃ pakatisavanupacāre viya pākaṭo ahosi, tisahassilokadhātuṃ viññāpesīti.
[06]Aruṇavatīsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^186^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Evaṃ taṃ kusinārāya hotī^eb^ti yathā anurodhapurassa thūpārāmo dakkhiṇapacchimadisāyaṃ, evaṃ taṃ uyyānaṃ kusinārāya dakkhiṇapacchimadisāyaṃ hoti. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti yasmā nagaraṃ pavisitukāmā uyyānato upecca vattanti gacchanti etenāti ^b^upavattana^eb^nti vuccati, tasmā. ^b^Ta^eb^nti sālapantibhāvena ṭhitaṃ sālavanaṃ. ^b^Antarenā^eb^ti vemajjhe. Appamajjanaṃ ^b^appamādo,^eb^ so pana atthato ñāṇūpasaṃhitā sati. Yasmā tattha satiyā byāpāro sātisayo, tasmā ^b^‘‘satiavippavāsenā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Appamādapadeyeva pakkhipitvā abhāsi^eb^ atthato tassa sakalassa buddhavacanassa saṅgaṇhanato.

[03]Jhānādīsu citte ca paramukkaṃsagatavasībhāvatāya ‘‘ettake kāle ettakā samāpattiyo samāpajjitvā ^a^V1.0220^ea^ parinibbāyissāmī’’ti kālaparicchedaṃ katvā samāpattisamāpajjanaṃ ^b^parinibbānaparikamma^eb^nti adhippetaṃ. ^b^Thero^eb^ti anuruddhatthero.

[03]^b^Ayampi cā^eb^ti yathāvuttapañcasaṭṭhiyā jhānānaṃ samāpannakathāpi saṅkhepakathā eva. Kasmā? Yasmā bhagavā tadā devasikaṃ vaḷañjanasamāpattiyo sabbāpi aparihāpetvā samāpajji evāti dassento ‘‘^b^nibbānapuraṃ pavisanto’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Catuvīsati…pe… pavisitvā^eb^ti ettha keci tāva āhu ^a^M1.0252^ea^ ‘‘bhagavā devasikaṃ dvādasakoṭisatasahassakkhattuṃ mahākaruṇāsamāpattiṃ samāpajjati, dvādasakoṭisatasahassakkhattumeva phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati, tasmā tadāpi catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassasaṅkhā samāpattiyo samāpajjati. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā ‘tathāgataṃ, bhikkhave, arahantaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ dve vitakkā bahulaṃ samudācaranti khemo ca vitakko paviveko ca vitakko’ti (itivu. 38). Khemo hi vitakko bhagavato mahākaruṇāsamāpattiṃ pūretvā ṭhito, pavivekavitakko arahattaphalasamāpattiṃ. Buddhānaṃ hi bhavaṅgaparivāso lahuko matthakappatto samāpattīsu vasībhāvo, tasmā samāpajjanavuṭṭhānāni katipayacittakkhaṇeheva ijjhanti. Pañca rūpāvacarasamāpattiyo catasso arūpasamāpattiyo appamaññāsamāpattiyā saddhiṃ nirodhasamāpatti arahattaphalasamāpatti cāti dvādasetā samāpattiyo bhagavā paccekaṃ divase divase koṭisatasahassakkhattuṃ purebhattaṃ samāpajjati, tathā pacchābhattanti evaṃ catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassasaṅkhā devasikaṃ vaḷañjanakakasiṇasamāpattiyo’’ti.

[03]Apare panāhu ‘‘yaṃ taṃ bhagavatā abhisambodhidivase pacchimayāme paṭiccasamuppādaṅgamukhena paṭilomanayena jarāmaraṇato paṭṭhāya ñāṇaṃ otāretvā anupadadhammavipassanaṃ ārabhantena yathā nāma puriso suviduggaṃ mahāgahanaṃ mahāvanaṃ chindanto antarantarā nisānasilāyaṃ pharasuṃ nisitaṃ karoti, evamevaṃ nisānasilāsadisiyo samāpattiyo antarantarā samāpajjitvā ñāṇassa tikkhavisadabhāvaṃ sampādetuṃ anulomapaṭilomato paccekaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṅgesu lakkhakoṭisamāpattisamāpajjanavasena sammasanañāṇaṃ pavatteti, tadanusārena bhagavā buddhabhūtopi anulomapaṭilomato paṭiccasamuppādaṅgamukhena vipassanāvasena divase divase lakkhakoṭiphalasamāpattiyo samāpajjati, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, ‘catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassasaṅkhā samāpattiyo pavisitvā’’’ti.

[03]^b^Imāni dvepi samanantarāneva^eb^ paccavekkhaṇāyapi yebhuyyena nānantariyakatāya jhānapakkhikabhāvato. Yasmā sabbapacchimaṃ bhavaṅgacittaṃ tato tato ^a^M1.0253^ea^ cavanato ‘‘cutī’’ti vuccati ^a^V1.0221^ea^, tasmā na kevalaṃ ayameva bhagavā, atha kho sabbepi sattā bhavaṅgacitteneva cavantīti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘ye hi kecī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Dukkhasaccenā^eb^ti dukkhasaccapariyāpannena cuticittena ^b^kālaṃ^eb^ kālakiriyaṃ ^b^karonti^eb^ pāpuṇanti, kālagamanato vā karonti peccāti.

[03]^b^Paṭibhāgapuggalavirahito^eb^ sīlādiguṇehi asadisatāya sadisapuggalarahito. Saṅkhārā vūpasammanti etthāti ^b^vūpasamo^eb^ti evaṃ saṅkhātaṃ ñātaṃ kathitaṃ nibbānameva sukhanti. ^b^Lomahaṃsanako^eb^ti lomānaṃ haṭṭhabhāvāpādano. ^b^Bhiṃsanako^eb^ti avītarāgānaṃ bhayajanako ^b^āsi^eb^ ahosi. ^b^Sabbākāravaraguṇūpete^eb^ti sabbehi ākāravarehi uttamakāraṇehi sīlādiguṇehi samannāgate. ^b^Asaṅkuṭitenā^eb^ti akuṭitena vipphārikābhāvato. ^b^Suvikasitenevā^eb^ti pītisomanassayogato suṭṭhu vikasitena. ^b^Vedanaṃ adhivāsesi^eb^ sabhāvasamudayādito suṭṭhu paññātattā. ^b^Anāvaraṇavimokkho sabbaso^eb^ nibbidabhāvo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘apaññattibhāvūpagamo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pajjotanibbānasadiso^eb^ti padīpassa nibbānasadiso tattha vilīyitvā avaṭṭhānābhāvato.
[06]Parinibbānasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Dutiyavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Sāratthappakāsiniyā saṃyuttanikāya-aṭṭhakathāya
[06]Brahmasaṃyuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^187^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dhanañjānigottā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0222^ea^^a^M1.0254^ea^ ettha pubbapurisato āgatassa kulavaṃsassa nāmābhidhānasaṅkhātaṃ gaṃ tāyatīti gottaṃ. (Kiṃ pana tanti? Aññakulaparamparāsādhāraṇaṃ tassa kulassa ādipurisasamudāgataṃ taṃkulapariyāpannasādhāraṇaṃ sāmaññarūpanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.) Dhanañjānigottaṃ etissanti ^b^dhanañjānigottā^eb^. Tassā udānassa kāraṇaṃ pucchitvā ādito paṭṭhāya vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘so kirā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Nānārasabhojanaṃ detīti yojanā. Pañcagorasasampāditaṃ sālibhattaṃ sūpasākabyañjanaṃ nānārasaṃ brāhmaṇabhojanaṃ. ^b^Maṇḍalaggakhagga^eb^nti maṇḍalaggasaṅkhātaṃ khaggaṃ. Duvidho hi khaggo maṇḍalaggo dīghaggoti. Tattha yassa aggo maṇḍalākārena ṭhito, so maṇḍalaggo. Yassa pana asiputtikā viya dīgho, so dīghaggo.

[03]^b^Sāsanā^eb^ti anusāsanā. ‘‘Namo…pe… sambuddhassā’’ti evaṃ vuttā ^b^pañcapadikagāthā^eb^. Satthusāsane hi lokiyacchandaṃ anapekkhitvā esā pañcapadikagāthāti daṭṭhabbā. ^b^Okkāvaradharā^eb^ti pubbapurisasaṅkhātaukkākavaṃsavaradhārikā. ^b^Sakkā^eb^ti sakkuṇeyyaṃ.

[03]^b^Eva^eb^nti ‘‘sace me aṅgamaṅgānī’’tiādinā iminā pakārena. ‘‘Pañca gāthāsatāni pana aṭṭhakathaṃ āruḷhāni, idha pana dve eva uddhaṭā’’ti vadanti. ^b^Paharituṃ vā^eb^ti ekavārampi hatthena vā pādena vā paharitumpi parāmasitumpi asakkontoti attho. So hi tassā ariyasāvikāya ānubhāvena attano sāmatthiyena vase vattāpanatthaṃ santajjitvāpi tadanuvattanto nibbiso ahosi. Tenāha ^b^‘‘bhotī’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Tassa brāhmaṇassā^eb^ti attano sāmikabrāhmaṇassa. ^b^Upasaṃharantī^eb^ti upanentī. ^b^Tasmiṃ samaye^eb^ti ^a^V1.0223^ea^ tasmiṃ dukkhuppattikāle ‘‘sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhā’’ti bhagavato ^a^M1.0255^ea^ vacanaṃ anussaritvā ‘‘dasabalassa bhagavato’’tiādīsu yathāparicitaṃ guṇapadaṃ anussari. Tenāha ^b^‘‘dasabalaṃ sarī’’^eb^ti.

[03]Khantisoraccarahitatāya ^b^kujjhitvā. Bhijjitvā^eb^ti saṃyatābhāvato tassa brāhmaṇassa antare mettibhedena bhijjitvā. ^b^Evamevā^eb^ti yathā etarahi akāraṇena, evameva aññadāpi akāraṇenāti attho. Nikkāraṇatādīpane ^b^evaṃ^eb^-saddo, ^b^eva^eb^-saddo pana avadhāraṇattho. Nikkāraṇatā ca nāma niratthakatā, niratthakavippalāpabhāvenettha ^b^evaṃ^eb^-saddassa gahaṇe pavatti gavesitabbā. Garahattho vāyaṃ ^b^evaṃ^eb^-saddo anekatthattā nipātānaṃ. Garahatthatā cassa vasalisaddasannidhānato pākaṭā eva.

[03]^b^Gāmanigamaraṭṭhapūjito^eb^ti iminā gāmanigamaraṭṭhasāmikehi pūjitabhāvo dīpito gāmādīnaṃ tesaṃ vase vattanato. ^b^Asukassa nāma^eb^ puggalassa. ^b^Sesa^eb^nti abhikkantantiādi, yampi caññaṃ idhāgataṃ heṭṭhā vaṇṇitañca.
[06]Dhanañjānīsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^188^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Bhāradvājova so^eb^ti bhāradvājo nāma eva so brāhmaṇo. Gottavasena hi tayidaṃ nāmaṃ, visesena panetaṃ jātanti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘pañcamattehī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Jānikatā^eb^ti ñātivaggahānikatā. ^b^Pakkho bhinno^eb^ti tato eva ñātipakkho naṭṭho. Yathā domanassito anattamanoti vattabbaṃ labhati, evaṃ kupitoti āha ^b^‘‘domanassena cā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Dasahī^eb^ti anavasesapariyādānavasena vuttaṃ pañcahi gāthāsatehi akkosanto tathā akkoseyyāti katvā. Tattha pana yena kenaci akkosantopi akkosatiyeva nāma. ^b^Karosi^eb^ mama bhātikassa pabbajjaṃ.

[03]^b^Sambhuñjatī^eb^ti sambhogaṃ karoti. Akkosādīhi ^b^ekato bhuñjati^eb^. ^b^Vītiharatī^eb^ti byatihāraṃ karoti, akkosato paccakkosanādinā vinimayaṃ ^a^M1.0256^ea^ karotīti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘katassa paṭikāraṃ karotī’’^eb^ti. Assa anussavavasena sutvā ‘‘sapati ma’’nti saññino bhayaṃ uppajjīti yojanā. ^b^Assā^eb^ti brāhmaṇassa. ^b^Sutvā^eb^ti padaṃ ubhayatthāpi yojetabbaṃ ‘‘tavevetaṃ brāhmaṇāti ^a^V1.0224^ea^ sutvā, anussavavasena sutvā’’ti ca. Kāmaṃ kisavacchādayo sapanaṃ nādaṃsu, devatānaṃyeva hi so attho, sattānaṃ pana tathā saññā uppannā, sopi tathāsaññī ahosi. Tenāha ^b^‘‘anussavavasenā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Dantassa^eb^ sabbaso damathaṃ upagatattā. ^b^Nibbisevanassā^eb^ti rāgadosādihetukavipphandanarahitassa. ^b^Tassevā^eb^ti paṭikujjhantasseva puggalassa ^b^tena kodhena pāpaṃ hoti^eb^ pāpassa santānantarasaṅkantiyā abhāvato. Keci pana ^b^‘‘tassevā^eb^ti tasseva paṭikujjhantapurisassa tena paṭikujjhanena. ^b^Pāpiyo^eb^ti paṭikujjhantapuggalassa lāmakataro’’ti evamettha atthaṃ vadanti. ^b^Satiyā samannāgato hutvā^eb^ paṭisaṅkhāne ṭhito ^b^adhivāseti,^eb^ na saho mūḷho hutvāti adhippāyo. ^b^Ubhinnaṃ tikicchanta^eb^nti ubhinnaṃ uppannakodhasaṅkhātaṃ kilesabyādhiṃ tikicchantaṃ vūpasamentaṃ taṃ puggalaṃ. ^b^Yo puggalo^eb^tiādinā purimāsu gāthāsu pavattitāni padāni sambandhitvā dasseti. Pañcasu khandhesu yāthāvato vinītā ariyadhammassa kovidā nāma hontīti āha ^b^‘‘dhammassāti pañcakkhandhadhammassā’’^eb^ti. Idāni tamatthaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ katvā dassento āha ^b^‘‘catusaccadhammassa vā’’^eb^ti.
[06]Akkosasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^189^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tenevā^eb^ti bhātupabbajiteneva. ^b^Assevā^eb^ti titikkhassa. ^b^‘‘Taṃ jayaṃ hotī’’^eb^ti liṅgavipallāsavasena vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘so jayo hotī’’^eb^ti, dujjayaṃ kodhaṃ titikkhāya jinantassāti adhippāyo. Yasmā titikkhādayo na kodhavasikaṃ dhuraṃ, taṃ pana bālānaṃ maññanāmattanti ^a^M1.0257^ea^ idha imamatthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘katamassā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Vijānatova jayo^eb^ na avijānato titikkhāya abhāvato. Na hi avijānanto andhabālo kodhaṃ vijetuṃ sakkoti. ^b^Kevalaṃ jayaṃ maññati^eb^ kilesehi parājito samānopīti adhippāyo.
[06]Asurindakasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^190^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Suddha^eb^nti kevalaṃ sambhāravirahitaṃ. ^b^Sambhārayutta^eb^nti kaṭukabhaṇḍādisambhārasahitaṃ. Kañjito nibbattattā ^b^kañjikaṃ,^eb^ āranālaṃ, bilaṅganti attho. ^b^Nāmaṃ gahitaṃ^eb^ saṅgītikāle ‘‘bilaṅgikabhāradvājo’’ti ^a^V1.0225^ea^ visesanavasena. ^b^Tayo^eb^ti dhanañjāniyā sāmiko bhāradvājo, akkosakabhāradvājo, asundarikabhāradvājoti ādito tīsu suttesu āgatā tayo. ^b^Me^eb^ti mayhaṃ.
[06]Bilaṅgikasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^191^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Esā^eb^ti brāhmaṇo. ^b^‘‘Ahiṃsako aha’’^eb^nti tadatthaṃ sādhetuṃ icchāya kathesīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘ahiṃsakapañhaṃ pucchī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tathā ce assā^eb^ti yathā te nāmassa attho, tathā cetaṃ bhaveyyāsi anvatthanāmako bhaveyyāsi ahiṃsako eva siyāti. ^b^Na dukkhāpeti^eb^ dukkhamattampi na uppādeti, dukkhato apanetīti attho.
[06]Ahiṃsakasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^192^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Jaṭāpañhassā^eb^ti ‘‘antojaṭā bahijaṭā’’ti evaṃ jaṭāpariyāyassa pañhassa.
[06]Jaṭāsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^193^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Suddhikapañhassā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0258^ea^ ‘‘nābrāhmaṇo sujjhatī’’ti evaṃ suddhasannissitassa pañhassa. ^b^Sīlasampanno^eb^ti pañcavidhaniyamalakkhaṇena sīlena samannāgato. ^b^Tapokamma^eb^nti anasanapañcātapatappanādiparibhedanatapokammaṃ karontopi. ^b^Vijjāti tayo vedā^eb^ti vadanti ‘‘tāya idhalokatthaṃ paralokatthaṃ ñāyantī’’ti katvā. ^b^Gottacaraṇa^eb^nti gottasaṅkhātaṃ caraṇaṃ. ^b^Brāhmaṇo sujjhati^eb^ jeṭṭhajātikattā. Tathā hi so eva tapaṃ ācarituṃ labhati, na itaro. ^b^Aññā lāmikā pajā^eb^ti itaravaṇṇaṃ vadati. ^b^Vacanasahassampī^eb^ti gāthānekasahassampi. Anto kilesehi pūtiko sabhāvena pūtiko. ^b^Kiliṭṭhehi kāyakammādīhi^eb^ kāyaduccaritādīhi.
[06]Suddhikasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^194^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Aggiparicaraṇavasenā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0226^ea^ aggihuttajuhanavasena. ^b^Sannihito^eb^ti missībhāvaṃ sampāpito. Tathābhūto ca so sappinā saddhiṃ yojito nāma hotīti āha ^b^‘‘saṃyojito’’^eb^ti. ^b^Apāyamaggaṃ okkamati^eb^ micchādiṭṭhimicchāsaṅkappādīnaṃ attano santāne samuppādanato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘imaṃ laddhi’’^eb^ntiādi.
[03]^b^Jātiyā^eb^ti sadosakiriyāparādhassa asambhavena parisuddhāya jātiyā. ^b^Nānappakāre^eb^ aṭṭhārasavijjāṭṭhānasaññite ^b^ganthe. Sutavā^eb^ti sutvā niṭṭhaṃ patto aggadakkhiṇeyyattāti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^Pubbenivāsañāṇenā^eb^ti idaṃ loke sāsane ca niruḷhatāvasena vuttaṃ. Aññe hi pubbenivāsaṃ jānantā pubbenivāsañāṇeneva jānanti, bhagavā pana sabbaññutaññāṇenapi jānāti. ^b^Dibbena cakkhunā^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. Sabbaso jāti khīyati etenāti ^b^jātikkhayo,^eb^ aggamaggo ^a^M1.0259^ea^, tena pattabbattā āpannattā ca jātikkhayo arahattaṃ. ^b^Jānitvā vositavosāno^eb^ti vijānitabbaṃ catusaccadhammaṃ maggañāṇena jānitvā soḷasannampi kiccānaṃ vositavosāno.

[03]^b^Uppattiṃ dīpetvā^eb^ti pāyasadānassa āgamanaṃ pakāsetvā. ^b^Gāthāhi abhigīta^eb^nti dvīhi gāthāhi mayā abhigītaṃ. ^b^Abhuñjitabba^eb^nti bhuñjituṃ na yuttaṃ. ‘‘Abhojaneyya’’nti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu bhagavato ajjhāsayo accantameva suddhoti? Saccametaṃ, brāhmaṇo pana pubbe adātukāmo pacchā gāthā sutvā dhammadesanāya muduhadayo hutvā dātukāmo ahosi, tasmā taṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anāgate diṭṭhānugatiāpajjanatthaṃ paṭikkhipi. Tathā hi anantarasutte kasibhāradvājasutte ca evameva paṭipajji. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tvaṃ brāhmaṇā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Kilañjamhi…pe… pakāsitā^eb^ti etena gāthaṃ uddesaṭṭhāneva ṭhapetvā bhagavā brāhmaṇassa vitthārena dhammaṃ desesīti dasseti. ^b^Gāyanenā^eb^ti gāyanakena, gānena vā. ^b^Atthañca dhammañcā^eb^ti sadevakassa lokassa hitañceva tassa kāraṇañca. ^b^Sampassantāna^eb^nti sammadeva passantānaṃ. ^b^Dhammo^eb^ti paveṇiāgato cārittadhammo na hoti. Bhojanesu ukkaṃsagataṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘sudhābhojana’’^eb^nti āha. ^b^Dhamme satī^eb^ti ariyānaṃ ācāradhamme sati taṃ ālambitvā jīvantānaṃ etadeva seṭṭhanti ‘‘somaṃ bhuñjeyya pāyasa’’nti taṃ ārabbha kathāya uppannattā.

[03]^b^Sallakkheti^eb^ ayaṃ brāhmaṇo. ^b^Sesā^eb^ paccayā ^b^niddosā^eb^ te ārabbha kathāya appavattitattā. ^b^Kukkuccavūpasanta^eb^nti ^a^V1.0227^ea^ aggiāhitapadassa viya saddasiddhi veditabbā. ^b^Annena pānenā^eb^ti lakkhaṇavacanametaṃ yathā ‘‘kākehi sappi rakkhitabba’’nti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘desanāmattameta’’^eb^nti. ^b^Bahusassaphaladāyakaṃ sukhettaṃ viya paṭiyatta^eb^nti sammā kasanabījanaudakānayanāpanayanādinā susajjitaṃ khettaṃ viya sīlādiguṇavisesasampādanena paṭiyattaṃ puññakkhettaṃ etaṃ.
[06]Aggikasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^195^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ānetvā ^a^M1.0260^ea^ hunitabbato ^b^āhuti^eb^. Sappimadhupāyasādīhi aggiṃ juhoti etthāti ^b^aggihuttaṃ,^eb^ sādhiṭṭhānaṃ veditabbaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘agyāyatana’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Suvisodhito cassā^eb^ti nihīnajātikānaṃ anena suṭṭhu visodhito ca bhaveyya. ‘‘Me’’ti padaṃ ānetvā sambandho.

[03]^b^Aphalaṃ karotī^eb^ti ito paṭṭhāya yāva ^b^demī^eb^ti padaṃ. Tāva anantarasuttavaṇṇanāya āgatasadisamevāti peyyālavasena ṭhapesi, na sappisaṅkhāraṭṭhapanaṃ. ^b^Himapātassa ca sītavātassa ca paṭibāhanattha^eb^nti akāraṇametanti taṃ anādiyitvā aññameva sukāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘paṭibalovā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Sañjānitvā^eb^ti ‘‘nāyaṃ brāhmaṇo’’ti sañjānitvā.
[03]^b^Nīcakesanta^eb^nti rassakesantaṃ. Brāhmaṇānaṃ suddhiatthā sikhāti āha ^b^‘‘pavattamattampi, sikhaṃ adisvā’’^eb^ti, ‘‘paramahaṃsaparikkhādinā’’ti keci.

[03]^b^Akāraṇaṃ dakkhiṇeyyabhāvassa jāti^eb^ adakkhiṇeyyabhāvahetūnaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ apaṭikkhepabhāvato. ^b^Eta^eb^nti sīlādibhedaṃ caraṇaṃ. ^b^Dakkhiṇeyyabhāvassa kāraṇaṃ^eb^ adakkhiṇeyyabhāvakārakapāpadhammānaṃ tadaṅgādivasena pajahanato. ^b^Assā^eb^ti brāhmaṇassa. ^b^Tamattha^eb^nti taṃ dakkhiṇeyyabhāvassa kāraṇatāsaṅkhātamatthaṃ upamāya vibhāvento. ^b^Sālādikaṭṭhā jātovā^eb^ti sālādivisuddhakaṭṭhāva jāto. Sāpānadoṇiādiavisuddhakaṭṭhā jāto aggikiccaṃ na ca na karoti. ^b^Eva^eb^nti yathā aggi yato kutoci jātopi aggikiccaṃ karotiyeva, evaṃ caṇḍālakulādīsu jātopi dakkhiṇeyyo na na hoti guṇasampadāvasena ariyānaṃ vaṃse pajātattāti āha ^b^‘‘guṇasampattiyā jātimā’’^eb^ti. Dhitiyā guṇasampattiyā pamukhabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘so hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^dhitiyā^eb^ti vīriyena. Tañhi anuppannānaṃ kusaladhammānaṃ uppādanaparibrūhanehi te dhāreti. ^b^Hiriyā dose nisedheti,^eb^ sammadeva pāpānaṃ jigucchane sati tesaṃ pavattiyā avasaro eva ^a^V1.0228^ea^ natthi. ^b^Monadhammena^eb^ ñāṇasaṅkhātena ottappadhammena. ^b^Kāraṇākāraṇajānanako^eb^ti tesaṃ tesaṃ ^a^M1.0261^ea^ dhammānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ ṭhānaṃ, pāpadhammānaṃ vā vippakārasabhāvaṭṭhānaṃ jānanako.

[03]^b^Paramatthasaccena^eb^ nibbānena ārammaṇapaccayabhūtena ariyamaggena ^b^danto. Indriyadamenā^eb^ti tato eva ariyena indriyasaṃvarena upagato. Vidanti tehi saccānīti ^b^vedā. Maggavedānaṃ anta^eb^nti ariyaphalaṃ. ^b^Kilesānaṃ anta^eb^nti tesaṃ anuppādanirodhaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^Yañño^eb^ti aggaphalaṃ. ^b^Niratthaka^eb^nti aphalaṃ tesaṃ anāgamanato, āgatānampi aggadakkhiṇeyyābhāvato. ^b^Juhati^eb^ deti.

[03]^b^Suyiṭṭha^eb^nti sudānaṃ aggadakkhiṇeyyalābhena. ^b^Suhuta^eb^nti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Atha vā ^b^suyiṭṭha^eb^nti suṭṭhu sammadeva yiṭṭhaṃ sāre upanītaṃ mama idaṃ deyyavatthu. ^b^Suhuta^eb^nti etthāpi eseva nayo.

[03]^b^Upahaṭamatte^eb^ti brāhmaṇena ‘‘bhuñjatu bhava’’nti upanītamatte. ^b^Nibbattitojamevā^eb^ti savatthukaṃ aggahetvā vatthuto vivecitaojameva. ^b^Tena taṃ sukhumattaṃ gata^eb^nti taṃ habyasesaṃ sabbaso sukhumabhāvaṃ gatanti ojāya anoḷārikatāya purimākāreneva paññāyamānataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na pana ojāya eva kevalāya gahaṇaṃ sandhāya. Sā hi avinibbhogavuttitāya visuṃ gaṇhituṃ na sakkā, tasmā devatāhipi savatthukā gayhati. ^b^Manussānaṃ vatthū^eb^ti karajakāyamāha. Oḷārikavatthutāya devānaṃ viya gahaṇī na tikkhāti dibbojasammissatāya sammā pariṇāmaṃ na gacchati. Sukhumāpi samānā dibbojā tena pāyasena missitā oḷārikasammissatāya sukhumavatthukānaṃ devānaṃ sukhadā na hotīti imamatthaṃ dasseti ^b^‘‘goyūse panā’’^eb^tiādinā. Paribhogavatthuno oḷārikatāya vā devānaṃ dukkaraṃ sammā pariṇāmetuṃ, dibbojāya garutarabhāvena manussānaṃ. Tenāha bhagavā ^b^‘‘na khvāha’’^eb^ntiādi. Samāpatticittasamuṭṭhitā tejodhātu jhānānubhāvasantejitā tikkhatarā hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘aṭṭha…pe… pariṇāmeyyā’’^eb^ti. Bhagavato pana suddheneva pariṇamatīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘pākatikenevā’’^eb^ti, jhānānubhāvappattena jhānena vinā sabhāvasiddheneva.

[03]‘‘Appaharite’’ti ettha appa-saddo ‘‘appiccho’’tiādīsu viya abhāvatthoti āha ^b^‘‘appahariteti aharite’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pātisatepi^eb^ pāyase. ^b^Na āluḷatī^eb^ti na āvilaṃ hoti. ^b^Anāgantāva gaccheyya^eb^ ‘‘attanāpi ^a^M1.0262^ea^ na paribhuñji, aññesaṃ na dāpesi, kevalaṃ pāyasaṃ nāsesī’’ti domanassappatto.

[03]^b^Dāru^eb^^a^V1.0229^ea^^b^samādahāno^eb^ti dāruhariddi dārusmiṃ tassa dahanto. ^b^Yadī^eb^tiādi dārujhāpanassa bahiddhabhāvasādhanaṃ asuddhahetūnaṃ paṭipakkhābhāvato tassa. ^b^Khandhādīsu kusalā^eb^ti tesu sabhāvato samudayato atthaṅgamato assādato ādīnavato nissaraṇato jānanato chekā paṇḍitā. ^b^Ñāṇajoti^eb^nti ñāṇamayaṃ jotiṃ. ^b^Jālemī^eb^ti pajjalitaṃ karomi. ^b^Niccaṃ pajjalitaggi^eb^ sabbatthakameva vigatasammohandhakāratāya ekobhāsabhāvato. Sabbaso vikkhepābhāvato ^b^niccasamāhitatto. Evaṃ vadatī^eb^ti caritaṃ brahmacariyaṃ gahetvā carāmīti evaṃ vattamānaṃ viya vadati āsannataṃ hadaye ṭhapetvā.

[03]^b^Khāribhāro^eb^ti khāribhārasadiso. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yathā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Khandhena vayhamāno^eb^ti kāje pakkhipitvā khandhena vayhamāno. ^b^Pathaviyā saddhiṃ phuseti^eb^ bhārassa garukabhāvena kājassa pariṇamanena. Mānena attano jātiādīni paggaṇhato aññassa tāni na sahatīti āha – ^b^‘‘tattha tattha issaṃ uppādento’’^eb^ti, tattha tattha jātiādimānavatthusmiṃ garutaraggahaṇena saṃsīdeyyāti adhippāyo. ^b^Kodho dhūmo^eb^ti yathāpi bhāsuro aggi dhūmena upakkiliṭṭho, evaṃ kodhena upakkiliṭṭho. ^b^Ñāṇaggīti^eb^ tassa kodho dhūmo. Musāvādova ^b^mosavajjaṃ^eb^. Yathā ñāṇe sati musāvādo natthi, evaṃ musāvāde sati ñāṇampīti tena taṃ nirodhitaṃ viya hotīti āha – ^b^‘‘musāvādena paṭicchannaṃ ñāṇa’’^eb^nti. Yathā sujāya vinā brāhmaṇānaṃ yāgo na ijjhati, evaṃ pahūtajivhāya vinā satthu dhammayāgo na ijjhatīti jivhā sujāpariyāyā vuttā.
