Joti ṭhiyati etthāti ^b^jotiṭṭhānaṃ^eb^ vedi, yaṃ aggikuṇḍaṃ. ^b^Sattānaṃ hadayaṃ jotiṭṭhānaṃ^eb^ ñāṇaggino tattha samujjalanato. ^b^Attāti cittaṃ^eb^ ‘‘āhito ahaṃ māno etthā’’ti katvā.

[03]^b^Dhammo rahado^eb^ti assaddhiyādiālasiyābhāvato kilesamalapakkhālanato paramagginibbutāvahanato ariyamaggadhammo anāvilo rahado. ^b^Heṭṭhupariyavālukā^eb^ti viparivattitavālukā hutvā. ^b^Āluḷā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0263^ea^ ākulajātā. ^b^Paṇḍitānaṃ pasattho^eb^ti paṇḍitānaṃ purato seṭṭho. Seṭṭhabhāvena santo pāsaṃso hutvā kilese bhindati samucchindatīti sabbhīti vuccati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘uttamaṭṭhenā’’^eb^ti. Tathā cāha bhagavā ^b^‘‘maggānaṭṭhaṅgiko seṭṭho’’^eb^ti (dha. pa. 273).

[03]^b^Vacīsacca^eb^nti iminā ‘‘caturaṅgasamannāgatā vācā suparisuddhā hotī’’ti sammāvācaṃ dasseti. Saccasaṃyamapadehi dassitā maggadhammā idha ‘‘dhammo’’ti adhippetāti āha – ^b^‘‘dhammoti iminā…pe… dassetī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Maggasaccaṃ gahitaṃ^eb^ anantaragāthāya anekehi visesetvā vuttattā. ^b^Atthato^eb^ti pubbaṅgamattādiatthato. Tāya hi sakiccaṃ karontiyā itare sabbepi tadanuvattikā ^a^V1.0230^ea^ honti. ^b^Taggatikattā^eb^ti sammādiṭṭhiyā upakārakabhāvena tāya samānagatikattā. Ārammaṇañhi vitakkenāhaṭaṃ paññā vicinituṃ sakkoti. Tathā hi so paññākkhandhena saṅgahaṃ gato. ^b^Dhammo^eb^ti sabhāvato samādhi gahito, itare dve tadupakārattā. Tathā hi ‘‘evaṃdhammā te bhagavanto’’tiādīsu (dī. ni. 2.13; ma. ni. 3.197; saṃ. ni. 5.378) samādhi ‘‘dhammo’’ti vutto. ^b^Paramatthasaccaṃ gahitaṃ^eb^ sabbesaṃ seṭṭhabhāvato. Yathāha – ‘‘yāvatā, bhikkhave, dhammā saṅkhatā vā asaṅkhatā vā, virāgo tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatī’’ti (itivu. 90; a. ni. 4.34). ^b^Atthato^eb^ti tato eva paramatthato, anantaraṃ vuccamānānaṃ vā maggadhammānaṃ ārammaṇabhāvato. ^b^Pañcaṅgāni gahitāni^eb^ tāsaṃ maggabhāvato. ^b^Tīṇi^eb^ aṅgāni. ^b^Brahmacariyaṃ nāmāti^eb^ etaṃ nibbānagāmi uttamaṭṭhena maggabrahmacariyaṃ nāma. ^b^Majjhe sitā^eb^ti līnuddhaccādiantadvayavivajjanena majjhe majjhimapaṭipadābhāvanaṃ nissitā. Sassatucchedaggahaṇaṃ hettha padhānatāya nidassanamattaṃ. ^b^Seṭṭhappattī^eb^ti seṭṭhabhāvappatti. ^b^Ta-kāro padasandhikaro^eb^ti ‘‘sa ujubhūtesū’’ti vattabbe majjhe ta-kāro padasandhikaro, ^b^‘‘sa dujjubhūtesū^eb^ti keci paṭhanti, tesaṃ da-kāro padasandhikaro. Sa-iti sundariko brāhmaṇo vuttoti katvā āha ^b^‘‘sa tva’’^eb^nti, so tvanti attho. Dhammo sāriyo paridhānabhūtā alaṅkārā etassāti ^b^dhammasārī^eb^. Atha vā dhammehi sāritavāti ^b^dhammasārī,^eb^ tehi sāretvā ṭhitavāti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kusaladhammehī’’^eb^tiādi.
[06]Sundarikasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^196^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Samantato^eb^ti ^a^M1.0264^ea^ dakkhiṇavāmānaṃ vasena samantato. ^b^Ūrubaddhāsana^eb^nti ūrūnaṃ bandhanavasena nisajjanaṃ. Dvinnaṃ ūrūnaṃ aññamaññabandhanavasena ābhujitākāraṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘ābhujitvāti bandhitvā’’^eb^ti. Heṭṭhimakāyassa anujukaṃ ṭhapanaṃ nisajjāvacaneneva bodhitanti ‘‘ujuṃ kāya’’nti ettha kāya-saddo uparimakāyavisayoti āha ^b^‘‘uparimaṃ sarīraṃ ujukaṃ ṭhapetvā’’^eb^ti. Taṃ pana ujukaṭṭhapanaṃ sarūpato payojanato ca dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘aṭṭhārasā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Parimukha^eb^nti ettha ^b^pari^eb^-saddo abhisaddena samānatthoti āha ^b^‘‘kammaṭṭhānābhimukha’’^eb^nti, bahiddhā puthuttārammaṇato nivāretvā kammaṭṭhānaṃyeva purekkhatoti attho. ^b^Pariggahaṭṭho^eb^ ‘‘pariṇāyikā’’tiādīsu viya. ^b^Mukhanti niyyānaṭṭho^eb^ ‘‘suññatavimokkhamukha’’ntiādīsu viya. Paṭipakkhato niggamanaṭṭho hi niyyānaṭṭho, tasmā ^b^pariggahitaniyyāna^eb^nti sabbathā gahitasammosaṃ pariccattasammosaṃ ^b^satiṃ katvā^eb^ paramaṃ satinepakkaṃ upaṭṭhapetvāti attho. ^b^Chabbaṇṇā…pe… nisīdi^eb^ brāhmaṇassa pasādasañjānanatthaṃ. ^b^Aṭavimukhā caramānā^eb^ti gocaraṃ gaṇhantā.

[03]^b^Ajjasaṭṭhi^eb^nti ^a^V1.0231^ea^ ajja channaṃ pūraṇī saṭṭhī divasavutti, ajja ādiṃ katvā cha divaseti attho. Accantasaṃyoge cetaṃ upayogavacanaṃ. ^b^Ajja chadivasamattakā^eb^ti ajjato chaṭṭhadivasamattakā. ^b^Lāmakā^eb^ti nihīnā nipphalā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tilakhāṇukā’’^eb^tiādi.
[03]^b^Ussāhenā^eb^ti uddhaṃ uddhaṃ pasārena abhibhavanena. Taṃ pana nesaṃ abhibhavanaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘kaṇṇanaṅguṭṭhādīnī’’^eb^tiādimāha.
[03]^b^‘‘Uppāṭakapāṇakā’’^eb^ti tacaṃ uppāṭetvā viya khādakapāṇakā ūkāmaṅgulādayo.
[03]^b^Kaḷārapiṅgalā^eb^ti nikkhantapiṅgalakkhikā, ^b^kaḷārapiṅgalā^eb^ti vā rattagattā ca piṅgalacakkhukā ca. ^b^Tilakāhatā^eb^ti āhatatilakā, tilappamāṇehi bindūhi samantato santhatasarīrā.

[03]^b^Paṭigāthāhi brāhmaṇassa dhammadesanaṃ vaḍḍhesī^eb^ti pakatiyā tassa attanā kathetabbaṃ dhammadesanaṃ pabbajjāguṇakittanavasena sattahi vaḍḍhesi. ^b^Pabbajitvā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0265^ea^ iṇāyikānaṃ attano palibodhaṃ tathā tathā jānāpetvā pabbajitvā.
[03]Yathā ca tattha bhagavā paṭipajji, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘puna divase’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.
[03]^b^Taṃ taṃ kulagharaṃ pesetvā^eb^ti taṃ taṃ tassa brāhmaṇassa dhītaraṃ tassa tassānucchavikassa brāhmaṇassa dento taṃ taṃ kulagharaṃ pesetvā brāhmaṇadhamme garukaraṇābhāvato.
[21]‘‘Naṭṭhe mate pabbajite, napuṃsakepi bhattari;
[22]Itthiyā patiseṭṭhāya, na añño pati icchiyo’’ti. –
[07]Ayañhi brāhmaṇadhammo. ^b^Ayyikaṭṭhāne^eb^ti mātāmahiṭṭhāne ṭhapesi satthu cittārādhanavasenāti.
[06]Bahudhītarasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Paṭhamavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^197^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dakkhiṇāgirismi^eb^nti ^a^V1.0232^ea^ dakkhiṇāgirijanapade, tasmiṃ dakkhiṇāgirijanapade dakkhiṇāgirivihāre. ^b^Khandhesu ṭhapetvā yuge yottehī^eb^ti yottarajjūhi yuttāni payojitāni icceva attho.

[03]^b^Paṭhamadivase^eb^ti vapanadivasesu paṭhamadivase āraddhadivase. Pañcaṅgānipi paripuṇṇāni, pageva itaraṅgānīti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘paripuṇṇapañcaṅgā’’^eb^icceva vuttaṃ. Haritālamanosilāañjanehi uratthanādīsu ṭhapitattā ābhāya ujjalagattā. ^b^Avasesā^eb^ balībaddā. Kilantagoṇaṃ mocetvā akilantassa yojanaṃ ^b^kilantaparivattanaṃ^eb^.
[03]^b^Sīhakuṇḍalānī^eb^ti sīhamukhakuṇḍalāni. ^b^Brahmaveṭhana^eb^nti brahmuno veṭhanasadisaṃ, assanakhaveṭhanasadisanti attho.

[03]Buddhānaṃ ^a^M1.0266^ea^ kiccāni kālavasena vibhattāni ^b^pañca kiccāni bhavanti. Purebhattakicca^eb^nti bhattato pubbe buddhena kātabbakiccaṃ. ^b^Vītināmetvā^eb^ti phalasamāpattiyā kālaṃ vītināmetvā. ^b^Kadāci ekoti^eb^ādi tesaṃ tesaṃ vineyyānaṃ vinayanānurūpapaṭipattidassanaṃ. ^b^Pakatiyā^eb^ti pakatibuddhavesena. Buddhānaṃ hi rūpakāyassa asītianubyañjanapaṭimaṇḍita-bāttiṃsamahāpurisa- lakkhaṇa-kāyappabhā-byāmappabhā-ketumālāvicittatā buddhaveso. ^b^Kadāci anekehi pāṭihāriyehi vattamānehī^eb^ti iminā pāramīnaṃ nissandabhūtāni pāṭihāriyāni rucivaseneva pakāsanakāni bhavanti, na sabbadāti dasseti. Evañca katvā ^b^‘‘indakhīlassa anto ṭhapitamatte dakkhiṇapāde’’^eb^tiādivacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti. Bhagavato kāye pītarasmīnaṃ yebhuyyatāya ^b^‘‘suvaṇṇarasasiñcanāni viyā’’^eb^ti vatvā kāyamhi nīlādirasmīhi tahaṃ tahaṃ pītamissitaṃ sandhāya ^b^‘‘vicitrapaṭaparikkhittāni viya cā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Madhurenākārena saddaṃ karonti^eb^ tuṭṭharavaravanato.
[03]^b^Tatthā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0233^ea^ vihāre. ^b^Gandhamaṇḍalamāḷe^eb^ti hatthena kataparibhaṇḍe samosaritagandhapupphadāme maṇḍalamāḷe.

[03]^b^Upaṭṭhāne^eb^ti pamukhe. ^b^‘‘Ovadatī’’^eb^ti vatvā tatthovādaṃ sāmaññato dassetuṃ, ^b^‘‘bhikkhave’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Sampattī^eb^ti cakkhādīndriyapāripūri ceva hatthādisampadā ca. ^b^Samassāsitakāyo^eb^ kilamathavinodanena. ‘‘Tañca kho samāpajjanenā’’ti vadanti. ^b^Dutiyabhāge^eb^ti iminā aparabhāgaṃ tayo bhāge katvā tattha purimabhāgaṃ seyyanisajjāvasena samāpattīhi vītināmetīti dasseti. ^b^Loka^eb^nti rājagahādīsu yaṃ tadā upanissāya viharati, tattha aññattha vā bujjhanakaṃ vineyyasattalokaṃ buddhacakkhunā voloketi. ^b^Kālayutta^eb^nti tesaṃ indriyaparipākakālānurūpaṃ. ^b^Samayayutta^eb^nti tasseva vevacanaṃ. ^b^Samayayutta^eb^nti vā tehi ājānitabbavisesapaṭilābhānurūpaṃ.
[03]^b^Paṭisallīno^eb^ti kālaparicchedaṃ katvā samāpattiṃ samāpanno. ^b^Adhippāyaṃ sampādento^eb^ taṃ avirādhento, ajjhāsayānurūpanti attho.

[03]^b^Sakala…pe… devatāyo^eb^ti ettha lokadhātusākalyaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, na devatāsākalyaṃ. Na hi mahāsamaye viya sabbadā majjhimayāme dasasahassacakkavāḷe ^a^M1.0267^ea^ sabbattha sabbā devatā satthu samīpaṃ upagacchanti. ^b^Kilāsubhāvo^eb^ kilamatho.

[03]^b^Vihāracīvaraparivattanavasenā^eb^ti vihāre nivatthanivāsanaparivattanavasena. ^b^Ādiyitvā^eb^ti pārupanavasena gahetvā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘dhāretvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Bhikkhācāra^eb^nti bhikkhatthaṃ caritabbaṭṭhānaṃ.

[03]^b^Atirocamāna^eb^nti taṃ taṃ atikkamitvā samantato sabbadisāsu virocamānaṃ. ^b^Sarīrappabha^eb^nti attano sarīrappabhaṃ. ^b^Jaṅgamaṃ viya padumasara^eb^nti ratanamayakiñjakkhaṃ rajatamayakaṇṇikaṃ samantato samphullitakañcanapadumaṃ sañcārimasaraṃ viya. ^b^Gaganatala^eb^nti abbhamahikādiupakkilesavigamena suvisuddhāakāsatalaṃ viya. Tampi hi tārāgaṇakiraṇajālasamujjalatāya samantato virocati. ^b^Kanakasikhara^eb^nti kanakagirisikharaṃ. ^b^Siriyā jalamāna^eb^nti sabbaso anavajjāya sabbākārena paripuṇṇakāyatāya anaññasādhāraṇāya rūpakāyasiriyā samujjalaṃ, yassā rucirabhāvo viddhe vigatavalāhake puṇṇamāsiyaṃ paripuṇṇakalamanomamaṇḍalaṃ candamaṇḍalaṃ atirocati, pabhassarabhāvo sahassaraṃsikiraṇatejojālasamujjalaṃ sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ abhibhavati, hemasamujjalabhāvo ^a^V1.0234^ea^ tadubhaye abhibhuyya pavattamānaṃ ekakkhaṇe dasasahassilokadhātuvijjotanasamattha-mahābrahmuno pabhāsamudayaṃ abhivihacca bhāsati tapati virocati.

[03]^b^Samantapāsādike^eb^ti samantato pasādāvahe. Tañca kho sabbaso saritabbatāyāti āha ^b^‘‘pasādanīye’’^eb^ti. ^b^Uttamadamathasamathamanuppatte^eb^ti kāyavācāhi anuttaraṃ dantabhāvañceva anuttaraṃ cittavūpasamañca sampatte. ^b^Appasādenā^eb^ti pasādābhāvena, pasādapaṭikkhepena vā assaddhiyena. ^b^Ubhayathāpi no^eb^ti appasādo macchariyanti ubhayathāpi no eva, atha kho anattamanatāya upārambhādhippāyena apasādento, bhagavato mukhato kiñci desetukāmo vā evamāha. Tattha kāraṇaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘bhagavato panā’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Atitta^eb^nti tittiṃ agacchantaṃ. ^b^Kammabhaṅga^eb^nti kammahāniṃ.

[03]^b^Tikkhapañño esa brāhmaṇo,^eb^ tathā hi na cirasseva arahattaṃ sacchikarissati. ^b^Kathāpavattanatthampi evamāha^eb^ – ‘‘evaṃ ahaṃ imassa kañci dhammaṃ sotuṃ ^a^M1.0268^ea^ labhissāmī’’ti. ^b^Veneyyavasenā^eb^ti attano kasanakāribhāvakittanamukhena vinetabbapuggalavasena.

[03]^b^Oḷārikānī^eb^ti pākatikāni. ‘‘Esa uttamadakkhiṇeyyo’’ti ^b^sañjātabahumāno^eb^. Pāḷiyaṃ ^b^‘‘yugaṃ vā naṅgalaṃ vā’’^eb^ti ^b^vā^eb^-saddo avuttavikappattho. Tena bījādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti, tasmā bījaṃ vā īsaṃ vā pariggahayottāni vāti ayamattho dassito hoti. Tathā hi bhagavā brāhmaṇassa paṭivacanaṃ dento ^b^‘‘saddhā bīja’’^eb^ntiādimāha. ^b^Pubbadhammasabhāgatāyā^eb^ti paṭhamaṃ gahitadhammasabhāgatāya. Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ aṭṭhakathāruḷhameva gahetabbañca saddato atthāpattito vā idha daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Buddhānaṃ ānubhāvo^eb^ ayaṃ, yadidaṃ pasaṅgāgatadhammamukhena desanaṃ ārabhitvā veneyyavinayanaṃ.

[03]^b^Ananusandhikā^eb^ti pucchānusandhivasena ananusandhikā. ^b^Eva^eb^nti idāni vuccamānākārena. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti etissā desanāya. ^b^So^eb^ti bhagavā. ^b^Tassā^eb^ti brāhmaṇassa. ^b^Anukampāyā^eb^ti asabbaññū hi satipi anukampāya pucchitamatte tiṭṭheyya, tathā jānantopi ananukampako, bhagavā pana ubhayadhammapāripūriyā ‘‘idaṃ apucchita’’nti aparihāpetvā katheti. ^b^Samūla^eb^ntiādinā saṅkhepena vuttamatthaṃ vivaranto ^b^‘‘tatthā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha bījassa kasiyā mūlabhāvo nānantariyato tappamāṇavidhānato cāti āha ^b^‘‘tasmiṃ…pe… kattabbato’’^eb^ti. Tena anvayato byatirekato ca ^a^V1.0235^ea^ bījassa kasiyā mūlabhāvaṃ vibhāveti. ^b^Kusalā^eb^ti iminā akusalā tato aññathāpi karonti, taṃ pana appamāṇanti dasseti.

[03]^b^Tassā^eb^ti brāhmaṇassa bījaṭṭhāniyassa dhammassa ca ^b^upakārabhāvato. Dhammasambandhasamatthabhāvato^eb^ti tathā vuttadhammassa phalena sambandhituṃ yojetuṃ samatthabhāvato. ^b^Tapo vuṭṭhī^eb^ti vuttavacanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ ^b^‘‘ayaṃ hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Kassakassa upakārassa bījassa anantaraṃ vuṭṭhi vuccamānā aṭṭhāne vuttā nāma na hoti. Kasmā? Bījassa vappakāle anurūpāya vuṭṭhiyā icchitabbato, tasmā avasāne majjhe vā vuccamānāya dhammasambandhasamatthatā tassā vibhāvitā na siyā. ^b^Attano avisaye^eb^ti jhānādiuttarimanussadhamme. ^b^Pacchāpī^eb^ti kasisambhārakathanato pacchāpi. ^b^Vattabbo^eb^ti ekantena vattabbo. ^b^Tadanantaraṃyevā^eb^ti bījānantaraṃyeva. ^b^Vuccamānā^eb^ vuṭṭhi ^b^samatthā hoti^eb^^a^M1.0269^ea^, bījassa phalena sambandhane samatthāti dīpitā hoti anantaravacaneneva tassā āsannaupakārattadīpanato.

[03]^b^Sampasādalakkhaṇā^eb^ti pasīditabbe vatthusmiṃ sammadeva pasīdanalakkhaṇā. ^b^Okappanalakkhaṇā^eb^ti saddheyyavatthuno evametanti pakkhandanalakkhaṇā. ^b^Mūlabīja^eb^ntiādīsu mūlameva bījaṃ mūlabījaṃ. Esa nayo sesesupi bījagāmassa adhippetattā. Bhūtagāmo pana mūlaṃ bījaṃ etassāti mūlabījantiādinā veditabbo. ^b^Bījabīja^eb^nti pañcamaṃ pana paccayantarasamavāye sadisaphaluppattiyā visesakāraṇabhāvato virūhanasamatthe sāraphale niruḷho bījasaddo tadatthasiddhiyā mūlādīsupi kesuci pavattatīti tato nivattanatthaṃ ekena bīja-saddena visesetvā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘bījabīja’’^eb^nti ‘‘dukkhadukkhaṃ rūparūpa’’nti ca yathā. Evampi iminā atthena imassapi nippariyāyova bījabhāvoti dassento āha ^b^‘‘taṃ sabbampi…pe… gacchatī’’^eb^ti.

[03]Idāni kathañci vattabbe saddhāya opammatte bīje saddhāya bījabhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘tattha yathā’’^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. Kāmaṃ saddhūpanisaṃ sīlaṃ, tathāpi samādhissa viya sabbesampi anavajjadhammānaṃ ādimūlabhāvato saddhāyapi patiṭṭhā hotīti āha ^b^‘‘heṭṭhā sīlamūlena patiṭṭhātī’’^eb^ti. Yasmā sabbasseva puggalassa saddhāvasena samathavipassanārambho, tasmā sā ^b^‘‘upari samathavipassanaṅkuraṃ uṭṭhāpetī’’^eb^ti vuttā. ^b^Ta^eb^nti dhaññabījaṃ. ^b^Pathavirasaṃ āporasa^eb^nti sasambhārapathavīāpesu labbhamānaṃ rasaṃ. ^b^Gahetvā^eb^ti paccayaparamparāya gahetvā. ^b^Dhaññaparipākagahaṇattha^eb^nti dhaññaparipākanibbattiatthaṃ. ^b^Rasa^eb^nti saddhāsīlamūlahetusamathavipassanābhāvanārasaṃ ādiyitvā. ^b^Ariyamagganāḷenā^eb^ti ariyamaggasotena ^b^ariyaphaladhaññaparipākagahaṇattha^eb^nti ariyaphalameva ^a^V1.0236^ea^ dhanāyitabbato dhaññaṃ tassa nibbattiatthaṃ. Dhaññanāḷaṃ nāma kaṇḍassa nissayabhūto pacchimadeso, ^b^kaṇḍo^eb^ tabbhantaro taṃnissayoyeva daṇḍo. ^b^Pasavo^eb^ nāma pupphaṃ. ^b^Vuddhi^eb^nti avayavapāripūrivasena vuddhiṃ. ^b^Virūḷhi^eb^nti mūlasantānadaḷhatāya viruḷhataṃ. ^b^Vepulla^eb^nti pattanāḷādīhi vipulabhāvaṃ. ^b^Khīraṃ janetvā^eb^ti taruṇasalāṭukabhāvappattiyā taṇḍulassa bījassa bījabhūtaṃ khīraṃ uppādetvā. ^b^Esā^eb^ti saddhā. ^b^Patiṭṭhahitvā^eb^ti kammapathākammapathasammādiṭṭhisahitena ādito pavattasīlamattena patiṭṭhahitvā. ^b^Vuddhi^eb^ntiādīsu suparisuddhāhi sīlacittavisuddhīhi vuddhiṃ, diṭṭhikaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhīhi ^b^virūḷhiṃ^eb^. Maggāmaggapaṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhīhi^b^ vepullaṃ^eb^ patvā. ^b^Ñāṇadassanavisuddhikhīra^eb^nti ^a^M1.0270^ea^ sādurasasuvisuddhibhāvato ñāṇadassanavisuddhisaṅkhātaṃ khīraṃ janetvā. ^b^Aneka…pe… phala^eb^nti anekapaṭisambhidā-anekābhiññāṇaparipuṇṇaṃ arahattaphalasīsaṃ nipphādeti.

[03]^b^Bījakiccakaraṇato^eb^ti bījakiccassa karaṇato. Yañhi taṃsadisassa visadisassa ca attano phalassa patiṭṭhāpanasambandhananipphādanasaṅkhātaṃ bījassa kiccaṃ, tassa karaṇato nibbattanato ^b^‘‘evaṃ saddhā bījakicca’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Iminā anaññasādhāraṇaṃ saddhāya kusaladhammānaṃ bījabhāvaṃ dasseti. ^b^Sā cā^eb^tiādinā tamevatthaṃ samattheti. Idāni tattha āgamaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘saddhājāto’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tena yathā sappurisūpanissayassa saddhammassavanassa ca, evaṃ anavasesāya sammāpaṭipattiyā saddhā mūlakāraṇanti dasseti.

[03]Indriyasaṃvaro vīriyañca akusaladhamme, dukkarakārikā dhutaṅgañca akusaladhamme ceva kāyañca tapati vibādhatīti ^b^tapo^eb^ti vuccati. ^b^Indriyasaṃvaro adhippeto^eb^ vīriyassa dhorayhabhāvena gayhamānattā, itaresaṃ vuṭṭhibhāvassa anuyuñjamānattā. Ādi-saddena kalalaṅgāravuṭṭhiādīnaṃ saṅgaho. ^b^Samanuggahita^eb^nti upagataṃ. Viruhanāmilāyananipphattivacanehi dhaññabījasantānassa viya tesaṃ vuddhiyā saddhābījasantānassa tapovuṭṭhiyā ādimajjhapariyosānesu upakārataṃ dasseti.

[03]^b^Purimapadesupī^eb^ti ^b^api^eb^-saddena parapadesupīti attho daṭṭhabbo ‘‘hirī me īsā, mano me yotta’’nti icchitattā, ‘‘sati me’’ti ettha me-saddo ānetvā yojetabbo. ^b^Udakampi tāva dātabbaṃ hoti^eb^ nadītaḷākādito ānetvā. ^b^Vīriyabalībadde^eb^ catubbidhe ^b^yojetvā. Niccakālaṃ^eb^ atthīti vacanaseso.

[03]^b^Saha vipassanāya maggapaññā adhippetā^eb^ amatapphalāya kasiyā adhippetattā. ^b^Vipassanā paññā^eb^^a^V1.0237^ea^^b^cā^eb^ti duvidhāpi paññā upanissayā hoti visiṭṭhabhāvato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yathā hī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Paññā^eb^ti pakārehi jānātīti paññā. Paññavataṃ paññā purato hoti yonisomanasikārassa visesapaccayabhāvato, sahajātādhipatīsu ca ukkaṭṭhabhāvato. ^b^Sirī^eb^ti sobhaggaṃ. ^b^Sataṃ dhammā^eb^ saddhādayo, ^b^anvāyikā^eb^ti anugāmino. ^b^Īsābaddhā hotī^eb^ti hirisaṅkhātaīsāya baddhā hoti ^a^M1.0271^ea^, paññāya kadāci appayogato manosīsena samādhi idha vuttoti āha ^b^‘‘manosaṅkhātassa samādhiyottassā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Samaṃ^eb^ upanetvā bandhitvā baddharajjukattā ^b^samādhiyottaṃ. Ekato gamana^eb^nti līnaccāraddhasaṅkhātaṃ ekapassato gamanaṃ vāreti. Majjhimāya vipassanāvīthiyā paṭipādanato kāyādīsu subhasukhaniccattabhāvavigamane paññāya visesapaccayā satīti vuttaṃ – ^b^‘‘satiyuttā paññā’’^eb^ti tassā sativippayogāsabbhāvato. Santatighanādīnaṃ ayaṃ viseso – purimapacchimānaṃ dhammānaṃ nirantaratāya ekībhūtānaṃ viya pavatti ^b^santatighanatā,^eb^ ekasamūhavasena ekībhūtānamiva pavatti ^b^samūhaghanatā,^eb^ dubbiññeyyakiccabhedavasena ekībhūtānamiva pavatti. ^b^Kiccaghanatā,^eb^ ekārammaṇavasena ekībhūtānamiva pavatti ^b^ārammaṇaghanatā^eb^. Sabbesaṃ, sabbāni vā kilesānaṃ mūlasantānakāni ^b^sabba…pe… santānakāni^eb^. Anuppayogo hi attho. ^b^Padāletī^eb^ti bhindati samucchindati. ^b^Sā ca kho^eb^ ‘‘padāletī’’ti vuttā ^b^lokuttarāva^eb^ paññā anusayappahānassa adhippetattā. Santatighanādibhedanā pana lokiyāpi hoti vipassanāvasena ghanavinibbhogassa nipphādanato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘itarā pana lokikāpi siyā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Hirīyatī^eb^ti lajjati, jigucchatīti attho. Tasmā ^b^‘‘pāpakehi dhammehī’’^eb^ti nissakkavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, hetumhi vā karaṇavacanaṃ. ^b^Ottappampi gahitameva,^eb^ na hi lajjanaṃ nibbhayaṃ pāpabhayaṃ vā alajjanaṃ atthīti. ^b^Rukkhalaṭṭhī^eb^ti rukkhadaṇḍo. Tena padesena kasanato visesato naṅgalanti vuccatīti āha ^b^‘‘īsā yuganaṅgalaṃ dhāretī’’^eb^ti. Kāmaṃ paññārahitā hirī atthi, hirirahitā pana paññā natthevāti āha ^b^‘‘hiri…pe… abhāvato’’^eb^ti. Sandhiṭṭhāne kampanābhāvato ^b^acalaṃ^eb^. Thirabhāvena ^b^asithilaṃ^eb^. Hiripaṭibaddhapaññā paṭipakkhavasena ca asithilabhāvena ca ^b^acalā asithilā^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘abbokiṇṇā ahirikenā’’^eb^ti. Nāḷiyā minamānapuriso viya ārammaṇaṃ munāti paricchedato jānātīti ^b^mano. Manosīsenā^eb^ti manaso apadesena. ^b^Taṃsampayutto^eb^ti iminā kuntasahacaraṇato puriso kunto viya manasahacaraṇasamādhi ‘‘mano’’ti vuttoti dasseti. ^b^Sārathinā^eb^ti kassakena. So hi idha balībaddānaṃ sāraṇato pācanato ‘‘sārathī’’ti adhippeto. ^b^Ekābandhana^eb^nti ekābaddhakaraṇaṃ. ^b^Sakakicce^eb^ti sakakiccena yutte. Tena hi īsādīsu ^a^M1.0272^ea^ yathārahaṃ bandhitvā ekābaddhesu katesu naṅgalesu kiccaṃ ijjhati, no aññathāti taṃ ^b^‘‘sakakicce paṭipādetī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Avikkhepasabhāvenā^eb^ti attano avikkhepasabhāvena ^a^V1.0238^ea^. ^b^Bandhitvā^eb^ti sahajātādipaccayabhāvena attanā sambandhitvā. ^b^Sakakicce^eb^ti hirīādīhi yathāsakaṃ kattabbe kicce.

[03]^b^Cirakatādimattha^eb^nti cirabhāsitampi atthaṃ. ^b^Sarati^eb^ anussarati kāyādiṃ asubhādito nijjhāyati. ^b^Phāletī^eb^ti padāleti. Pājenti gamentīti taṃ ^b^pājanaṃ^eb^. ^b^Idha^eb^ imasmiṃ sutte ^b^‘‘pācana’’nti vuttaṃ^eb^ ja-kārassa ca-kāraṃ katvā. ^b^Phālapācana^eb^nti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yathā hi brāhmaṇa…pe… satī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Idāni tamatthaṃ vitthārato dassento ^b^‘‘tattha yathā’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Naṅgalaṃ anurakkhati^eb^ bhijjanaphālanato. ^b^Purato cassa gacchatī^eb^ti assa naṅgalassa kassane bhūmiyā vilikhane purato gacchati pubbaṅgamā hoti. ^b^Gatiyo^eb^ti pavattiyo. ^b^Samanvesamānā^eb^ti saraṇavasena gavesamānā. ^b^Ārammaṇe vā^eb^ kāyādike ^b^upaṭṭhāpayamānā^eb^ asubhādivasena ^b^paññānaṅgalaṃ rakkhati^eb^. Sabhāvāsabhāvūpagame phālo viya naṅgalassa ^b^‘‘ārakkhā’’ti vuttā^eb^ ‘‘sabbānatthato sati rakkhatī’’ti katvā. Tathā hesā ārakkhapaccupaṭṭhānā. Cirakatacirabhāsitānaṃ asammussanavasena sati paññānaṅgalassa purato hotīti vatvā tassa puratobhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘sati…pe… no pamuṭṭhe’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Satiparicite^eb^ti satiyā paṭṭhāpite. ‘‘Upaṭṭhāpite’’tipi pāṭho, ayamevattho. ^b^Saṃsīdituṃ na detī^eb^ti sakiccakiriyāya saṃsīdanaṃ kātuṃ na deti. Kosajjasaṅkhātaṃ saṃsīdanaṃ ^b^kosajjasaṃsīdanaṃ^eb^.

[03]^b^Pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ vuttaṃ^eb^ kāyikavācasikasaṃyamassa kathitattā. ^b^Āhāre udare yato^eb^ti paribhuñjitabbāahāre saṃyatabhāvadassanena paribhuñjitabbatāya catūsupi paccayesu saṃyatabhāvo dīpitoti āha ^b^‘‘āhāramukhenā’’^eb^tiādi. Saṃyatabhāvo cettha paccayahetu anesanābhāvoti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘nirupakkilesoti attho’’^eb^ti. Bhojanasaddo āhāraparibhoge niruḷhoti katvā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘bhojane mattaññutāmukhenā’’^eb^ti. Paribhuñjanaṭṭhena pana bhojanasaddamukhenāti vutte adhippetattho labbhateva. ^b^Tenā^eb^ti kāyaguttātiādivacanena. ^b^Na vilumpantī^eb^ti ^b^‘‘dīpetī’’^eb^ti padaṃ ānetvā sambandho.

[03]^b^Dvīhākārehī^eb^ti ^a^M1.0273^ea^ adiṭṭhādīnaṃ adiṭṭhādivasena diṭṭhādīnañca diṭṭhādivasenāti evaṃ dvippakārehi. ^b^Avisaṃvādanaṃ^eb^ avitathakathanaṃ. ^b^Chedanaṃ^eb^ mūlappadese nikantanaṃ. ^b^Lunanaṃ^eb^ yattha katthaci chedanaṃ. ^b^Uppāṭanaṃ^eb^ ummūlanaṃ. ^b^Asitenā^eb^ti dattena, lāyitenāti attho. ^b^Visaṃvādana^eb^saṅkhātānaṃ ^b^tiṇānaṃ,^eb^ aṭṭhannaṃ anariyavohārānanti attho. ^b^Yathābhūtañāṇa^eb^nti nāma rūpaparicchedakañāṇaṃ. ^b^Saccanti veditabbaṃ^eb^ aviparītavuttikattā ^b^‘‘chedakaṃ’’^eb^ chindanakaṃ. ^b^Niddāna^eb^nti niddāyakaṃ. Idameva saccaṃ ^a^V1.0239^ea^ moghamaññanti diṭṭhi ^b^‘‘diṭṭhisacca’’^eb^nti vuccati. ^b^Dvīsu vikappesū^eb^ti bhāvakattusādhanavasena dvīsu vikappesu. ‘‘Niddāna’’nti upayogavaseneva attho.

[03]^b^Sīlameva ‘‘soracca’’nti vuttaṃ^eb^ ‘‘pāṇātipātādīhi suṭṭhu oratassa kamma’’nti katvā. Saṅkhāradukkhādīnaṃ abhāvato sundarabhāvato sundare nibbāne ārammaṇakaraṇavasena ratattā surato, arahā. Tassa bhāvo ^b^soraccaṃ,^eb^ arahattaṃ. ^b^Appamocanameva^eb^ accantāya pamocanaṃ na hoti.

[03]Yadaggena vipassanāya paññāya taṃsahagatavīriyassa ca naṅgaladhorayhatā, tathāpavattakusalabhāvanāya ca kasibhāvo ca, tadaggena tato puretaraṃ pavattapaññāvīriyapāramīnaṃ naṅgaladhorayhatā, tathāpavattakusalabhāvanāya ca kasibhāvo veditabboti dassento ^b^‘‘yathā hī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Dhuraṃ vahatīti ^b^dhorayhaṃ. Yathāvuttaṃ ghana^eb^nti asmimānādibhedaṃ ghanaṃ. Vahitabbā ādibhūtā dhurā etesaṃ atthīti dhurā, purimadhuravāhakā. Taṃmūlakā aparaṃ dhuraṃ vahantā dhorayhā. ^b^Dhurā ca dhorayhā ca dhuradhorayhaṃ^eb^ ekattavasena. ^b^Vahanta^eb^nti kasanena pavattantaṃ.

[03]Kāmayogādīhi ^b^yogehi khemattā^eb^ anupaddavattā. ^b^Taṃ^eb^ nibbānaṃ ^b^adhikicca^eb^ uddissa. ^b^Vāhīyati^eb^ vipassanāya sahagataṃ. ^b^Abhimukhaṃ vāhīyati^eb^ maggapariyāpannaṃ. ^b^Khettakoṭi^eb^nti khettamariyādaṃ. ^b^Diṭṭhekaṭṭhe^eb^ti diṭṭhiyā sahajātekaṭṭhe pahānekaṭṭhe ca. ^b^Oḷārike^eb^ti uparimaggavajjhe upādāya vuttaṃ, aññathā dassanapahātabbāpi dutiyamaggavajjhehi oḷārikāti. ^b^Aṇusahagate^eb^ti aṇubhūte. Idaṃ heṭṭhimamaggavajjhe upādāya vuttaṃ. ^b^Sabbakilese^eb^ avasiṭṭhasabbakilese ^b^pajahantaṃ anivattantaṃ gacchati^eb^ puna pahātabbatāya abhāvato. ^b^Anivattanta^eb^nti na nivattantaṃ, yathā nivattanaṃ na ^a^M1.0274^ea^ hoti, evaṃ gacchatīti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘nivattanarahita’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Etaṃ pana^eb^ tava dhuradhorayhaṃ.

[03]^b^Evamesā kasī^eb^ti yathāvuttassa paccāmasanaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘nigamanaṃ karonto’’^eb^ti. Vuttasseva hi atthassa puna vacanaṃ. ^b^Paññānaṅgalena satiphālaṃ ākoṭetvā^eb^ti paññāsaṅkhātena naṅgalena saddhiṃ satiphālassa ekābaddhabhāvakaraṇena ākoṭetvā. ^b^Kaṭṭhā^eb^ti ettha ‘‘kasī’’ti padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ ‘‘kaṭṭhā kasī’’ti. ^b^Kammapariyosāna^eb^nti yathāvuttakasikammassa pariyosānabhūtaṃ. Yadipi pubbe ‘‘paññā me yuganaṅgala’’ntiādinā attuddesikavasenāyaṃ amatapphalā kasi dassitā, mahākāruṇikassa pana bhagavato desanā sabbassapi sattanikāyassa sādhāraṇā evāti dassento ^b^‘‘sā kho panesā’’^eb^tiādimāha.

[03]^b^Divaseyevā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0240^ea^ taṃdivase eva. ^b^Ādimāhā^eb^ti ettha ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena kathāpariyosāne pāṭhapadeso gahitoti tadaññaṃ ‘‘evaṃ vutte’’tiādipāṭhaṃ sandhāya ^b^‘‘tato parañcā’’^eb^ti āha.
[06]Kasibhāradvājasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^198^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Etaṃ vutta^eb^nti ‘‘odanena pūresī’’ti etaṃ vacanaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^‘‘Gahetuṃ samattho nāma nāhosī^eb^ti bhagavato adhiṭṭhānabalenā’’ti vadanti. ^b^Taṃ^eb^ brāhmaṇaṃ vinetukāmatāya kira bhagavā tathā akāsi.

[03]^b^Upārambhabhayenā^eb^ti parūpavādabhayena. ^b^Avatvāva nivatto^eb^ ‘‘abbhāgatopi pāsaṇḍo vācāmattenapi na pūjetabbo’’ti brāhmaṇadhamme vuttattā. ^b^Pakkanto^eb^ti brāhmaṇassa dhammaṃ avatvā pakkanto brāhmaṇassa na tāva ñāṇaṃ paripakkanti. ^b^Etaṃ vacanaṃ…pe… magamāsi^eb^ ‘‘punappunañceva vapanti bīja’’ntiādinā ^a^M1.0275^ea^ dhammaṃ kathetuṃ avassaṃ ākaṅkhanto. Pakārato kassatīti ^b^pakaṭṭhako,^eb^ rasataṇhāya pakaṭṭhoti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘rasagiddho’’^eb^ti.

[03]‘‘Punappunañceva vapanti bīja’’nti imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhīti sambandho. ^b^Bīja^eb^nti ca iti-saddo nidassanattho vā. Tena avayavena samudāyaṃ nidasseti. ^b^Osakkasī^eb^ti saṅkocasi. ^b^Vutta^eb^nti vapanaṃ kataṃ. Tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘alamettāvatā’’^eb^ti. ^b^‘‘Vassitvā’’^eb^ti vuṭṭhiṃ pavattetvā.

[03]^b^Desanā…pe… dasseti^eb^ brāhmaṇena vuttaṃ ayuttavacanaṃ parivaṭṭentopi divase divase bhikkhācariyā nāma bhikkhūnaṃ kāyagatā vuttīti. Khīraṃ hatthena nayantīti vā ^b^khīranikā. Kilamatī^eb^ti taṃtaṃkiccakaraṇavasena khijjati. ^b^Phandatī^eb^ti anatthasamāyogavasena vipphandati. ^b^Apunabbhavāyā^eb^ti āyatiṃ anuppattiyā. ^b^Maggo nāmā^eb^ti upāyo nāma nibbānaṃ, tasmiṃ laddhe punabbhavābhāvato. ‘‘Punappuna’’nti vacanaṃ upādāya bījavapanādayo punappunadhammā nāma jātāti āha ^b^‘‘soḷasa punappunadhamme desentenā’’^eb^ti.
[06]Udayasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^199^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Udaravātehī^eb^ti ^a^V1.0241^ea^ vātakatavijjhanatodanādivasena aparāparaṃ vattamānehi udaravātehi, tassa vā vikārehi. Nibaddhupaṭṭhākakāle pana dhammabhaṇḍāgārikova. ^b^Arañña^eb^nti bhagavato bhikkhūnañca vasanaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ tapovanaṃ. Taṃ ^b^niddhūmaṃ hoti^eb^ udakatāpanassapi akaraṇato. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti yasmā tassa uṇhodakavikkiṇanacariyāya jīvikākappanaṃ hoti, tasmā.

[03]^b^Vattametaṃ^eb^ tassa patikāratthaṃ parikathādīnampi kātuṃ labbhanato. Idāni tattha kāraṇampi savisayaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘vaṇṇaṃ hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Bhagavā hi āyasmato upavāṇassa devahitabrāhmaṇassa taṃ sambhāvitaṃ bhavissati ^a^M1.0276^ea^ tikicchāpaṭiyattaṃ, tāya ca attano rogassa vūpasamanaṃ, tappasaṅgena ca devahitabrāhmaṇo mama santikaṃ āgantvā dhammassavanena saraṇesu sīlesu ca patiṭṭhahissatīti sabbamidaṃ ñatvā evaṃ ^b^‘‘iṅgha me tvaṃ, upavāṇa, uṇhodakaṃ jānāhī’’^eb^ti avoca. ^b^Āgamanīyappaṭipadaṃ^eb^ pubbabhāgappaṭipadaṃ pubbabhāgappaṭipattiṃ ^b^kathetuṃ vaṭṭati^eb^ anuttarimanussadhammattā. ^b^Sadevakena lokenā^eb^ti anavasesato lokassa gahaṇaṃ. Phalavisesākaṅkhāya pūjetabbāti pūjanīyā, te eva idha ^b^‘‘pūjaneyyā’’^eb^ti vuttā. Tathā ādarena pūjetabbatāya sakkāriyā, ā-kārassa rassattaṃ, ri-saddassa ca re-ādesaṃ katvā ^b^‘‘sakkareyyā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ‘‘Apacayeyyā’’ti vattabbe ya-kāralopaṃ katvā ^b^‘‘apaceyyā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Tesa^eb^nti sadevakena pūjaneyyādīnaṃ. ^b^Haritu^eb^nti netuṃ.
[03]^b^Ettakenapī^eb^ti upasaṅkamanādinā ettakena appamattakenapi katavattena ^b^ayaṃ kitti…pe… somanassajāto^eb^.

[03]^b^Yajamānassā^eb^ti deyyadhammaṃ dentassa. Dakkhiṇāya ijjhanaṃ nāma vipulaphalabhāvoti āha ^b^‘‘mahapphalo hotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Vidita^eb^nti paṭividdhapaccakkhakataṃ. ^b^Ājānātī^eb^ti vutthabhavādiṃ pariyādāya jānāti paṭivijjhati. ^b^Jānitvā^eb^ti cattāri saccāni maggapaṭipāṭiyā paṭivijjhitvā. Aggappattatāya ^b^katakiccataṃ patto^eb^. Brāhmaṇena attanā kato kāro ca bhagavato eva paccupaṭṭhātīti taṃ dassento ^b^‘‘iminā khīṇāsave yajanākārena yajantassā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.
[06]Devahitasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^200^eb^^b^.^eb^ Yasmā ^a^V1.0242^ea^ tassa brāhmaṇassa anissayassa jiṇṇabhāvena visesato kāyo lūkho jāto, jiṇṇapilotikakhaṇḍehi saṅghaṭitaṃ pāvuraṇaṃ, tasmā ^b^‘‘lūkhapāvuraṇo’’^eb^ti padassa ^b^‘‘jiṇṇapāvuraṇo’’^eb^ti attho vutto. ^b^Pāṭiyekka^eb^nti puttesu ekameko ekamekāya vācāya visuṃ visuṃ.

[03]Sampucchanaṃ ^a^M1.0277^ea^ nāma idha sammantananti āha ^b^‘‘saddhiṃ mantayitvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Nandissa^eb^nti abhinandiṃ. Atītatthe hi idaṃ anāgatavacanaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘nandijāto…pe… ahosi’’^eb^nti. ^b^Bhussantā^eb^ti nibbhussanavasena ravantā.

[03]^b^Vayogata^eb^nti pacchimavayaṃ upagataṃ. So pana yasmā purime dve vaye atikkamavasena gato. Pacchimaṃ ekadesato atikkamanavasena, tasmā vuttaṃ – ^b^‘‘tayo vaye gataṃ atikkantaṃ pacchimavaye ṭhita’’^eb^nti.
[03]^b^Nipparibhogo^eb^ti jiṇṇabhāvena javaparakkamahāniyā aparibhogo na bhuñjitabbo. ^b^Khādanā apanīyatī^eb^ti yavasaṃ adadantā tato nīharanti nāma. ^b^Thero^eb^ti vuḍḍho.
[03]^b^Anassavā^eb^ti na vacanakarā. ^b^Appatissā^eb^ti patissayarahitā. ^b^Avasavattino^eb^ti na mayhaṃ vasena vattanakā. ^b^Sundarataro^eb^ti upatthambhakāribhāvena sundarataro.
[03]^b^Purato^eb^ti upatthambhakabhāvena purato katvā. ^b^Udake patiṭṭhaṃ labhati^eb^ tattha patiṭṭhato thirapatiṭṭhabhāvato. Addhapatiṭṭho hi daṇḍo daṇḍadharapurisassa patiṭṭhaṃ labhāpeti.

[03]^b^Brāhmaṇiyo^eb^ti attano brāhmaṇiyo. ^b^Pāṭiyekka^eb^nti ‘‘asukassa gehe asukassa gehe’’ti evaṃ uddesikaṃ katvā visuṃ visuṃ. ^b^Mā niyyādehi, amhākaṃ ruccanaṭṭhānamevā^eb^ti tava puttānaṃ gehesu yaṃ amhākaṃ ruccanaṭṭhānaṃ. Tatthameva gamissāmāti sabbesampi etesaṃ anuggahaṃ kātukāmo bhagavā evamāha.

[03]^b^Tato paṭṭhāyā^eb^ti sotāpattiphalapaṭilābhato paṭṭhāya. Yadatthaṃ mayaṃ imassa brāhmaṇassa mahāsampattidānādinā ^a^V1.0243^ea^ anuggaho kato, so cassa puttaparijanassapi attho siddhoti satthā na sabbakālaṃ tassa brāhmaṇassa puttānaṃ gehaṃ agamāsi, te eva pana kālena kālaṃ satthu santikaṃ gantvā yathāvibhavaṃ sakkārasammānaṃ akaṃsūti adhippāyo.
[06]Mahāsālasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^201^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Mānena^eb^^a^M1.0278^ea^^b^thaddho^eb^ti ‘‘ayaṃ kho’’tiādinā paggahitena mānena thaddho bajjhitacitto thaddhāyosalāko viya kassacipi anonato. ^b^Na kiñci jānāti^eb^ loke paṭisanthāramattassapi ajānanato.

[03]^b^Abbhutavittajātā^eb^ti sañjātābbhutavittā. Vittaṃ vittīti ca tuṭṭhipariyāyā. ^b^Abhūtapubbāyā^eb^ti yā tassā parisāya vitti tadā bhūtā, sā ito pubbe abhūtā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘abhūta…pe… samannāgatā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Assa puggalassā^eb^ti anena puggalena. ^b^Apacitā^eb^ti paramanipaccena pūjanīyasāmaññato tattha attano pakkhipanaṃ idha desanākosallaṃ.
[06]Mānatthaddhasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^202^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^‘‘Sabbaṃ seta’’^eb^nti kenaci ^b^vutte^eb^ tassa ^b^paccanīkaṃ karontasseva assa^eb^ brāhmaṇassa. ^b^Vinetvā^eb^ti vināsetvā. ^b^Suṇātīti atthoti^eb^ ‘‘suṇātī’’ti kiriyāpadaṃ āharitvā gāthāya attho veditabbo ‘‘jaññā subhāsita’’nti vuttattā. Na hi asutvā desitaṃ jānituṃ sakkonti.
[03]Paccanīkasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^203^eb^^b^.^eb^ Vanakamme niyutto, kiriyamānena vanakammaṃ etassa atthīti ^b^vanakammiko^eb^. ^b^Imasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe^eb^ti imasmiṃ evaṃmahante vanasaṇḍe. Na me vanasmiṃ karaṇīyamatthi yathā, ‘‘brāhmaṇa, tuyha’’nti adhippāyo. Itaraṃ pana yaṃ mahākilesavanaṃ, taṃ maggañāṇapharasunā samādhimayasilāyaṃ ^a^V1.0244^ea^ sunisitena sabbaso ^a^M1.0279^ea^ ucchinnamūlaṃ, tato eva ^b^nibbanatho^eb^ nikkilesagahano. Vivekābhiratiyā ekako abhirato paṭipakkhavigamena. Tenāha ^b^‘‘aratiṃ…pe… jahitvā’’^eb^ti.
[06]Vanakammikasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^204^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dhammantevāsikā^eb^ti kiñcipi dhanaṃ adatvā kevalaṃ antevāsikā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘veyyāvaccaṃ katvā sippuggaṇhanakā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Gambhīrasabhāve^eb^ti samantato dūrato gahanasacchannavipulatararukkhagacchalatāya ca, tadā himapiṇḍasinnabhāvena mayūrayānehi patiṭṭhātuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya ca gambhīrabhāve.

[03]^b^Bahubherave^eb^ti bahubhayānake. ^b^Aniñjamānenā^eb^ti itthambhūtatthe karaṇavacanaṃ. ^b^Atisundaraṃ vatā^eb^ti evaṃ sante nāma araññe evaṃ niccalakāyo nisinno jhāyanto ativiya sundarañca jhānaṃ jhāyasīti vadati.
[03]^b^Accherarūpa^eb^nti acchariyabhāvaṃ. ^b^Seṭṭhappattiyā^eb^ti seṭṭhabhāvappattiyā.
[03]‘‘Lokādhipatisahabyataṃ ākaṅkhamāno’’ti iminā brāhmaṇo lokādhipatisahayogaṃ pucchati, ‘‘kasmā bhava’’ntiādinā pana tadaññavisesākaṅkhaṃ pucchatīti āha ^b^‘‘aparenapi ākārena pucchatī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Kaṅkhāti taṇhā^eb^ abhikkhaṇavasena pavattā. ^b^Anekasabhāvesū^eb^ti rūpādivasena ajjhattikādivasena evaṃ nānāsabhāvesu ārammaṇesu. Assādarāgo lobho abhijjhāti ^b^nānappakārā. Sesakilesā vā^eb^ diṭṭhimānadosādayo. ^b^Niccakālaṃ avassitā^eb^ sattānaṃ avassayabhāvattā. ^b^Pajappāpanavasenā^eb^ti pakārehi taṇhāyanavasena. ^b^Nirantā^eb^ti antarahitā niravasesā.

[03]^b^Anupagamano^eb^ti anupādāno. ^b^Sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ dīpeti,^eb^ tassa hi vasena eva nānāsabhāvesu ^a^V1.0245^ea^ bhagavā samantacakkhunā passatīti ^b^‘‘sabbe…pe… dassano’’^eb^ti ^a^M1.0280^ea^ vuccati. ^b^Arahattaṃ sandhāyāha,^eb^ tañhi nippariyāyato ‘‘anuttara’’nti vuccati.
[06]Kaṭṭhahārasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^205^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ito^eb^ti manussattabhāvato. ^b^Paṭigantvā^eb^ti abhigantvā. Sagge hi nibbattanto kammaphalena dhammatāvasena paṭisandhikālato paṭṭhāya abhirativasena abhiramati eva nāmāti.
[06]Mātuposakasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^206^eb^^b^.^eb^ Virūpaṃ gandhaṃ pasavatīti ^b^visso,^eb^ duggandho. ^b^Bāhitvā^eb^ti attano santānato bahikatvā nīharitvā. Taṃ pana anavasesato pajahananti āha ^b^‘‘aggamaggena jahitvā’’^eb^ti. Saṅkhāyati sammadeva paricchindati etāyāti ^b^saṅkhā,^eb^ ñāṇanti āha ^b^‘‘saṅkhāyāti ñāṇenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Bhinnakilesattā^eb^ti niruttinayena bhikkhusaddasiddhimāha.
[06]Bhikkhakasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^207^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paccetī^eb^ti pattiyāyati saddahati. Tathābhūto ca tamatthaṃ nikāmento nāma hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘icchati patthetī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sādhu, bhante^eb^ti ettha ^b^sādhu^eb^-saddo āyācanattho, na abhinandanatthoti ^b^‘‘āyācamāno āhā’’^eb^ti vatvā āyācane kāraṇaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘therassa kirā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Udakasuddhiko na ekaṃsena apāyūpago, laddhiyā pana ^a^M1.0281^ea^ sāvajjakilesabhūtabhāvato āyācati. Aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ apadisanto ^b^‘‘apicā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Phalabhūto attho etassāti ^b^atthavasaṃ,^eb^ kāraṇanti āha ^b^‘‘atthānisaṃsaṃ atthakāraṇa’’^eb^nti. ^b^Papañcasūdaniyaṃ^eb^ pana phaleneva araṇīyato attho, kāraṇanti katvā ‘‘attho eva atthavaso, tasmā ^b^dve atthavase^eb^ti dve atthe dve kāraṇānī’’ti vuttaṃ.
[06]Saṅgāravasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^208^eb^^b^.^eb^ Evaṃladdhanāmaṃ ^a^V1.0246^ea^ piṇḍāya pāvisīti yojanā. ^b^Evameva^eb^nti kenaci animantitena sayameva upasaṅkamante. ^b^Aphāsukadhātuka^eb^nti ayuttarūpaṃ. ^b^Sabhādhamma^eb^nti sabhāya caritabbaṃ cārittadhammaṃ. ^b^Asañcāletvā^eb^ti āsanato avuṭṭhāpetvā. ^b^Ujukameva āgacchati^eb^ lokagganāyako bhagavā sabbasattuttamo attano uttaritarassa abhāvato lokassa apacitiṃ na dasseti. Ye sabbaso saṃkilese pajahanti, teva paṇḍite ‘‘santo’’ti dasseti ^b^‘‘ete’’^eb^tiādinā.
[06]Khomadussasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Dutiyavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Sāratthappakāsiniyā saṃyuttanikāya-aṭṭhakathāya
[06]Brāhmaṇasaṃyuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^209^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Āḷaviya^eb^nti ^a^V1.0247^ea^^a^M1.0282^ea^ āḷavinagarasamīpe. ^b^Aggacetiye^eb^ti gotamakacetiyādīhi uttamacetiye. Taṃ kira bhūmirāmaṇeyyakabhāvena manuññatāya padhānayuttatādisampattiyā ca itaracetiyehi seṭṭhasammataṃ. ^b^Kappattherenā^eb^ti ‘‘kappo’’ti gottato āgatanāmo thero, sahassapurāṇajaṭilānaṃ abbhantare ayaṃ mahāthero. ^b^Ohīnako^eb^ti theresu gāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhesu vihāre eva avahīnako ṭhito. Tattha kāraṇamāha ^b^‘‘vihārapālo’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Samalaṅkaritvāti^eb^ samaṃ alaṅkārena alaṅkaritvā. ^b^Kusalacittaṃ viddhaṃseti^eb^ pavattituṃ appadānavasena. ^b^Etasmi^eb^nti etasmiṃ rāge uppanne. ‘‘Ekasmi’’nti vā pāṭho, ekasmiṃ visabhāgavatthuke rāge uppanne. ^b^Dhammo vā^eb^ti mama citte uppajjanakato añño dhammo vā. Yena kāraṇena paro anabhiratiṃ vinodetvā idāneva abhiratiṃ uppādeyya, taṃ kāraṇaṃ kuto labbhāti yojanā, taṃ kāraṇaṃ natthīti attho, tassa abhāvakāraṇavacanaṃ.

[03]^b^Anagāriya^eb^nti agāravirahato anagāraṃ pabbajjā. Tattha niyuttattā anagāriyaṃ ka-kārassa ya-kāraṃ katvā, pabbajitanti attho. ^b^Ādhāvantī^eb^ti hadayaṃ abhibhavitvā dhāvanti. ^b^Uggatāna^eb^nti uḷārānaṃ puttā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘mahesakkhā rājaññabhūtā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Uttamappamāṇa^eb^nti sahassapalaṃ ^b^samantā^eb^ti samantato. ^b^Parikireyyu^eb^nti vijjheyyuṃ. ^b^Etasmā sahassā^eb^ti yathāvuttā dhanuggahasahassato. ^b^Atirekatarā^eb^ anekasahassā. ^b^Itthiyo^eb^ olokanasitalapitaroditasare khipantiyo. ^b^Neva maṃ byādhayissanti^eb^ neva maṃ nijjhāyissanti. ‘‘Byādhayissatī’’ti pāṭhoti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘cāletuṃ na sakkhissatīti attho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Dhamme samhī^eb^ti sake santike patiṭṭhite sāsanadhamme. Tenāha ^b^‘‘anabhiratiṃ^eb^^b^vinodetvā’’^eb^tiādi.
[03]^b^Magga^eb^nti ‘‘maggo’’ti vattabbe liṅgavipallāsena vuttaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘so hi nibbānassa pubbabhāgamagggo’’^eb^ti.
[06]Nikkhantasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^210^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vihāragaruko^eb^^a^V1.0248^ea^^a^M1.0283^ea^^b^kiresa thero^eb^ti etena thero attano saddhivihārikaṃ vaṅgīsaṃ ovadituṃ anavasaro. Tena antarantarā tassa cittaṃ rāgo anuddhaṃsetīti dasseti. ^b^Sāsane arati^eb^nti sīlaparipūraṇe samathavipassanābhāvanāya ca anabhiratiṃ. ^b^Kāmaguṇesu ca rati^eb^nti pañcasu kāmakoṭṭhāsesu assādaṃ. ^b^Pāpavitakka^eb^nti kāmasaṅkappaṃ. ^b^Sabbākārenā^eb^ti sabbe tadaṅgavikkhambhanasamucchindanākārena. Yathā mahantaṃ araññaṃ vanathanti, evaṃ mahantaṃ kilesavanaṃ ^b^‘‘vanatha’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Pathaviñca vehāsa^eb^nti bhummatthe paccattavacanaṃ, tasmā pathaviyaṃ ākāse cāti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘pathaviṭṭhita’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Jagatī^eb^ti ca pathaviyā vevacanaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘antopathaviya’’^eb^nti. ^b^Parijīratī^eb^ti sabbbaso jaraṃ pāpuṇāti. ^b^Samāgantvā^eb^ti ñāṇena samāgantvāti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘mutattāti viññātattabhāvā’’^eb^ti.
[03]^b^Paṭighapadena gandharasā gahitā^eb^ ghānajivhānaṃ paṭihananavasena pavattanato. ^b^Mutapadena phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ gahitaṃ^eb^ mutvā gahetabbato. ^b^Na lippatī^eb^ti na makkhīyati.

[03]Saṭṭhi-saddo cha-saddena samānatthoti ^b^‘‘saṭṭhinissitā’’^eb^ti padassa ^b^‘‘chāarammaṇanissitā’’^eb^ti attho vutto. ^b^Puthū adhammavitakkā^eb^ti rūpavitakkādivasena bahū nānāvitakkā micchāsaṅkappā. ^b^Janatāya niviṭṭhā^eb^ti mahājane patiṭṭhitā. ^b^Tesaṃ vasenā^eb^ti tesampi micchāvitakkānaṃ vasena. ^b^Na katthaci^eb^ ārammaṇe. ^b^Kilesavaggagato^eb^ti kilesasaṅgaṇikaṃ upagato na bhaveyya, kilesavitakkā na uppādetabbāti attho. ^b^Duṭṭhullavacanaṃ^eb^ kāmapaṭisaṃyuttakathā.
[03]^b^Dabbajātiko^eb^ti dabbarūpo. ^b^Nepakkenā^eb^ti kosallena. ^b^Nibbānaṃ paṭiccā^eb^ti asaṅkhatadhātuṃ ārammaṇavasena paṭicca. ^b^Parinibbānakāla^eb^nti anupādisesanibbānakālaṃ.
[06]Aratisuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^211^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Etesa^eb^nti ^a^M1.0284^ea^ etesaṃ mahallakānaṃ. ^b^Na pāḷi^eb^ āgacchati appaguṇabhāvato. Na ca pāḷi ^a^V1.0249^ea^ upaṭṭhāti, ekāya pāḷiyā sati pāḷigatiyā tathā tathā upaṭṭhānampi nesaṃ natthīti vadati. ^b^Na aṭṭhakathā^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. Sithiladhanitāditaṃtaṃbyañjanabuddhiṃ ahāpetvā uccāraṇaṃ ^b^padabyañjanamadhuratā. Atikkamitvā maññati^eb^ aññe bhikkhū. Hīḷanavasena abhibhavitvā paṭibhānasutena attānaṃ pasaṃsati sambhāveti. Mānassa pavattitāya sahajātanissayādipaccayadhammā taṃsahabhudhammā. Mānavasena ^b^vippaṭisārī ahuvā^eb^. Mā ahosīti yojanā. ^b^Vaṇṇabhaṇana^eb^nti parehi kiriyamānaṃ guṇābhitthavaṃ. ^b^Akhilo^eb^ti pañcacetokhilarahito. ^b^Nissesaṃ navavidha^eb^nti navavidhampi mānaṃ kassaci ekadesassapi asesato. ^b^Vijjāyā^eb^ti aggamaggavijjāya. Accantameva ^b^samitatāya^eb^ vūpasamitatāya ^b^samitāvī^eb^.
[06]Pesalasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^212^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Rāgo^eb^ti ettha āyasmato vaṅgīsassa rāgassa uppattiyā kāraṇaṃ vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘āyasmā ānando’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Ta^eb^nti ānandattheraṃ. ^b^Ārammaṇaṃ pariggahetu^eb^nti kāyavedanādibhedaṃ ārammaṇaṃ satigocaraṃ. Asubhadukkhādito, rūpādiekekameva vā chaḷārammaṇaṃ aniccadukkhādito pariggaṇhituṃ paricchijja jānituṃ. ^b^Itthirūpārammaṇe^eb^ti itthisantāne rūpasabhāve ārammaṇe.

[03]^b^Nibbāpana^eb^nti nibbāpayati etenāti nibbāpanaṃ. ^b^Vipallāsenā^eb^ti asubhe ‘‘subha’’nti vipallāsabhāvahetu. ^b^Rāgaṭṭhāniya^eb^nti rāguppattihetu. ^b^Iṭṭhārammaṇa^eb^nti subhārammaṇaṃ. Ettha ca iṭṭhārammaṇasīsena tattha iṭṭhākāraggahaṇaṃ vadati. Tañhi vajjanīyaṃ. ^b^Parato^eb^ti avasavattanatthena aññato. Saṅkhārā hi ‘‘mā bhijjantū’’ti icchitāpi bhijjanteva, tasmā te avasavattittā paro nāma, sā ca nesaṃ paratā aniccadassanena pākaṭā hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘parato passāti aniccato passā’’^eb^ti. Kāmaṃ vipassanā saṅkhāranimittaṃ na ^a^M1.0285^ea^ pariccajati saṅkhāre ārabbha vattanato, yesaṃ pana nimittānaṃ aggahaṇena animittāti gahituṃ arahati, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘niccādīnaṃ nimittāna’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. Salakkhaṇa-sāmaññalakkhaṇa-dassanavasena mānassa dassanābhisamayo, vipassanāya pahānābhisamayo. ‘‘Maggenā’’ti vadanti, maggeneva pana asammohato pariññāpaṭivedhavasena dassanābhisamayo, pahānapaṭivedhavasena pahānābhisamayo. ^b^Rāgādisantatāyā^eb^ti rāgādīnaṃ samucchedavasena paṭippassaddhivasena vūpasametabbato santabhāvena.
[06]Ānandasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^213^eb^^b^.^eb^ Aṅgīyanti ^a^V1.0250^ea^ hetubhāvena āgamabhāvena avayavabhāvena vā ñāyantīti ^b^aṅgāni,^eb^ kāraṇāni, avayavā vāti āha ^b^‘‘aṅgehīti kāraṇehi, avayavehi vā’’^eb^ti. Viratiyo subhāsitavācāya pubbaṃ patiṭṭhitā hontīti musāvādāveramaṇiādayo tassā visesahetūti āha ^b^‘‘musāvādā…pe… kāraṇānī’’^eb^ti. Yasmā ariyavohārā visesato cetanāsabhāvā, tasmā vacīsucaritasamudāyassa saccavācādayo aṅgabhūtāti āha ^b^‘‘saccavacanādayo cattāro avayavā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Nissakkavacana^eb^nti hetumhi nissakkavacanaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘samanuāgatā pavattā’’^eb^ti. Vācā hi tāya viratiyā sammā anurūpato āgatā pavattāti ‘‘samannāgatā’’ti vuccati. ^b^Karaṇavacana^eb^nti sahayoge karaṇavacanaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yuttā’’^eb^ti. Sahajātāpi hi cetanā yathāsamādinnāya viratiyā sammā anurūpato yuttāti vattuṃ arahati.

[03]^b^Samullapanavācā^eb^ti saddavācā, sā vuccatīti ^b^vācā^eb^ nāma. Viññatti pana vuccati etāyāti ^b^vācā^eb^ nāma, tathā virati cetanāvācā. ^b^Na sā idha adhippetā^eb^ti sā cetanāvācā viññattivācā viya idha imasmiṃ sutte na adhippetā ‘‘subhāsitā hotī’’ti vacanato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘abhāsitabbato’’^eb^ti. Suṭṭhu ^b^bhāsitā^eb^ti sammā ñāyena bhāsitā vacīsucaritabhāvato. ^b^Atthāvahata^eb^nti hitāvahakālaṃ pati āha. ^b^Kāraṇasuddhi^eb^nti ^a^M1.0286^ea^ yonisomanasikārena kāraṇavisuddhiṃ. ^b^Dosābhāva^eb^nti agatigamanādidosābhāvaṃ. Rāgadosādivinimuttañhi taṃ bhāsato anurodhavirodhavivajjanato agatigamanaṃ dūrasamugghāṭitamevāti. ^b^Anuvādavimuttā^eb^ti apavādavirahitā. ^b^Sabbākārasampattiṃ dīpeti,^eb^ asati hi sabbākārasampatiyaṃ anuvajjatāpi.

[03]Kiñcāpi pubbe dhammādhiṭṭhānā desanā āraddhā, puggalajjhāsayato pana ^b^puggalādhiṭṭhānāya…pe… vacanametaṃ^eb^. Kāmañcettha ^b^‘‘aññataraniddosavacana’’^eb^nti avisesato vuttaṃ, ‘‘dhammaṃyeva bhāsatī’’tiādinā pana adhammadosādirahitāya vācāya vuccamānattā idhāpi subhāsitā vācā adhippetāti. ‘‘Subhāsitaṃyevā’’ti avadhāraṇena nivattitaṃ sarūpato dasseti ^b^‘‘no dubbhāsita’’^eb^nti iminā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tasseva vācaṅgassa paṭipakkhabhāsananivāraṇa’’^eb^nti. Paṭiyogīnivattanattho hi eva-saddo, tena pisuṇavācāpaṭikkhepo dassito. ‘‘Subhāsita’’nti vā iminā catubbidhaṃ vacīsucaritaṃ gahitanti ^b^‘‘no dubbhāsitanti iminā micchāvācappahānaṃ dīpetī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Sabbavacīsucaritasādhāraṇavacanañhi subhāsitanti. Tena parabhedanādikaṃ asabbhādikañca bodhisattānaṃ vacanaṃ apisuṇādivisayanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Bhāsitabbavacanalakkhaṇa^eb^nti bhāsitabbassa ^a^V1.0251^ea^ vacanassa sabhāvalakkhaṇaṃ dīpetīti ānetvā sambandho. Yadi evaṃ nanu abhāsitabbaṃ paṭhamaṃ vatvā bhāsitabbaṃ pacchā vattabbaṃ yathā ‘‘vāmaṃ muñca, dakkhiṇaṃ gaṇhā’’ti āha ^b^‘‘aṅgaparidīpanatthaṃ panā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Paṭhamenā^eb^ti ‘‘subhāsita’’nti padena. ^b^Dhammato anapeta^eb^nti attano paresañca hitasukhāvahadhammato anapetaṃ. ^b^Mantāvacana^eb^nti mantāya pavattetabbavacanaṃ. Paññavā avikiṇṇavāco hi na ca anatthāvahaṃ vācaṃ bhāsati. ^b^Itarehi dvīhī^eb^ti tatiyacatutthapadehi. ^b^‘‘Imehi khotiādīnī^eb^ti karaṇe etaṃ upayogavacana’’nti keci. ^b^Taṃ vāca^eb^nti yathāvuttaṃ caturaṅgikaṃ. Yañca vācaṃ maññantīti sambandho. ^b^Aññe^eb^ti ito bāhirakā ñāyavādino akkharacintakā ca. ‘‘Paṭiññāhetūdāharaṇūpanayanigamanāni avayavā vākyassā’’ti vadanti. ^b^Nāmādīhī^eb^ti nāmākhyātapadehi. ^b^Liṅgaṃ^eb^ itthiliṅgādi ^b^vacanaṃ^eb^ ekavacanādi. Paṭhamādi ^b^vibhatti^eb^ atītādi ^b^kālaṃ^eb^. Kattā sampadānaṃ ^a^M1.0287^ea^ apādānaṃ karaṇaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ kammañca ^b^kārakaṃ^eb^. ^b^Sampattīhi samannāgata^eb^nti ete avayavādike sampādetvā vuttaṃ. ^b^Taṃ paṭisedhetī^eb^ti taṃ yathāvuttavisesampi vācaṃ ‘‘imehi kho’’ti vadanto bhagavā paṭisedheti. ^b^Kho^eb^-saddo hettha avadhāraṇattho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘avayavādī’’^eb^tiādi. Yā kāci asabhāvaniruttilakkhaṇā. Sā milakkhubhāsā. ^b^Sīhaḷakenevā^eb^ti sīhaḷabhāsāya pariyāpannena vacanena. ^b^Arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsū^eb^ti saṃsāre ativiya sañjātasaṃvegā tannissaraṇe ninnapoṇamānasā hutvā vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
[03]^b^Pātova phullitakokanada^eb^nti pātova saṃphullapadumaṃ. ^b^Bhijjiyate^eb^ti nibbhijjiyati nibbhiggo jāyati. ^b^Manussattaṃ gatā^eb^ti manussattabhāvaṃ upagatā.
[03]^b^Buddhantare^eb^ti buddhuppādantare dvinnaṃ buddhuppādānaṃ antarā. Tadā hi paccekabuddhānaṃ sāsane, na buddhasāsane dippamāne.

[03]^b^Jarāya parimaddita^eb^nti yathā hatthacaraṇādiaṅgāni sithilāni honti, cakkhādīni indriyāni savisayaggahaṇe asamatthāni honti, yobbanaṃ sabbaso vigataṃ, kāyabalaṃ apagataṃ, satimatidhitiādayo vippayuttā, pubbe attano ovādapaṭikarā puttadārādayopi apasādakā, parehi vuṭṭhāpanīyasaṃvesanīyatā punadeva bālabhāvappatti ca honti, evaṃ jarāya sabbaso vimadditaṃ. ^b^Eta^eb^nti sarīraṃ vadati. ^b^Milātachavicammanissita^eb^nti jiṇṇabhāvena appamaṃsalohitattā milātehi ^a^V1.0252^ea^ gatayobbanehi dhammehi sannissitaṃ. ^b^Ghāsamāmisa^eb^nti ghāsabhūtaṃ āmisaṃ maccunā gilitvā viya patiṭṭhapetabbato. Kesalomādi^b^nānākuṇapapūritaṃ^eb^. Tato eva ^b^asucibhājanaṃ etaṃ^eb^. Sabbathāpi nissāratāya ^b^kadalikkhandhasamaṃ^eb^.

[03]^b^Anucchavikāhī^eb^ti sammāsambuddhassa anurūpāhi. ^b^Na tāpeyyā^eb^ti cittañca kāyañca na tāpeyya. Tāpanā cettha sampati āyati ca visādanā. ^b^Na bādheyyā^eb^ti ^b^‘‘nābhibhaveyyā’’^eb^ti padassa atthadassanaṃ. ^b^Apisuṇavācāvasenā^eb^ti sabbaso pahīnapisuṇavācatāvasena. ^b^Pāpānī^eb^ti lāmakāni nikiṭṭhakāni. Tenāha ^b^‘‘appiyānī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Anādāyā^eb^ti aggahetvā.

[03]^b^Sādhubhāvenā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0288^ea^ niddosamadhurabhāvena. ^b^Amatasadisā^eb^ti sadise tabbohāroti, kāraṇe vāyaṃ kāriyavohāroti āha ^b^‘‘nibbānāmatapaccayattā vā’’^eb^ti. Paccayavasena hi sā tadā dassanappavatti. ^b^Cariyā^eb^ti cārittaṃ. ^b^Porāṇā^eb^ nāma paṭhamakappikā, buddhādayo vā ariyā.

[03]^b^Patiṭṭhitā^eb^ti niccalabhāvena aṭṭhiṃ katvā paccayāyattabhāvato avisaṃvādanakā. Ubhayathā paṭipattiṃ āha ^b^‘‘attano ca paresañca atthe patiṭṭhitā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Atthe^eb^ diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikādihite patiṭṭhitattā eva ^b^dhamme^eb^ avihiṃsādidhamme patiṭṭhitā. ^b^Anuparodhakara^eb^nti etena hitapariyāyoyaṃ attha-saddoti dasseti. ^b^Dhammika^eb^nti dhammato anapetaṃ, atthadhammūpasaṃhitaṃ vā.

[03]^b^Nibbānappattiyā^eb^ti nibbānappattiyatthaṃ. ^b^Dukkhassa antakiriyāya^eb^ antakaraṇatthaṃ. Yasmā buddho khemāya bhāsati, tasmā khemuppattihetuyā ^b^khemā,^eb^ tasmā sā sabbavācānaṃ uttamāti evampettha attho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Mantāvacanavasenā^eb^ti sabbadosarahitavasena.
[06]Subhāsitasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^214^eb^^b^.^eb^ Vākkaraṇacāturiyato vacanaguṇahetūnaṃ pūriyā pūre bhavāti porī, tāya ^b^poriyā^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘akkharādiparipuṇṇāyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Avibaddhāyā^eb^ti pittādīhi na vibaddhāya anupaddutāya. Tenāha ^b^‘‘apalibuddhāyā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Niddosāyā^eb^ti atthato byañjanato vigatadosāya. ^b^Akkhalitapadabyañjanāyā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0253^ea^ agalitapadabyañjanāya, ^b^atthassa viññāpaniyā^eb^ti diṭṭhadhammikādiatthassa bodhane pariyattāya. ^b^Bhikkhuna^eb^nti gāthāsukhatthaṃ rassaṃ katvā vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^‘‘Saṃkhittenapi deseti, vitthārenapi bhāsatī’’^eb^ti nayidaṃ paṭhamaṃ uddisitvā tassa atthassa kittanavasena pavattitaṃ vacanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Sā hi vitthāradesanā eva hoti. Yā pana desanā kadāci dhammapaṭiggāhakānaṃ ajjhāsayavasena ^a^M1.0289^ea^ saṃkhitteneva dassetvā nikkhipati, yā ca kadāci vitthārena, tadubhayaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘cattārimānī’’^eb^tiādi. Sabhāvamadhuro paccayavasena madhurataro hotīti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yathā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Vividhākāraṃ katvā dhammaṃ kathetuṃ paṭibhātīti ^b^paṭibhānaṃ,^eb^ desanāpakārañāṇaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘samuddato’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Odahantī^eb^ti avajānanavasena gamenti.
[06]Sāriputtasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^215^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tasmiṃ ahū^eb^ti tasmiṃ ahanīti āha ^b^‘‘tasmiṃ divase’’^eb^ti. ^b^Anasanenā^eb^ti sabbaso āhārassa abhuñjanena. Sāsanikasīlena bāhirakānasanena vā upetā hutvāti yojanā. ^b^Vā^eb^-saddena khīrapānamadhusāyanādīnipi saṅgaṇhāti. Pakārehi diṭṭhādīhi vāreti kāyakammādike sarāpeti gārayhe karoti etāyāti ^b^pavāraṇā,^eb^ paṭipattivisodhanāya attano attano vajjasodhanāya okāsadānaṃ. Yasmā yebhuyyena vassaṃvuṭṭhehi kātabbā esā visuddhidesanā, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘vassaṃvuṭṭhapavāraṇāya. Visuddhipavāraṇātipi etissāva nāma’’^eb^nti. Tadā tassa bhikkhusaṅghassa tuṇhībhāvassa anavasesatāyapi vaṇṇaṃ dassetuṃ pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘tuṇhībhūta’’nti vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘yato yato…pe…^eb^^b^natthī’’^eb^ti. Hatthassa kukkuccatā asaṃyamo asampajaññakiriyā ^b^hatthakukkuccaṃ^eb^. Tathā ^b^pādakukkuccaṃ^eb^ veditabbaṃ, ^b^vā^eb^-saddo avuttavikappattho, tena tadaññesamabhāvo vibhāvitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Pañcapasādehī^eb^ti pañcavaṇṇehi pasādehi. ^b^Vossaggattho^eb^ yathāruci kiriyāya vossajjanaṃ. ^b^Pucchanatthe^eb^ti paṭikkhepamukheneva pucchanatthe ^b^na^eb^kāro, ^b^me kiñci^eb^ kiriyaṃ vā vācasikaṃ vā na garahatha, kiṃ nu garahatha kāyavācāhīti attho. Keci ‘‘dvārānevā’’ti dvārasīsena dvārappavattacariyaṃ vadanti. Visuddhipavāraṇāya adhippetattā yena pavāritaṃ, teneva visuddhīti ñāyati, yena na pavāritaṃ. Kiṃ nu taṃ avisuddhanti siyā kassaci puthujjanassa āsaṅkā? Tannivāraṇatthamāha ^a^V1.0254^ea^^b^‘‘no aparisuddhattā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Manodvāraṃ^eb^^a^M1.0290^ea^^b^parisuddhaṃ^eb^ asucikārakaupakkilesānaṃ dūrīkatattā. ^b^Idāni^eb^ etarahi buddhakāle. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti manodvāraparisuddhiyaṃ.

[03]Kāyavacīsamācāraparisuddhiyā paveditāya manosamācāraparisuddhi atthato paveditāva hotīti ^b^‘‘kāyikaṃ vā vācasikaṃ vā’’^eb^iccevāha. Tathā hi vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘kāyikaṃ vā vācasikaṃ vāti idaṃ catunnaṃ arakkhiyataṃ sandhāya thero āhā’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Bhikkhave, pavāremi vo’’ti bhikkhusaṅghavisayattā pavāraṇāya tattha bhikkhusaṅghena vattabbaṃ paṭivacanaṃ dento dhammasenāpati ^b^‘‘bhikkhusaṅghassa bhāraṃ vahanto’’^eb^ti vutto. Tenāha ^b^‘‘na kho mayaṃ, bhante’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Arakkhiyānī^eb^ti parānuvādato na bhāyitabbāni suparisuddhabhāvato.

[03]‘‘Anuppannassā’’ti idaṃ adhippāyikavacananti tadadhippāyaṃ vivaranto ^b^‘‘kassapasammāsambuddhato paṭṭhāyā’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Kassapasammāsambuddhato^eb^ti vibhatte nissakkaṃ, tasmā kassapasammāsambuddhato oranti atthoti. ^b^Aññenā^eb^ti ito bhagavato aññena. ^b^Anuppāditapubbassā^eb^ti parasantāne na uppāditapubbassa. Sasantāne pana paccekabuddhānaṃ vasena na uppāditoti na sakkā vattuṃ. ^b^Samanuāgatā^eb^ti sammā anu upagatā. ^b^Bhagavato sīlādayo guṇā^eb^ti buddhabhūtassa guṇā adhippetāti āha ^b^‘‘arahattamaggameva nissāya āgatā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sabbaguṇā^eb^ti dasabalañāṇādayo sabbe buddhaguṇā. ^b^Bhante^eb^ti ettha ^b^iti^eb^saddo ādiattho. Tena ‘‘imesaṃ pana…pe… vācasikaṃ vā’’ti yāvāyaṃ pāḷipadeso, taṃ sabbaṃ gaṇhāti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘idaṃ thero…pe… pavārento āhā’’^eb^ti.

[03]Yaṃ attano puññānubhāvasiddhaṃ cakkaratanaṃ nippariyāyato tena pavattitaṃ nāma, na itaranti paṭhamanayo vutto. Yasmā pavattitasseva anupavattanaṃ, paṭhamanayo ca taṃsadise tabbohāravasena vuttoti taṃ anādiyitvā dutiyanayo vutto. ^b^Dasavidha^eb^nti antojanasmiṃ, balakāye rakkhāvaraṇaguttiyā saṃvidhānaṃ, khattiyesu anuyuttesu, brāhmaṇagahapatikesu, negamajānapadesu, samaṇabrāhmaṇesu, migapakkhīsu adhammacārapaṭikkhepo, adhanānaṃ dhanānuppadānaṃ, samaṇabrāhmaṇe upasaṅkamitvā pañhapucchananti evaṃ dasavidhaṃ. Tattha gahapatike pakkhijāte ca visuṃ katvā gahaṇavasena ^b^dvādasavidhaṃ. Cakkavattivatta^eb^nti cakkavattibhāvāvahaṃ vattaṃ. Yasmā yāthāvato ^a^M1.0291^ea^ pavattitaṃ, tadanurūpakaṃ pana ñāyena yuttakena pavattitaṃ nāma hotīti āha ^b^‘‘sammā nayena hetunā kāraṇenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ubhatobhāgavimuttā^eb^ti ubhayabhāgehi ubhayabhāgato vimuttāti ayamettha atthoti dasseti ^b^‘‘dvīhi bhāgehi vimuttā, arūpā…pe… nāmakāyato’’^eb^ti iminā. ^b^Tevijjādibhāva^eb^nti ^a^V1.0255^ea^ tevijjachaḷabhiññacatuppaṭisambhidabhāvaṃ. Paññāvimuttā hi taṃ tividhaṃ appattā kevalaṃ paññāya eva vimuttā.

[03]^b^Visuddhatthāyā^eb^ti visuddhipavāraṇatthāya. Saṃyojanaṭṭhena ^b^saṃyojanasaṅkhāte ceva^eb^ bandhanaṭṭhena ^b^bandhanasaṅkhāte ca^eb^. ^b^Vijitasaṅgāma^eb^nti yathā rāgādayo puna na sīsaṃ ukkhipanti, evaṃ ariyamaggasenāya vasena vijitasaṅgāmaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘vijitarāgadosamohasaṅgāma’’^eb^nti. ^b^Mārabalassā^eb^ti mārasenāya, mārassa vā sāmatthiyassa. ^b^Veneyyasattha^eb^nti vinetabbajanasamūhaṃ. Sakaṭādisatthasabhāgato vineyyova satthoti taṃ veneyyasatthaṃ. Sīlasārādiabhāvato ^b^antotuccho^eb^.
[06]Pavāraṇāsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^216^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sahassato paraṃ aḍḍhateyyabhikkhusataṃ tadā bhagavantaṃ payirupāsatīti āha ^b^‘‘parosahassanti atirekasahassa’’^eb^nti. ^b^Nibbāne kutoci bhayaṃ natthī^eb^ti kutocipi kāraṇato nibbāne bhayaṃ natthi asaṅkhatabhāvena sabbaso khemattā. Tenāha bhagavā – ‘‘khemañca vo, bhikkhave, dhammaṃ desessāmi khemagāminiñca paṭipada’’ntiādi (saṃ. ni. 4.379-408). Na kutoci bhayaṃ etasmiṃ adhigateti ^b^akutobhayaṃ,^eb^ nibbānaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘nibbānappattassā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Vipassito paṭṭhāyā^eb^ti amhākaṃ bhagavato nāmavasena isīnaṃ sattamabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Te hi tattha tattha sutte bahuso kittitā. ^b^Isīna^eb^nti vā paccekabuddhasāvakabāhirakaisīnaṃ sattamo uttaro seṭṭhoti attho.

[03]^b^Aṭṭhuppattivasenā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0292^ea^ kāraṇasamuṭṭhānavasena. Tadassa aṭṭhuppattiṃ vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘saṅghamajjhe’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Paṭibhānasampannavācāya aññe īsati abhibhavatīti ^b^vaṅgīso^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘paṭibhānasampatti’’^eb^ntiādi.

[03]^b^Kilesummujjanasatānī^eb^ti rāgādikilesānaṃ rajjanadussanādinayehi savisaye ayoniso uṭṭhānāni. Yadi anekāni satāni, atha kasmā ‘‘ummaggapatha’’nti? Vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘vaṭṭapathattā pana patha’’^eb^nti. Rāgadosamohamānadiṭṭhivasena ^b^rāgakhilādīni pañca^eb^khilāni. ^b^Vibhajanta^eb^nti vibhajanavasena kathentaṃ. ^b^Vibhajitvā^eb^ti ñāṇena vivecetvā.
[03]^b^Amate^eb^^a^V1.0256^ea^^b^akkhāte^eb^ti amatāvahe dhamme desite. ^b^Dhammassa passitāro^eb^ saccasampaṭivedhena. ^b^Asaṃhīrā^eb^ diṭṭhivātehi.

[03]^b^Ativijjhitvā^eb^ti paṭivijjhitvā. ^b^Atikkamabhūta^eb^nti atikkamanaṭṭhena bhūtaṃ. ^b^Dasaddhāna^eb^nti dasannaṃ upaḍḍhānaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘pañcanna’’^eb^nti. ^b^Jānantenā^eb^ti dhammassa sudullabhataṃ jānantena.
[06]Parosahassasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^217^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Evaṃgahitanāmo^eb^ti ‘‘aññāsi vata, bho, koṇḍañño’’ti satthu vacanaṃ nissāya bhikkhūhi aññehi koṇḍaññanāmakehi visesanatthaṃ evaṃgahitanāmo. Dvādasannaṃ saṃvaccharānaṃ vasena ^b^cirassaṃ. Chaddantabhavane^eb^ti chaddantanāgarājabhavanaṭṭhāne. ^b^Paññavā mahāsāvako^eb^ rattaññutāya. ^b^‘‘Dasasahassacakkavāḷe devamanussāna^eb^nti dasasahassacakkavāḷe devānaṃ, imasmiṃ cakkavāḷe devamanussānañcāti evaṃ dasasahassacakkavāḷe devamanussāna’’nti vadanti. ^b^Agga^eb^ntiādito. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti mandākinitīre.

[03]^b^Vassaggenā^eb^ti vassapaṭipāṭiyā. ^b^Ta^eb^nti aññāsikoṇḍaññattheraṃ. Mahābrahmānaṃ viya lokiyamanussā harāyanti. Pāmokkhabhūto āyasmā ^a^M1.0293^ea^ thero antarantarā tattha tattha janapade vasitvā tadanukkamena mandākinitīraṃ upagato, tasmā vuttaṃ – ^b^‘‘icchāmahaṃ, bhante, janapade vasitu’’^eb^nti.

[03]Ānubhāvasampannā dibbāyukā te hatthināgāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘pubbe paccekabuddhānaṃ pāricariyāya kataparicayā’’^eb^ti. Therassa sañcaraṇaṭṭhāne ^b^āvaraṇasākhā haritvā^eb^ apanetvā. ^b^Mukhodakañceva dantakaṭṭhañca ṭhapetī^eb^ti saḷaladevadārukaṭṭhādīni aññamaññaṃ ghaṃsitvā aggiṃ nibbattetvā jāletvā tattha pāsāṇakhaṇḍāni tāpetvā tāni daṇḍakehi vaṭṭetvā taḷākāsu udakasoṇḍīsu khipitvā udakassa tattabhāvaṃ ñatvā nāgalatādantakaṭṭhaṃ upanento mukhodakañca ṭhapeti. ^b^Vattaṃ karotī^eb^ti antokuṭiyā bahi ca pamukhepi aṅgaṇepi sākhābhaṅgehi sammajjanto vakkhamānanayena āhāraṃ upanento vattaṃ karoti.

[03]^b^Patiṭṭhappamāṇe^eb^ti kaṭippamāṇe, ayameva vā pāṭho ^b^tāva mahantamevā^eb^ti yāva mahantaṃ setapadumavanaṃ ^a^V1.0257^ea^, tāva mahantameva. Eseva nayo ^b^rattakumudavanā^eb^dīsu. ^b^Khādantā^eb^ manussā. ^b^Pakkapayoghanikā viyā^eb^ti supakkapayoghanaṃ viya. Ghanabhāvena pana pakkhittakhuddamadhu viya hoti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘etaṃ pokkharamadhu nāmā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Muḷāla^eb^nti setapadumānaṃ mūlaṃ. ^b^Bhisa^eb^nti tesaṃyeva kandaṃ. ^b^Ekasmiṃ pabbe^eb^ti ekekasmiṃ pabbantare. ^b^Pādaghaṭaka^eb^nti doṇassa catubhāgo saṇṭhānato khuddako, tasmā ^b^pādaghaṭakappamāṇa^eb^nti tumbamattaṃ. ^b^Soṇḍiāvāṭe^eb^ti khuddakasoṇḍiyo ceva khuddakāavāṭe ca.
[03]^b^Etaṃ bhojana^eb^nti yathāvuttaṃ nirudakapāyasabhojanaṃ. ^b^Keci sañjānanti^eb^ ye therā vuḍḍhatarā. ^b^Keci na sañjānanti^eb^ ye navā acirapabbajitā.

[03]^b^Buddhānubuddho^eb^ti buddhassa anubuddho. ^b^Bāḷhavīriyo^eb^ti catunnaṃ sammappadhānānaṃ vasena ciranicitavīriyo. ^b^Tiṇṇaṃ vivekāna^eb^nti kāyacittaupadhivivekānaṃ lābhīti yojanā. ^b^Catasso vadati^eb^ vaṅgīsatthero sayaṃpaṭibhānaṃ, na sesābhiññānaṃ abhāvatoti āha ^b^‘‘itarā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Parisā sannisīdi^eb^ nissaddabhāvena tuṇhī ahosīti attho. ^b^Anujānāpesī^eb^ti paṭhamaṃ attanā ñātaṃ upaṭṭhitaṃ attano parinibbānakālaṃ anu pacchā satthāraṃ jānāpesīti evaṃ ettha attho daṭṭhabbo.

[03]^b^Ta^eb^nti ^a^M1.0294^ea^ āsāḷhipuṇṇamāya isipatane yaṃ dassanaṃ, yaṃ vā dukkaracariyāyaṃ tumhākaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ ādito dassanaṃ, taṃ, bhante, paṭhamadassanaṃ. ^b^Onatavinatā^eb^ti heṭṭhā upari ca onatā vinatā. ^b^Kampetvā^eb^ti thokaṃ cāletvā dassanatthaṃ ^b^ekaninnādo^eb^ tesaṃ hatthināgānañceva nāgayakkhakumbhaṇḍānaṃ devatānañca saddena. Brahmāno devānaṃ adaṃsūti sambandho.

[03]^b^Sajjhāyamakaṃsu^eb^ pasādanīyesu pasādavasena sannipatitaparisāya pasādajananatthaṃ ^b^bhagavati nikkhamitvā^eb^ti bhagavati gandhakuṭito nikkhamitvā. ^b^Dharatiyevā^eb^ti aduṭṭhataṃ patvā tiṭṭhateva.
[06]Koṇḍaññasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^218^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paccavekkhatī^eb^ti tesaṃ ariyānaṃ cittaṃ attano ñāṇacakkhunā pati avekkhati paccavekkhati. ^b^Pabbatassā^eb^ti isigilipabbatassa. ^b^Dukkhapāraṃ gata^eb^nti vaṭṭadukkhassa pāraṃ pariyantaṃ gataṃ ^a^V1.0258^ea^. ^b^Sabbaguṇasampanna^eb^nti sabbehi buddhaguṇehi ca sāvakaguṇehi ca paripuṇṇaṃ. ^b^Anekākārasampanna^eb^nti rūpaghosalūkhadhammappamāṇikānaṃ sattānaṃ tehi tehi ākārehi sabbesañca anekehi anantāparimeyyehi pasīditabbākārehi samannāgataṃ. Te pana ākārā yasmā anaññasādhāraṇā buddhaguṇā eva, tasmā āha ^b^‘‘anekehi guṇehi samannāgata’’^eb^nti.
[06]Moggallānasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^219^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Te^eb^ti te devamanusse. ^b^‘‘Sarīravaṇṇenā^eb^ti sarīre chavivaṇṇenā’’ti vadanti. ^b^Sarīravaṇṇenā^eb^ti vā dhammarūpakāyaguṇena. ‘‘Yasasā’’tipi pāṭho, so evattho. ^b^Vigatamalo^eb^ti abbhāmahikādīhi vigatūpakkileso ^a^M1.0295^ea^. Bhāṇu vuccati pabhā, sātisayo bhāṇu etassa atthīti ^b^bhāṇumā^eb^. Sūriyoti āha ^b^‘‘ādicco viyā’’^eb^ti.
[06]Gaggarāsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^220^eb^^b^.^eb^ So kira vicaratīti sambandho. ‘‘Yathāyaṃ dīpo jambudīpoti jambunā paññāto, evāhampi tena jambunā paññāyissa’’nti ^b^jambusākhaṃ pariharitvā. Vādaṃ katvā^eb^ti ‘‘imasmiṃ vāde sace te parājayo hoti, tvaṃ me dāso hohi. Sace me parājayo, ahaṃ te bhariyā’’ti evaṃ katikaṃ katvā. ^b^Vāde jayaparājayānubhāvenā^eb^ti tathāpavattite vāde paribbājakassa jayānubhāvena ceva attano parājayena ca. ^b^Vayaṃ āgammā^eb^ti sippuggahaṇavayaṃ āgamma. ^b^Vijja^eb^nti mantaṃ.

[03]Nibbattagativibhāvanavasena chavasīsabhāvaṃ dūseti vināsetīti ^b^chavadūsakaṃ sippaṃ,^eb^ tathāpavattaṃ mantapadaṃ. ^b^Attano ānubhāvenā^eb^ti niraye nibbattasattassa sīsaṃ yattha katthaci ṭhitaṃ buddhānubhāvena ānetvā dassetvā. ^b^Khīṇāsavassa sīsa^eb^nti paramappicchatāya kañcipi ajānāpetvā araññaṃ pavisitvā parinibbutassa khīṇāsavassa chaḍḍitaṃ sīsakaṭāhaṃ. ^b^Dassesī^eb^ti attano ānubhāvena ānetvā dassesi.

[03]^b^‘‘Tumhe, bho gotama, jānāthā’’^eb^ti kāmaṃ vaṅgīso nibbattaṭṭhānaṃ sandhāya pucchati, bhagavā pana ^a^V1.0259^ea^ anupādisesanibbānaṃ sandhāya ^b^‘‘āma, vaṅgīsa…pe… gatiṃ jānāmī’’^eb^ti āha. Vuttañhetaṃ ‘‘nibbānaṃ arahato gatī’’ti. Vaṅgīso sayaṃ mantabalena gatipariyāpannassa gatiṃ jānanto bhagavantampi ‘‘ayampi tathā’’ti maññamāno ^b^‘‘mantena jānāsi, bho gotamā’’^eb^ti āha. Bhagavā attano buddhañāṇameva mantaṃ katvā dīpento ^b^‘‘āma, vaṅgīsa, ekena manteneva jānāmī’’^eb^ti āha. Mudhā eva dātabbanti ^b^amūliko^eb^. Anantarahitāya bhūmiyā sayanaṃ ^b^thaṇḍilaseyyā^eb^. ^b^Ādi^eb^-saddena sāyatatiyaṃ udakorohaṇabhūmiharaṇādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^So taṃ…pe… arahattaṃ pāpuṇī^eb^ti iminā vaṅgīsatthero pabbajitvā na cirasseva sukhāya paṭipadāya arahattaṃ patto viya dissati, na kho panetaṃ ^a^M1.0296^ea^ evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, āyatiṃ thero pabbajitvā samathavipassanāsu kammaṃ ārabhitvāpi dukkhāya paṭipadāya tādisaṃ kālaṃ vītināmetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tenāha –
[21]‘‘Nikkhantaṃ vata maṃ santaṃ, agārasmānagāriyaṃ;
[22]Vitakkā upadhāvanti, pagabbhā kaṇhato ime’’. (saṃ. ni. 1.209; theragā. 1218);
[03]Āyasmato vaṅgīsassa anabhirati uppannā hoti, rāgo cittaṃ anuddhaṃseti, ‘‘kāmarāgena ḍayhāmi, cittaṃ me pariḍayhatī’’tiādi (theragā. 1232).

[03]^b^Vimuttisukha^eb^nti sabbaso kilesavimuttiyaṃ nibbāne ca uppannaṃ sampatiarahattaphalasukhaṃ ^b^paṭisaṃvedento^eb^ti yathāparicchinnaṃ kālaṃ pati sammadeva vedento anubhavanto. Kavinā kataṃ, tato vā āgataṃ, tassa vā idanti kāveyaṃ, tadevettha ^b^‘‘kāveyya’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Ye niyāmagataddasā^eb^ti ye bhikkhū ariyā buddhānaṃ sāvakā phalaṭṭhabhāvena niyāmagatā ceva maggaṭṭhabhāvena niyāmadasā ca. ^b^Niyāmo^eb^ti hi sammattaniyāmo adhippeto. ^b^Suāgamana^eb^nti mama imassa satthuno santike āgamanaṃ upagamanaṃ, imasmiñca dhammavinaye āgamanaṃ pabbajanaṃ upasampadā sundaraṃ āgamanaṃ. Tattha kāraṇamāha ^b^‘‘tisso vijjā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Avutta^eb^mpi gāthāya atthato gahitameva therassa chaḷabhiññabhāvato.
[06]Vaṅgīsasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Sāratthappakāsiniyā saṃyuttanikāya-aṭṭhakathāya
[06]Vaṅgīsasaṃyuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^221^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Saṃvejetukāmā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0260^ea^^a^M1.0297^ea^ atthato saṃvegaṃ uppādetukāmā. Tathābhūtā naṃ kilesasaṅgaṇikādito vivecetukāmā nāma hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘vivekaṃ paṭipajjāpetukāmā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Bāhiresū^eb^ti gocarajjhattato bahibhūtesu. ^b^Puthuttārammaṇesū^eb^ti rūpādinānārammaṇesu. ^b^Caratī^eb^ti pavattati. ^b^Tvaṃ jano^eb^ti tvaṃ attano kilesehi jananato visuṃ jāto tādise eva aññasmiṃ jane imaṃ ayonisomanasikāravasena pavattamānaṃ chandarāgaṃ vinayassu vinodehi. ^b^Sataṃ taṃ sārayāmase^eb^ti niyyānikasāsane pabbajitvā satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññavāsena ca satimantaṃ paṇḍitaṃ taṃ mayampi yathāuppannaṃ vitakkaṃ vinodanāya sārayāma, sataṃ vā sappurisānaṃ kilesavigamanadhammaṃ paṭipajjitvā vasantaṃ taṃ sārayāma vaṭṭadukkhaṃ. ^b^Pātāla^eb^nti mohapātālaṃ kilesarajo, tadeva ‘‘pātāla’’nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Mā avaharī^eb^ti heṭṭhā duggatisotaṃ mā upanesi. ^b^Sita^eb^nti sambandhaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sarīralagga’’^eb^nti. ^b^Vivekamāpanno^eb^ti kilesavivekaṃ samathavipassanābhāvanamāpanno. ^b^Uttamavīriya^eb^nti ussoḷhilakkhaṇappattaṃ vīriyaṃ, catubbidhaṃ samappadhānavīriyaṃ vā sampattaṃ. ^b^Paggayhā^eb^ti āropetvā. ^b^Paramaviveka^eb^nti paramaṃ samucchedavivekaṃ.
[06]Vivekasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^222^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kāyadaratho hotiyeva^eb^ niyamena, na cittadaratho tassa maggeneva samugghāṭitattā.

[03]^b^Jarāturo^eb^ti jarābhibhavanena āturoyeva. Padadvayepi eseva nayo. Upariṭṭhatāya parito dīghaputhulatāya ativiya vijjhatīti sattisallaggahaṇaṃ. Evaṃ hissa taṇhāsallassa sadisatā. Avijjāya pana sammohāpādanena ^a^M1.0298^ea^ dukkhāpādanena ca visasadisatā. ^b^Ruppato^eb^ti vikāraṃ āpādiyamānassa pīḷiyamānassāti atthoti āha ^b^‘‘ghaṭṭiyamānassā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Pabbajita^eb^nti ^a^V1.0261^ea^ sasantānato pabbajitaṃ vā rāgādimalato pabbajitaṃ vā. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti yasmā therassevetaṃ vacanaṃ, tasmā ^b^ayaṃ^eb^ idāni vuccamāno ^b^ettha^eb^ gāthāya attho. ^b^Devatāya hī^eb^tiādi vuttasseva atthassa pākaṭakaraṇaṃ. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti sesagāthāsu. Atthassa vuttanayattā ^b^‘‘anuttānapadavaṇṇanā’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Vinayā^eb^ti hetumhi nissakkavacananti tassa hetumhi karaṇavacanena atthamāha ^b^‘‘vinayenā’’^eb^ti. Tathā ^b^‘‘samatikkamā’’^eb^ti etthāpi. ^b^Paramaparisuddhaṃ^eb^ saṃkilesasamucchindanato. ^b^Āraddhavīriya^eb^nti sambhāvitavīriyaṃ. Sambhāvanañcassa paggaṇhanaṃ paripūraṇañcāti āha ^b^‘‘paggahitavīriyaṃ paripuṇṇavīriya’’^eb^nti.
[06]Upaṭṭhānasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^223^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Cheta^eb^nti migānaṃ jīvitaṃ chetaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘migaluddaka’’^eb^nti. ^b^Rohitamiga^eb^nti lohitavaṇṇaṃ khuddakamigaṃ, ‘‘mahārohitamiga’’nti keci. Satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā tassa janapadassa sulabhabhikkhatāya tattha gantvā viharatīti imamatthaṃ sandhāya ^b^‘‘paṭhamasutte vuttanayenevā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Ayaṃ pana thero pañcābhiñño vipassanākammiko. ^b^Ṭhatvā^eb^ti padānubandhanavasena gamanaṃ upacchinditvā therassa āsannaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā. Tassa vacanaṃ ^b^sotuṃ āraddho. Aṅguṭṭhakaṃ jālāpesī^eb^ti adhiṭṭhānabalena daṇḍadīpikaṃ viya attano aṅguṭṭhakaṃ jālāpesi. ^b^Akkhīhipi passati^eb^ aṅguṭṭhakaṃ jālamānaṃ. ^b^Kaṇṇehipi^eb^ suṇāti tena vuccamānaṃ dhammaṃ ekadesena. Cittaṃ panassa dhāvatīti sambandho. ^b^Etassapī^eb^ti luddakassapi.

[03]^b^Appapañña^eb^nti ettha ^b^appa^eb^-saddo ‘‘appaharite’’tiādīsu viya abhāvatthoti āha ^b^‘‘nippañña’’^eb^nti. ^b^Kāraṇajānanasamatthenā^eb^ti iminā kāraṇena sattānaṃ sukhaṃ, iminā dukkhanti evaṃ samācaramānena kāraṇaṃ jānituṃ ^a^M1.0299^ea^ samatthena kammassakatañāṇasampayuttacittenāti attho. ^b^Suṇātī^eb^ti kevalaṃ savanamattavasena suṇāti, na tadatthavasena. Tenāha ^b^‘‘atthamassa na jānātī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Kāraṇarūpānī^eb^ti sabhāvakāraṇāni. ^b^Kiṃ me iminā^eb^ti? ‘‘Idaṃ papañca’’nti pahāya. ^b^Vīriyaṃ paggayhā^eb^ti catubbidhaṃ sammappadhānaṃ vīriyaṃ paggaṇhitvā.
[06]Kassapagottasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^224^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sambahulā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0262^ea^ suttantanayena sambahulā. Suttante sajjhāyiṃsūti ^b^suttantikā^eb^. Vinayaṃ dhārentīti ^b^vinayadharā. Yuñjantī^eb^ti vāsadhure yogaṃ karonti. ^b^Ghaṭentī^eb^ti tattha vāyāmaṃ karonti. Karontānaṃyeva aruṇo uggacchatīti sambandho.

[03]^b^Kome^eb^ti kiṃ ime? Tenāha ^b^‘‘kahaṃ ime’’^eb^ti? Vajjibhūmiṃ vajjiraṭṭhaṃ gatāti ^b^vajjibhūmiyā^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘vajjiraṭṭhābhimukhā gatā’’^eb^ti. Natthi etesaṃ nikebhaṃ nibaddhanivāsaṭṭhānanti ^b^aniketā^eb^ tenāha ^b^‘‘agehā’’^eb^ti. Utu eva sappāyaṃ, utuvasena vā kāyacittānaṃ kallattā sappāyaṃ. Esa nayo sesesupi.
[06]Sambahulasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^225^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ativela^eb^nti atibahukālaṃ. Bhikkhunā nāma upagatānaṃ upanisinnakathāmattaṃ vatvā ganthadhurehi vāsadhurehi vā yuttapayuttacittena bhavitabbaṃ, nātivelaṃ tesaṃ saññattibahulena. Thero pana tadā kenaci kāraṇena bahuvelaṃ gihisaññattibahulo ahosi, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ‘‘ativela’’ntiādi. Idāni tamatthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘bhagavatī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Ta^eb^nti taṃ tādisaṃ saññāpanaṃ sandhāya etaṃ ‘‘ativelaṃ gihisaññattibahulo’’ti vacanaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Bhikkhusaṅghassa kathaṃ sutvā^eb^ti saṅghassa ^a^M1.0300^ea^ majjhe nisīditvā therena kathitattā vuttaṃ. ^b^Satthusāsana^eb^nti piṭakattayaṃ vadati.

[03]^b^Pasakkiyā^eb^ti upasakkitvā gantvā. Taṃ pana tattha ajjhogāhanaṃ hotīti āha ^b^‘‘pavisitvā’’^eb^ti. Saṅkhāradukkhato nibbinnahadayassa sabbasaṅkhāravinissaṭaṃ nibbānaṃ yāthāvato paccavekkhantassa sammadeva samassāsakaraṃ hutvā upaṭṭhahantaṃ taṃ upari adhigamāya ussukkaṃ karonto nibbānaṃ hadaye nikkhipati nāmāti āha – ^b^‘‘nibbānaṃ…pe… opeti nāmā’’^eb^ti. Nibbānaṃ…pe… ārammaṇato opeti nāmāti ānetvā sambandho. Atthavirahitā ‘‘biḷibiḷī’’ti pavattakiriyā biḷikā, ayaṃ pana gihisaññattikathā therassa attano sāmaññatthāsādhanato devatāya biḷikā viyāti ^b^biḷibiḷikā^eb^ti vuttā.
[06]Ānandasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^226^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Anantare^eb^^a^V1.0263^ea^^b^attabhāve^eb^ti atītānantare devattabhāve. Thero hi tāvatiṃsadevalokā cavitvā idhūpapanno. ^b^Aggamahesī^eb^ti kāci paricārikā devadhītā cittapaṇidhānamattena idānipi devakāye bhavissati upacitakusaladhammattāti maññamānā tasmiṃ vattamānaṃ viya kathentī ^b^‘‘sobhasī’’^eb^ti āha. Evaṃ atītampissa dibbasotaṃ paccuppannaṃ viya maññeyya nāticirakālattāti dassento ^b^‘‘pubbepi sobhasī’’^eb^ti āha. Sugatinirayādiduggatiyā vasena duggatā etarahīti adhippāyo. ^b^Paṭipattiduggatiyā^eb^ kāmesu sammucchitabhāvato.

[03]^b^Patiṭṭhahanto^eb^ti nivisanto. ^b^Aṭṭhahi kāraṇehī^eb^ti cirakālaparibhāvanāya viruḷhamūlehi ayonisomanasikārādipaccayamūlakehi vuccamānehi aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi. ^b^Ratto rāgavasenā^eb^ti sabhāvato saṅkappato ca yathāsamīhite iṭṭhākāre sakkāye sañjātarāgavasā ratto giddho gadhito. ^b^Patiṭṭhātī^eb^ti oruyha tiṭṭhati. ^b^Duṭṭho dosavasenā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0301^ea^ sabhāvato saṅkappato ca yathāsamīhite aniṭṭhākāre sakkāye sañjātadosavasena duṭṭho rupitacitto. ^b^Mūḷho mohavasenā^eb^ti asamapekkhanena mūḷho muyhanavasena. ^b^Vinibaddho^eb^ti ahaṃkārena visesato nibandhanato mānavatthusmiṃ bandhito. ^b^Mānavasenā^eb^ti tena tena maññanākārena. ^b^Parāmaṭṭho^eb^ti dhammasabhāvaṃ niccādivasena parato āmaṭṭho. ^b^Diṭṭhivasenā^eb^ti micchādassanavasena. ^b^Thāmagato^eb^ti rāgādikilesavasena thāmaṃ thirabhāvaṃ upagato. ^b^Anusayavasenā^eb^ti maggena appahīnatāya anu anu santāne sayanavasena. Appahīnaṭṭho hi tesaṃ anusayaṭṭho. ^b^Aniṭṭhaṅgato^eb^ti saṃsayito. ^b^Vikkhepagato^eb^ti vikkhittabhāvaṃ upagato. ^b^Uddhaccavasenā^eb^ti cittassa uddhatabhāvavasena. ^b^Tāpī^eb^ti tāpi devakaññāyo. ^b^Evaṃ patiṭṭhitāvā^eb^ti yathāvuttanayena rattabhāvādinā sakkāyasmiṃ patiṭṭhitā eva. ^b^Naradevāna^eb^nti purisabhūtadevānaṃ.

[03]^b^Paṭigantu^eb^nti apekkhāvasena tato apagantuṃ apekkhaṃ vissajjetuṃ. ^b^Dussanta^eb^nti dasantaṃ, ‘‘vattha’’nti keci. ^b^Sūciṃ yojetvā^eb^ti sibbanasuttena sūciṃ yojetvā pāse ca pavesetvā. Manāpakāye devanikāye jātā ^b^manāpakāyikā^eb^. Tesaṃ pabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘manasā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Samajja^eb^nti saṃhitaṃ. ^b^Gamanabhāva^eb^nti gamanajjhāsayaṃ. ^b^Vikkhīṇo^eb^ti vicchindanavasena khīṇo. Devatānaṃ uttarimanussadhammārocane doso natthīti tāsaṃ puna anāgamanatthaṃ arahattaṃ byākāsi.
[06]Anuruddhasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^227^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Atikālenā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0264^ea^ ativiya pubbaṇhakālena, kālassevāti attho. ^b^Koṭisammuñjaniyā^eb^ti sammuñjanikoṭiyā, sammuñjaniyā ekadesenevāti attho. Iminā sammajjane amanāpakāritaṃ dasseti. ^b^Majjhanhike vītivatte^eb^ti gihisaṃsaggavasena kālaṃ vītināmento majjhanhe bahuvītivatte. ^b^Aññehi bhikkhūhī^eb^ti nātikālaṃ paviṭṭhehi. Nissakkavacanañcetaṃ. ^b^Bhāyāmi nāgadatta^eb^nti tassa paṭipattiṃ bhāyitabbaṃ katvā devatā vadantī ^a^M1.0302^ea^ paṭipattiyaṃ niyojeti. ^b^Suppagabbha^eb^nti kāyapāgabbiyādīhi ativiya samannāgataṃ.
[06]Nāgadattasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^228^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ogāhappatto^eb^ti vissāsavasena anuppavesaṃ patto. ^b^Aññataraṃ kula^eb^nti tasmiṃ kule jāyampatiṃ sandhāya vadati. ^b^‘‘Bahūpakāraṃ me etaṃ kulaṃ^eb^ ciraṃ sappāyāhāradānādinā; tasmā idhāhaṃ aggadakkhiṇeyyo jāto; imesaṃyeva deyyadhammapaṭiggaṇhanena puññaṃ vaḍḍhessāmī’’ti cintesi. Tenāha ^b^‘‘aññattha gantvā kiṃ karissāmī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Sā^eb^ti devatā. ^b^Ubhopete^eb^ti taṃ bhikkhuñca gharaṇiñca sandhāya vadati. ^b^Paṭigādhappattā^eb^ti paṭigādhaṃ pattā aññamaññasmiṃ patiṭṭhitavissāsena.

[03]Vissamappattivasena santiṭṭhanti etthāti ^b^saṇṭhānaṃ,^eb^ vissamanaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^Samāgantvā^eb^ti sannipatitvā. Paṭiññūdāharaṇehi mantayatīti ^b^mantanaṃ,^eb^ ñāpakaṃ kāraṇaṃ. ^b^Paṭilomasaddā^eb^ti paṭilomabhāvena patitattā asaccavibhāvanā paṭikūlasaddā. ^b^Tena kāraṇenā^eb^ti tena kāraṇapaṭirūpakena micchāvacanena. ^b^Na maṅkuhotabbaṃ^eb^ akārakabhāvato. ^b^Saddena paritassatī^eb^ti parehi attani payuttamicchāsaddamattena paritassanasīlo. ^b^Vataṃ na sampajjatī^eb^ti yathāsamādinnavataṃ lahucittatāya na pāripūriṃ gacchati. ^b^Sampannavato^eb^ti paripuṇṇasīlādivataguṇo
[06]Kulagharaṇīsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^229^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vajjiraṭṭhe rājaputto^eb^ti vajjiraṭṭhe jātasaṃvaddho vajjirājaputto. ^b^Sabbaratticāro^eb^ti chaṇasampattiyā ito cito carantehi anubhavitabbanakkhattamaho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kattikanakkhattaṃ ghosetvā’’^eb^^a^V1.0265^ea^ tiādi. ^b^Ekābaddhaṃ hotī^eb^ti yasmā cātumahārājikadevā tasmiṃ divase nakkhattaṃ ^a^M1.0303^ea^ ghosetvā attano puññānubhāvasiddhāya dibbasampattiyā mahantaṃ nakkhattakīḷāsukhaṃ anubhavanti, tasmā taṃ tehi ekābaddhaṃ viya hoti. ^b^Bheriāditūriyāna^eb^nti bherimudiṅgasaṅkhapaṇavavīṇāditūriyānaṃ. ^b^Tāḷitāna^eb^nti āraddhalayānurūpaṃ pahaṭānaṃ. ^b^Vīṇādīna^eb^nti vīṇāveṇugomukhīādīnaṃ. ^b^Vāditāna^eb^nti yathāraddhamucchanānurūpaṃ saṅghaṭṭitānaṃ. ^b^Abhāsī^eb^ti tena saddena ākaḍḍhiyamānahadayo ayoniso ummujjitvā ‘‘mahatī vata me jānī’’ti anutthunanto abhāsi. ^b^Chaḍḍitadārukaṃ viyā^eb^ti vane chaḍḍitaniratthakakaḷiṅgaraṃ viya. ^b^Lāmakataro^eb^ti nihīnataro. Devatā paṭhamappitaṃ āṇiṃ paṭāṇiyā nīharantī viya tena bhikkhunā vuttamatthaṃ apanentī ‘‘tassa te bahukā pihayantī’’ti avocāti vuttanti dassento ^b^‘‘thero’’^eb^tiādimāha. Saggaṃ gacchantānaṃ yathā nerayikā pihayanti, evaṃ sammāpaṭipannassa tuyhaṃ bahū pihayanti, tasmā tvaṃ ‘‘pāpiyo’’ti attānaṃ mā maññitthāti adhippāyo.
[06]Vajjiputtasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^230^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Nissaraṇapariyattivasenā^eb^ti addhā imaṃ pariyattiṃ nissāya vaṭṭadukkhato nissarituṃ labbhāti evaṃ nissaraṇapariyattivasena. ^b^Sajjhāyanato^eb^ti vimuttāyatanasīse ṭhatvā sajjhāyanato. Idāni tassa nissaraṇapariyattivasena sajjhāyanakaraṇaṃ, paṭipattivasena vattapaṭivattakaraṇaṃ, vipassanābhāvanañca dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘so kirā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Arahattaṃ pattadivase paṭipattikittanāya purimadivasesupi tathā paṭipajji, vipassanaṃ pana ussukkāpetuṃ nāsakkhīti dasseti. ^b^Kālaṃ ativattetī^eb^ti idaṃ ^b^‘‘saṅkasāyatī’’^eb^ti padassa atthavacanaṃ. ^b^Therassā^eb^ti sajjhāyakattherassa.

[03]^b^Dhammapadānī^eb^ti sīlādidhammakkhandhadīpakāni padāni. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sabbampi buddhavacanaṃ adhippeta’’^eb^nti. Na gaṇhāsi uddesanti adhippāyo. Pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘bhikkhūhi saṃvasanto’’ti iminā tesaṃ dhammassavanatthāyapi dhammo pariyāpuṇitabboti dasseti. Virajjati etenāti ^b^virāgo,^eb^ ariyamaggo. ^b^Jānitvā^eb^ti pariññābhisamayavasena diṭṭhasutādiṃ yāthāvato jānitvā paṭivijjhitvā. ^b^Vissajjana^eb^nti ^a^M1.0304^ea^ pahānaṃ. ^b^Na buddhavacanassa^eb^ vissajjanaṃ. Bhaṇḍāgārikapariyattiyāpi anuññātattā pageva nissaraṇatthāya, tattha pana mattā jānitabbāti dassento ^b^‘‘ettāvatā’’^eb^tiādimāha.
[06]Sajjhāyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^231^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Akusale^eb^^a^V1.0266^ea^^b^vitakke^eb^ti akosallasambhūtaṭṭhena akusale micchāvitakke. Yoni vuccati upāyo, tasmā asubhādike subhādivasena manasikāro ayonisomanasikāroti āha ^b^‘‘anupāyamanasikārenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pāsādikakammaṭṭhāna^eb^nti pasādāvahaṃ buddhānussatiādikammaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^Balavapītiñca sukhañcā^eb^ti nīvaraṇavikkhambhanato balavantaṃ upacārajjhānasahagataṃ pītiñca sukhañca.
[06]Akusalavitakkasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^232^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Nandanavagge^eb^ti nandanavaggavaṇṇanāyaṃ tattha idhāpi gāthāya visesābhāvato. Yadi evaṃ kasmā tattha saṅgītaṃ idha gahitanti? Devatāpaṭisaṃyuttataṃ upādāya devatāsaṃyutte saṅgahitampi aṭṭhuppattiyā paṭisaṃyuttattā idha gahitaṃ.
[06]Majjhanhikasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^233^eb^^b^.^eb^ Terasame yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ vitthāritamevāti yojanā. ^b^Jantudevaputtasutte^eb^ti jantudevaputtasuttasaṃvaṇṇanāya. ‘‘Tattha saṅgītaṃ idhāpī’’tiādi anantarasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayameva.
[06]Pākatindriyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^234^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Gandhārammaṇaṃ^eb^^a^M1.0305^ea^^b^upanijjhāyatī^eb^ti gandhasaṅkhātaṃ ārammaṇaṃ upecca nijjhāyati, rūpārammaṇena viya viññāṇena rūpaṃ, gandhārammaṇena taṃ upecca nijjhāyati paccakkhato, yāthāvato sabhāvato paṭivijjhatīti attho. ^b^Upasiṅghissatī^eb^ti taṇhāvasena upagantvā siṅghissati.

[03]^b^Ekaṅgametaṃ^eb^^a^V1.0267^ea^^b^theyyāna^eb^nti ārammaṇavasena theyyavatthūsu vibhajiyamānesu ekamaṅgametaṃ gandhārammaṇanti āha ^b^‘‘thenitabbāna’’^eb^ntiādi. Ojāpekkhāya theyyāya pavattamānāya dhammārammaṇatāpi tassā siyā, sā pana na madhurā theyyakatā cāti ^b^‘‘pañcakoṭṭhāsāna’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Kāmañca taṃ gandhārammaṇaṃ kenaci pariggahitaṃ na hotīti ādiyituṃ sakkā, satthārā pana ananuññātattā na yutto tassa paribhogo. Yaṃ pana tena bhikkhunā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘na harāmi na bhañjāmī’’^eb^ti, tassapi ayameva parihāro. Vaṇṇīyati phalaṃ etenāti ^b^vaṇṇaṃ,^eb^ kāraṇanti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘vaṇṇenāti kāraṇenā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Tasmi^eb^nti tasmiṃ bhikkhusmiṃ. ^b^Ākiṇṇakammanto^eb^ti taṇhādiṭṭhiādivasena akusalakammanto diṭṭhimohataṇhādivasena ādito paṭṭhāya kusalakammānaṃ paṭikkhepanato. Diṭṭhivasena ca kathinakakkhaḷakharigatattā ^b^‘‘akhīṇakammanto kakkhaḷakammanto’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Ākiṇṇaluddo^eb^ti ākiṇṇo hutvā kakkhaḷo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘bahupāpo’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Makkhito^eb^ti litto. ^b^Ta^eb^nti devatācodanaṃ. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti atikkamma ṭhitattā‘‘tvañcārahāmi vattave’’ti evamāha.

[03]^b^Gavesantassa^eb^ attano santāne uppādanavasena pariyesantassa. Anekayojanāyāmavitthāraṃ gaganatalaṃ byāpetvā uppannavalāhakakūṭappamāṇaṃ viya. ^b^Suddho^eb^ti sīlena parisuddho ayanti jānāsi. ^b^Sugati^eb^nti sundaranibbattiṃ. Tena nibbānassapi saṅgaho siddho.
[06]Gandhatthenasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Sāratthappakāsiniyā saṃyuttanikāya-aṭṭhakathāya
[06]Vanasaṃyuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^235^eb^^b^.^eb^ Attano ^a^V1.0268^ea^^a^M1.0306^ea^ pariṇāyakattena indo nāma mahesakkho, indoti samaññā assāti katvā ‘‘indako’’tipi vuccati, tassa ^b^indakassa^eb^. Indakūṭe pabbate nivasatīti indakūṭanivāsī, tassa ^b^indakūṭanivāsino^eb^. Balikammehi yajitabbato pūjitabbato yakkho, tassa ^b^yakkhassa^eb^. Indassa nivāsaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ kūṭaṃ indakūṭanti ^b^yakkhato kūṭena nāmaṃ laddhaṃ^eb^. Indakūṭo indo uttarapadalopena yathā ‘‘kelāsakūṭo kelāso’’ti. Indo yakkhoti ^b^kūṭato yakkhena nāmaṃ laddhaṃ^eb^. ^b^Na^eb^ cettha itarītaranissayadoso aññamaññūpalakkhaṇabhāvato yathā taṃ ‘‘kāyakammaṭṭhāna’’nti. ^b^Rūpa^eb^nti sakalaṃ rūpakkhandhamāha, na rūpāyatananti. Imaṃ sarīraṃ pecca ayaṃ kinti paṭilabhatīti codeti.

[03]^b^Kuto āgacchatī^eb^ti parādhārarūpe jīve attani mātukucchimokkante rūpassa sambhavoti kuto nāma ṭhānato āgacchati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘imāni ca aṭṭhīni imā ca maṃsapesiyo’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Kathaṃ nvaya^eb^nti ayaṃ kucchisaṅkhāte gabbhare kathaṃ sajjatīti pucchati. ‘‘Sīhānaṃva nadantānaṃ, dāṭhīnaṃ girigabbhare’’tiādinā (theragā. nidānagāthā) gabbharo ca kucchivācako āgato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘gabbharasminti mātukucchismi’’^eb^nti. ^b^Puggalavādī^eb^ti attavādupādāno. Yathā hi macchamaṃsaṃ bhuttaṃ pheṇaṃ viya hutvā vilīyati, na ca paññāyati sattabhāvena appavattanato, evamevaṃ yadi mātukucchismiṃ gabbhabhāvena uppannaṃ rūpaṃ satto na bhaveyya no vaḍḍheyya, vilīyitvā gaccheyya, paññāyati ca taṃ rūpaṃ, tasmā jīvoti imāya ^b^laddhiyā. Evamāhā^eb^ti ‘‘rūpaṃ…pe… gabbharasmi’’nti evamavoca. ^b^Paṭhama^eb^nti etesaṃ pañcannaṃ paṭhamaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘paṭhamena paṭisandhiviññāṇena saddhi’’^eb^nti. ^b^‘‘Jātiuṇṇaṃsūhī^eb^ti jātieḷakāya uṇṇaṃsūhī’’ti vadanti. ‘‘Gabbhaṃ phāletvā gahitauṇṇā ^b^jātiuṇṇā^eb^. Tassā aṃsūhi ^b^tīhi katasuttagge’’^eb^ti saṃyuttabhāṇakānaṃ adhippāyo.

[03]^b^Anāvilo^eb^ti ^a^V1.0269^ea^ accho, suppasannoti attho. ^b^Evaṃvaṇṇappaṭibhāga^eb^nti vuttappamāṇasaṇṭhānasamparicchinnaṃ. ^b^Kalalaṃ sampavuccatī^eb^ti attabhāvo bhūtupādārūpasaṅkhāto ^a^M1.0307^ea^ santānavasena pavattamāno kalalaṃ nāmāti kathīyati.
[03]^b^Kalalā^eb^ti yathāvuttakalalarūpahetu taṃ nissāya paccayaṃ katvā. ^b^Maṃsadhovanaudakavaṇṇa^eb^nti vaṇṇato maṃsadhovanaudakavaṇṇaṃ, saṇṭhānato pana vilīnatipusadisaṃ.

[03]^b^Paripakka^eb^nti paripākakalalabhāvato paripākaṃ gataṃ suparipākaṃ gataṃ. ^b^Samūhata^eb^nti samūhabhūtaṃ saṅgataṃ. ^b^Vivaṭṭamāna^eb^nti pariṇamantaṃ. ^b^Tabbhāva^eb^nti karaṇe etaṃ upayogavacanaṃ, tabbhāvena pariṇamantanti attho. Nissakke vā upayogavacanaṃ, tabbhāvato kalalabhāvato kalalaṃ vipariṇamantaṃ. ^b^Abbudaṃ nāma jāyati,^eb^ abbudaṃ nāma sampajjatīti attho.
